(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

you know, i wanted to give Jaskier an edge in this so that's why he's a little ooc at times. Imagine giving almost your all to some lumbering idiot only for him to ditch you like that? It'll give any cheerful man a pause and roughen his edges so yeah, he's a little bit bitter and angry but he's doing well regardless!!!
I also love the idea of a jaskier/yennefer friendship bc she'd be the best wingwoman ever. and i really love triss so i mixed up a bit of her from the netflix show and the games to give it some depth.

WOW okay WOW you guys like holy shit
I just finished this chap and it's all thanks to all of your amazing comments i'm truly honoured to be accepted with open arms into this new and funky fresh fandom and that you all like this story so far!
I dont think i would have finished this chapter as fast as i did if you guys hadnt taken a shine to the first one! And while i dont think i'll respond to all of them know that i have read them and that i appreciate them greatly and wow. i'm just so flattered, gosh!

Anyway! Surprise! It's a Geralt POV chapter!
I'll get back to y'all in the notes at the end abt my thoughts on this one!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Okay SO
-Geralt is a dumbass but he's trying. I loved breaking the fourth wall with him a little so excuse me being a literature nerd. I also needed to make sure that he knows what he did wrong and that it was clear from the start that he's been an asshole.
- Triss is PURE and must be PROTECTED and i love her a lot okay Triss baby you dont need Geralt i'll marry you
- i went in on that monster bit a little bc i do love that whole aspect of the series but i just cant fit an entire monster hunting mystery into this without it seeming like it's unnecessary and the Gryttie is a nordic cryptid or something that i'd looked up when i needed an acquatic based monster for the scene
-it took me far longer than id like to admit to settle on a proper timeline for this fic and ill probably make a graphic for it eventually if anyone wants to see it (once the fic is over of course) AND i mostly completely disregard the shows actual timeline bc my mans (jaskier) doesnt look a day over 25.
- What is Yen up to? Well, she's being the best wingwoman she can possibly be and maybe she exaggerates a little sometimes but - well, anything for a happy ending right?
- What is Yen up to? pt. two - it's not as important but stay tuned anyway!
geralt with some braids that i drew

hoooo my lovelies!! Here it is, the final chapter! You've all been so wonderful and I'm so glad you like my edge-lord bitter Jaskier and soft goth himbo Geralt so much!
Some warnings for the smut: graphic, barebacking bc duh, btm jaskier but he's bossy, jaskier's potty mouth and geralt getting a little possessive, overall p soft and sweet
As a sidenote i always find it hard not to use modern day terms and slang for things so if u catch something out of place dont mind me my brain's wired for contemp language and i don't read books lmao
More in the end notes as always and enjoy!
Also, people calling Jaskier Julian when they want to be serious is my new headcanon
I also drop some canon lore in there abt the two but thats neither here nor there

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Okay, first of all! I want to address the Yen/Triss situation:
- in game, as far as i know, they were both super into Geralt and i simply, did not give a fuck and cut out the middle man (geralt) and now they're engage to be married and on the run bc Yen probably did some dumb shit and got them into trouble
Second of all: Jaskier and Geralt lived happily ever after and Geralt found Jaskier in every life that they lived ever because they're SOULMATES okay.
Thirdly: i didnt go into the grovelling as much as i wanted to because i wanted it to be going on over a period of several days so if he'd done it all at once it would have been more detailed but not as impactful as imagining geralt hanging out and gardening for two weeks
And lastly, i want to thank everyone for loving this story and supporting my dumb ideas and headcanons and i hope yall are satisfied with the ending!

author: ['AvoidingAverage']
title: The Sweetest Poison
fandoms: ['Wiedźmin | The Witcher - All Media Types', 'The Witcher (TV)']
relationships: ['Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia/Jaskier | Dandelion']
characters: ['Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia', 'Jaskier | Dandelion']
additional_tags: ['Hurt/Comfort', 'Mild torture', 'First Kiss', 'Mutual Pining', 'Jaskier | Dandelion Loves Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia', 'Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia Whump', 'Hurt Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia', 'Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia Has Feelings', 'Angst', 'Angst with a Happy Ending', 'Whump', 'Badass Jaskier', "That's right", 'Jaskier can be badass too']
summary:
“And what do you want in return?  Your freedom? Your safety?”

Jaskier didn’t flinch from her scorn and Geralt could see his knuckles go white with the force of his grip around the small vial.  “Save him.”

The mage stared at him for a beat before letting out a burst of laughter that echoed off the wall like the flutter of vultures wings.  “All this trouble for the Witcher?” she asked incredulously, “Tell me, boy, do you really think he would do the same for you? That he cares at all what happens to the bard who follows after him like a lost puppy?”  She stepped forward, confident as a soldier preparing his death blow. “Oh, I know who you are, bard. I watched you trailing after the Witcher, eager for every scrap of affection or interest he’ll toss your way. I’ve seen the way you look at him.”

Jaskier was breathing heavily now, jaw clenched tight enough that Geralt could see the muscles fluttering with effort.

“Were you hoping this ill-conceived rescue mission would be enough to make him finally notice you?” she murmured with a mocking smile, “Poor little bard--always singing of love but never truly experiencing it.”
notes:
This is my first foray into The Witcher fandom so I hope you'll excuse any mistakes you may find along the way. I've just finished the series on Netflix and was feeling like a good ol' fashioned whump was necessary to resolve some of my feelings.

Enjoy.

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

I hope you like this angsty little story of mine. I'd love to hear your thoughts in the comments! Based on feedback I may decide to continue writing a multi-chapter romance between our favorite Witcher and his Bard.

summary: "Right, well," Jaskier says, when he halts before Geralt. Up close, he looks much more nervous. notes:
Many thanks to you lovelies on tumblr, Twitter, and ao3, and to Henry Cavill's commitment to the bit. Title from the Reginald Shepherd poem "you, therefore."
 

and you fall from the sky
with several flowers, words spill from your mouth
in waves, your lips taste like the sea, salt-sweet (trees
and seas have flown away, I call it
loving you): home is nowhere, therefore you,
a kind of dwell and welcome, song after all,
and free of any eden we can name

Enter HeroCon:X.

summary:
There's a tiny clock on his wrist, bright red numbers. It's supposed to tick, supposed to move, supposed to tell him when he'll meet his soulmate. The time will run to zero when they've met, moving numbers will become stationary—the ticking that signified uncertainty transforming to the silent stability of forever.

Iwaizumi Hajime's clock hasn't ticked for as long as he can remember.

additional_tags: ['Humor', 'Attempt at Humor', 'Dark Humor', 'There are TWO scenes that contain', 'Angst', "It was necessary for plot I'm sorry", 'Explicit Language', 'i curse a lot', 'we know this', 'Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Canon Era', 'Not Canon Compliant', "Arthur Knows About Merlin's Magic (Merlin)", 'Magic Revealed', 'Good Morgana (Merlin)', 'Arthur Is Trying', 'Snarky Merlin (Merlin)', "Uther Finds Out About Merlin's Magic (Merlin)", 'POV Arthur Pendragon (Merlin)', 'Immortal Merlin (Merlin)']
series: Part 6 of Me @ Merlin Writers: What if You Didn't Murder My Favorite Characters?
summary:
Arthur could see his father glaring down - face red and eyes narrowed as he looked at Merlin with clear distaste.

"Once this over, sorcerer...I’ll burn you."

"You’ve already tried that," Merlin’s voice answered and Arthur had to bite his fist to keep from making any noise. “You need to accept you can’t kill me… Hand me that blanket, please.”

“I’m sure there must be some method… Beheading?”

“No, we tried that.”

“Hanging?”

“I just sort of... Swung there, remember?”

There was another pause.

“I should have made you keep that dragon below the castle so I could feed you to it.”

“Kilgharrah? He won’t eat me, but if you want to torture me than making me listen to his nonsense for an hour might do it.” Merlin said and there was a soft sigh from the other end of the room. “I’m glad you agreed to help me though. Usually I have to do the grunt work of saving Arthur myself.”

“I can’t wait to kill you.” 

Or

Uther finds out about Merlin’s magic, but can’t seem to kill him. Merlin is just trying to protect Arthur. They become a begrudgingly effective duo. Arthur doesn't understand why they think he isn't noticing this.

series: Part 1 of Dreamers Never Die
summary:
Izuku gets de-aged to 3 years old and Shota Aizawa is really not being paid enough to deal with any of this.

-
“Izuku, how old are you right now?”

Izuku's wide green eyes stare back at him. “I'm- I'm 3, Mr. Eraser.”

“Okay. What's the last thing you remember?”

Izuku looks down at his lap, his small fingers tracing over a bruise on his stomach. “Papa was angry cause I was too loud. So I cried and took a nap and now I'm awake here... Did Papa take me here?”

Shota exhales and decides that the truth might be too confusing for now. “Well, I'm going to take care of you until you feel better, okay? You're going to be staying with me for now. Your dad's gone. He won't hurt you anymore.”

Izuku looks up, eyes full of hope that dares not be called hope, something so shaky and hesitant but desperate nonetheless. “Really?”

And for once, Shota gives his student a smile. “I promise. Cross my heart.”

Bakugou isn't a heartless asshole, Hizashi keeps taking pictures and ruining Aizawa's reputation as the Snape of the school, and Izuku and Todoroki have a heart-to-heart.

The quotes that are in italics are Bakugou's unless stated otherwise.

additional_tags: ['soulmate!AU', 'Polyamory', 'the course of love never did run smooth though', 'Darcy Lewis takes on the Big Apple', 'Darcy POV', 'Threesome', 'First Time']
summary:
Darcy has imagined her soulmates a million times. Her plan for their first meeting is to punch them in the face with all her might. Her first soulmark-- “Well, at least she’s got a nice rack”-- has been plaguing her since she was born, fueling every self-conscious fear she had ever had. The second, which had only appeared a few years back, is equally as insulting. At least at that point she was a little too focused on the aliens streaming from the sky to really concern herself about whatever jerk she was destined to connect with. Who needs soulmates anyway?

She just didn’t expect “You've got to be kidding me” to be such a hunk.

additional_tags: ['Kid Fic', 'Married Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead/Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic', 'Shinsou Hitoshi Replaces Mineta Minoru', 'Shinsou Hitoshi is in Class 1-A', '5+1 Things', 'i was gonna make this gen but then i found out its shindeku month', 'i can have a little shindeku.... as a treat', 'Parental Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead', 'its big brother izuku hours!!!! thats his sister!!!!']
summary:
“Is there anyone else you want us to call?” Ochako asks gently, and Eri chews on her lip and looks down and away. “Do you want me to call Deku?” Ochako pushes, and it’s worth it for the way Eri’s head snaps back up to her, eyes wide with hope, before she looks away again.

“I’ll send him a text!” Mina pipes up, already having her phone out and typing rapidly on it. “He’s just on the other side of the building, Eri-chan,” she waves the phone at her with a wide smile that squints her eyes shut. “All done, he should be here any min-“

The door to the room slams open, making them all jump and jerk their heads towards it. Ochako brings her fists up instinctively, heart hammering in her throat.

“What’s wrong with Eri?” Deku demands, standing in the doorway, green lightning sparking off his skin, eyes shifting around wildly as if looking for a threat, body braced in a battle stance.

(Or: 5 times Eri falls asleep on Izuku + 1 time Izuku falls asleep on her)

series: Part 3 of Wangxian's Time-Travelling Shenanigans
summary:
His brother was carrying a child, and neither he nor Wei Wuxian seemed surprised that he was there. Lan Xichen felt mounting dread build up inside him.

“Xichen-ge!” Wei Wuxian called out, waving cheerfully. “Xichen-ge, guess what? We’re parents now!”

(Wherein a time-traveling Wangxian have absolutely no self-control, and everyone else is just slowly losing their minds).
notes:
Here's another fic in this series! It would be best to read "Nothing's Gonna Stop Us Now" and "The Mess We've Left Behind" first, but if any of you want to jump straight into this one - basically, Lan Wangji and Wei Wuxian have time traveled back to their younger bodies, and this all happened midway through the events at the Guanyin Temple, pre-confession scene. They ended up in the middle of class on their first day, and ended up going to hell with it, and confessing in front of everyone. And then they ran off and eloped, and everyone was very, very confused, since as far as they knew, LWJ and WWX didn't even know each other.

This fic will take place in multiple scenes spanning different amounts of time after the events of these previous two fics. There will be five smaller stories in total that make up this fic.

A-Yuan will be showing up in this, in the last of these fics, which will be in the next chapter I post!

Hope you guys enjoy this :D

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

So, I finally decided to write another fic for this series! And it literally all spanned from one comment on another one of my fics from Dandelion_sama that said: "There's this a simple , practical method to drive people ending their seclusion quickly, that even the infamous live only for seclusion, qingheng jun, would fall for it and end his seclusion, and reunite with his family...."

and that made me really want to write a fic where this happens, and then I thought about this series, and somehow ended up coming up with a bunch of other ideas...and then this happened.

So this is basically happening in multiple little drabbles (well they were meant to be little, and some might be smaller than others but...yeah they really didn't end up being that small haha. So maybe mini-oneshots?) that take place in the Wangxian time travel universe. I've basically written the whole thing already so chapter 2 will come out sometime this week.

Chapter 2 will include 3 mini stories: "Jin Zixuan Learns Something New" "The Death of Wen Ruohan" and "Meet Our New Child!" (this last one will have A-Yuan showing up! So look forward to that haha)

Hope you guys enjoy this! The response to my other two stories in this series has been unbelievable, so thank you to all of you guys for that :D

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

So the end is here (so far anyway). Who knows though, I might end up writing more for this in the future...and if I do, I'll most likely just end up adding onto this fic.

That being said, if you guys have any ideas/requests you would like me to write for this, feel free to mention them in the comments! Can't promise I'll get to them straight away, or if I'd be able to add them to this series, but I'll see what I can do!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Just a short chapter based on a bunch of comments left on the previous chapter - quite a few of you mentioned how funny it would be if Jingyi somehow ended up as the heir, and that gave me inspiration to write this. Hopefully you guys enjoy it, and feel free to give me suggestions/ideas for potential future chapters!

(Also, why do I just seem to love torturing LQR in my fics? xD)

Also, I have no idea if Jingyi is his birth name or courtesy name, and I'm assuming courtesy name, but I absolutely suck at coming up with original names, so I'm just sticking with Jingyi here haha

Hope you guys enjoyed this! :)

summary:
There should have been nothing remarkable about two people in a busy cafeteria, but Becket takes in the familiar sight of curly hair, brown eyes, and a t-shirt with a science pun on it talking animatedly alongside Actual Anthony Edward Stark and promptly drops his lunch.

He gapes for a solid second, seeing but not believing. It definitely doesn’t look like Mr. Stark is forcing the kid to leave, or firing him, or escorting him to security given the relaxed smiles on both of their faces. If anything, Becket thinks Mr. Stark looks rather proud.

“So, uh, Mr. Stark definitely knows Roomba-Kid,” Becket says and discreetly tilts his head in the direction of the pair.

“Oh my god,” Jess says. She almost sounds gleeful. “Oh my god, he’s not just some random kid. He’s Mr. Stark’s kid.”

or: the interns at Stark Industries have some questions about Peter Parker. The answers aren’t quite what they expect.

summary:
To his unbridled horror, Wei Wuxian sees his face up on the giant screen in real time for the entire stadium to see. Still laughing as his face takes a moment to catch up with the sheer mortification he’s feeling, A-Yuan perched on his shoulders as the Lan Wangji cape drapes over them.

There’s also commentary.

“—scenes from the stands here, this dad and his son making for an adorable twosome all decked out in support for local hero Lan Wangji—”

“—Speaking of, our man seems to have taken a little tumble—”

Wei Wuxian finds Lan Wangji on the field. The ball is nowhere near him but he seems to have fallen inexplicably backwards, sitting on the grass as he looks up at the giant screen.

Right up at the footage of him.

(AU where A-Yuan is professional footballer Lan Wangji's biggest fan, and his babysitter Wei Wuxian wants nothing more than to forget his days as the photographer of their school football team, calling out to the captain from the stands just so he'd look around at him.)

author: ['Bergen']
title: Good publicity
relationships: ['Pepper Potts/Tony Stark', 'Peter Parker & Tony Stark', 'Peter Parker & Pepper Potts']
characters: ['Peter Parker', 'Tony Stark', 'Pepper Potts']
additional_tags: ['Peter Parker Needs a Hug', 'Peter Parker is a Little Shit', 'Tony Stark Has A Heart', "Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker's Parental Figure", 'Secret Identity', 'Identity Reveal', 'Dead May Parker (Spider-Man)', 'Foster Care', 'civil war never happened', "Don't copy to another site"]
summary:
“That was a disaster. The press is having a field day.”
“It wasn’t my fault,” Tony defends. “That Spider-Guy never knows when to shut up. He distracted me.”
“Your reputation took a blow,” Pepper tells him. “Which will be fixed, of course. I’ve already set it up.”
“Set what up? What, am I going to make flower arrangements with the elderly?”
Pepper slides a piece of paper towards him. “Try an orphan. His name is Peter Parker. His biggest dream is to meet you. But…” She hesitates.
“But?”
“Apparently he doesn’t talk much. Sometimes not at all. Trauma-related.”
“A smart kid who doesn’t talk? Perfect combination. If only all my employees were like that.”
---
Or: Between Peter Parker barely speaking, and Spider-Man being the ultimate chatterbox, how was Tony ever supposed to figure out that they were one and the same person?

summary:
Ozai said he'd killed Iroh. So when he shot lightning at Zuko- the lightning came back. Azula's fire broke when she saw Ozai dead- Zuko promised to fix things.
Everyone is confused about where the Fire Nation troopes are going.
Zuko is Fire Lord. Everyone is kind of confused about that too.

Aang finds a teacher. Zuko is finding a teacher. Everyone is mostly still depressed.

Azula and Zuko go on a Field trip

People meet people and are confused.

Um... Stuff happens.

Turtle ducks and fire- but not really combined.

The Gaang figures out Zuko sent and assassin after then. They aren't happy.

Meetings are held

Zuko is diagnosed

Toph tries her hand at earth healing. King Kui is confused. And Jeong Jeong is depressed.

I don't know.
I can't remember what I wrote.
So there.

Actually I do remember.

I can say with some certainty that Aang gets a letter and Jeong Jeong is concerned.
The two are not related.

Miscommunication is horrible.

Really.

Piandao is convinced of Zuko's innocent. Really- was there ever any doubt?

Jeong Jeong despairs for King Kuei's security measures.

Piandao talks to Iroh
Kuei arrives in Ba Sing Se
Turtle Ducks

The title is good enough I think

End of the story-
Bit short
Which is why I posted the last chapter and this one kind of together
notes:
I didn't spend as much time editing this as I usually do- I wanted to publish it before life happened- so if anyone sees any glaring mistakes they want to tell me about- feel free.
Writing Fanfic has led to to know that I don't ever actually read names. I just kinda blip over them and then I have to look them up to see how they're actually supposed to be spelled... if anyone notices any of that stuff I will fix it!
Other than that- thanks for reading!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

I melted my car on accident. Doesn't have anything to do with the story. But it did happen. On the bright side, things went wrong in the best possible way. :)

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Next up- combustion man. You gotta admit that you were wondering what happened to him...

So... it's been awhile.
Blame COVID-19.
Or me.
It's your choice.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

So, in the next chapter I'm thinking of going back in time for Hakoda and Katara's meeting and a bit of family fluff stuff... If a time jump doesn't bother anyone that is...

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Me and cars are not getting along lately.

They seem to be breaking at proportionally smaller rates every time I buy one.

Felix melted after seven months.
Beck was driving (I was driving, technically, bit still) peacefully along in a straight line on a straight road going under the speed limit and got nailed by another car turning left less than a week after I got her
Ralph broke within the first thirty minutes of driving him...

I think Ralph is fixed now though.
Hopefully.
Probably.

notes:
Since neither of us is pursuing a career in law or law-related topics, you'll have to forgive the inaccuracies that can probably be found everywhere in this story. This is meant as a fic equivalent of a courtroom drama, with all the allowances for storytelling that it implies, not an accurate depiction of how this trial would go down if it actually took place.

Apologies to people whose (user)names we have inadvertently, or indeed purposefully stolen; all happenings in this story are fictional.

Thank you to Kora & the twitter crew for listening to us break down over writing this.

summary:
“This drink, the mage made it. It is going to make you a good boy,” she brushed back his hair, too long nails trailing along his cheek. “But you cannot tell anyone. You cannot tell a soul about this drink or this spell. You don’t talk about it. You keep it secret.”

 

Julian opened his mouth to ask more and was hit by a pain he had never experienced. The boy cried out in pain and doubled over, arm wrapping around his screaming middle. His mother shushed him and pet at him until he was able to catch his breath.

 

“See what happens to naughty little boys who don’t listen?” Her voice was sharp. “I told you not to say anything.”

--

Jaskier was cursed with obedience as a child and has mostly learned to get by without others knowing. Geralt is not most people.

Y'all.

This chapter has been a LOT to write!

I'm a special education teacher and just restarted school so my life was super crazy THEN I found out that I'm pregnant with my first child which while super exciting means I'm soooooooo tired.

Excuses aside, I really wanted to do this chapter justice. I wrote it like fifty times and this time I realized that this is how I wanted this story to end.

I am so, so grateful for y'all support and love throughout this story. I loved writing it! Thank you again!
notes:
My first foray into Witcher fic! I just finished the series and read this prompt and had no choice but to go for it.

I hope everyone is doing okay during this crazy time!! Stay safe!

Chapter Warnings!

Sexual abuse

I've started posting this on tumblr too if you want to read it there :)

thequeenofallcorgis.tumblr.com

Also posted on my Tumblr: https://thequeenofallcorgis.tumblr.com/

I was planning on making the mountain scene rough but then I decided to make it soul crushing. It's in the next chapter and I'm already so sorry.

Aw man, here we go.

Lots of dumb decisions are made by dumb people and lots of hearts are broken.

Please don't hate me.

WARNING! Fleeting thoughts of suicide. Please don't read if it will upset you.

Oh man, oh man guys.

Oi, so sorry this took me so long to get out! I am moving into a new position at work with a TON of new responsibility and duties and I've been frantically trying to train for it before the school year starts (or doesn't? but we don't know and that is another stressor)

REGARDLESS, I can't tell you how appreciative I am for your comments and beautiful words. Honestly, it makes my day every time I read them!

Here's the chapter I'm sure you've been waiting for, Geralt and Jaskier finally sit down and talk.

Awwww man y'all, strap in. Things are about to get CRAZY.

Shorter chapter but I'm happy with it! Things are finally looking up!

I'm expecting a few more chapters out of this story. Look forward to happy things! (finally!)

author: ['pupeez4eva']
title: A Wedding For The Ages
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
fandoms: ['魔道祖师 - 墨香铜臭 | Módào Zǔshī - Mòxiāng Tóngxiù']
relationships: ['Lan Zhan | Lan Wangji/Wei Ying | Wei Wuxian', 'Jiang Yanli/Jin Zixuan']
characters: ['Wei Ying | Wei Wuxian', 'Jiang Cheng | Jiang Wanyin', 'Nie Huaisang', 'Lan Zhan | Lan Wangji', 'Lan Yuan | Lan Sizhui', 'Lan Huan | Lan Xichen', 'Lan Qiren', 'Wēn Qíng', 'Wen Ning | Wen Qionglin', 'Jiang Yanli', 'Jin Zixuan']
additional_tags: ['Time Travel', 'Humor', 'Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Alternate Universe - Everyone Lives/Nobody Dies', 'Canon divergence in that they travel to a MUCH happier version of the future']
summary:
After a mishap, Wei Wuxian, Jiang Cheng and Nie Huaisang find themselves stuck in the future. Luckily, everyone is far too preoccupied to pay much attention to them, because apparently there is a wedding happening in the Cloud Recesses that day, between Hanguang-Jun — whoever that is — and some guy from Yiling.

It’s nothing for them to worry about, of course.

(Or, where time travel occurs, and Wei Wuxian ends up being a guest at his own wedding).
notes:
So, before you start reading, just a quick (and quite important) note — the future they travel to his an AU - Canon Divergence version of the canon universe. Basically sometime after Jin Ling’s birth, WWX actually gets his act together, and LWJ actually manages to communicate properly, and the confess and decide to get married. And now the Wens are all living at the Cloud Recesses, and Wangxian get to have an amazing wedding with all their family around, because that is what they deserve.

And THAT is the future where these three will end up in. I nearly wrote this happening post-canon, but then felt sad because most people were dead, and then I realised that it’d just complicate things because WWX would be in MXY’s body. So I just decided to do it this way.

Also, it just occurred to me, but you guys could probably pretend this is a continuation of my fic “A Broken Heart Fixes Everything” if any of you have read that. Because this would totally work in that universe.

Anyway, hope you enjoy this! :D

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Thanks so much for reading! Hope you guys enjoyed this. I seriously can't seem to stop myself from writing time travel fics. And also, since I suck at being creative, literally all my time travel ideas amount to 'a weird array brought so and so here'

Anyway, let me know what you thought! :)

additional_tags: ['Tropes', '5+1 Things', 'Bathtubs', 'Animal Transformation', 'Wolf!Geralt', 'There Was Only One Bed', 'Fuck Or Die', 'Kidnapping', 'hurt!Jaskier', 'immortal!jaskier', 'This Is Callimachean Bullshit', 'Fluff', 'Humor', 'A little angst', 'Idiots in Love']
summary:
Over the years, Yennefer notices that Geralt and Jaskier’s life can be really bloody weird at times.

Alternative summary: five Geraskier fandom tropes that our boys find completely normal, and one that isn’t at all.
notes:
Okay, this fandom is tropey as fuck, and don’t get me wrong, I love it, but it’s just hilarious to me how we have so many versions of the same story! This isn’t intended to bash anyone at all, far from it - I’ve written most of these tropes myself, in one form or another. (Hurt!Jaskier, anyone??) So this fic is my self-indulgent way of poking fun at our collective fandom obsession with there only being one bed, with sharing baths, and with Geralt getting turned into a wolf. Among other things!

Edit: There is now a podfic of this fic available here, by the wonderful reena_jenkins!

title: of music and motion and love
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings', 'No Archive Warnings Apply']
fandoms: ['The Witcher (TV)', 'Wiedźmin | The Witcher - All Media Types']
relationships: ['Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia/Jaskier | Dandelion', 'Jaskier | Dandelion & Yennefer z Vengerbergu | Yennefer of Vengerberg']
characters: ['Jaskier | Dandelion', 'Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia', 'Yennefer z Vengerbergu | Yennefer of Vengerberg', 'Cirilla Fiona Elen Riannon']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Jaskier & Yennefer are Siblings', 'Jaskier | Dandelion Has Feelings', 'Non-Human Jaskier | Dandelion', 'Magic Jaskier', 'Jaskier | Dandelion Has a Past', 'Getting Together', 'Misunderstandings', 'Implied/Referenced Child Abuse']
series: Part 1 of of bards and witches and witchers
summary:
When Jaskier was four, he slipped his mother’s watch and went to the field to gather a bouquet of dandelions. He climbed back into the yard, as stealthy as a child really cared to be, and crept over to the barn. In the barn, lived a secret. (The man he thought his father said the secret was a monster, a plague. His mother said the secret was his sister.)

OR

Jaskier comes from a far humbler background, and would really like to know why Yennefer never came back for her youngest brother.
notes:
Hey! Well, here I am in a fandom I don’t belong in, ignoring the WIP that’s been hanging over my head for two years. I’m sorry? But also I couldn’t help myself. There’s a lot going on in the world right now, and most of it is scary and stressful. If I can even make one of you smile today, I’ll count myself lucky.

Please, join me. I have only ever seen the Netflix show, and from just the premise you can probably tell this takes wild liberties with Jaskier and Yen’s backstory, but here we are. All mistakes are my own, though shout out to bioluminescent for pointing out a couple spelling errors.

Enjoy!

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

So that’s it! I want you to imagine Ciri, patiently coaching Geralt through all of his emotional moments with Jaskier. This kid put up with so much. Anyway, I may or may not add an epilogue in a few days. Thanks for reading!

series: Part 1 of The Accidental Warlord and His PackPart 1 of The Accidental Warlord and His Pack - Recommended Reading Order
summary:
From the kinkmeme: AU Warlord!Geralt receives Tribute!Jaskier as a sacrifice to appease him in every way possible. Jaskier has no choice on the matter and he’s fully aware of the awful rumours that have spread about Geralt and his ruthless conquests. (But we all know those aren’t legit.) A classic angst with a happy ending please! A dash of smut to heal those scars and a sprinkle of new found love!

Jaskier arrives at Kaer Morhen knowing his family gave him up without a second thought, and absolutely sure that the dreaded Warlord of the North will value him even less than his own blood did. But the White Wolf and his pack are not what Jaskier expected...and if he's unreasonably lucky, Kaer Morhen might become far more of a home than Lettenhove ever was.

...He is, in fact, going to be unreasonably lucky, because the Warlord of the North is a far finer monarch - and a far better man - than Redania's king has ever dreamed of being.
notes:
This plays merry havoc with the timeline: I just sort of grabbed characters and threw them in where I needed them.

author: ['isaksara (syailendra)']
title: The MSBY Black Jackals Read Thirst Tweets
characters: ['Miya Atsumu', 'Sakusa Kiyoomi', 'Hinata Shouyou', 'Bokuto Koutarou', 'Miya Osamu', 'Kita Shinsuke', 'MSBY Black Jackals', 'Ojiro Aran', 'Suna Rintarou', 'Ginjima Hitoshi', 'Inarizaki Volleyball Club', 'Hoshiumi Kourai', 'past unrequited AtsuKita - Character']
additional_tags: ['Annoyances to Annoyances with Benefits to Lovers', 'Kagehina and Bokuaka are In Love and Embarrassing About It', 'Atsumu Is Not a Single-Target Horndog', 'Social Media', "The Safe Word is 'Onigiri'", 'the mildest of d/s', "there's nothing really graphic but everyone is really h word all the time", 'Pining Atsumu', 'Getting Together']
summary:
Sakusa’s eyes are very dark naturally, sucking in all surrounding rays of light and crushing them in his pupils. For an athlete, he is rather pale. His lips look very pink in comparison. Atsumu is suddenly catastrophically aware that in this instance, ‘accent’ is a euphemism. “Good enough for your Olympic-size ego, Miya?”

(In which Atsumu realizes that he is attracted to Sakusa Kiyoomi in the most inconvenient way possible.)

Now with gorgeous gorgeous art by Quip/pseudoanalytics!

So what is this new obsession with Sakusa really about? Is it really about getting a volleyball spiked up his ass?

Love life? What the hell would that be like, then, dating Sakusa Kiyoomi? There’s a konbini at the metro station, and you can catch the nine-thirty train. You can kiss any dream of having breakfast in bed goodbye, not just because Sakusa would never cook it, but because he’d kill you for spilling just one crumb on the sheets. He’d sooner suffocate you with a cloth soaked in his favorite disinfectant.

(Quip made the beautiful drawing of Sakusa in this chapter!!! Look at him. No wonder Atsumu fell in love.)
notes:
this started out with a 'hmmmm i guess i should TRY writing canonverse, you know, just to see if i can manage to not put these kids in situations where they end up with life-threatening injuries' and then for some reason all my stupid came out to play. fml.

CREDITS TO sarishinohara FOR 1) the Osamu thirst tweet and its consequences, and also 2) Twitter user Dumbass Hinata! Those are all her! Without her input I would've just gone on writing 10000% Legit Actual Miya Dique Thirst (my own) so, we are all thankful that's not how it played out

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

come be stupid with me on twitter if you want to (@kenmacarena)!

EDIT: so as it turns out Suna doesn't talk in a Kansai dialect. Went back and fixed that, sorry!

these are trying times so if i made you laugh i'm very happy! thank you for sharing sakuatsu joy with me. for some reason these two bring out my worst h word jokes.

fun fact yesterday after finishing atsumu's hasty escape from kagehina my brain went like uhh how are they gonna fall in love? so I had to stop there and try to actually get work done. then just as I was going to be productive atsumu and sakusa came to my house, broke down my door, and shouted THIS IS HOW WE WANT TO FALL IN LOVE in my face and I could only nod in a dumb daze

sorry for the brief mood whiplash at the beginning i promise you everything will be 100% stupid again by the end

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

had a lot of fun writing this because, as mentioned, these two crazy kids just kept hauling me around by the ears everywhere they wanted to go. did you know i set out to write a romp about atsumu and hormones and ended up with him in love. go figure.

P.S.: I vaguely remember something about Aran being American although if I'm wrong take it as Atsumu being presumptuous and Aran just letting it slide because he does not want to expend the energy it will take to address it

summary:
It doesn’t take long for the rumors to start.

The Fire Nation prides itself on its civilization. It isn’t like the other, lesser, nations who throw their children away by sending them into war. Those uncultured and unfeeling savages who are destroying their own future faster than the Fire Nation can save them from themselves.

Every Fire Nation child goes to school. They learn reading and writing, the illustrious history of their country, and what will be expected of them as proper, upstanding Fire Nation citizens. They are to be protected, because children are the future glory of the nation.

The crown prince is thirteen when his father burns his face in front of an audience of hundreds.
notes:
set between Zuko's ill-fated visit to the war room and his sixteenth birthday.

thanks to ro for giving this a glance over for me!

additional_tags: ['Angst', 'Brotherly Love', 'Emotional pain', 'with a smidgen of', 'Physical Pain', 'jiang cheng feels a lot', 'wei wuxian loves him and wants him to be happy', 'Jiāng Chéng Needs A Hug', 'But also', 'Jiang Cheng Gets A Hug', 'More than one actually', 'jiang cheng loves jin ling', 'jin ling is worried and for good reason', 'jiang cheng is in heckin turmoil', 'wei wuxian is lovely', "jiang cheng knows this even if he doesn't say it", 'only happy endings for these boys', 'Platonic Hanahaki', 'kind of', "it's not actually hanahaki but it's close enough"]
summary:
"The curse is meant to physically manifest the emotions of its victim."

Jiang Cheng submits to the mortifying ordeal of being known.
notes:
This was only supposed to be about 500 or 1000 words, what the heck happened

Title is from "somewhere I have never travelled, gladly beyond" by E.E. Cummings.
Second half of the summary is inspired by Tim Kreider.

 

"We don’t give other people credit for the same interior complexity we take for granted in ourselves, the same capacity for holding contradictory feelings in balance, for complexly alloyed affections, for bottomless generosity of heart and petty, capricious malice. We can’t believe that anyone could be unkind to us and still be genuinely fond of us, although we do it all the time.

Years ago a friend of mine had a dream about a staircase you could descend deep underground, in which you heard recordings of all the things anyone had ever said about you, both good and bad. The catch was, you had to pass through all the worst things people had said before you could get to the highest compliments at the very bottom. There is no way I would ever make it more than two and a half steps down such a staircase, but I understand its terrible logic: if we want the rewards of being loved we have to submit to the mortifying ordeal of being known."

author: ['iimpossible_things']
title: a leaf falls on loneliness
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
relationships: ['Evan "Buck" Buckley/Eddie Diaz', 'Evan "Buck" Buckley & Christopher Diaz & Eddie Diaz (9-1-1 TV)', 'Evan "Buck" Buckley & Eddie Diaz (9-1-1 TV)', 'Evan "Buck" Buckley/Eddie Diaz (9-1-1 TV)']
characters: ['Evan "Buck" Buckley', 'Eddie Diaz (9-1-1 TV)', 'Christopher Diaz (9-1-1 TV)', 'Bobby Nash', 'Howie "Chimney" Han', 'Henrietta "Hen" Wilson', 'Maddie Buckley', 'Athena Grant', 'Original Characters', 'Original Male Character(s)']
additional_tags: ['Angst', 'Fluff and Angst', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Hurt Evan "Buck" Buckley', 'Angst with a Happy Ending']
summary:
Buck doesn’t think that if he were to say, “I’m in a bad place”, that anyone would turn him away. Really, he doesn’t. The 118 has too many good, kind people for that.

But every time he wants to open his mouth, to say something, to reach out to Eddie or Bobby or Hen or Chim, he hears Eddie yelling, “you’re exhausting.”

—you’re exhausting, you’re exhausting, you’re exhausting—

So each day he does his job and he laughs and he jokes and he pretends he’s the care-free goofball he’s always been. And each day he packs away his bruises and his worries, takes them home to his empty loft with its quiet rooms, and licks his wounds in silence.
notes:
(See the end of the work for notes and other works inspired by this one.)

Falls to the floor in exhaustion, crawls to the shore. *my watch has ended*

Oh my God, that fic took a thousand years to write. It got to the point where I was literally yelling, “WHY WONT YOU FUCKING END! END! END! END!”

Okay, so this fic has been 75% written since, like, before the hiatus—I just couldn’t handle the grocery store scene and couldn’t believe no one talked about it? HOW? So y’all got some indulgent angst fic as a result. I had to slow burn as much as I could because I’m a masochist. I live for the Buddie slowburn.

I hope you guys like this fic! I’m always iffy about OCs so I’m really iffy about Cole but I needed someone who didn’t know anyone else in 118, and who was just Buck’s. The backstory dump was...well I thought it was important so I kept it in bc it was short anyway even though I hate backstory dumps and it fucks with my pacing. If things feel a little out of character, it may be because I pulled a few things out of an original story of mine that's been sitting on my desktop for YEARS though I only used the material because of how closely Buddie reflected my characters (isn't it funny? Most people adapt their fanfics for their original works, and I do the opposite hehe oh well at least this way it's not gathering virtual dust).

Also—how nice of the show runners to confirm Eddie is a bad cook for me. Now if they could confirm literally the rest of my story, that’d be s’well.

I have another fic idea for these guys (or several), but I have a ton of Tarlos ideas too for 911 Lone Star and I need to get at least one of those ones done AND finish my Little Women fic first.

If any of you are Tarlos fans, here’s a snippet of what is *likely* to be my next fic:

 

“The thing is--the thing is, Carlos had always felt temporary. TK had wanted someone, and Carlos had been there, but his presence--his specific presence, and not just a male body to pass a few hours with--was, ultimately, negotiable. Convenient, yes; acceptable, yes; but never, ever critical. So he’d known that his time was limited. Known it the first time TK had walked out of his apartment without a backwards glance. Heard the ticking of the countdown the moment TK had said, “my ex just texted me,” then louder again when he said, “my ex is in town.” He’s not sure why it hurt so much to hear “I’m getting back with my ex” now, except that it does.

 

He’d hoped. He’d known better, and he’d hoped.”

 

I know, I know. Don’t come at me. I live for angst. All the angst. (In this scenario, they were strictly fwb/casual).

As a final note--I still can't figure out how AO3 and HTML works. I apologize for the thousand of relationship tags because I couldn't originally find the Buck/Eddie one when I went to post this story.

If anyone sees anything triggering that they would like tagged, please let me know and I will update the tags.

Title is from the e.e.cummings poem, although it was also very much inspired by the other e.e.cummings poem, "you are tired (i think)". I'll be honest though, that poem has inspired a lot of fics for me. Angstangstangst.

fandoms: ['Wiedźmin | The Witcher - All Media Types', 'The Witcher (TV)']

additional_tags: ['Soft Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia', 'Soft Jaskier | Dandelion', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Touch-Starved', 'Platonic Cuddling', 'Jaskier gets allll the witchers', 'Lambert needs a hug', 'Eskel needs a hug', 'Emotionally Constipated Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia', 'Established Relationship']
series: Part 1 of If We Must Starve (Let it be Together)
summary:
The witchers of Kaer Morhen have never been comfortable with gentle touches. It just isn't who they are. But when Geralt arrives to spend the winter with his brothers looking more relaxed than any of them have felt in years, all due to the affection of a human bard, Lambert and Eskel grow curious. They wonder what it would be like to be touched or held without fear.

When Lambert runs into Jaskier in a small town in Redania, it's the safest he's felt in years. He and his brothers need touch and kindness more than they're willing to admit, and all Jaskier wants it to help , if only the witchers would let him.

Geralt and Jaskier are together, all the other relationships are platonic with a good helping of touch-starvation on the side.
notes:
Wow, I updated this sooner than expected. All your comments and kudos really inspired me- so thank you guys!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

I have some real, actual work to do tomorrow, but this will definitely be updated sometime this weekend. Thanks for reading, and please feel free to leave a comment below- I love to read them and chat with people!

You guys are the best. The BEST. Thank you so much for the support- it means the world to me!

Thank you guys so much for reading and commenting! I love hearing your thoughts, and I promise to answer any questions/prompt ideas you leave for me. I hope you all enjoyed!

This is NOT the last chapter of this, just so you guys know. There will be at least one more of the boys at Kaer Morhen, and probably an epilogue, too, because I fell in love with writing this and I feel like the group needs a little more time together before I wrap it up. Hope y'all are ok with that ;)

Please feel free to leave thoughts/opinions/writing prompts in the comments! All your kind words really mean a lot, and I love chatting with you guys. Thanks so much for reading!

I've finally frickin' decided how long this thing is going to be. One more chapter and an epilogue for the main fic, though I have a ton of ideas in this timeline, so there will definitely be shorter pieces with all the witchers coming out in the next few weeks. The last two parts of this fic should be out in the next three days or so, depending on how much time I have. For now- enjoy the chapter!

I'm back! This chapter is a little longer, so it took a while. I hope you guys enjoy!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

I have gotten so much love and so many cool prompts in the comments! You guys are amazing. Please feel free to leave any rants or story ideas below- I adore reading what you guys think, and I'm keeping a google doc of ideas for when I'm done with this main fic!

Whew! This got way longer than I expected, but I'm pleased with how it turned out. Thank you guys so much for sticking with me during this whole process, and for all the love you guys have sent my way. It truly means the world to me. That said- there will be more! I've been inspired by your comments/prompts to make this a timeline with multiple stories.

The first one, which will be a multi-chapter fic (though not as long as this one), is going to be hurt/comfort about Jaskier getting kidnapped and all the hell his witchers rain down on the man fool enough to hurt him. The first chapter of that will be out this weekend, so stay tuned! I've made this fic a series, so you can bookmark the series if you want updates when I write something new. Also, if I use your prompt, I promise to dedicate the fic to you/mention you in the author's notes.

That's it! Thanks again for reading, and please feel free to leave thoughts/questions/prompts for the timeline (or prompts unrelated to this fic) in the comments. Love you guys!!

author: ['mrthology']
title: he ain't heavy, he's my brother
fandoms: ['Percy Jackson and the Olympians & Related Fandoms - All Media Types']
characters: ['Percy Jackson', 'Triton (Percy Jackson)', 'Poseidon (Percy Jackson)', 'Amphitrite (Percy Jackson)', 'Sally Jackson', 'Delphin (Percy Jackson)', 'Annabeth Chase (Percy Jackson)', "she'd just mentioned", 'Others mentioned as well']
additional_tags: ['Percy gets a migraine while in Atlantis', 'Poseidon (Percy Jackson) is a Good Parent', 'Protective Poseidon (Percy Jackson)', 'Amphitrite comes round', "Triton doesn't get it", 'Sickfic', 'Headaches & Migraines', 'Family', 'Sally Jackson is a Good Parent', 'Family Bonding', 'Sick Percy Jackson', 'Fluff', 'Prince Percy Jackson', "but he doesn't realise he's a prince", 'Fluff and Angst', 'because im apparently incapable of not including at least some', 'Triton (Percy Jackson) is a Good Sibling', 'Undersea Family']
series: Part 6 of With Friends Like These
summary:
Percy doesn’t get migraines very often, thank the Gods, but when he does they tend to knock him on his ass for days, regardless of drugs, ocean water, sleep, ambrosia, or anything else he’d tried. He just had to wait (suffer) it out.

It was just his luck that his first migraine in literally years would hit when he was visiting his father in Atlantis for the first time after the war with Gaea. And instead of waking up with one and being able to hide in his rooms, he’d have to collapse in public, right after talking to his half brother Triton.

If it didn’t hurt so damn much he’d be embarrassed.
notes:
(See the end of the work for notes.)

I called Percy small quite a few times in this. I’m going with while he’d average/a bit above average for a person (I read 5'11 years ago and that’s what I’m sticking with) and that’s not tall for a merperson. He’s short and pretty skinny to them, and 17 here so still a kid, especially considering most of them are centuries old or more. I'm in my 20's and still want someone to look after me when I'm sick, so I don't see it as too out of character for Percy to be the same way, especially when it's his father looking after him.

Thank you for reading!

---- note, I know I need to edit some things for consistency with the rest of the series, as I wrote this and a couple of others when I was super sick. I know there are some continuity issues but haven't had the time (or desire, tbh) to go edit and find them all.

author: ['inkinmyheartandonthepage']
title: One in a Million
characters: ['Peter Parker', 'Tony Stark', 'Morgan Stark (Marvel Cinematic Universe)', 'Stephen Strange', 'Pepper Potts', 'James Rhodes', 'Steve Rogers', 'Bruce Banner', 'Clint Barton', 'Thor (Marvel)']
additional_tags: ['Mention of Avengers', 'Post-Avengers: Endgame (Movie)', 'Fix-It', 'Post-Endgame', 'Hurt Peter Parker', "Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker's Parental Figure", 'Peter Parker Needs a Hug', 'Peter Parker Has a Family', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Emotional Hurt', 'Hurt', 'Family Fluff', 'The Avengers Are Good Bros', 'Stephen Strange is a Good Bro', 'Parent Tony Stark', 'Protective Tony Stark', 'Complete', 'Irondad', 'spiderson', 'Sleepwalking', 'Peter Parker Acts Like a Spider', "Pepper Potts Acting as Peter Parker's Parental Figure", 'Dead May Parker (Spider-Man)', 'Mentioned May Parker (Spider-Man)', 'May Parker (Spider-Man) Dies', 'Injured Peter Parker', 'Grief/Mourning']
summary:
Peter has the gauntlet, the stones already in place. Aliens are beginning to swarm him and in the overwhelming panic that begins to consume, he does the only thing he can think of. He shoves his hand into the gauntlet.

Peter keeps waking up in strange places

Peter has a bad day

Peter didn’t want to ask – he didn’t need to ask really – because everyone was avoiding it, himself included. There was only one reason why May hadn’t come to visit.

“How did you do it?” Steve asked, making Tony turn.

“What?” Tony blinked.

“Thanos, the stones, how did you do it?” Steve asked, eyes trailing over Tony’s armour that still clung to his skin.

“I could ask you the same question,” Tony nodded at Steve who was filthy but had no burn marks like Bruce had received. “Something a little extra in that bottle you failed to mention?”

*

During the final battle, Peter is lost and forgotten amongst the battlefield and it isn't until it's over does Tony realise what he's done.

Morgan had been looking forward to meeting her big brother ever since her mum and dad had told her about him. Except, Peter just keeps sleeping and she wants him to wake up.

Peter just wants to be Spiderman again - even if it means breaking into Tony's workshop

Thing were starting to look up. Things were starting to return to normal.
notes:
Hi everyone!

It's been quite a while since I have written anything. I had a disastrous March with the loss of my dad and for the first time I have had the creativity to write something.

I hope this little one-shot gives you something to distract you with everything that is happening in the world.

Apologies for any mistakes and I hope you enjoy.

additional_tags: ['Implied/Referenced Child Abuse', 'Dissociation', 'Implied/Referenced Torture', 'Fainting', 'Hurt Takami Keigo | Hawks', 'Takami Keigo | Hawks-centric', 'Protective Dabi (My Hero Academia)', 'Protective League of Villains (My Hero Academia)', 'Takami Keigo | Hawks Needs a Hug', "Hero Public Safety Commission's A+ Parenting", 'Panic Attacks', 'raptor stress grip', 'Animal Traits', 'Starvation', 'Self-Esteem Issues', 'Soft Takami Keigo | Hawks', "he gets hurt and doesn't know its bad", 'my poor birb boy', 'Wing Grooming', 'no beta we die like illiterate idiots', 'wow this is bad', "This Is Why We Can't Have Nice Things", 'welcome to the family birb boi', 'they commit crimes on saturday and play monopoly on sunday', 'League of Villains as Family (My Hero Academia)', 'Takami Keigo | Hawks Acts Like a Bird']
series: Part 1 of Hawks Needs Help (And He Actually Gets It)
summary:
Hawks takes baby steps backwards, getting closer and closer to the door, as everyone continues to get loud and look at eachother for answers. Well, almost everybody; Dabi is watching him limp away with an unimpressed expression.

“Those are torture wounds,” Shigaraki points out, crossing his arms and leveling Hawks with a dead-eyed stare.

“How do you even know what torture wounds look like?” Hawks throws back as he continues to plan his escape. Shigaraki looks at him with raised eyebrows until Hawks looks away again, feeling like an idiot. These people are villains, he knows that (but its so easy to forget-).

“Right, fuck.”

Hawks flicks him a two fingered salute before turning tail like the coward he feels like and making for the door. He doesn't get more than four feet before Dabi grabs him by one of his wings and yanks him back.
notes:
I'm sorry if it's ooc, and I just want to ask you to read the warnings. Nothing gets too descriptive, but I just don't want to trigger anyone! ;^;

Please comment!! The only way to get better is to have feedback, and reading comments from you guys just makes my day!
<3

summary:
Lan Wangji and Wei Wuxian make out in a room full of Sect Leaders, Jiang Cheng tearfully declares his love for his estranged brother, Sect Leaders Yao and Ouyang beg for the Yiling Patriarch’s forgiveness, and Lan Qiren openly welcomes a new nephew-in-law into his family.

None of them want to be doing any of this. Thanks to the Juniors, they don’t exactly have a choice.

(Or, wherein the Juniors accidentally write a cursed fanfiction, and everyone has to reenact their parts in it, or potentially cease to exist).
notes:
Hey, just a quick note before we start what is probably one of my craziest ideas so far - while my MDZS fics are generally set in the novel universe, I'm using the ending of the drama for this, where WWX leaves after the Guanyin Temple, and LWJ becomes Chief Cultivator

Hope you enjoy this! It's...probably one of the craziest ideas I've had so far, and it was definitely fun to write haha

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Hope you guys enjoyed this little piece of insanity my brain decided to spit out.

So I spent the majority of today trying to get what is probably the worst assignment I have done in my life finished, and I’ve gotten through maybe half of it. I desperately needed a break, and writing usually calms me down, and I somehow ended up coming up with this idea.

…I usually come up with the most random fic ideas, but I think this might be the weirdest one I’ve thought up so far.

So, I don’t know if I explained this whole ‘cursed scroll’ idea well enough, so — basically, it’s a blank scroll where if you write something on it, e.g. “[insert name] needs to…” they need to do fulfil whatever the action is, or they cease to exist. The scroll will usually take about a day after the instructions have been written on it to work, and when it does a curse mark will appear on the arm of the person who has been cursed, and the same mark will appear on the scroll above whatever has been written. The mark will grow darker as the hours past, and gets closer to the moment when time will run out, and will only disappear after the action has been carries out.

…Basically I just made up the dumbest idea I could think of to let me create this monstrosity xD

Hopefully you guys still enjoy it though xD Let me know what you think!

summary:
“Listen. Lan Zhan," Wei Ying says. "I know this whole thing, with — with the soul-switch, it’s upsetting. And believe me, I know my body is the last one on earth you’d want to be inside of.”

Lan Wangji chokes, then passes it off as a cough.

—

On a night hunt, Wei Wuxian and Lan Wangji get cursed and stuck in each other's bodies. As you would expect, shenanigans ensue.
notes:
Hi guys! This fic is set shortly after the events of the Sunshot Campaign, but as if Wen Qing never met Wei Wuxian at Jinlintai (episode 26-ish for the live action people), thus triggering the events of Qiongqi Way/Path onward — the Wen siblings and A-Yuan are hiding safe and happy somewhere in this universe, thank you v much. It has some of the book’s characterization but mostly follows the events of the live action, as Wei Wuxian and Lan Wangji have a better relationship at this narrative point in the show than they do in the book.

Heads up that there are spoilers for the live action through episode 46!

Content warnings are alcohol usage, canon-typical blood loss (but really not much), and sloppy gay feelings.

Disclaimer that this is my first fic for this pairing and fandom. Happy to accept feedback or corrections in comments!! Thank you very much to my beta Kelsey also.

Shout @ me on tumblr or twitter.

series: Part 2 of If We Must Starve (Let it be Together)
summary:
Geralt is no longer the Butcher of Blaviken. But when Jaskier is taken and tortured by soldiers from Nilfgaard, his tightly held morality frays at the edges. Joined by Lambert and Eskel, he sets out to rescue Jaskier and slaughter the men foolish enough to harm him. Nilfgaard was prepared for the rage of the White Wolf. They aren't prepared for his brothers.

Because Jaskier belongs to all the wolves of Kaer Morhen, and they will raze kingdoms to keep him safe.

Takes place after If I Starve, but can be read as a standalone. All relationships besides Geralt/Jaskier are platonic.
notes:
Hey! If anyone is reading this after If I Starve, be warned. This one is a lot darker. There will be cuddles and happiness at the end, I promise, but the road there is long and bloody. That said, this first chapter is a short one to set up the story, and a longer addition should be out in the next few days. I'll update tags and such as needed.

To all the people commenting stuff like "Rip them apart babes!"- I see you, and I love you.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Hope you enjoyed! Stuff gets heavier next chapter, so I'll make sure to add some warnings before the chapter. As always, thank you for reading, and feel free to leave thoughts/questions/rants in the comments!

Warnings for this chapter: graphic depictions of torture and violence.

It's darker than the first chapters, and pretty far away from the fluff of If I Starve. I'm really not nice to Jaskier here. Please only read if you're comfortable doing so.

This chapter: Torture
Next chapter: BEATDOWNS and some very angry witchers. Hope y'all are ready.

The comments are FERAL. I hope this satisfies you.

Healing and comfort next, I promise.

This chapter brought to you by longing and the sweet, sweet sounds of Simon and Garfunkel.

There will be one more chapter of this that's pure snuggles and happiness, because these idiots deserve it. If any of you beautiful people have any other prompts/ideas/rants, please feel free to leave them in the comments. And as always, thank you for reading!

You can also come yell at me on Instagram, if you like. I'm @igneum_art, and while my account has nothing to do with fandoms or writing, I'm always happy to DM people and chat! Hope you all are staying safe and happy during these weird times of ours ;)

summary:
"For a while, Jaskier doesn’t know he’s cursed. It feels like free will, going back down that mountain, just as dangerous down as the way up, and alone this time, too. The descent is fast, maybe even reckless, but Jaskier’s feeling numb and out-of-sorts anyways, Geralt’s words simmering in his mind, and at the time it doesn’t feel like he’s being pulled on by anything but his own desire to get away."

Based off a post that Geralt's words on the mountain are granted by the djinn.

author: ['AlexiHollis']
title: Candles and Boring Games
characters: ['Zuko (Avatar)', 'Azulon (Avatar)', 'Iroh (Avatar)']
additional_tags: ['Past Child Abuse', 'Child Neglect', 'Iroh Adopts Zuko AU', 'Azulon is not as bad as he could be', 'but hes not good either', 'Pre-Canon', 'Political Games', 'Zuko (Avatar) Needs a Hug']
series: Part 1 of Grandfather Azulon AUs
summary:
“You dare suggest that I betray Iroh?” Fire Lord Azulon did not shout. “My first born? After the demise of his only beloved son?” The old man leaned back in his throne shaking his head, “You have made an irrevocable error here, today, Ozai. What man of honor, what brother, what Uncle, would use this tragedy, a death towards furthering our family’s sacred mission as you call it, for his own political,” He practically spat the word, “gain. No, no, Iroh has suffered enough, but you, my son, have been far too coddled.”
Zuko felt Father’s tension, but his stomach truly dropped when he saw Azula’s own worry, clear as day on her perfect actress face.
“You need to be taught a lesson,” Fire Lord Azulon decided. “You must, too, suffer the pain of losing your first born.”

OR

Fire Lord Azulon, to punish Ozai, gives Zuko to Iroh
notes: This was inspired by one of my favorite works in this fandom, so I would definitely recommend going and reading that!!

title: Through the dark side of the morning
fandoms: ['僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia']
characters: ['Dabi (My Hero Academia)', 'Takami Keigo | Hawks']
additional_tags: ['Kid Fic', 'Pre-Relationship', 'Developing Relationship', 'First Kiss', 'Dry Humping', 'Clothed Sex', 'Frottage', 'Blood and Injury', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Implied Mpreg', 'Dabi is Todoroki Touya', 'Dabi Swears a Lot (My Hero Academia)']
summary:
Hawks manages to keep his baby a secret from Dabi for a grand total of two months. Once Dabi finds out about him, he starts coming around a lot more often, usually at night. These are snippets of their time together.

 

Hawks smiles as he helps him to stand on wobbly feet, both thumbs lost in a tight-fisted grip. Toma coos at him and Hawks coos back. To his surprise—and Dabi’s, judging by the look on his face—Toma then turns and makes the same sound at him.

Dabi huffs a breath and reaches out a hand to stroke over Toma’s fuzzy head.

“I don’t know how to make that sound, kid.”

series: Part 5 of Hawks Needs Help (And He Actually Gets It)
summary:
The look that he gets is full of mock-sympathy.

 

“I’ll call for a car,” she offers, not even bothering to wait for his reply before her heels start clicking across the polished floor. Hawks isn’t sure that he could give one right now, his voice still trapped somewhere in his chest, which feels too tight, so tight that he’s surprised that he can even breathe because they had grounded him and birds are meant to fly-

 

The commission, displeased with his reliance on them, had taken his flight feathers, cut off the tips, and grounded him both literally and figuratively. He can’t fly like he’s meant to, like he always has. Instead, his wings are two useless, feathery lumps on his back, weighing him down as he blankly waits for a car to take him home for the first time since he’d moved into his own place. His wings flap, as if insisting that they could hold him long enough, that he doesn’t need a car to get home. 

 

Hawks ignores them as he watches the commission’s car pull up in front of him.

 

Or: Hawks is grounded (ha) and Dabi just has to show up to be a little bitchy but also helpful because that's just who he is
notes:
Fluffier than usual, but still a little angsty in the beginning! There's a blood mention, and implied torture, but it's not too bad??? Please be careful! <3

summary:
Wei Changze is reborn as Wen Yuan. Cangse Sanren is reborn as Lan Jingyi. Understandably, this changes a lot of things.

(Or, Wei Changze tries to get used to a life where he is both the father and son of the exact same person, and Cangse Sanren is just loving being the most un-Lan Lan to ever live).
notes:
(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

I was debating whether to refer to them as WCZ and CSSR in this, or as LSZ and LJY, but I decided to stick with the former since I figured, if they had the full range of meories from their previous life, they’d probably identify with that more.

CSSR will be in the next chapter!

This is a bit of a weird idea, I know, and it was initially supposed to be really crack-y, but this actually ended up being angstier than I thought it’d be haha. I guess there’s no way to have complete humour when the main character is continuously mourning his wife throughout this. But CSSR and WCZ will be reunited in the next chapter!

Hope you enjoyed this weird little idea of mine, and let me know what you think!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

And I finally managed to get this chapter done!!! Only took me nearly four months...sorry about the wait

Also, last chapter, it...kind of slipped my mind to have a little moment in there about WCZ reacting to JFM's death? So it might have seemed like he was indifferent, but trust me, he was devastated. Just...imagine that he found out off screen, and so said devastation happened off screen. I decided to add a little scene in here with Cangse to make up for it haha

Also, I've started posting updates about my fics on my tumblr, so you can check that out if you like: pupeez4eva.tumblr.com

Also I've started to use my twitter account more, mostly to retweet a bunch of MDZS stuff, but I'm also probably going to start posting about updates, ect. on there soon...possibly even posting snippets of future chapters, and fics? So if you want to check that out it's: Twitter

(I'm pupeez4eva1 on there because I once made another account on there years ago and then forgot the email and password I used...so that'll have to do haha)

Anyway hope you enjoyed this chapter, and keep an eye out for more from me in the future!

additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Modern Setting', 'Alternate Universe - College/University', 'Swimming', 'film student lwj', 'Pining', 'Mutual Pining', 'swimmer wwx', 'best friends lwj and jyl', 'the inherent mortification of being in love with your best friend’s brother', 'or your older sibling’s best friend']
summary:
“I am going to Yanli-jie’s,” Lan Zhan grits out. “To film,” he adds pointedly, hitching his bag full of filming equipment a little higher on his shoulder.

“At her flat?” asks his brother, eyes twinkling.

“Yes,” says Lan Zhan resignedly.

“Wonderful,” says Lan Huan. “Although, those sandalwood notes of your cologne - while very lovely and intense - good choice, brother... I don’t think they’re quite strong enough for your channel’s viewers to catch.”

Lan Zhan exhales. Here it comes.

“Unless,” says Lan Huan, “The reason for all this is at your friend’s flat instead? A person, perhaps?”

(AU where film student Lan Zhan is an accidental vlogging sensation under the name Hanguang-jun, keeps running into his best friend Jiang Yanli’s younger brother far more frequently than he’d like, and suffers.)
notes:
i always thought that if lwj were to ever become a social media personality, it would be 100% unintentional with him going viral after posting some artsy footage of him going about his day without showing his face or speaking at all - something along the lines of nino's home or 子时当归, but with less cooking and more bunnies.

thank you K for reading through this as always!

additional_tags: ['Canon Compliant', 'discussion of canon character death', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Nightmares', 'bed sharing', 'Getting Together', 'Yearning', 'Literal Sleeping Together', 'Really Excessive Amounts of Hurt/Comfort']
summary: “Hanguang-jun,” Wei Wuxian repeats. His heart clenches. He wants—but he’d really meant to have this nightmare stuff down before they met again, so he wouldn’t find himself relying on Lan Wangji’s nearness. He’s not supposed to go back yet. But he’s so tired, and his will crumbles. “Yeah,” he says. “All right. Take me back to Gusu with you.”
notes:
Title is from Sara Bareilles's "Orpheus," which is a great Wangxian song, if you have not heard it.

A QUICK NOTE. This is canon compliant to the show, not the book (so they're not together, Lan Wangji is Chief Cultivator, etc), with one fairly major change that never gets explicitly discussed but which is nevertheless thematically important: there was no second flautist at the Nightless City. In this household we reject demonic cultivator Su She! Let Wei Wuxian make his own mistakes! Thank you for coming to my TedTalk.

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

AN UNBELIEVABLY MASSIVE THANKS TO MY BETA, ROSE. When I shoved the first draft of this at her in December, it was 16k and she came back to me saying, "Listen, this is fine, but I think you forgot your point about halfway through," and I legitimately went, "I had a point?" And then I had to convince her I wasn't joking. And then she had to explain to me what the point of my own fic was. This has gone through more edits and rewrites than anything else I've done, and if you received any emotional catharsis from it at all... From the bottom of my heart, she's why.

Thank you so much for reading--this was a labor of love (and screaming and frustration). I hope you enjoyed the self-indulgence in this weird, horrible time we're all living in. Throw me a comment if you've got a chance, here or on tumblr. Stay safe, stay healthy, I love you. I hope you aren't alone.

title: bring the forgotten dawn
fandoms: ['Percy Jackson and the Olympians - Rick Riordan', 'Percy Jackson and the Olympians & Related Fandoms - All Media Types']
relationships: ['Annabeth Chase & Percy Jackson', 'Percy Jackson & Grover Underwood', 'Nico di Angelo & Percy Jackson', 'Bianca di Angelo & Percy Jackson']
characters: ['Percy Jackson', 'Annabeth Chase (Percy Jackson)', 'Grover Underwood', 'Nico di Angelo', 'Bianca di Angelo', 'Hades (Percy Jackson)', 'Sally Jackson (Percy Jackson)', 'Ares (Percy Jackson)', 'Poseidon (Percy Jackson)', 'Gabe Ugliano', 'Luke Castellan']
additional_tags: ['Time Travel', 'Time Travel Fix-It', 'Unreliable Narrator', 'Mood Whiplash', 'percy is a bad child therapist', 'annabeth is ready to kill god', 'grover is a little scared not gonna lie', 'bianca is a queen', 'nico is just happy to be here', 'rated demigod for stabbing swearing and suicidal ideation']
series: Part 1 of the darkness of the depths is forgotten in the surf
summary:
“What is it?” Grover asks, “What’s with that weird look on your face?”

“Just trying to figure out if turning me in will get us enough bounty money to buy our way to LA.” Percy says, craning his neck towards the news van.

“We are not turning you in to the police.” Grover presses his head back into the alleyway.

“Why not?” Percy says. They could use a bit of cash. “You guys can just break me out afterwards, right?”

Annabeth looks like she’s considering it.

“No, guys,” Grover says. “No.”


If Percy has to spend the rest of his life cleaning up after the gods, then he might as well start from the beginning.
notes:
“O dark shivering in the roots and the leaves
if it were but you who would bring the forgotten dawn!”

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

“I have loved a few unknown persons
talking to themselves like captains of sunken armadas,
a sign that the world is wide.”

“And yet we should consider towards what we go forward,
Because we’ve loaded even our song with so much music that it’s slowly sinking”

“This current that goes its way
caught in the embroidered nets of a life that was as it should be and then became dust and sank into the sands”

“He felt the sturdy rigging of a love, stretched taut inside his body like the veins where the blood booms,
Of a love with unbroken rhythm, invincible as music and undying,
Because it was born when we were born, and whether it dies when we do, we do not know, and it is no use trying.”

“carved in relief on the gold cover of our existence
a dark spot that you see traveling like a fish
with the dog-teeth of summer
with the ancient monuments and the contemporary sorrow.”

“When the dice have struck the slate,
when the lance has struck the breast-plate,
when the eye has recognized the stranger,
and love gone dry
when you can’t any longer choose
the death you wanted for your own—
allow your hands, if you can, to travel
free yourself from the faithless time
and sink,
sinks whoever raises the great stones.”

series: Part 4 of Hawks Needs Help (And He Actually Gets It)Part 1 of Using Hawks to vent but adding plot so it's okay I hope???
summary:
Dabi is back, and if Hawks didn’t know better, he would say that the villain's expression looks confused. Dabi’s hand gestures around his own scarred mouth, where a smirk is slowly growing.

 

“You’ve been busy,” he greets, and at first Hawks doesn’t even know what he’s talking about, but he knows that it’s not the impressive stack of completed paperwork on his desk. Tentatively, he raises his own fingers to his mouth and rubs lightly before looking down at them. They’re a bright red, too artificial to be blood, but his stomach still lurches at the sight. Hawks almost wishes that it was blood.

 

“So, what, am I too ugly for ya? There ain’t no way that you’re straight,” Dabi’s smiling like a cat, the wide smile making the staples in his skin pull, and it’s just unsettling enough, and Hawks is already at the end of his rope enough to just tell someone.

 

“I couldn’t move.”

 

Obviously, that was not the response that Dabi was expecting.

Or: Hawks works through some stuff and Dabi calls him a bitch (said softly, with love) as he does it.
notes:
Sexual assault trigger warning!!! It's not horribly graphic, but it's there and I don't want anyone to be caught off-guard! Mentions of non-con, kinda, but nothing happens? Ummm, non-consensual drug use, but nothing comes out of it... I think that's it? Please let me know if I missed something! <3

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Guys, I'm going to be honest here; please, if you don't think that what his mother did was abuse, keep it to yourself? I get a lot of writing inspiration from working through my own trauma, and that's all I'm really going to say about it so please, PLEASE, be nice? And please leave comments because I love hearing from you guys!!! You're all so nice, and I try to respond to every single one of you! <3!!!

Edit: Part two is out guys!

summary:
“Bakugo, you need to update your costume.” Kirishima said, “There’s this one dude in the support class- he’s got a literal waiting list, that’s how good he is- but he did my new upgrade."

“Yeah,” Bakugo sighs and leans back on his hands, staring at the bracer. “I know. I’ll go,” his mouth twists a little. “I’ll go tomorrow. This is just- this is my design you know?” he’s not explaining himself very well, and refuses to look at Kirishima.

“It can be hard to give up your first hero design, and you did a great job,” Kirishima said. “You definitely had the best one out of all of us when we first got our costumes."

Bakugo hunched his shoulders. “I didn’t design it,” he grumbled.

author: ['Annacharlier']
title: Don't Go
characters: ['Adora (She-Ra)', 'Catra (She-Ra)', 'Glimmer (She-Ra)', 'Bow (She-Ra)', 'Entrapta (She-Ra)', 'Horde Prime (She-Ra)']
additional_tags: ['Hurt/Comfort', 'Missing Scene', 'Post-episode: S05Ep05 Save the Cat', 'Emotional Hurt/Comfort']
summary:
They stay that way for a long time, Catra’s face tucked into Adora’s shoulder, Adora gently cradling Catra’s head. Adora is careful not to hug Catra too hard or make her feel restrained, anticipating the moment that Catra will start to pull away — but Catra doesn’t. She hangs on so tightly it hurts, her claws digging through Adora’s jacket and into her back, latching into her like she did when she was a kitten and didn’t know how much her claws could hurt. Adora tries not to wince, tries not to move a single muscle, worried that if she does the spell will break and Catra will struggle away, appalled at having shown weakness.

But Catra doesn’t let go. And so neither does Adora.
