summary:
“Okay,” Jingyi says, as Sizhui puzzles this out aloud. “Okay! So the demon has been turning its victims into children.”

“I think so,” Sizhui says.

“To make them easier prey,” Jingyi says.

“Yes,” Sizhui says.

“So—” Jingyi’s voice cracks here, “this kid is Senior Wei.”

Wei Wuxian, still tangled in his own massive robes, blinks politely at them.

(Or: Wei Wuxian is cursed on a night-hunt, and the junior quartet rapidly finds themselves in over their heads.)
notes:
WHEW, WE MADE IT. Huge thank you to all of you who cheered this idea on when it was a 11pm crying thread on Twitter, and big thanks especially to the lovely people who have been reading all my draft snippets for the past several weeks, especially Aubrey for her always-insightful beta read and Lore for catching some punctuation shenanigans. (A few more spoilery shoutouts can be found at the bottom!)

A few quick warnings on this one: this fic deals with both WWX and Sizhui's childhood, and obliquely discusses food security issues, as well as WWX's time living on the streets.

Thank you so much for all your support, and I hope you enjoy it!!

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

Thank you so much to:
- Fey for suggesting the 'A-Ying knocks over a cup of tea' scene
- Carrie for suggesting 'Jingyi accidentally teaches A-Ying to say fuck'

And if you'd like to find me on Twitter and yell about Wangxian, I'm at @bee_off_main!

author: ['poisedwalrus']
title: close to the breathing wave
fandoms: ['Percy Jackson and the Olympians - Rick Riordan', 'Percy Jackson and the Olympians & Related Fandoms - All Media Types']
characters: ['Percy Jackson', 'Luke Castellan', 'Annabeth Chase (Percy Jackson)', 'Grover Underwood', 'Sally Jackson (Percy Jackson)', 'Clarisse La Rue', 'Silena Beauregard', 'Ethan Nakamura', 'Charles Beckendorf']
additional_tags: ['Time Travel', 'Time Travel Fix-It', 'Unreliable Narrator', 'Mood Whiplash', 'percy is once again asking for you to seize the means of production', "luke is either your murderer or your mom he hasn't decided yet", 'rated demigod for stabbing swearing and suicidal ideation']
series: Part 2 of the darkness of the depths is forgotten in the surf
summary:
“Why are you looking at skateboards?” asks Luke.

“Maybe Kronos wants us to get a skateboard.”

Luke presses a hand on the top of Percy’s head and physically turns him away from the window display.

“Does Kronos want us to get a skateboard,” he says.

“…No.”


Luke wants to know what the hell Percy thinks he’s doing. Percy wants Luke to trip and fall over the side of the yacht. They are, as always, at an impasse.
notes:
“shadows and smiles everywhere,
on shoulders, thighs and knees;
That’s how the gods wanted it.”

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

“does there really exist
among these ruined lines, edges, points, hollows and curves
does there exist the movement of the face, shape of the tenderness
of those who’ve waned so strangely in our lives,
those who remained the shadow of waves and thoughts with the sea’s boundlessness”

“And yet I have once loved Syngros Avenue
the double rocking of the wide road
that would leave us miraculously by the sea,
the everlasting sea, to be cleansed of our sins;”

“behind the lattices the cool garden changing shape, growing larger and smaller,
we too changing, as we gazed, the shape of our desire and our hearts,”

“If pain is human we are not human beings merely to suffer pain;
that’s why I think so much these days about the great river,
this meaning that moves forward among herbs and greenery”

“The moon rose from the sea like Aphrodite,
covered the Archer’s stars,
I too was an archer in the war;
my fate: that of a man who missed his target.”

“Our friends have left us
perhaps we never saw them, perhaps
we met them when sleep
still brought us close to the breathing wave
perhaps we search for them because we search for the other life,
beyond the statues.”

author: ['WillowSong']
title: I'll Always Protect You
characters: ['Spider-Man', 'Deadpool', 'Peter Parker', 'Wade Wilson', 'Original Character']
additional_tags: ['Angst', 'Humor', 'Violence', 'Romance', 'Action', 'Tumblr Prompt', 'Kidnapping', 'Spideypool - Freeform', 'wade falling off things', 'and not thinking plans through', 'Peter is a badass', 'and a little ball of sunshine', 'Explicit Language', 'Suspense', 'Sort Of', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Established Relationship']
summary:
I saw this anonymous prompt on tumblr and had to try writing it. Props to the anon who came up with this idea, because it's really awesome!!

Anonymous said: If anyone is up for it I have a rescue prompt idea where Peter (he is not in his spiderman suit) is taken as a hostage with a gun to the head along with a few other civilians. Peter is warning the criminals to let everyone go otherwise his fiance,Wade, will kill them all. They mock him and beat him up. Then a furious Deadpool saves Peter by the most badass way possible. Also I would love if someone write how unnervingly skilled Wade is as a mercenary. Please? Anyone?

So I originally only meant for this to be a oneshot, but then a lovely anon suggested that I write a continuation where Wade meets Jonah. I kind of fell in love with the idea, so this happened. Thank you, anon!! I hope you enjoy!! ^^

Wade really needed to start thinking his plans through. Especially the plans had to do with exploding bridges, going into battle against moving boxes, and proposing to his boyfriend.
But who was he kidding?
Wade Wilson never plans.
Which is probably why everything blows up.

 
Set five months before the previous chapters.
notes:
Now translated into Chinese by the beautiful Lwnixndk: http://archiveofourown.org/works/6722134/chapters/15367462

Well, hello, Spideypool fandom! Long time, no see! :D

Sooooooo my hand slipped and I kind of accidentally wrote a third part to this verse. That's basically how I've written this entire verse though, so I guess that's really nothing new haha.

I hope you enjoy this next crazy little adventure! <3

series: Part 4 of If We Must Starve (Let it be Together)
summary:
Lambert did his best not to get swept up in mortal politics. It didn't work. When he gets into trouble with a baron in Kerack, fighting his way out of the situation seems hopeless. Good thing Jaskier is nearby. Good thing he knows the baron in question. Good thing he wields power all his own in the world of the nobility.

Oh, and did he mention his name is Julian?

Set in the If I Starve timeline, but also works as a standalone. This one is pretty heavy on the friendship between Jaskier and Lambert, but I tagged it as Jaskier/Geralt because they are together in this 'verse.
notes:
Am I working on a longer, more emotional piece for this series? Yes. Did this prompt/plot bunny crawl into my head and shit all over the furniture until I gave in and wrote it? Also yes.

This piece will have a second part, likely posted in the next few days. And I will post the first part of a new piece (which will be much longer and angstier) a few days after that. But until then...I hope you enjoy!

(This is set a few years after Wrath of the Wolves, for those of you who are following the series.)

(See the end of the work for other works inspired by this one.)

This one fell straight out of my head and into my word document in record time, I swear. I hope it delivers all the feral nobility content that y'all were thirsting for in the comments ;)

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Thank you for reading!! As always, comments are very much appreciated! Also, I'm open for prompts rn if any of you want to hit me up with story ideas.

summary: When A-Yuan gets sick and Wen Qing doesn't have the supplies she needs to properly treat him, Wei Wuxian can only think of one place to go for help.
notes:
I started this long before Covid19 reared its ugly head. It is in no way related to, or an inspiration for, events in this story.

There are a few minor novel details, but main beats are all based on CQL canon.

Many thanks to Cinco for her amazing beta skills! This is a much better story due to her help. Thank you to ~Whatever and Yelling for all your support and encouragement, and all my love and gratitude to ThirtySixSaveFiles for her endless support and encouragement during the writing process. This story would not exist without her.

The title is from the song of the same name, The Kite String and the Anchor Rope, by Prides.

ETA: Since posting this story, I learned that A-Yi is a homonym for auntie and while I feel like that could be a very funny way for Jin Ling to get back at Jingyi for calling him "young mistress," it doesn't really work for a tiny child, so after consulting w/a couple of Chinese speakers, I settled on calling him Jing-er.

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

You can find me at fleurdeliser on tumblr or @fleurdeliser on twitter. Come say hi!

additional_tags: ['Midoriya Izuku Has a Quirk', 'Suicide Attempt', '5+1 Things', 'Dadzawa', 'Parental Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead', 'Implied/Referenced Self-Harm', "but it doesn't actually happen", "I promise this isn't actually that dark", 'Hurt/Comfort', 'It’s a lil dark', 'Temporary Character Death', 'Temporary', 'Now Edited', 'so it might be slightly better than last time', 'Suicidal Izuku Midoriya']
series: Part 1 of I can't stop giving izuku death quirks, and now look where i amPart 1 of author's personal favourites
summary:
The darkness had learnt not to swallow him whole, had learnt to dance with him as he felt the warmth enter his veins, and learnt to give him back.

Or, five times Izuku Midoriya kills himself, and one time he... well.
notes:
PLEASE DO NOT POST THIS TO ANOTHER SITE. THIS INCLUDES TRANSLATIONS. IF YOU HAVE READ THIS ANYWHERE BUT AO3 IT IS STOLEN, POSTED, OR TRANSLATED, WITHOUT PERMISSION. This includes ficbook. If I discover any sites hosting this work without permission, I will report it for plagiarism.
This is my first ever mha (published) fic! I got introduced to it recently and fell in love, and wrote this!

Just a cw: a character asks another (underage) character if they've been sexually assaulted. No sexual assault occurs in any capacity, implied or referenced in any way, it's a question posed to get an answer directly. I haven't tagged it since it isn't in the story, but let me know if I should change that!

 

an eta: this fic has been on my mind very recently again and you know what? it is dark. when i wrote this, i convinced myself that it wasn't, because like most fics, this sort of thing is just written out of pure catharsis and coping mechanisms. if i were to write this fic today, i'd probably do it a lot differently, probably mostly on bakugou's characterisations, but i wrote this the way i wrote it, and i am still proud of what it is, and the comments i still get that just thank me for writing it.

it gets better. it really, really does. me saying this isn't actually that dark and it's a lil dark is tucking these things under a rug, but, and i think most people did get the subconscious message i was telling when i wrote this, the point of this fic is healing. acceptance. moving on.

this fic is coping. and this fic is hope.

please enjoy it, and i hope you all have a fantastic day.

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

ETA: the response I got for this fic has been so overwhelmingly positive, I am so glad you guys liked it so much! Thank each and every one of you for your kind comments on my dumb lil fic!

author: ['Igneum807']
title: Solace and Sanctuary
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
fandoms: ['Wiedźmin | The Witcher - All Media Types', 'The Witcher (TV)']
relationships: ['Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia/Jaskier | Dandelion']
characters: ['Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia', 'Jaskier | Dandelion', 'Eskel (The Witcher)', 'Lambert (The Witcher)', 'Vesemir (The Witcher)']
additional_tags: ['Fate & Destiny', 'The wolves at Lettenhove', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Canon-Typical Violence', 'Anti-Witcher Sentiments', 'But also', 'decent human beings', 'Touch-Starved', 'Emotionally Constipated Geralt z Rivii | Geralt of Rivia', 'Emotionally constipated witchers', 'some outside POV', 'And also some Feral Nobility Jaskier', 'Jaskier Befriends the Witchers', 'Witchers Have Feelings (The Witcher)']
series: Part 5 of If We Must Starve (Let it be Together)
summary:
The people of Lettenhove listen to every song that Jaskier writes. He is their viscount, after all. The songs speak of witchers as heroes, as saviors, and the people believe them. When Eskel stumbles on the town in a desperate state, he discovers an unexpected safe haven in Jaskier's home and sets off a chain of events that quickly spirals into something powerful. Something the poets call destiny. The destiny of a manor and its people. Because after all these years, after all the hatred and the scorn, the witchers of Kaer Morhen have found a place to call home.

Heavy on the Jaskier/all the witchers friendship, but he and Geralt are in an established romantic relationship. Works as a standalone!
notes:
I was completely, beautifully overwhelmed by the comments on my last fic. Y'all wanted to see more about the people of Lettenhove and Jaskier's witchers, and my brain was hit by a stroke of inspiration so strong it shocked me. I have this whole thing planned out already. Oh boy, it is gonna be a long one. I hope you guys are ready, I hope you enjoy, and, to all those people who left kind words on "Pulling Rank," thank you! A special thanks to RoS13, whose plot bunnies always make me smile like crazy (except for the angsty ones), and whose comment was a huge part of the inspiration for this story.

By the way, there isn't really a need to read the rest of the series before this one. A few mentions and such might not make sense, but the narrative here will stand by itself just fine.

Damn, I love outside POV. I completely made Leo up, but I had a grand old time writing bits of this from his perspective. Anyway, I hope you all enjoy!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Next chapter, we get to see a non-wolf witcher at Lettenhove! And more from my main hoe, Destiny herself.

As always, comments/rants/thoughts are super appreciated!

Thank you all for your patience on this chapter. I pride myself on uploading regularly, but I got two new piercings and sleep has been...elusive. Who knew I rolled over so often? But I am rested now and re-hyped about this story, so I hope you all enjoy!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

I didn't want to put this at the beginning because I wanted Letho to be a surprise, but y'all, FUCK CANON. Letho and Geralt have all this cool backstory, but so much of it is tied to Geralt's relationship with Yennefer that it does not fit into this 'verse at all. Suffice to say that Letho is still a Kingslayer, and he and Geralt still fought, but I'm not going into too much more detail than that because the events of this fic literally cannot happen if canon is obeyed.

Anyway, timelines are hard. I hope you guys liked this chapter, and, as always, please leave thoughts/questions/rants in the comments. It's so much fun for me to interact with you, and people always offer the best plot bunnies/headcanons that an author could ask for!

Current mood: listening to Not Yet/Love Run on loop and crying like a fucking baby.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

I know the hype is real in the comments for Letho and Geralt to meet, and I promise, next chapter ;)

I have zero goddamn reason for why this is two months late. Blame the plague, guys.

But the good news is, I have my mojo back and am super excited to continue this story! Thanks to everyone who is following this- your interest in it and all the super sweet comments were a brilliant motivation for kicking myself out of my funk. I hope this chapter lives up to your expectations!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Thoughts? Questions? General gay rants? Yell at me in the comments!

A quick chapter because I'm getting my groove back and wrote this on my long ass flight to California. Enjoy!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Lambert and Eskel next chapter, I promise! Thank you guys so so much for reading, and as always, please feel free to rant at me in the comments.

School is starting up, so I finally feel like a person again! It's nice to be able to wake up early and actually have something to do. But of course, what do I do when my professors load on the work? You guessed it! I write Witcher fanfiction. Please enjoy my product of procrastination.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Have y'all read "The Name of the Wind?" When it comes to music and general stupidity, Kvothe has some serious Jaskier vibes. Anyway, as always, please feel free to rant/ask questions/commiserate with me in the comments ;)

I'm back! Everything has been crazy lately because I just moved to Canada, and getting all my ID, cell service, and wifi was a mess. But I'm in a really good place now, in an apartment I love, so I can finally get back to writing. That said, this should be getting updated regularly until it's finished.

Also, I want to give a huge shoutout to RoS13. They wrote two completely hilarious poems for me in the comments that were a huge source of motivation for jumping back into this project. If anyone wants to read those poems, they're just in the comments, so you can go look at them if you choose. Thank you RoS!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Thank you all for reading and being patient with me. I know updates on this have been super slow, but I still get a lot of love from you guys, and I really appreciate it. As always, please feel free to leave a comment/question/rant below, and thanks for reading!

A short little chapter as I get ready to wrap things up. The next chapter of this fic will be the last, and it will be out before the end of the month!

Also: If I Must Starve hit 5000 kudos, and I just have to say a massive, crazy huge THANK YOU to all of you for reading, commenting, and leaving kudos on my work. My writing has gotten an insane amount of attention and kindness from the community. It means so, so much to me. You folks are amazing, and I appreciate you every day!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

I saw a lot of super sweet comments talking about cuddle piles and such. As much as I love the thought, I just couldn't do it. These characters have too much bloody history, and too many self-preservation instincts, to end up sleeping comfortably next to each other. Letho and the wolves can be cordial, sure, but anything approaching intimacy felt way too unrealistic for me to write. Hope you guys still enjoyed!

As always, please feel free to leave rants/opinions/thoughts in the comments!

Canon? Who's she? I've never heard of her.

Also, I'm posting this a few hours before midnight in my time zone. So happy new year to all of you! Good fucking riddance to 2020. It was a nightmare, but we got through it, and I'm hopeful for a better 2021.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

That's the end, folks! I probably won't write anything else for this 'verse, or the fandom at all really, until season 2 comes out. But I hope you guys enjoyed this wild ride, and thanks a ton for sticking around. I know I didn't keep to a decent upload schedule with this one, so I appreciate all the continued support. As always, feel free to leave thoughts/questions/rants in the comments, and if you guys ever want to chat, I'm @igneum_art on IG. Happy 2021!

It seemed like a good idea. Taking Five out for coffee after both of them found themselves wide awake in the middle of the night. Some brotherly quality time to pass the hours until breakfast. It was just their luck that the café they sat in got robbed.

summary:
Midoriya Izuku is terrible at tying his tie. He knows this. His mother knows this. All Might knows this. Honestly, the whole of Japan knows this.

So really, they couldn't have made the connection sooner.

It takes a headband, a black-tie Gala and a school dance to figure out why every villain is so damn intimidated by him in a suit.
notes:
disclaimer: i don't know when in canon this is-- afo was captured, eri was rescued, and AM is retired, but machia hasn't made an appearance and kurogiri somehow isn't in jail anymore, and izuku has already interned with endeavor. it's just... in there somewhere.

yes, i should be working on omniscience. oops.

so, yeah! hope you enjoyed.

author: ['Ariaste']
title: Attempting the Impossible
fandoms: ['陈情令 | The Untamed (TV)', '魔道祖师 - 墨香铜臭 | Módào Zǔshī - Mòxiāng Tóngxiù']
relationships: ['Jiang Cheng | Jiang Wanyin & Wei Ying | Wei Wuxian', 'Lan Zhan | Lan Wangji/Wei Ying | Wei Wuxian', 'background Sizhui/Jin Ling']
characters: ['Lan Yuan | Lan Sizhui']
additional_tags: ['Reconciliation', 'Adoption', 'Adopted Children', 'ultimate dads wangxian', "jiang cheng's avuncular powers", 'Jiang Cheng POV', 'Family Feels', 'Family Fluff', 'the Yunmeng Bros make up', 'Post-Canon', 'the Wangxian Need More Kids agenda', 'Original Character(s)', 'Kid Fic', 'Family Drama', 'lan wangji living his best life as a husband and father', 'Fluff', 'and like a tiny dab of angst']
summary:
Jiang Cheng gathers up his determination in both hands and goes to the Cloud Recesses to embark on one of the most difficult endeavors he can imagine: Repairing his relationship with his brother.

To his surprise, he discovers he's become an uncle again... several times over.

Wei Wuxian, what the fuck?!
notes:
If you are looking for plot, abandon hope, all ye who enter here. This is just talking and feelings and fluff as far as the eye can see.

Notes at the end have some discussion of OCs' names (including the Chinese characters used therein). I didn't put it up here because of spoilers.

As is a grand tradition in any MDZS adaption or interpretation: rip to all the other interpretations, but my words to Wangxian.mp3 are different. In this universe, the first character of the song is 思 (si1, thinking/longing). Yes this is plot relevant.

Huge thank you to the groupchat for gently supporting me through it, especially Williedustice who I love to spoil and who really wanted a Wangxian remix of Speranza's brilliant Due South fic, With Six You Get Eggroll. Thank you also to my platoon of beta readers, especially all the ones who cheerled me through the home stretch. <3

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

The most difficult part of this fic was naming the kids. Thank you so so so so so much to my squad of Chinese speakers (Williedustice, Holly, Grace, and Katje) who took one look at the first draft of the list and were gentle but ruthless in their mockery of what I'd come up with and *extremely* helpful in polishing it up. Thank you for keeping me from accidentally naming one of the kids after a famous prostitute from classical Chinese literature. You are all priceless jewels.

The full list of kids, in order of adoption, are:

Sizhui 思追 (si1zhui1), Lan Yuan 蓝愿 (lan2yuan4)
Siyue 思悦 (si1yue4), Lan Ding  蓝定 (lan2ding4)
Siyuan 思湲 (si1yuan2), Lan Shu 蓝淑 (lan2shu1)
Sixia 思霞 (si1xia2), Lan Hao 蓝皓 (lan2hao4)     
Sihan, 思晗 (si1han2), Lan Chun 蓝淳 (lan2chun2)
Siyong 思永 (si1yong3), Lan Que 蓝确 (lan2que4)
Her Ladyship, Lan Ying 蓝迎 (lan2ying2), who will eventually be bestowed with the name Siqing 思清 (si1qing1)

The naming squad and I had some puzzled conversations re: how to handle the courtesy names, because technically, in historical China, a courtesy name isn't given to you until you reach adulthood (age 20), except that in MDZS, everyone arrives at the Cloud Recesses fifteen years old and already in possession of courtesy names, and in the show, JFM and Yanli call Wei Wuxian by his courtesy name (and "A-Xian"!) when he's first brought back to Lotus Pier as a tiny child, and Yanli asks Wei Wuxian to think of a courtesy name for Jin Ling before he's even born, so... MXTX, what is the truth??? I've decided to err on the side of following her slightly-tweaked-from-perfectly-historical-accuracy worldbuilding. She tweaked it for the sake of writing Cute Family Moments and... *gestures to this whole fic* here we are.

 

Anyway!! Thank you for reading!! Please feel free to yammer at me, either in the comments here, on tumblr, or on twitter (where I am in my guise as a professional fantasy author but plz do not let that stop you, we're all nerds here). I have a few more fic WIPs in progress right now, so subscribe to ya boi for those sweet update emails.

*

(And yes, a couple weeks later the whole family goes to Yunmeng for a month, and all the kids learn to swim in the river, and they eat lotus seeds and spicy food, and A-Chun falls absolutely in love with it and draws Jiang Cheng a picture of the river that he absolutely hangs on the Metaphorical Fantasy Refrigerator, and Ding-er catches a dozen frogs and declares that it's the best place ever, and Wei Wuxian tells Jiang Cheng that Her Ladyship hasn't been colicky once since he visited them and that she's sleeping through the night sometimes which is great because that means he and Lan Zhan have a lot more energy for-- but Jiang Cheng puts him in a headlock before he can finish talking.

...And a couple years later, A-Chun comes to be a Jiang disciple, and A-Hao splits his time evenly between Gusu and Yunmeng so he doesn't have to be apart from his twin too much, and a few years after *that* Ding-er comes to Yunmeng too. She doesn't become a cultivator. She just wants to be a naturalist and study aquatic plants and wildlife.)

title: how, or when, or from where
fandoms: ['魔道祖师 - 墨香铜臭 | Módào Zǔshī - Mòxiāng Tóngxiù', '陈情令 | The Untamed (TV)']

characters: ['Lan Zhan | Lan Wangji', 'Wei Ying | Wei Wuxian']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Modern Setting', 'Amnesia', 'Friends to Lovers', 'Getting Together']
summary:
Jiang Cheng sucks in a sharp breath. “What year do you think it is, Wei Wuxian?”

“2001,” Wei Wuxian says, and then cracks up when Jiang Cheng’s eyes widen in alarm. “Calm down, I’m just kidding. I know it’s 2014.”

Jiang Cheng stares at him.

Wei Wuxian is quiet for a beat. “I presume from your reaction that it is not actually 2014.”

“No,” Jiang Cheng says softly. “No, it’s not.”

(Or, the one where Wei Wuxian loses his memories, and tries to figure out why he isn't dating Lan Wangji yet.)
notes:
title is from that one neruda sonnet that i take all my titles from, y'all know the drill by now. the line is:

 

"i love you without knowing how, or when, or from where."

notes:
I do not consent to have my work hosted on any third party app or site. If you are reading this fanfiction anywhere but on the website of archiveofourown, it has been reposted without my permission.

 

Ok, so obviously, everyone and their mortal parent has written the Three Days At The Infirmary already by now, but I started this because I hadn't yet seen anyone address or remember the following facts:

• Will is actually bad at everything Apollo except for healing. He doesn't even fight. He's not even good with his bow. He specifically says he isn't a good musician nor singer.
• Nico's shirt
• that little murder/assisted suicide thing

So here's my take on it because alzejalzkjslkajdqazs I'm still so happy for Nico, let's make him even happier.
I've no idea how this got this long, I'm sorry, nothing even really happens, but oh gods these two.

summary:

Peter and Tony return to the Tower, and an ambush of sorts proceeds.
notes:
Hey! This is sort of my first time publishing a fic. I wrote a short She-Ra fic for a class earlier this year, but that was posted under the author MDST3559014. It's called Loyalty if you wanna find it. The other stories by that author are not mine. Anyway, enjoy!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Hope you enjoyed! This probably could've been edited a little more... but I got tired of reading it and wanted to post. I have a lot of ideas for different ways Peter could meet the Avengers, so this might turn into a series. Let me know what you think! (Polite) Feedback appreciated!

Hey y'all! Sorry this took a while to get out - I was sick so I have a good excuse. More info about this piece and series in the end notes. Enjoy and thanks for reading!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Okay, so. Sorry this piece is sort of just an in-between to connect the first and next chapters. I hope you still enjoyed it, and I'm excited about what it's setting up to in the next chapter.
Speaking of which, the next chapter will be posted on Wednesday. That'll be the last chapter to this piece.
However, I am also making this part of a series of pieces (mostly one-shots other than this) in which Peter meets the Avengers (or one of the Avengers or Rhodey or Ant-Man or someone like that). I just about to post a new piece, in which Peter and Rhodey meet for the first time, so if you liked this please check that out! I'll be planning on posting something every Wednesday and Saturday.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

The end!

I hope y'all enjoyed! Sort of a short and sweet piece, but I had originally only intended on one chapter so it is longer than I planned.
This piece was the first part of a series of unrelated short pieces (mostly one-shots) about Peter meeting and interacting with the Avengers/some other characters. I've already posted the second piece in the series, which is about Peter and Rhodey meeting, so I encourage you to check that out if you haven't already. I plan on updating the series pretty regularly, so keep an eye out for more. Also, if you have ideas/prompts along those lines that you want to see, please send em my way!

Thanks again! Hope you enjoyed this piece.

author: ['senlinyu']
title: Height
characters: ['Hermione Granger', 'Ginny Weasley', 'Draco Malfoy']
additional_tags: ['Hogwarts Eighth Year', 'Height Differences', 'Height Kink', 'tol/smol', 'erotic hand holding', 'Mutual Pining', 'Explicit Sexual Content', 'Determined Hermione', 'Pining Draco Malfoy', 'Fluff and Crack', 'Fluff and Angst', 'Angst and Fluff and Smut', 'Size Difference']
summary:
“Tall? That’s what you think I should notice about Malfoy? His height?”

Ginny quirked an eyebrow and licked the tip of her quill suggestively. ”Well, isn’t that your thing? Lockhart. Krum. McLaggen. Ron. The only thing they have in common is being tall enough to give me a neck ache.”

Hermione felt her ears grow hot, and she gripped her book tighter. “I don’t have a thing for tall men. Their height is—completely coincidental.”

Dramione Height Differences Minifest 2020.

title: tie a knife with a ribbon
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
fandoms: ['魔道祖师 - 墨香铜臭 | Módào Zǔshī - Mòxiāng Tóngxiù', '陈情令 | The Untamed (TV)']
relationships: ['Lan Zhan | Lan Wangji/Wei Ying | Wei Wuxian']
characters: ['Lan Zhan | Lan Wangji', 'Wei Ying | Wei Wuxian']
additional_tags: ['Dubious Consent', 'Bottom!Lan Wangji', 'top!wei wuxian', 'Yiling Patriarch!WWX', 'D/s', 'Rimming', 'Frottage', 'Just so much smut', 'a lot of smut', 'a sprinkling of plot for flavour', 'war prize LWJ']
summary:
The Yiling Patriarch makes a bargain with the cultivation world. He'll give them the power to defeat Wen Ruohan. No more death. No more war.

All he wants in return is Lan Wangji.
notes:
pls de-anon!

 

 

Prompt:

 

So I love war prize fics...

Any canon/setting/or other genre included is fine. Any background pairings are fine.

Wei Ying was not adopted by the Jiang Clan as a child; he grew up the yiling patriarch instead (reasoning is your choice). When the war happens, the 4 Clans ask him to help defeat the Wens. Maybe Lan Zahn goes to the Burial Mounds to request help, or Wei Ying sees Lan Zahn at a war meeting and says "him! I choose that one." But Wei Ying gives a small gift (token/ribbon/something of your choice) to Lan Zahn that he must wear until the end of the war, promising that it will help against the Wen puppets.

*On the condition* that Lan Zahn joins him of his free will in the Burial Mounds after the war is won. That can be forever, or can be for a specific length of time.

Whatever the gift is, when they approach Nightless City, the puppets run in terror from Lan Zahn. It turns the tide of the war.

Lan Zahn goes to him following the war. Do the other clans let them be? Do they now fear the yiling patriarch? Do they find a reason to attack the burial mounds under the flimsy excuse they must rescue Lan Zahn?

Dub-con is fine, no non-con please. Would prefer that Lan Zahn falls in love with Wei YIng as well, and at some point, protects/defends him against the other 4 Clans. (Maybe they meet up a year after the war, Lan Zahn and Wei YIng going to some conference to meet with them. Maybe it's if/when they try to attack the Burial Mounds.)

I would like LXC to get some peace over their union, in the end, so he doesn't worry endlessly for his brother.

title: Gossip Lord Zuko
characters: ['Zuko (Avatar)', 'Sokka (Avatar)', 'Original Characters']
additional_tags: ['the original characters are fire nation staff/citizens', 'Matchmaker!Zuko', 'Fluff', 'Mentioned sexual harassment', "nothing is outright described and it's over quickly but still", 'Zuko will fuck harassers up', "you're making someone uncomfortable?", 'get ready to throw hands with the Firelord', 'Zuko is a sucker for pregnant women', 'will offer them the world or at least his bank account', 'the Fire Nation loves Zuko', 'and Zuko loves the Fire Nation', 'Zuko and Sokka are soft and gay for each other', 'Post-Canon', "it's canon that Zuko got rid of homophobia in the Fire Nation and I love that for him", 'am i creating a whole tiny universe revolving around zuko and the palace staff?', 'perhaps', 'me writing an academic paper: 1500 words is so much work', 'me writing fanfic: writes nearly 10000 words easily', 'zuko plays matchmaker but those relationships are minor', 'Fire Lord Zuko', 'Ambassador Sokka']
series: Part 2 of Post-Canon Fire Lord Zuko (and his staff)
summary:
Zuko was probably more involved in the gossip around the palace than he had any right to be.

It’s not his fault, it’s really not. It’s just that sometimes he’s sitting in the kitchens (the best place to get the gossip) drinking tea and trying to relax for once, and some of the kitchen staff will start gossiping where he can still hear them. He doesn’t really try to listen in; it’s not his place and he won’t judge the staff based on whatever rumors are running around, but Spirits is it interesting. He tries not to listen too much, or get too invested in it though. Gossip is gossip after all, and rumors hardly ever turn out to be true.

But Zuko absolutely needs to know if Maya from the laundry room broke up with her piece of shit boyfriend.

Or, 5 times Zuko got invested in/meddled in palace gossip, and 1 time he was the subject of the gossip.
notes:
I mentioned briefly in another fic that Zuko likes to sit in the kitchen and gossip with the staff, and so this fic was born. Could also be summarized as 'Zuko embracing his theater kid side and loving Mess.' Not beta read, so any mistakes are my own. Enjoy!

Edit: Hi! As I'm making this edit, this fic has just passed 10,000 kudos. That is absolutely insane to me, I can't believe how much love and support this fic has gotten. It really means the world to me, thank you all so much. I hope this continues to be a fic that people read and enjoy. Thank you all so much <3

author: ['WitchofEndor']
title: Life in Eden
additional_tags: ['Ursa (Avatar) is a Good Parent', 'Ozai (Avatar) Being a Terrible Parent', 'Hakoda (Avatar) is a Good Parent', 'Azula (Avatar) Redemption', 'Zuko is an Awkward Turtleduck', 'Everyone Needs A Hug', 'Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Sibling Dynamic: Fucked Up But Wholesome']
summary:
Her daughter is five years old when Ursa realises what she and Ozai have been doing to their children. By each choosing one to bestow with their approval, they’re pitting them against one another. Perhaps Ozai is doing it on purpose, but Ursa isn’t. She resolves to heal the damage she has done.

In which Ursa tries to be a better parent to Azula, and it doesn’t change very much. And then, quite abruptly, it changes everything.
notes:
I'm apparently falling face-first into this fandom.

Warnings: canon-typical child abuse, discussions of a homophobic society, Azula being Azula.

Title is from Sara Bareilles's song 'Eden'. The full lyric in question is: life in Eden changed.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

This has been a complete blast. I have very much enjoyed falling face-first into this fandom. Thank you all for joining me on this adventure!

summary:
Peter doesn't want to go on a field trip to Stark Tower. It's a recipe for disaster. His class doesn't believe him, his teacher doesn't believe him. If he makes it through the entire day without being suspended, it'll be a miracle. Unfortunately for Peter, he's never much believed in miracles.

...

“This is a goddamn disaster.” Peter declared miserably. At least he hadn’t thrown up his food.

“Could be worse.” MJ said across from him. Peter lifted up his head.

“Oh yeah, how?”

MJ shrugged. “They could have expelled you instead.”

Peter gaped at her. “Thanks MJ, that’s really helpful. I feel so much better now.”

summary:
Sex-ed class has never gone so wrong. When a truth serum reveals a secret that Bakugou and Midoriya planned to take to their grave, the rest of their peers at U.A. become concerned with their well-being. How will the two of them react?

Katsuki and Deku are confronted by their teachers.

Midoriya and Bakugou tell the truth. It's kind of a theme now.

The parents are informed of what happened to the boys, and a dark secret is revealed.

Midoriya and Bakugou are finally forced to confront everyone about everything that's happened.
notes:
Hello! Yet another fic I'm starting because I'm uncontrollable? You betcha. This is another vent fic that I use to deal with my own sexual assault story, which leads to my next point.
TRIGGER WARNING! This fic discusses sexual assault of a child, with some graphic flashbacks later on and multiple discussions of what happened throughout the fic. If this triggers you in any way then do NOT read this fic. You have been warned.
Not beta'd, obviously.

The title of this fic is inspired by one of my favorite SONGS by Avenge Sevenfold, I highly suggest checking it out if you want to get emotional.

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Hello! I'm here again with another chapter. This chapter discusses the act of sexual assault, but it isn't graphic. Still, it may be triggering to some, so don't read this story if that upsets you.
Not beta'd, of course.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

I hope you all liked it! Leave me a comment if you want to see more, it really motivates me! <3

Hello fellow fanfiction fiends. (See what I did there? Alliteration? No? Okay.) There is a TRIGGER WARNING for this chapter. It depicts graphicly violent descriptions of the aftermath of rape, some of which I've experienced myself and know to be real. if those things trigger you, then this chapter and this entire story are not for you.
Not beta'd, as per usual.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Whoo! That was emotional, huh? It was also kind of all over the place, but you know how it goes. Next chapter we'll be seeing how Mitsuki, Masaru and Inko react to the news of what happened to their sons, so I hope y'all are prepared for that.

We're nearing the home stretch, folks! I'm trying to decide if I want to add another chapter or two, so I guess y'all should look out for that.
TRIGGER WARNING, this chapter discusses child abuse and rape, so if you aren't comfortable with that, then you probably shouldn't be reading this story.
Not beta'd, as per usual.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

What did y'all think? Some of you already guessed that Inko already knew about what was happening to Izuku, but I just wanted to clarify that she did NOT take Izuku to the hospital after Hisashi raped him. She just found the blood on his clothes and figured that was what happened, and since Izuku never told her that he was even injured, he figured that his mother had no idea any of it happened in the first place.
Next chapter will start with some healing, so let's all pray for our boys to find peace. Lord knows I'll never give them any if my stories have anything to say about it.

Whew! This is the last chapter folks! I'm currently debating on whether I should make this a series, so if you'd like to see that, comment down below on what you'd like to see happen in this universe!
Not beta'd, as per usual. This chapter also reveals spoilers from plots that happen in the manga right after the anime ends, so if you are an anime-only person, don't read it!

How did y'all like it? Would you like to see more? Let me know!

author: ['aworus']
title: next time, next time
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
fandoms: ['僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia']
characters: ['Midoriya Izuku', 'Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead']
additional_tags: ['Time Loop', 'Angst', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Protective Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead', 'Parental Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead', 'Hurt Midoriya Izuku', 'Depressed Midoriya Izuku', 'Temporary Character Death', 'Suicidal Thoughts', 'let aizawa say fuck', 'no beta we die like izuku in this fic', 'Blood and Gore', 'theres cursing bc this is in aizawas pov', 'i have been informed that this is a bit of a horror fic so... beware', 'Implied/Referenced Child Abuse', 'sorry theres vomit ewwie ewwie']
summary:
Over and over again, Aizawa Shouta is woken by the same alarm, at the same time, on the same day.

The roof access door alarm is triggered. It is 7:56am. It is Saturday.

And over and over again, Aizawa Shouta is just barely too late to stop Midoriya Izuku from stepping off of the ledge and splattering onto the concrete below.
notes:
Hello! This piece is inspired by aloneintherain’s absolutely phenomenal fic, a lesson you should heed (try, try again).

While you don't have to have read that fic in order to enjoy this one, I highly recommend reading it anyway! Firstly, reading that fic will aid in your understanding of this one, and secondly, it’s just a great piece!!

This was not originally intended to be a whole rewrite, but that is... exactly what it turned into?? Anyway, the key difference between this fic and the orig is that; instead of only Izuku being involved in a time loop, Aizawa is as well! This fic is about the both of them trying to find a way to save the other, while refusing to communicate the full extent of what they’re really going through. (spoiler alert: that doesn’t work.)

Also if you’ve read aloneintherain’s fic, you’ll see that I completely disregarded Shinsou’s involvement in the story. I swear I don't hate him, I just really wanted to focus on Aizawa and Midoriya's relationship! Also there was literally no way that I could add yet ANOTHER overlapping time loop without the story being completely incomprehensible.

Remember to check the tags for possible triggers! Stay safe friends!!

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

title: the distance to the stars
characters: ['Eddie Diaz (9-1-1 TV)', 'Evan "Buck" Buckley', 'Henrietta "Hen" Wilson', 'Howie "Chimney" Han', 'Bobby Nash', 'Maddie Buckley', 'Christopher Diaz (9-1-1 TV)', 'Minor Characters']
additional_tags: ['Fluff', 'angst if you squint', 'Getting Together', 'Love Confessions', 'First Kiss', 'POV Eddie Diaz', 'Domestic Fluff', 'give buck and eddie the world you cowards!', 'Accidental Relationship', 'but not really?', 'this is just fluff and miscommunication idk what else to say about it']
summary:
“Didn’t know you were seeing someone.”

Buck just laughs. Like, honest to god giggles. Eddie is stuck fighting off doubly massive waves of butterflies and confusion, all while Buck just gazes down at him.

“That’s cute,” he hears Buck mumble, just before climbing into the truck, calling Eddie after him.

-

or, everyone knows eddie is dating buck except for eddie, literally.
notes:
hello! i am so excited to finally be doing this!

it's been over a year since i've written anything after a rough personal year but writing has gotten me through a lot, and this was pure joy. i'm thrilled to be back, but it's been a minute and i've got a whole new account (new year new me!) so this might be a little iffy, but i genuinely had such a good time with this and could write an embarrassingly long amount more on it too.

this is also not proofread at all. apologies in advance

it's way longer than i ever intended it to be but yolo. it is what it is. take the fluff and run with it.

hope you are all staying safe! <3

little 2024 update to wave my bisexual flag around because a lot of new people are checking this out and just want to say how truly thankful i am for the love y'all have shown this little story of mine over the years. i was completely overwhelmed then, still am now. i'll never ever have the words, hope you guys are doing well <3

summary:
After moving to Florida, George relies on his online best friend, Dream, to help him adjust to his new school. But only a few weeks in, George falls head over heels for one of the most popular boys in school, Clay. With the help of his new wingman, Sapnap, and his best friend Dream, George tries to win Clay over.
Surely nothing about this will go wrong.

Slowly but surely, George gets to know everyone at school.

George likes all of his friends... but perhaps he likes one of them a little more.

Against his better judgement, George asks Sapnap for help.

George and Clay get to know each other a bit more. Sapnap is somehow the best and worst wingman at the same time.

Halloween approaches! Featuring peanut butter cups, friendship, and anonymous candy grams.

It's George's first Halloween in Florida, and his friends are determined to make it the best Halloween possible.

George goes on his first study date.

George takes a leap of faith.

After a shocking realization, George struggles with how to move forward.

George is ready to meet Dream, and Dream is ready to meet his online best friend— but will things actually work out in real life for them?

Winter break arrives, and everything works out.

summary:
After six days, Sasuke wakes up.
Naruto doesn't.
notes:
Okay, after the last chapter I just had to retcon everything. And not just because of a distinct lack of Sasunaru.
I would've like SasuSaku or Naruhina or Narusaku or anything at all really - if there had been proper development for it, instead of invalidating everyone's character development and introducing the next gen.
So instead I switched things around. Just a little.

Edit: The lovely Blythe_Lance has given me the honor of translating this fic into Chinese which you can read here on their blog.

 

Come follow me on tumblr!

author: ['Mintoki']
title: Of Bias and Bravery
fandoms: ['僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia']
characters: ['Midoriya Izuku', 'Class 1-A (My Hero Academia)', 'Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead', 'Iida Tenya', 'Uraraka Ochako']
additional_tags: ['Emotional Hurt/Comfort', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Quirkless Discrimination (My Hero Academia)', 'Quirk Discrimination (My Hero Academia)', 'Canon Compliant', 'Parental Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead', 'Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead is a Good Teacher', 'Bullying', 'Implied/Referenced Suicide', 'past suicidal ideation', 'world building', 'Complicated emotions regarding past trauma', 'Technically a lot of 1-A shows up but not enough to properly be tagged', 'aizawa finds out about one for all', 'Midoriya Izuku Needs Therapy', 'Midoriya Izuku Needs A Hug', 'Microagressions', 'Author accidentally made a 5+1 fic without even registering it', 'Quirkless People with Extra Toe Joints Wear Custom Sneakers | Red Shoe Theory (My Hero Academia)']
summary:
"It’s not that his peers are inherently cruel to the Quirkless. Izuku firmly believes that, if the truth ever got out to his classmates, they would still welcome him with open arms. At the same time though, acceptance does not necessarily mean they are well-informed on the subject. His classmates might be well-intentioned, but sometimes the words that come out of their mouths cut deeper than even he could have ever expected."

OR

In which Izuku possesses the words and knowledge to try and correct his classmate's misguided beliefs concerning Quirkless people, but actually communicating them is another challenge altogether.
notes:
Hi everyone, this is my first fic in the bnha fandom and I'm actually super excited about it. It's been a long time since I've watched the show, but recently I've been reading a lot of fics for it and it's reignited a lot of the love I have for it. Something that's always bothered me though (and some other fans apparently) is how Quirklessness/Quirkless discrimination is not something that's really addressed past the introductory episodes. With Izuku especially, I think there's an interesting struggle there as someone who was born Quirkless and only now has a Quirk. As such, I've decided to explore it here.

Content warnings for this fic include: References to bullying, suicide of an OC off screen, past suicidal ideation of a major character, and overall just ignorant/unintentionally hurtful comments made against a marginalized group. If you feel like I missed something, please let me know and I'll be sure to update this list!

I hope you enjoy the fic and please let me know what you think in the comments. I'd especially love to hear how you think I did with characterization since I'm still pretty new to working with these characters. Hopefully I do them justice!

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Thank you all for reading! You can find my on tumblr under the username white-weasel. I don't post a lot of bnha but I figured I'd put it out there.

One other note, the idea of special shoes exclusively for Quirkless people isn't completely mine. Rather, I just expanded on it a bit as my mind saw fit. As such, I want to credit the author of this tumblr post for it:
https://the-final-sif.tumblr.com/post/190832718694/i-recently-had-a-life-changing-revelation-and

Once again thanks for reading! I hope you enjoyed this fic because I definitely had a lot of fun writing it :)

title: Fatigue Fractures (Baby I'm A Wreck)
fandoms: ['僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia']
characters: ['Midoriya Izuku', 'Todoroki Shouto', 'Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic', 'Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead', 'Yagi Toshinori | All Might', 'Bakugou Katsuki', 'Class 1-A (My Hero Academia)', 'Nezu']

Got Dorms Early']
series: Part 1 of Like Fractions (Baby We're Breaking Down)
summary:
Izuku chases after Kacchan, stays right on his heels as they both sprint through the gate and into the mock city.

“K-Kacchan,” Izuku calls out to his teammate. “W-We need to make a plan or something. It’s All Might so maybe we should just run ‘cause th-there’s no way we can fight him. It’s All Might.”

The hit to the face isn’t a surprise really.

A part of Izuku was even expecting it.

Was waiting to feel that familiar burning crackle against his skin, the long familiar scent of burnt caramel flooding his senses as pain ripples out across his face like spider web fractures in a foundation.

What is a surprise is the way that something in his mind just...

Shatters.

Izuku greys out around the edges.

In which Izuku finds his resolve.
notes:
It's me again, ya girl, back at it with this AU that won't leave me alone.

summary:
"According to Dante and a lot of Christians there are nine circles of hell: limbo, lust, gluttony, greed, anger, heresy, violence, fraud and treachery.

Peter Parker was pretty sure he had now ended up in the secret tenth circle of hell, the one created specifically for him: embarrassment.

Because what other possible explanation would there be for his terminal case of foot in the mouth disease? What other way to excuse the fact that he always ended up saying the wrong thing at the wrong time?

Why else would he be going on a school trip to Stark Tower?"

or:

Tale as old time: Peter Parker's science class goes on a school trip to Stark Industries.

It goes as well as you'd expect.

series: Part 1 of Broken trust and shattered heart
summary:
He had noticed how everyone changed.

And it had all begun with his lost notebook.

One day he was still fine, laughing with his friends and raising his hand during every lesson, the next he was alone and scared of speaking up.
The teachers glared at him, his friends avoided him, and the only ones seemingly unaffected by whatever happened were Present Mic, Shinsou, Todoroki and Asui.

Then he was suddenly sitting in an interrogation room, with his previously lost notebook laying in front of him.

 

What the hell was going on?
notes:

Enjoy the sweet angst! <3

Calmed down enough that he can speak again, Daichi takes a deep breath, his smile settling on his face easily and wide.

Suga accidentally calls a stranger instead of his best friend, tells him all about his burned batch of cookies before realising, and that particular mistake might turn out the best one he ever made.
notes:
It's been so damn long since I uploaded anything, jeez. So, I'm trying to flex my muscles again before jumping back to Lost with us. I had this idea together with the wonderful pinkteabagarhut (smooches) and then took it and ran because who doesn't want Called the wrong number AUs?!

Fun fact: one time after a long day at a con my friends and me watched bad movie trailers and it was all fun and games but then we watched the trailer to Rubber and tired me went into a life crisis, I think I kept muttering about that movie in utter horror and despair until people forced me to bed :'D

Thank you all for your lovely comments and kudos!!! <3

Is there gonna be a second story in this strange alternate universe where both Suga and Daichi struggle with unruly cats?! You bet. I'm crying. I wanted to do a three chapter thing, not a tiny series. But, well, let's see Daisuga figure their stuff out first, shall we?

ALSO YOU GUYS. YOU GUYS. YOUR FEEDBACK I CAN'T BELIEVE I'm so happy and honoured. This is just a dumb romcom but I enjoy it so much. I'm glad that you do, too <3 Thank you so much, it really gets me itching to write!

I literally sat down today, wrote this entire chapter in an insane 1000+ words per 40 minutes rhythm and declared I'd edit and upload it today even if it kills me. Well, I'm still alive and here's the chapter. FINALLY, finally. I've been looking forward to this for so long. If you have half as much fun reading as I had writing, we'll all be happy today.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

The Flightless Crow was a nod to Metis_Ink's 'This will be' which is ONE OF MY FAV FICS OF ALL TIME and if you want, you should totally check it out. It has Daisugas and Tobio trying to play matchmaker. Emphasis on trying.

aLSO THAT ARTICLE ABOUT MOZZARELLA STICKS IS A REAL THING and it's the greatest article I have read in my entire life. I literally cried tears of laughter, so in case you want to check it out.

Once again, thank you for all your overwhelming wonderful feedback. I'm honestly speechless with all the love this dumb cat/cookie disaster romcom AU has gotten. Thank you so, so much <3
Merry Christmas and Happy New Year's to all of you in advance. May you never get into a situation like Daichi's.

Guess who was a big dork and made a playlist! :D (Don't judge me for the cover IT DOES FIT :'D)
Welcome to the new year, you guys <3 Hope y'all had a nice start into 2015!

I also hope none of you are tired of me writing all romcom clichés just for the heck of it.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Gosh. This was actually the last main chapter! Next up is a big epilogue, and then Daisuga will stay background characters as the series continues and everyone hates them for being that gross perfect couple :'D (The series will also still contain plants, cats and cookies.)

Once more, thank you for all that overwhelming feedback <3 I'm so happy! This idiotic AU brings me so much joy and I really hope it makes you smile too! That's all I need! :D

This is it, you guys ;A;
Ahhhhhh. I'm not used to finishing things I'm used to them spiralling into 118k+ monsters and never ending. Good thing Daisugas are gonna stick around in the next part! That's why the epilogue is shorter than anticipated - I can write a lot of things into the next part, too. And I'll probably write an entire One-Shot dedicated to Yui's visit.

Oh, and. Wonderful, amazing people created wonderful, incredible art. <3

The adorableness is killing me too how are people so amazing does science have an answer to THAT
The 'Good Morning' Series, Part I aka yet another cause of my death y'all are so good at killing me with gorgeous art

… it's 2.30 a.m. Please excuse me I'll probably regret editing and uploading this late at night once I had a proper amount of sleep, and thus common sense back.

summary:
“And now? Now you’ve all betrayed,”  Steve flinched at the choice of words, “Stark, and Potts and Rhodes are not going to sit and take it.”

Natasha frowned at the phone. “What does this mean for us?”

Fury laughed - an ugly laugh with no myrth in it. “It means that Potts or Rhodes are the ones who sent me this phone because they wanted me to contact you. They wanted me - and you - to know that they are with Stark, that they are the line of defence between him and us.”
  
“It means that they just declared war. God have mercy on your souls.”

summary:
“Hey, Miya—”

“I saw the sex stuff in your bathroom,” Atsumu violently blurts against his will.

Time stretches out, eternal, unending… the void at the beginning and end of all things coming to claim Atsumu as he stands in his borrowed house slippers by Sakusa’s door. There’s a ringing in his ears, or perhaps it’s the laughter of some vengeful god.

Sakusa’s expression doesn’t outwardly change. His eyes feel like they’re drilling holes in Atsumu’s head.

“It’s not sex stuff. It’s bondage gear.”
notes:

some ppl have found atsumu’s persistent ( fuckboy ) behavior to read as coercive so if that is potentially a trigger for you please proceed with caution. sakusa is never threatened physically or mentally and he freely consents.

title: "what's your type?"
fandoms: ['僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia']
characters: ['Bakugou Katsuki', 'Midoriya Izuku', 'Uraraka Ochako', 'Kirishima Eijirou', 'Ashido Mina', 'Midoriya Inko', 'Yagi Toshinori | All Might']
additional_tags: ['Oblivious Midoriya Izuku', 'Oblivious Bakugou Katsuki', 'Friends to Lovers', 'Mutual Pining', 'a tiny bit of angst', 'Misunderstandings', 'Getting Together', 'Love Confessions', 'Game Shows', 'Wingman Midoriya Inko', "I'm making that a tag now", 'Fluff and Humor', 'Humor', 'i make myself laugh anyway', 'Pining Bakugou Katsuki', 'Pining Midoriya Izuku', 'Original Character(s)', 'Aged-Up Character(s)', 'Characters Are Pro Heroes (My Hero Academia)', 'Coming Out', 'Minor Midoriya Inko/Yagi Toshinori | All Might', 'Minor Ashido Mina/Kirishima Eijirou', 'Canon Compliant', 'Romantic Comedy']
summary:
“Congratulations on getting nine out of ten questions correct! Without further ado, let’s move on to the last question..” Hanazawa paused for dramatic effect as the lights dimmed and the spotlights overhead honed in on their podiums.

“What is … your hero partner’s type?”

A brief silence.

“‘Type?’” Izuku questioned at the same time as Kacchan.

“Yes, type,” the host laughed. “Like, who would they date? What are they into?”

The blood drained from Izuku’s face and he shot a panicked look at Kacchan. The blond didn’t seem to be faring any better, his gaze zeroed in on Hanazawa as if he could will her to change the question to something else.

Izuku... didn't know the answer to that.

--

In order to increase their popularity rankings as up and coming pro heroes, Izuku and Katsuki participate in the most popular late night talk show for hero duos - ‘Heroes Rising!’. They’re killing it, obviously, because they know each other from inside and out. Until one question stumps the two of them: “What is your hero partner’s type?”
notes:
lowkey embarrassed to post this bc it's super self-indulgent and so much longer than i was expecting it to be, but here it is! finally out in the wild after months of hiding in my drafts! i hope everyone is proud of me for finally having a fic name that's less than 5 words :0

p.s: i would be perfectly happy if you wanted to just skip ahead to the scene in the summary if the bits in the middle are too boring. that being said, if you make it to the end then i will treasure u forever <3

p.p.s: i deleted the 'attempt at humor' tag bc i laughed when writing it and that's all that counts

title: A Good Kid (A Good Son)
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
relationships: ['Dave | Technoblade & TommyInnit', 'Wilbur Soot & TommyInnit', 'Phil Watson & TommyInnit', 'Dave | Technoblade & Wilbur Soot & Phil Watson', 'Dave | Technoblade & Wilbur Soot', 'Dave | Technoblade & Phil Watson', 'Wilbur Soot & Phil Watson', 'Sleepy Bois Inc - Relationship', 'Toby Smith | Tubbo & TommyInnit']
characters: ['TommyInnit (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Wilbur Soot', 'Dave | Technoblade', 'Phil Watson (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Toby Smith | Tubbo']
additional_tags: ['Implied/Referenced Child Abuse', 'Arguing', 'Family Feels', 'Family Fluff', 'Family Bonding', 'Tommy-centric', 'TommyInnit is stubborn but he cares a lot', 'Adoption', 'Found Family', 'sleepy bois inc - Freeform']
summary:
This house, so big and expensive, was never supposed to take someone like him in- a house like this is meant for the nice children with good records and perfectly pleasant attitudes towards absolutely everything, even dog shit. It wasn't in the request forms that Phil had filled out, but it was just how foster kids were grouped sometimes; the good kids get the good houses, and kids like Tommy weren't even allowed in the neighborhood's vicinity. Him ending up here was never supposed to happen; there’d been some misplaced paperwork, and Tommy had ended up on Phil’s doorstep with a bad attitude and thunder in his expression, fully expecting to be sent away the second the man caught a look at the bruise on his jaw and the rage on his face. But he only opened the door further and told Tommy that they'd get it all sorted out in a few days. He'd naturally assumed that 'sorted out' meant sending him back, and had never fully unpacked in the days that he'd stayed; he mainly kept to his room, in the interest of not pissing off the nice man who hadn't left him outside like a lot of others had done. Tommy was never meant to stay.

Or: Tommy will throw down at any time for any reason and everyone knows it.
notes:
From the lovely EmoPan00's prompt! PLease don't judge me, I wrote this in like,,,, a day,,, <3

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Writing for Tommy was pretty fun, not gonna lie! Please tell me what you thought! <3

title: the heartlines on our hands
fandoms: ['陈情令 | The Untamed (TV)', '魔道祖师 - 墨香铜臭 | Módào Zǔshī - Mòxiāng Tóngxiù']

additional_tags: ['Soulmates', 'Alternate Universe - Soulmates', 'Angst with a Happy Ending', 'Mutual Pining', 'First Time', 'Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Canonical Character Death']
summary:
Among the cultivation sects and beyond, the soulmate threads are a shared and common knowledge: blue for a familial soulmate. Silver for a friend. Red for a lover.

Lan Zhan is eight years old when the red thread first appears on his wrist.
notes:
Should be noted up front that this is truly….the most frankencanon of frankencanons. For plot events, it mostly (emphasis: mostly) follows the novel timeline, but I pulled quite a few scenes, characterizations, etc. that I liked from CQL and the donghua, and omitted other sequences for the sake of not absolutely imploding trying to write around how massive the canon is (just for one example like, the archery competition, as much as I love it, rip). Also: I love the slow build of WWX coming to understand his sexuality in the novel, but for the sake of canon timeline when this fic is set (pre-timeskip), he’s a little more self-aware in that regard.

Thank you to my peerless betas: Mel, Em, and Kelsey.

Hope you enjoy!

author: ['LostOnMyRoad']
title: ascension, love, and the ever present pull-and-push
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
fandoms: ['전지적 독자 시점 - 싱숑 | Omniscient Reader - Sing-Shong']
relationships: ['Kim Dokja & Everyone', 'Kim Dokja & Yoo Jonghyuk', "Kim Dokja & Kim Dokja's Company"]
characters: ['Kim Dokja', "Kim Dokja's Company", 'Yoo Jonghyuk', 'Han Sooyoung', 'Yoo Sangah', 'basically everyone', 'Lee Hyunsung', 'Lee Jihye (Omniscient Reader)', 'Shin Yoosung', 'Lee Gilyoung', 'Biyoo (Omniscient Reader)', 'Jung Heewon', 'Demon-like Judge of Fire | Uriel']
additional_tags: ['Post Epilogue', 'Age Regression/De-Aging', 'Fluff and Angst', 'honestly this fic is so soft', 'Suicidal Thoughts', 'Implied/Referenced Suicide', 'spoilers for the epilogue', 'Post-Canon', 'Post-Apocalypse', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'young kim dokja deserved so much better: the fic']
summary:
Kim Dokja gets de-aged as a result of a mishap with an artifact, post-epilogue. Uncomfortable truths come out.

(Or, they love Kim Dokja, no matter what form he’s taken.

 

He doesn’t know what to do with this much love.)

...

When he wakes up again, it’s to a whole group of people, most of which are noisy and loud.

He lies there in the soft blanket for a minute, taking in the details of a hospital room, and noting the IV going into the crook of his elbow. He attempts to sit up, wincing when it pulls at the mess of his chest.

There’s an odd weight on one of his legs, and there’s a fluffy...creature resting on it, curled into his side. It’s warm.

The room goes quiet all of a sudden, and he finds himself staring back at an odd assortment of people.

Yoo Jonghyuk’s eyes are piercing. They burn through him, straight through his paper-thin defenses and whatever doors he’d managed to put up to keep himself away from the thoughts that had led him to try his luck in the afterlife.

Reader Kim, Lonely Child Kim, only fit to suffer and die before he causes more pain for others.

When they exit the subway, both adults turn and watch the doors close and the train leave, peering through the windows as if making sure nothing was left behind. They look him over once too, as if afraid they left a piece of him behind as well.

He’s been regaining his memories piece by piece—not enough to form a clear picture on anything but enough to attain an echo, a shadow, a vague afterimage of who he had been (will be).

Dokja remembers the feel of Unbroken Faith in his hands, how it feels to die, and watching Yoo Jonghyuk (unscarred and almost hopeful) from the windows of a subway car, but he has no context for it, no timeline.

Trading fingers for Yoo Jonghyuk’s happiness, wings sprouting from his back, the strange sensation of turning into a ghost, his fingers turning into wisps of smoke in a tunnel.

“Omniscient Reader?” he reads aloud, uncertain. “Interesting name for a novel.”

“You’ve read it before,” she says, eyes shining. “But I think you’ll enjoy it.”

He flips it open, and reads the first lines.

author: ['internetpistol (orphan_account)']
title: A Liar's Truth
relationships: ['Miya Atsumu/Sakusa Kiyoomi', 'Miya Atsumu & Miya Osamu', 'Komori Motoya & Sakusa Kiyoomi']
characters: ['Sakusa Kiyoomi', 'Miya Atsumu', 'Miya Osamu', 'Komori Motoya', 'Suna Rintarou', 'Yachi Hitoka', 'MSBY Black Jackals']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Coming Out', 'Coming of Age', 'Homophobia', 'Underage Sex', 'Sexual Tension', 'Smut', 'Angst with a Happy Ending', 'Fluff and Crack', 'Bastards To Lovers', 'Miya Twins Dynamic', 'Atsumu Cries Over Sakusa Too Much', 'Rimming']
series: Part 1 of Miya Four Vs. The World
summary: In which Sakusa Kiyoomi is raised to believe that gay people go to hell but then takes one look at Miya Atsumu and thinks, then why the hell did God make them so fucking hot?
notes:
This fic will be split into two chapters. I'm actually already done writing the other half, it's just in the process of being edited and beta-read. Once that's done, it'll be up, most likely by tomorrow! So, that's about it. Peace.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

This fic was written for three reasons:

First, to share the painful process of making sense of who you are when you were raised in an environment that told you who you are is wrong. And how sometimes, the people we love most who were raised the same way, will struggle to accept you as well. And the journey of unlearning is long and hard, but not undoable if done with love.

Second, inspiration from a novel called The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo which shook me to my fucking core and gave me a better understanding of myself and the LGBT community.

Third, because this year, at age twenty-one, I came out to my friends, some of my family, and to myself - as a lesbian.

Everything is so much better but everything is also still scary, even right now. But I hope everyone who is currently in the same place as Sakusa was, or in the same place that I was, you get something good from this story. One day, we'll all get there. Hell, I still have to convince myself of that sometimes, so we're in this together!

There's no point in living a life that isn't true.

summary:
The cultivation world is rebuilding from the wreckage of the Sunshot Campaign, but Wangji and his shield brother Wei Wuxian are still completely attached at the hip. It is sad that Lan Xichen’s brother is stuck in the youthful pattern of - ah, no polite way to say it: exchanging handjobs with his shield brother - rather than moving on to more adult pursuits.

On the other hand, now that the war is over, Wangji does seem so much more open and happy than he was as a boy. He smiles sometimes, mostly at Wei Wuxian. Once, he even took an afternoon off. So Lan Xichen can let Wangji’s closeness with his shield brother lie for a time, while he finishes maturing.
notes:
- IK LXC isn’t 100% himbo all the time but consider: what if he WAS just a willfully ignorant heterosexual, for joke purposes
- Title from Carly Rae Jepsen’s Happy Not Knowing
- Thanks @ likeafox for looking this one over!

title: that’s the art of getting by
characters: ['Remus Lupin', 'Sirius Black', 'Harry Potter', 'Molly Weasley', 'Minerva McGonagall', 'Albus Dumbledore', 'Arthur Weasley']
additional_tags: ['Post-Marauders Era (Harry Potter)', 'Post-First War with Voldemort', 'Raising Harry Potter', 'POV Remus Lupin', 'Remus Lupin Raises Harry Potter', 'Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Depression', 'Sirius Black Free from Azkaban', 'Sirius Black and Remus Lupin Raise Harry Potter', 'Slow Build', 'Marauders Era (Harry Potter)', 'Implied/Referenced Child Abuse', 'First War with Voldemort', 'Alternate Universe', 'Unhealthy Coping Mechanisms', 'Angst', 'Angst with a Happy Ending']
series: Part 1 of more than getting by
summary:
“What do you want me to do?” Remus says, tiredly. All he wants is to curl up on his bed. Smoke a pack of cigarettes. Get drunk. He can’t stop looking at Harry.

“Remus...” Dumbledore is gentle. Remus hates when he has that tone. Hates that he knows it will hurt. “There is no one else left.”

A bitter laugh escapes him. “So you’ll curse the poor thing with a werewolf for a guardian?”

Hello friends, this story has been floating around my brain for a while now. Not sure how many chapters quite yet, but plan to update weekly. Feedback is welcome, always. Hit me up with comments, theories or anything you'd like to see in the work.

So we have finally made it to the Reunion™. This was a tough one to write. What did you think?

Content warning: PTSD, reference to child abuse.

Hey friends, happy new year! Big apologies for the delay between chapters. The holiday season overwhelmed me plus writer's block really got to me ha. In the end it took a lot of rewriting and reordering until it finally felt natural. Would love to get your feedback <3

I have a few more chapters planned and then perhaps some one-shots if there's still an interest. Next up... conversations Sirius and Remus need to have in order to move forward.

Content warning: reference to child abuse.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

God, untangling these boys is a messy business. What did you think of the chapter? A huge shout out to @swifty_fox on TikTok for recommending this fic, and thank you to everyone who has commented. It honestly means so much to get your feedback and yell about all the complicated emotions these Marauders inspire in us x

Content warning: reference to child abuse.

I'm sorry that I still had to make Christmas angsty. These boys. Also, wow you guys. The response to the last chapter has blown me away. I have adored every single comment, it means so much to hear what you think and that you're enjoying the story. And a massive shout out to @aidanelizabeth for recommending and reacting to this fic over on TikTok. It's so incredible. As always, comment below and see you next chapter!

Wow, the start of some big conversations between the boys. And I know I say this every chapter, but gosh your comments honestly blow me away. There's been such an incredible response (thank you TikTok!) and I love all your keysmashes, angry exclamations and headcanons. Big apologies for the delay, life got slightly in the way. Next chapter is nearly done so shouldn't be too far away. Can't wait to hear what you think of this one x

Content warning: gore, self harm, drugs, references to sex, terrible coping mechanisms.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Poor Remus, this was a dark one. A bit of an extra long, timeskip character study to make up for my tardiness. Would love to know your thoughts on the chapter, honestly every comment and dissection and favourite sentence quoting fills me with such joy. Next up is the chapter I've been building to for a while. It's always been known in my brain as The Kiss. Can't wait for you to read it, see you soon x

Content warning: detailed character death, sex

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

This chapter. Wow it's been a journey to get here. I hope it was everything you imagined. Can't wait to hear your thoughts in the comments, it's such a joy to receive them.

As you may have noticed, this fic officially has an end in sight. Two more left before it's complete. But don't worry, I already have some future one-shots that I'd love to write. Let me know if you have any requests.

Of course, I also want to do a shoutout to TikTok. You guys are incredible. The art and edits and reactions mean so much. Big thank you to @swifty_fox, @aidanelizabeth, @itslevihoesa and @m0nloup.

If you want to follow me over on TikTok or Tumblr my username is @sarewolf. See you next chapter x

Content warning: PTSD, discussion of war, past violence, past suicidal thoughts

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Hey friends, gosh all I can say is big apologies for the long wait on this one! A lot has been happening in life. I hope you like this chapter, it was so great to get back into this world again. I've missed these boys <3

As always, a huge shout out to all the incredible commenters, people who make fanart and video edits over on TikTok and everyone who has supported this fic. There's one more chapter left, and I'm sad to see it end. You may notice, however, that I've added this to a series. The hope is that I'll write a few one-shots about how I see the rest of the story developing as Harry grows up and goes to Hogwarts. If you have any requests, please let me know.

You can find me over on TikTok and Tumblr at @sarewolf or Twitter at @sarewolfwrites x

Content warning: Discussion of war, PTSD

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

The end is here and it has been an emotional journey. I'm so incredibly proud of this fic – it has seen me through a very strange time in our world and also brought me closer to an incredible community of fans and people. Thank you so much for supporting this work. For your fanart, your edits, your comments, your kudos and most of all, your shared enthusiasm over the characters that mean so much to us.

I can't wait to see what happens next in this series. There are so many small stories I want to tell about their future. So many possibilities of how they turn out. So stay tuned, and as always you can find me on TikTok and Tumblr at @sarewolf or Twitter at @sarewolfwrites.

Thank you x

My socials are @sarewolf on TikTok and Tumblr, and @sarewolfwrites on Twitter x

title: in the shade of a sunflower
fandoms: ['僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia']
relationships: ['Bakugou Katsuki & Midoriya Izuku', 'Midoriya Izuku & Melissa Shield', 'Midoriya Izuku & Uraraka Ochako']
characters: ['Midoriya Izuku', 'Bakugou Katsuki', 'Uraraka Ochako', 'Melissa Shield', 'Iida Tenya', 'Asui Tsuyu', 'Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead', 'Class 1-A (My Hero Academia)']
additional_tags: ['quirk science', 'Quirk Shenanigans (My Hero Academia)', 'Quirkless Biology', 'Class 1-A Shenanigans (My Hero Academia)', 'Carolina Reapers (Ghost Peppers)', 'Colorblind Characters', 'Appendicitis', 'Wisdom Teeth', 'Midoriya Inko is a Ray of Sunshine', '5+1 Things', 'POV Uraraka Ochako', 'Midoriya Izuku & Uraraka Ochako Friendship', 'Colorblind Midoriya Izuku', 'bakugou has taken it upon himself to single handily safeguard ofa but is a Bitch About It', 'deku is a small object', 'what do you MEAN you dont know the scientific name for the funny bone?', "Izuku's body isn't as evolved as everyone else's", "the pinky joint isn't the only extra useless thing in his body", 'slight vomiting', 'its just a little tho no worries', 'crack treated seriously ???????? maybe??', 'Humor', 'Quirkless People with Extra Toe Joints Wear Custom Sneakers | Red Shoe Theory (My Hero Academia)']
summary:
A waft of spice hit Ochako’s nostrils and she reeled back in shock. She has faced down countless villains since coming to UA. She has been in battle and in hand to hand combat possibly a hundred times. She faced Overhaul’s minions with support from her peers, but otherwise without outside help. But no villain with a terrifying quirk has ever struck her with more fear than quirkless Melissa shoveling curry made of peppers so deadly it killed an unprepared Pro Hero famous for his spice tolerance on live TV. Deku was still guzzling water directly from the sink, Tokoyami’s quirk was crying in pain as he casually shoveled more into his mouth, and Melissa was handling the spice like a pro.

Being biologically quirkless came more with an extra pinkie joint in the toes and a stunning lack of vestiges mutations. It came with smaller things, like extra teeth that did virtually nothing, exploding organs, and weird exposed nerves that weren't designed to feel pain.

Or,

Five time's Midoriya Izuku struggled with being biologically quirkless and one time it was a gift
notes:
special thanks to BelleAmant and Ashynarr for bouncing ideas off of me

Chapter Three of A Legacy In Crimson has also come out! please go read that when you have the chance!

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)
