3. midoriya is minorly red/green colorblind because colorblindness is male patterned on the quirkless traits. no one bats an eye though because people can still have vestige mutations on biologically quirkless bodies or bodies without a quirk factor. its not as well known that people who are colorblind cannot have emitter type quirks though and its not anything well researched either since colorblindness is pretty obscure.

In the best of circumstances, Shang Qinghua wouldn’t have to be cursing all the choices that Luo Binghe makes, except Luo Binghe’s every move as the venerated ruler of the realm is so carefully observed and emulated by all the other demons.

Luo Binghe takes a male consort? The demons watch and learn.

Luo Binghe’s consort is a human cultivator? The demons are taking notes.

Luo Binghe’s human consort is a Cang Qiong Peak Lord? The demons are frantically making checklists that would determine one’s suitability to be a consort, and guess who ticks all the boxes.

(Or, the one where Shang Qinghua suddenly becomes Prime Demon Marriage Material™.)

characters: ['Harry Potter', 'Ron Weasley', 'Hermione Granger', 'Luna Lovegood', 'Death (Harry Potter)', 'Tony Stark', 'Steve Rogers', 'Clint Barton', 'Natasha Romanov (Marvel)', 'Loki (Marvel)', 'Bruce Banner', 'May Parker (Spider-Man)']
additional_tags: ['Master of Death Harry Potter', 'Magically Powerful Harry Potter', 'Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD', 'Panic Attacks', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Angst', 'Post-snap', 'A bit sad', 'People tell me the teacup deserves a name', 'anthropomorphic inanimate objects', 'several unsuccessful suicides but such is the nature of being the master of death', 'potentially triggering to folks struggling to live', "I've been there so stay safe y'all", "but Harry literally can't die", 'Or even turn into the moon', 'Though then Tony could tell Thor "That\'s rough buddy"', 'father-teacup relationship', 'Self-Indulgent', 'Crack Treated Seriously', 'Crack', 'Crossover', 'Crossover Pairings', 'Crack Crossover']
summary:
It starts slowly, the steady disconnect between who he is and who he should be. The man in the mirror becomes a stranger to him; he looks into the glass and wonders how everything became so distorted and backward and...wrong. He notices in bursts: when Teddy grows taller than him, when he’s kissing Ginny on her lips and looking at the subtle smile lines she’s starting to develop around her plush mouth. She’s got the cutest crinkles by her eyes.

His face is smooth as it was when he was seventeen. Which was 18 years ago. He hasn’t aged a day.
_________
Living forever isn't all it's cracked up to be. Harry Potter learns the meaning of immortality when everyone he loves dies again and again after becoming the master of death. After millennia of love lost, Death sends him to "Elsewhere" in order to give his master something new and different.

Harry emerges from ash in New Asgard. What's a man like Thor to do but offer the traveler a home?

Harry ends up in the MCU post infinity war. This is the first Christmas after Thanos got all snappy-snappy

Thor is okay with magic because he's Asgardian. Korg is just a nice guy. Next chapter more people will be confused by Harry. This one is all about the feels.

Some people think Harry's Loki again. It's like... no one can imagine a new magic-user in the MCU who's not Loki (Except for Wong, and Doctor Strange and Wanda and... but that's NOT the point. Okay?) Black hair and green eyes and magic = Loki, right?

I find it hysterical how many people enjoy this fic. To be honest, I wrote out my other two fics to have like themes and overarching stories and plots. Especially Dripping Fingers. That fic has a 26 page document I use to keep track of all the things I need to keep track of. This fic is not like those other fics. (not like the other girls.) I wrote this fic to be purely self-indulgent. I was just like, "eh may as well make it public." Thanks for indulging me with this and your comments.

If you are interested in my other works, I have two HP fics called Another Mind Game and Dripping Fingers (prior mentioned) I highly recommend.

Have you read both and are feeling interested in what I do outside of fic writing? Look up my book called "Dear the Man Upstairs"

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Thor: So, were you hot?
Loki: What? Thor, Ohmygawd
Thor: You said you kissed yourself? So, was girl-you hot?
Loki: ...
Thor: ...
Loki: Okay, fine, fine! She was very hot. But she was more than that. She was strong, smart, witty. Treacherous, arguably.
Thor: Sounds like you.
Loki: She WAS me.
Harry: Yikes.

Thank you to all you lovely people who came along on this journey with me. It's been a bit more than a year, and we are here at the end. It's been a pleasure and an honor to share these chapters with you. Please leave a kudos or one last comment if you feel so inclined.

Did it fuck you up? This chapter fucked me up :)

Sorry I haven't proofread it or anything cos I'll probably start fucking sobbing again, but I'm glad y'all read until the end. Kaeya is king and I want to see him obliterated by angst and anything else.

Just know, I was crying as I was typing and it's really hard to try and think when you're leaking liquid from your eyes, while trying to not get tears onto your keyboard and trying to not alert your family that your crying. wheezes.

Anyway, comments and kudos' are nice and they're really encouraging. I might write something a bit more lighthearted soon, but not right now. I still need some recovering time lmao.

I'll also probably be making a Kaeya animatic at some point, whenever I dig out my motivation from whichever hole it's buried itself in, but I currently have a Liyue Chili one on my Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AP9Ervtp3wM (shameless plug lol)

additional_tags: ['the original characters are fire nation citizens so', 'Fluff', 'Post-Canon', 'Fire Lord Zuko', 'zuko loves the fire nation and the fire nation loves zuko', 'this is literally just fluff', 'not an ounce of angst anywhere', 'me to me: im going to write a fire lord zuko fic that is so self-indulgent', 'Fainting', 'a character does faint once', 'Breaking and Entering', 'Hijinks & Shenanigans', 'a group of kids decides to break into the palace', 'Zuko is confused', 'the guards are having the time of their lives', 'Politics', 'kind of?', "there's a meeting where zuko yells at dumb people", 'my years in ffa really jumped out during that part', 'also the part of me that has Feelings about mean teachers', 'this was supposed to be a 5+1 but its only a 4+1', 'catch me shamelessly just slightly altering one of my previous titles for this fic', 'Humor', 'Idk I think I’m funny']
series: Part 4 of Post-Canon Fire Lord Zuko (and his staff)
summary:
While trying to stop himself from falling, Chen had been flailing his arms in a desperate attempt to regain his balance. All his flailing manages to do, however, is smack his arm into one of the torches lining the wall. The force of his arm hitting the torch causes it to fall from its holder. Chen watches from the floor in horror as the torch falls, and somehow, somehow, on its way down, the flame touches the portrait of Fire Lord Sozin. Which then begins to catch fire. Chen feels like he’s watching everything happen in slow motion as the portrait is slowly being eaten up by flames. The portrait of Fire Lord Sozin is on fire holy shit. 

Chen thinks he’s going to faint. 

Or, times Fire Lord Zuko was nice and people were surprised, and one time everyone expected it.
notes:
Hey, y'all, I'm back! I know it's been almost a month since I posted something, and I'm sorry about that. I'll try not to let it happen again, I promise. But! I'm going back to my roots with a good old fashioned Fire Lord Zuko fic.

Also, if this interests any of you, I posted my works in progress list over on tumblr! So if you want, you can go check it out and see what I'm working on writing next. I'll leave a link in the end notes if y'all want to check it out.

That being said, I hope you enjoy this! Not beta-read (unless you count Grammarly), so any mistakes are my own! Enjoy!!

High School', 'Vigilante Midoriya Izuku', 'Cult Leader Midoriya Izuku', 'this is all (mostly) accidental', 'Crack', 'Crack Taken Seriously', 'Like', 'extremely seriously', 'Stalking', 'Social Reform', 'Minor Character Death(s)', 'Quirk Discrimination (My Hero Academia)', 'HTML Tryhard']
series: Part 1 of how to (accidentally) start a cult
summary:
One month after @hawks_unofficial's initial viral post, the blog titled "Quirk Analysis Blog for the Future", otherwise known as "Q. A. B.", has gone from an average of 10 views per post to an average of 20,000 views per post.

Midoriya Izuku does not know how to view the impressions analysis for his suddenly popular blog, and only notices that sometimes, people actually comment on his posts now. He does not google himself or his moniker and thus does not see the rise in online articles and speculation.

He is unaware that the "kyuu-ei-bee" he begins to hear about in passing refers to his own blog. He does not have a Twitter account.

At the time, Midoriya Izuku is 15 years old.

Izuku (accidentally) starts a cult.

name of the file this fic lives in is "THIS IS NOT A CULT, GO HOME, midoriya screams into the abyss, convincing no one", just thought u should know
i am... incredibly sorry for the incoming wall of text.
 
technical notes/taken liberties:
- the intelligent members of the fandom commonly agree that bnha does NOT take place in the year 20XX, and mathematically, likely takes place in 22XX or 23XX. HOWEVER; the anime makes several references to 20XX, so uh that's what i went with. also the anime makes references to "yahoo news" (and no way yahoo is gonna be around that long) so i feel justified in just saying bnha is set in a parallel modern day universe. therein also lies my justification of the abuse of modern day social media sites.
- the reason i used 20X4 is bc bnha released in 2014 and im afraid i may need to increase the year counter at some point. (the first draft just used 20XX, but that was before things got ~out of hand~.)
- "shuttai" is an alternate reading of the kanji used for "izuku" (well... sort of. don't think about it too hard)
- ive decided to include japanese honorifics for. reasons? (i think i had a real reason at one point but i cant remember now so im just going to trust past!me on this one.)
- - i have spent several hours watching random bnha clips youtube and hulu in the original japanese to figure out what everyone uses for honorifics bc they sure do localize bnha, dont they :/ i had to guess on a few.
- in japanese, when you're talking to (or about) someone on the internet, you generally use '-san'. im going to be taking a looot of liberties here and mixing and matching the way engish speakers and japanese speakers talk to each other online, partially for convenience, partially for flow. (you probably wont notice, but ive lost sleep over it.)
- we're using military time bc thats the staple in japan.
- after mirio comes to terms with midoriya's blog post, he changes his online handle(s) to "pacman". i have yet to smuggle this in anywhere and am incredibly sad.

warnings:
- i have NOT figured out the theoretical days of the week for this theoretical year bc my brand of crazy only takes me so far.
- im pulling from the bnha:illegals crew. just know they exist i guess? (koichi, kazuho, and iwao.)
- i have several ideas for how this fic will go, but rn im only promising you "part 1". part 1 will be standalone. part 1 is complete sans editing and sans a metric buttload of html.
- i do not know html. i've spent the last two weekends learning (/suffering) and being forced to create my own workskins bc ao3 hates spaces.
- i played around with a lot of different types of formatting before settling on what i hope comes across as "minimalistic but still recognizable and nice to look at". if i did not succeed, i only want to know if it's a small, fixable thing; otherwise, i prefer to live in semi-satisfied ignorance. thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
- i am still not happy with the spacing between lines during texting rants but i am also very, very tired. i might circle back.
- i am still not happy with how i've got sort-of-but-not-really right-aligned text working, but this is likely NOT changing bc ive spent the last 8h just getting it to this point.
- i have not quite decided how to handle transitions and am liable to change it. suggestions welcome, i guess?

final notes:
- if you notice any weird errors (particularly in the html) please, please let me know!
- google now thinks im a robot and i have to keep clicking the 'im not a robot' captcha. apparently googling html terms is suspicious??
- ive never had to make such a detailed timeline in my life and i dont care for it at all and now that we're live im just praying i dont have to go back and change the timeline and all the date/timestamps AGAIN
- ao3, why u no support flexbox :(

- i forged a whois report. i forged. an entire whois report. why did i do that. why am i like this.
- i need you to believe me the whois report is incredibly accurate.
- i also need you to know that it's actually like three times as long and was in the original draft and on some readthrough a while back i was all, "wait, w. why did you include this entire thing." and the answer was "because i doctored the entire thing and it was hard" but that wasnt enough reason to make the final cut.
- so one time i ordered this sketchy thing from a kickstarter and it never showed up. no tracking number, no emails. i emailed the help email but a week went by with no response. i called the listed help number but it was an automated voice with no actual help to offer. so i ran whois against the website for the inventor guy and snagged his phone number and called him up, all "hey uh, sorry to bother you but can you help me get my thing, i dont think it shipped" and he was all *"who is this, how did you get this number"*. it was his personal cell. he did help me out tho.
- moral of this story is *BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU SET UP A WEBSITE*.
- yap!news is used in actual bnha but i cant find it on the wiki/reddit/anywhere? i promise its a thing, i was watching the anime and remember laughing at it and writing it down. it's obviously a play on yahoo!news, which i might not have realized except that it's the End All Be All news source for like. japan. i dont make the rules and am just as confused as you are.

ch4 notes:
- semi-major, not at all important, retroactively updated formatting in previous chapters. i keep figuring out how to do things i'd given up on.
- (updates are mostly ch1 and a little of ch3. i was too tired for ch2, maybe later.)
- i was split between "chi-chan" and "hime-chan" (chi being blood and hime being princess) so lemme know if you've got a preference. they're both dumb enough to be funny to me
- i turned on discord light to check how things were formatted against a white background and i still feel unsettled from looking at it
- have i finally gone too far with the colored background squares?? i thought about not putting them in but. they're so pretty.
- i was gonna have some people use actual text/sms in this chapter, but i couldnt in good faith do it. no one uses sms in japan, it's all line all the time. (and some messenger, but ugh no thanks)
- "ku" means. uh. ward? it's like an area of a prefecture.
- (you can skip this next part if you dont care about physical location details)
- japan's split up weird, but lets talk about tokyo.
-- tokyo is a prefecture. tokyo is split into 23 "wards".
-- in japanese, 'ward' is 'ku'. so harajuku is in 'shinjuku-ku'. i am physically incapable of using the word ward, it confuses me. when i was hearing kamino spoilers through the grapevine and everyone kept saying 'kamino ward' i was 100% sure the kamino arc took place in a hospital.
-- basically, if you see "-ku", it's an area in tokyo.
- osaka is way south west of tokyo
- UA (and midoriya) are in shizuoka (south of Tokyo) but i feel like the majority of crimes would happen in tokyo. (lots of hero agencies seem to be in tokyo, including best jeanist and all might's agencies.) so uh. QAB messes around in tokyo a lot, dont worry about it
- this fic is starting to feel like 'today i learned html could do X, and then tried to make it do my bidding. come, listen to the agonized screaming of my soul' but if y'all r still here, then ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

from this point on im just going to complain about html gratuitously, u can leave if u want. this is the abbreviated version, can u believe:

- whys this you ask? BECAUSE APPLE HATES CONFORMING AND LIKES TO MAKE UP DUMB ARBITRARY RULES TO MAKE THE REST OF US SUFFER is all i can come up with

[1] "My Number" is japan's version of citizen identification. (so like SSN for america or SIN in canada.) it is also known as "Kojin Bangou", which is what i've used here bc "my number" is a terrible name confusing to english speakers. (click to go back)

[2] 110 and 119 are japans emergency services numbers, like america's 911; that was not a typo. (110 is for police/crime, 119 is for other emergencies (as i understand it)) (click to go back)

that reddit post:
- HOO BOY HOW ABOUT THAT NONSENSE I JUST SPOUTED ABOUT KOUJIN BANGOU AND QUIRKLESS POLITICS, HUH.
- (i am mixing the way the american SSN and japanese "My Number"/Koujin Bangou functions bc this is the ~future~ and japan seems to take a lot of cues on how to do things based on western society.)
- the irl issue im drawing from is american SSNs and the fact that, when banks check to see if they can give you a loan but your birthday is past a certian date, they just dont even validate your identity bc it would cost them money.
- get this: SSNs are insecure. gov makes them more complicated/secure, and in doing so, harder to access. (which is the whole point.) but this means that it takes longer to get results and it's a more complicated process and requires more overhead (ie, they have to pay more people to handle this process.) banks/loan officers/etc say, wait, its gonna take how long? you're gonna *charge us*? ...nah, we don't need it, it's fine. #yolo
- this is a REAL THING that i am likely misremembering details of and couldnt find references for; dont worry about it (i tell myself, while worrying about it). this is fiction, yo.

misc:
- people are legit referring to me as 'format god' for some reason and i think this is hilarous and am half convinced i should put it on a business card
- HEY I REMEMBERED WHY I GAVE KOICHI A WHOLE EMAIL ADDRESS it's bc i reused his fake university in this chapter. (when did i do that?? good job, past me)

pre-finished chapter7:

- me, 7 rewrites of ch1 later: maybe i should just do it, maybe i should just make text boxes for twitter and signal and sms and line and they will all be different and you will have to rewrite every single chapter but maybe it's worth it

post-finished chapter7:
- yeah
- yeah that

- sib called me sexy over the html coding of this chapter ;) which i think is grossly inaccurate and a misuse of the phrase, but ;)

this is NOT a chapter announcing a hiatus of this series. W H O O P S.
named this chapter literally months ago and didn't even think about it, sorry for the heart attacks

wow ch8:
- i wanted to get this one out (bc cliffhanger) but i need to rewrite ch9 again so it might be a few weeks before you see me again.
- i stole from r/anxiety and do i regret it? no.
- i. gave cccredit? does it count as credit if i just stole their usernames too
- i rewrote that entire first section bc i realized we never learn the name of hawks' agency and i didnt wanna make one up. that is a real thing that i did.
- if html were a class, this chapter would be my final
- it has... all the things. i can showcase everything ive learned using this one chapter. its. a little ridiculous.
- but look at how pretty! :D
- reddit remains my least favorite thing to format, but that's ao3s fault for the way it handles newlines. i dont want to talk about it. just know ao3 has done me wrong *yet again*.
- and on that note ao3, why? would you accept a display: grid?? and then??? not display: grid???? for real tho, what is WRONG with you, i honestly want to know. i spent hours formatting that box thing at the top of the chapter, got it just right, and then ao3 said, 'lol, oh u thought?'
- so yes. i took a picture of it. and threw it in there as an image. yes i did.

and now, notes:
- this chapter was really tricky to write but i think i pulled it off? i think i like the end result.
- boy i hope the phone/homescreen/time sections don't look terrible on y'all's devices, boy would that suck after all that work
- html floats are LEGITIMENTLY black magic and i do not understand whats going on there or what secret properties they hold only that sometimes, if u throw a float on a thing, it breaks, and OTHER times, you throw a float on it, and it FIXES the thing, and there is no logic in this world.
- "when in doubt, clear the buffer" is my new mantra
- tbh it was always my mantra but i. forgot about it. there was a lot of suffering today bc i forgot my own mantra.
- i thought itd be fun to check how big my workskin file is, and the answer is: 1540 1674 words.
- (i had to write ~100 lines of css to fix some weird issues this chapter)
- the spacing between centered boxes is still tragic and i dont like thinking about it. maybe next time.
- just in case anyone is unaware, the html basically doubles the word count on every chapter and this chapter is fRICKIN LONG
- i canNOT get timestamps to align to the bottom of the line message bubbles. i thought of one potential way but it would require rewriting a buuuunch of css code not to mention the html of almost every chapter, and thats assuming it even works like i want it to. so. i'll keep thinking about it, i guess.
- haha tried it, failed it, then remembered even if i managed it, ao3 doesnt respect tables, so. guess they get to be top aligned.
- dabi's new name in hawks' phone is a fnaf reference, my beta tells me it's funny

- 😒

update:
thanks so much for all your comments and encouragement!! i was trying to get around to answering every comment for a while and then got behind and then got overwhelmed, but i do read and appreciate all of them!! <333
(every so often i go back and add more working links, if anyone cares to play through the shortest ARG in the world. )

 

FINAL NOTES :'(
- the reception to QAB has been amazing, thanks so much for reading/commenting/encouraging/commiserating and coming on this crazy ride with me!!
- idk rn if i'll write a sequel. i have some stuff plotted out, but even if i had time to work on it, it'd be several months before i'd be able to post the first chapter
- and i dont have time, bc hawks brainrot is real. warn your friends. its already too late for me.
- microwave and egg convo based loosely on real life where i told this guy i kept thinking about breaking into this empty condo to turn off the light someone had left on. he said "that's... nice of you?" but then i followed up with, "and it think about in equal measure breaking in to microwave an egg, just to watch it happen irl and not have to clean it up."
- today i found out you can style a blockquote?? you can STYLE a BLOCKQUOTE
- i have had my workskins in an open tab since literally the beginning of QAB and i'll... finally be able to close it?? w i l d
- denki and himiko are ABSOLUTELY DATING(or about to) and i never had the chance to do it justice :(( they haven't met in person yet, they just chat on discord and line and send each other a lot of memes, this relationship is not a joke to me (...even if that's how it started out. pls, they'd be so cute together)
- if you have any thoughts/conjectures/predictions for a potential act 2, i'd love to hear them!! and steal them (if i do write a sequel i dont want to forget anything.)

 

thanks so much, everybody ♡

additional_tags: ['no relationships - Freeform', 'Scary Midoriya Izuku', 'Angry Midoriya Izuku', 'angry midoriya is scary', 'midoriya scares class 1A', 'Quirkless Discrimination (My Hero Academia)', 'Mentions of Suicide Baiting', 'mentions of past suicide baiting and bullying', 'Mineta is an idiot', 'Mineta Minoru Being an Asshole', 'Mineta is scared', "Midoriya Inko is scary and that's where Izuku gets it from", 'Class 1A is scared', 'do not make Midoriya angry', 'BAMF Midoriya Izuku', 'Feral Midoriya Izuku', 'Good Parent Midoriya Inko', 'BAMF Midoriya Inko', 'Protective Midoriya Inko', 'Scary Midoriya Inko', 'Crack']
summary:
Izuku Midoriya was known to be one of the nicest people in class 1A. He was known as someone who loved their friends and would go beyond to help them, all with a smile. So it was unsettling to see such an unrecognizable look on the boy’s face.

Yes he was one of the nicest people in class 1A, but he was also one of the scariest when he was angry.

What happened after Mineta ran out of the dorms?

Midoriya vs. Villains

Do not get in the way of an angry mother.
notes:
**reminder this is fanfiction so it is not accurate to canon which includes character actions, characterizations, and events.

I do not give my permission to repost this anywhere. Translations and fics inspired by this one are fine as long as they are on ao3 and properly linked as credit/inspiration.

author: ['TheRainbowElectric']
title: Not Nothing
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
characters: ['Neil Josten', 'Andrew Minyard', 'Nicky Hemmick', 'Aaron Minyard', 'Kevin Day', 'Renee Walker (All For The Game)']
additional_tags: ['content warnings for all the canon-typical trauma', '5 Things', 'Post-Canon', 'Developing Relationship', "andrew's pov", 'Neil learning how to be people', 'Fluff and Angst', 'Emotional Hurt/Comfort', 'Angst with a Happy Ending', 'please do not copy']
summary:
“Have you considered the possibility that Neil has chosen you, but believes you have not chosen him?” Renee says. "Have you ever explicitly told him what you want?”

“Neil knows what I want,” Andrew snaps. This is not Andrew’s fault.

“How do you know?”

Because Neil always knows. He is as fluent in Andrew’s micro-expressions as he is in German and French. He knows which head tilts mean “go on” and which ones mean “shut up.” Without ever asking, he learned what it meant to see Andrew wearing double layers of long sleeves, or taking multiple showers in a day, and learned to hand Andrew the car keys.

That has always been the most terrifying thing about Neil — his patience to wait, watch, listen, learn. The prospect that if Neil were given enough time, there would be no part of Andrew that was just Andrew’s anymore.

“He has to know,” Andrew says.

“Does he?” Renee says. “Have you ever known Neil to assume that he is wanted?”

Five times Neil tells someone that he and Andrew aren’t dating, and one time Andrew uses his words to set the record straight.
notes:
(See the end of the work for notes.)

Thank you thank you thank you to my beloved beta, sevenimpossiblethings, for bearing with all my explanations of the tire fire that is AFTG canon, and editing this story anyway :)

Come hang out with me on Tumblr <3

characters: ['Lan Jingyi', 'Wei Ying | Wei Wuxian', 'Lan Yuan | Lan Sizhui', 'Lan Huan | Lan Xichen', 'Lan Zhan | Lan Wangji', 'Nie Huaisang', 'Jin Ling | Jin Rulan', "Lan Jingyi's Parents"]

summary:
The good news is that Lan Jingyi has found a mentor, friend, and constant companion through the difficulties in life.

The bad news is that that’s because he’s been accidentally possessed by the Yiling Patriarch.
notes:
Yes, I absolutely gave the chattiest character in this series open access to the secrets of one of the least communicative characters in this series, and I don’t even feel bad about it.

...It's good for him, anyway.

(See the end of the work for other works inspired by this one.)

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

1) How long is it going to take Jingyi and Wei Wuxian to get used to the idea that other people can hear them when they talk now? Too long, that’s how long.

2) NHS’s job just became a lot more complicated in ways he really wasn’t expecting. He’ll make it work, though.

3) If the state of possession had persisted, eventually LWJ would have figured it out because Jingyi would have used a blatantly Yiling Patriarch-inspired talisman on a night hunt. FORTUNATELY IT DIDN’T COME TO THAT.

series: Part 11 of From Samhain to the Solstice 2020Part 3 of Princeps
summary: Sequel to “Princeps” and “Potens.” Harry has gained the loyalty of many of the young Slytherins, and others he never expected. Now he attempts to find and destroy Voldemort’s Horcruxes and protect and teach his students while avoiding Time’s plans—and his followers’—to make him into a Lord.
notes:
This should have three parts, and is part of my “From Samhain to the Solstice” series of fics, as well as a sequel to the first two parts of the series. The title is a Latin word meaning “prophetic” or “magical.”

This part of the series is now going to be 4 parts, as this chapter grew too long.

I’m sorry, but this story is going to have a fifth part. The characters all want to talk and fight and not end the fic.

So, yeah, there's going to be one more part after this.

Yes, to everyone who guessed that this would have seven parts, you were right. Stupid talking and fighting characters.

Thank you again for all the reviews! This is the end of the story, and the end of the series.

series: Part 1 of [insert tragic backstory]
summary:
“My life is a nightmare,” Dabi muttered blankly.

“Nah, this is hilarious,” Hawks said, and while he wasn’t explicitly laughing, Dabi knew that those weird little chirps he was letting out were pointed at him. “Imagine if we go through all this effort and you don’t even have some sort of dramatic background or tragic backstory to justify you being this emo, you’re just a hot topic junkie or something.”

“That’s fucking worse.”

Or,

Dabi has amnesia and keeps reading conspiracy theories about himself in an attempt to figure out who he is, gets the League in on it, and they dismantle organized crime, revolutionize society, and ravage the hero system in the process. Hawks suffers.

dabi: god has allowed me to live another day, and i am about to make it everyone's problem

or,

bakugou, holding up a picture of todoroki touya: this you?

dabi: bitch, it might be

or,

hawks has a perpetual, never-ending nervous breakdown

a n y w a y, this was originally supposed to be a oneshot, like 7k max, but now the doc i'm writing this in is over 50 pages and it's lagging enough that scrolling through it is like watching a slideshow, so i've decided to split this into two parts and write the home stretch of this (what will become chapter 2) in a separate doc, and hopefully have that up in time for christmas or new years!

i hope you enjoyed this, and happy holidays!

critics say this chapter is defined by it's severe emotional and tonal whiplash. now featuring 90% more hawks suffering. like. hawks goes through so much shit in this part.

title: Aliens, Hammers, and Making a Memorable First Impression
fandoms: ['Spider-Man - All Media Types', 'Spider-Man (Tom Holland Movies)', 'Marvel Cinematic Universe', 'The Avengers (Marvel Movies)']
relationships: ['Peter Parker & Avengers Team', 'Peter Parker & Thor', 'Peter Parker & Tony Stark']
characters: ['Peter Parker', 'Thor (Marvel)', 'Tony Stark', 'Steve Rogers', 'Natasha Romanov (Marvel)', 'Clint Barton', 'James "Rhodey" Rhodes', 'Bruce Banner', 'Sam Wilson (Marvel)']
additional_tags: ['I might be forgetting some', 'Peter Parker is Worthy', 'Peter Parker Can Wield Mjolnir', 'Precious Peter Parker', 'Peter Parker Meets the Avengers', 'Not Canon Compliant', 'Secret Identity', 'Humor', 'or at least thats what i was going for', 'civil war never happened', 'and never WILL', 'nyc is a cosmic punching bag']
summary:
"Wow, dude, this thing is awesome. Does it generate its own electricity?" Peter flipped the hammer once in the air and caught it, watching in amazement as sparks danced over it. "Like, I know you're the god of thunder, but I didn't know your hammer had magic powers too! That is so cool. I want one. Like, I won't get it, obviously, 'cause I don't want to steal your thunder—no pun intended.”

He grinned at his totally-intended pun, but Thor didn't react. Not even a twitch of the lips.

“Okay, yeah, that was a dumb joke,” Peter admitted. “Sorry. Here's your hammer, Mr. Thor.” He held out the weapon to its rightful owner.

Thor just stared.

 

(Peter Parker meets Thor for the first time. It does not go as expected.)

title: sleeping dogs lie
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
characters: ['Miya Atsumu', 'Sakusa Kiyoomi', 'Miya Osamu', 'Komori Motoya']
additional_tags: ['Prostate Milking', 'Handcuffs', 'Masturbation', 'Angst', 'Crying', 'Subdrop', 'Self-Doubt', 'Supportive Miya Osamu', 'self-deprecating thoughts', 'Gleefully Helpful Komori Motoya', 'First Dates', 'vanilla sex']
series: Part 8 of Terminal Curiosity
summary:
After his shower, Atsumu walks into the bedroom to find Sakusa laying a drop cloth over what looks like some kind of plastic sheet. The faint crinkle of plastic reminds Atsumu of the way Sakusa set things up the time they played with temperature; it made sense then, because between all the water, ice, and the hot wax, things got really messy.

Exactly how messy are things going to get today?

“Hey, Kiyoomi,” a familiar voice answers after only a few rings. “What’s up?”

“Motoya,” Kiyoomi greets in turn. He watches a seagull land on someone’s balcony across the street. “Where would you take someone for a first date if you’ve already known them for years?”

“Hmm, well, if you’re already friends—wait, what?! Oh, holy shit—Kiyoomi, are you going on a date?!”

Kiyoomi narrows his eyes, “Why would I be asking if I wasn’t? It’s this Friday, so I can’t pick anywhere with an extended reservation list, either.”

“No, wait, stop,” Motoya says, and Kiyoomi sighs as he hears the sparking mirth in his cousin’s voice. “Who are you going on a date with?!”

additional_tags: ['Personality Swap AU', 'Actor Midoriya Izuku', 'Merry Christmas Everyone!', 'BAMF Midoriya Izuku', 'Minor Spoilers- but just for this series']
series: Part 27 of Personality Swap AU
summary:
The students of 1-A celebrate Christmas, and reminisce on the chaos that is Izuku Midoriya.
That's it.
notes:
Merry Christmas to all! I had a lot of fun writing this, and am proud to say it is now the longest work in the series!
And as much as I wrote this story to be a gift to you...it contains more gifts inside! Hints of what is to come are sprinkled within this story, as a promise from me to you of what will come with the coming year. See if you can spot them all! ;D

Note: This isn't the next work in the timeline. It takes place during the break between second and third term of their first year! (Aka there's at *least* a month's difference from where we are normally, giving time for many of the changes you will notice!)

With that said, please enjoy the fic! <3

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

And there we have it! This is the final installment of 2020, but don't be alarmed! More will be coming in 2021, though I don't know quite how frequently. I'll be taking on classes that require more of my time next semester for my college courses, and my AP classes are always rather time-consuming...but as I only plan to work on my priority fics (this series and Skvader), I should be fairly consistent!

So one last time for the year, let me ask...what did you think? Any thoughts, comments, questions? If you have a suggestion for a future piece, leave it in the comments! I take what you guys say to heart, truly, and I love to know what you all have to say!

Have a merry, blessed day, and until next time, au revoir! <3

additional_tags: ['Parental Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Angst and Hurt/Comfort', 'Emotional Hurt/Comfort', 'Midoriya Izuku Needs A Hug', 'Midoriya Izuku Swears', 'Let Midoriya Izuku Swear', 'Protective Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead', 'Quirk Accident (My Hero Academia)', 'Quirk Discrimination (My Hero Academia)', 'Quirkless Discrimination (My Hero Academia)', 'Bakugou Katsuki is Bad at Feelings', "and I don't mean in a fun way", 'Implied/Referenced Suicide', 'Implied/Referenced Self-Harm', 'Suicidal Thoughts', 'Self-Harm', 'Panic Attacks']
series: Part 9 of author's favorites
summary:
How is Eri able to forgive him, to look at him like he’s a hero, when he failed her so badly for so long? If he had been stronger, faster, better with his quirk, he would have been able to get her out of their faster, save her right when she first ran into him instead of so much later. Sir Nighteye was right about him not deserving—

Problem Child? comes Aizawa-sensei’s voice. He sounds tired and a bit irritated, as always, but beneath that there’s a layer of sheer incredulity.

Problem Child? his voice comes again. This time Izuku finally recognizes where it’s coming from— his own head. He can feel a sharp, painful jolt of panic physically stabbing through his chest, and he can’t help but bite back an emphatic shit.

Or: While visiting Eri at the hospital following her rescue from the Shie Hassaikai, Izuku and Aizawa-sensei both run into a nurse with a telepathy based quirk, and Izuku finds himself in a telepathic bond with his teacher. This is... somewhat worrying, considering how many secrets Izuku needs to keep.

We see what Aizawa thinks of all of this.

CW in end notes.

Izuku thinks that all of this is just kind of a Lot.

cw in end notes

The last installment of this fic.

cw in the end notes as always.

series: Part 1 of not stolen, only borrowed
summary:
Izuku hated his Quirk, and he hated what he thought his dad would do with it even more. So he would keep pretending, even if it made his dad angry. He would wait, and one day heroes would come to save him.

And finally, they do.

Izuku woke up

Izuku goes home with two pro heroes.

Izuku laughs
notes:
howdy y'all

why do i love adoption fics so goshdarn much? is it because i am starved for parental affection in my own life and think it's beautiful when complete strangers find a child and decide "yes they are ours now"? Mayhaps...

Anywhosie, I've been reading a lot of dadzawa fics lately and this idea sprung into my head and i decided i have nothing better to do with my life than regurgitate my thoughts onto my laptop and share it with the world. so here it is :)

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

hmmm? izuku's quirk is erasure then? but the tags say... i wonder what's happening here

please leave a kudos or even a comment if you enjoyed! it brings me such serotonin to know others enjoy the things i put out!

Next chapter should be up monday, but don't be concerned if it's a little later on tuesday. i wish you all a safe and happy (hopefully uneventful) new year!

as you can see, this ain't the final chapter after all! i increased the chapter count by one, so you have something to look forward to this week :)

enjoy!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

y'all i just want to add that, while i know at least a fair amount of ASL, japanese sign language is obviously not the same thing. i've attempted to do some research, because i would hate to portray anything inaccurately, but resources on english to JSL are not very common apparently lol. because of this, my descriptions of the signing in this work are going to be influenced by my knowledge of how ASL is structured since that is the best i can do with the resources i have. the characters are still using JSL, though, and if any point someone who is well-versed in this than i am notices i have made an error or written something inaccurate, please let me know. i'm doing the best with what i can.

ALSO: chapter count has gone up by one! I just really wanted to end this here, ladies and gentlepeople, i'm sure you understand why. Next chapter will go up friday (maybe Thursday if i get it done and feel like y'all deserve a treat), and then I'll get crackin' on the next fic in the series, so if u want more of this au make sure you subscribe to the series as a whole.

see y'all then!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

thank yall so much for reading!! if you're interested in where else i take this au, please subscribe to the series not stolen, only borrowed. the next work takes place at the start of canon, and i should be posting the first chapter of it by the end of the month :)

i also have some other ideas in my pocket for bnha au's, some of which will also have some quality dadzawa and probably dadmic too (because i love them both), and some ideas for deku w/ dif quirks, so if those sound like something you'd like, be on the look out! i'm in the middle of writing one rn with some solid aizawa & deku and shindeku, which i'm very excited for

again, thank you so much for reading, commenting, and interacting in any way! i am so amazed by you all. see you soon!

i hope you enjoyed!!! if you did, please leave a kudos or even comment to let me know!!! if you didn't... please don't leave a comment, i'm sensitive.

I aim to update this (and eventually the next work which will be a BEHEMOTH) on Mondays and Fridays. See you then!

additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Everyone Lives/Nobody Dies', 'Post-Avengers: Endgame (Movie)', 'POV Outsider', "Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker's Parental Figure", 'Social Media', 'Zoom University', 'Quarantine', 'and they were quarantined (oh my god they were quarantined)', "Why Is Peter Parker In Tony Stark's Home? First Period Chemistry Class Tunes In", 'this fic is basically those videos where a person is at work', 'and their kid comes in the room while on a zoom call', 'except the Exact Opposite', 'Humor', 'Fluff and Humor']
summary:
“Peter Parker,” Cindy says. Peter’s head snaps up so fast that it almost looks inhuman. “Did Tony Stark just waltz in and pick up his child in the background of your Zoom call?”

Peter freezes. Wide-eyed, with ‘guilty’ written on his forehead in 72, bold, Times New Roman font. It takes a solid thirty seconds before he can put himself together enough to click the unmute button.

“I—no?” Peter says. His voice is startlingly high pitched and his expression is nothing short of horrified.

Damn, if that isn’t anything but a confession.

Or: a day in the life of the quarantined high school spider-kid, as seen through the eyes of his first-period chemistry class.
notes:
this is Very Obviously inspired by current real life events but yknow. i am a little worried that posting this means that im not taking the current situation seriously which isn’t rlly the case—more of finding humor in times where we all might need a little laugh. but for real, though, stay inside, wear a mask if you need to go out, listen to scientists, & don’t take unnecessary risks! we are all in this together.

im ignoring who was blipped and who wasn’t and im just going to say the entire decathlon team was blipped because i miss writing them and also i can do what i want

series: Part 6 of Genius Support Course Izuku
summary:
“Of course, Kacchan! No poison on the drone, pinky promise!”
Katsuki grumbles over the wording of the promise but knowing better than to try pushing for a promise of no poison at all. He wraps his significantly larger pinky around Izuku’s dainty little digit before ruffling his hair. Looking at his ruffled hair Katsuki frowns before checking his pockets then his bag when his pocket don’t have what he’s looking for. He pulls out a small, green plastic case with a glittery I branded on it in yellow and orange, from the case he pulls out a hair clip, this time with a cute little bunny charm on it and pins up Izuku’s bangs.
“You need a haircut soon.”
“Hm, will you come with me? You always explain it better to the person.”
“Sure. I gotta get to class early, nerd. 1-A’s got the field trip today, remember? We leave before lunch and won’t be back until classes let out so remember to eat lunch, you got me? OI! CLIPBOARD!”
Nakahara jumps in his seat, having been laying out his own designs. “Ah! Uh yes, Bakugou-san?” Nakahara turns to face Izuku and Katsuki.

 
---
USJ

Izuku misses lunch and Katsuki sets a bot loose on a poor admirer.

author: ['envysparkler']
title: Fairy Godbrother
relationships: ['Dick Grayson & Jason Todd', 'Tim Drake & Jason Todd', 'Tim Drake & Damian Wayne']
characters: ['Jason Todd', 'Dick Grayson', 'Bruce Wayne', 'Tim Drake', 'Damian Wayne']
additional_tags: ['Whump', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Time Travel', 'Dimension Travel', 'Fix-It', 'Accidental Brother Acquisition', 'Kidnapping', 'Child Neglect', 'Non-Consensual Drug Use', 'Enemy to Caretaker', 'Implied/Referenced Child Abuse', 'Canon-Typical Violence']
summary:
What are brothers for?

(Or: some minor dimensional travel, pseudo-kidnapping, and a whole lot of meddling.)
notes:
Your irregular reminder that the author has never touched a DC comic in her life.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Dick, staring at Jason: …so my future self dropped off a little kid for us?
Five seconds later…
Dick, hugging Jason: *hisses* if anyone so much as lays a finger on my Jaybird, I’m going to cut their whole hand off!
Bruce and Alfred, watching on in pride: that’s our boy.

In this universe, thanks to Jason’s tip, Batman looks into Sheila Haywood much, much earlier, and discovers that she’s Jason’s birth mom. Jason feels horrible for a little while, but ultimately ignores it because he has his own fiercely protective Mama Bird.

In this universe, Dick does not get into a loud argument with Bruce and storm away from home, because there’s a twelve-year-old kid who’s imprinted on him and he has to set a good example. (Bruce is not above using this argument in pointing out the virtues of a college education.)

In this universe, Dick passes the Robin mantle to Jason when he’s ready, and tells him about the special meaning behind the name. Jason nearly bursts into tears then and there, Bruce’s eyes are suspiciously shiny, and Alfred has to dot at his eyes with a handkerchief.

(In this universe, Jason tells them about the little sister that likes waffles, so Dick promptly adopts Spoiler the moment they find out her favorite food.)

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Jason, starry-eyed: is it my turn to get a baby brother from the dimension storks?
Bruce: that’s not how it—well, I guess that is how it works now.

In this universe, Bruce works out some sort of ‘temporary’ guardianship with Tim’s parents so that Tim stays with them whenever they’re out of the country. (This is an arrangement that is acceptable to all parties involved, except Jason, who really wanted to break some noses.)

In this universe, Jason has a little brother to steer his impulses towards benign things, like starting a prank war, whenever he gets angry at Bruce and Dick’s moral philosophies. On one memorable occasion, Tim manages to distract him from his growing argument with Bruce by admitting he’s never read Pride and Prejudice, leading to an impressively detailed rant stretching over a full week.

In this universe, Jason hands the Robin mantle over to Tim in a solemn ceremony, interspersed by Dick’s tears and unsubtle hints that the name ‘Flamebird’ has not yet been taken. Tim can’t quite control the twitching of his lips as Jason pointedly ignores Dick.

(In this universe, they don’t figure out who Hood is, or how he knows so much about them—though Tim has his suspicions, especially after hearing Jason’s adoption story.)

Content warning: implied/referenced animal death.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Tim, snatching Damian: ha, I finally got one of my own!
Bruce: but he’s my—you know what, I give up.

In this universe, Damian is intimidated by his older siblings and mostly clings to Tim. Tim cements his position of favorite sibling ever by introducing Damian to Selina. Between Tim’s logical arguments and careful coaching of puppy-dog eyes, Bruce is helpless to resist the plans for Damian’s menagerie. (Everyone coos over the baby kitten that Damian carries everywhere.)

In this universe, thanks to the detailed information left behind, Bruce finds and promptly adopts Cassandra Cain before any of his children have the chance to snatch another sibling. He also works off of the groundwork to destroy a large portion of the League’s operations and relegate Ra’s back to the shadows. (Bruce and Talia have a long shouting match concerning kidnapping children and lying about miscarriages, but eventually a custody agreement is worked out.)

In this universe, Tim passes the Robin mantle to Damian in a move designed to distract Dick and Jason while Tim disappears to follow the trail of a missing Bruce. The deception holds up for all of twenty hours before Tim—new alias Crow—is dragged back from Europe by Cass and both Tim and Damian are grounded while the Justice League works on getting Bruce unstuck from the timestream.

(In this universe, they all wonder about the Bats from the other dimension and what exactly they’re up to—but it takes a few years before they finally get an explanation.)

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

When Batman gets home a week later, he immediately confiscates the portal gun. Unfortunately, the damage is already done—they’ve saved Jason from death five times, kidnapped Damian from the League in seven dimensions, stolen Steph in two, lured Cass to the family four times, roped Tim into the family earlier thrice, and prevented the Graysons’ death once. Not to mention the one where tired single dad Bruce is in charge of one teenager, two preteens, two young children, and a wailing newborn.

Bruce resists the urge to travel to that dimension to give Alfred a raise.

series: Part 1 of Eraserhead
summary:
“I’m Eraserhead!” The vigilante, small and green, and looking distinctly unlike his namesake, pipes up brightly.

Aizawa Shouta, also known as Eraserhead the pro hero, stares.

“No,” he says, eventually. “I don’t think you are.”

Another drabble in this AU.

Aizawa is dadzawa. The resulting chaos of a vigilante, a hero, a couple of capture scarves and a few too many knives.

Nezu and the Problem Child...

Someday, in the future, Aizawa will regret allowing the two of them to meet.

Aizawa finds out exactly where Izuku gets his special brand of chaos from.

a n g s t

Nezu trolls Aizawa and then Aizawa trolls him back.

Izuku starts a cult. Or something.

what it says on the tin <3
notes:
Hi, thanks for giving this fic a go <3

Before you continue, make sure you've read the tags. I've had a comment or two about a specific trope I've used etc, and I've done my best to tag everything so if you see something you dislike, this fic probably isn't for you.

That isn't to say 'don't like don't read'. Everyone is welcome to read my fics, but at the end of the day this fic is almost entirely crack and something I've written for fun, so it will differ from canon, and there will be characters I make the butt of the joke. This is just a pre-emptive warning, and it does not mean that I dislike those characters or believe that the way I've written them is how they actually are in canon.

Also if I haven't tagged something you think needs to be tagged, go ahead and let me know! I think its super important people know what they're getting into.

With that said, I hope you enjoy! <3

author: ['pqrker']
title: percy jackson and the scrutiny of his coworkers
fandoms: ['Percy Jackson and the Olympians & Related Fandoms - All Media Types']
characters: ['Percy Jackson', 'Annabeth Chase (Percy Jackson)', 'Original Characters']
additional_tags: ['POV Outsider', 'my mom made me write this', 'I wish I was kidding', 'Marine Biology', 'Marine Biologist Percy Jackson', 'Camp Half-Blood (Percy Jackson)', 'Camp Jupiter (Percy Jackson)', 'New Rome (Percy Jackson)', 'Minor Annabeth Chase/Percy Jackson', 'Percy Jackson is a Dork', 'Adult Percy Jackson', 'do i know what im doing?', 'No I dont', 'Percy Jackson References', 'percy has been banned from every seaworld on earth', 'i have no idea how marine biology labs work', 'im bullshitting through this entire thing', 'percy spins the beads on his necklace because i do the same thing', 'Percy Jackson is a Mess', 'percy jackson is a bad liar', 'gratuitous barbie in a mermaid tale references']
summary:
Jim turned back to the tank and looked at Marcie the seal, who was now staring at the spot his coworker had been standing just moments before with that same strange look of reverence in her eyes.

Percy Jackson truly was the oddest person Jim Elpool had ever worked with.

or

5 times percy's coworkers were confounded by his fish magic, plus 1 time they try to figure it out

Melody stared through the tank’s slightly fogged glass and into the water, admittedly a little in awe.

They had walked in on their coworker playing with the small blue shark some 30 minutes ago in his goggles and wetsuit, that ballpoint pen he was weirdly attached to still somehow in his pocket even as he swam around under the water. His old beaded necklace floated loosely around his neck.

The strangest thing?

He didn’t have an oxygen tank on.

Ciara had spent her whole life learning about animals in her spare time. Ever since she was a child, she would pour over her National Geographic magazines and read until her eyes were swimming with scientific names, fun facts, and any other tidbit of knowledge she could get her hands on. She knew their diets, their habitats, their behaviors. 

She knew which animals were friendly, which ones were aggressive, which ones were just curious, and which ones were scared.

But she had never seen one seem so starstruck.

“New Rome University is a private university in New Rome, California, founded in the late 1600s, graduation rate 100%... acceptance rate .5%?” He read off the screen, his face scrunching up in confusion towards the end of the sentence.

Melody leaned over his shoulder and raised an eyebrow, “That’s oddly specific, isn’t it?”

“Very. Where even is New Rome? I’ve never heard of the town either.”

Melody hummed in agreement and Marcus typed something new in.

The duo blinked in surprise when the results loaded.

“It’s… blank.”

Waves.

Normally, Elaine Rudolph absolutely adored them. Crashing down gently on the sand, making calming noises and leaving soft seafoam in their wake. She truly loved them.

Right now, however, as she was being tossed around and trapped beneath them, she did not.

or

percy seems to be immune to waves. no matter how rough or unforgiving they were, they just seemed to break around him

Everyone blinked at Melody.

“Alright, I rescind my earlier statement. We’re gossiping about Percy while he’s gone, and it is totally moral and okay because he’s fucking weird. Agreed?” Marcus announced, throwing his hands up in exasperation.

Everyone around the table nodded with varying degrees of enthusiasm. Truth be told, nobody really knew much about Percy, other than his spooky ability to seemingly telepathically communicate with animals and his love for his wife. Everybody was at least a little bit curious.

or

while percy is out, his coworkers compare notes on his suspicious actions

summary:
The last thing he remembers is leaving school. It was a half day, as he’d finished his exams early, texted May about staying over at Ned’s place, sent another text to MJ and then a twitch of his spider senses--

Then a pinch at his neck, like a bee sting, but deeper. Darkness. Then here.

Huh. Kidnapped. That’s new. If he was less emotionally dead from finals and sleep deprivation, he’d probably have a stronger and much more appropriate reaction to that.

At least he's got Captain America and the Winter Soldier to keep him company.

author: ['arahir']
title: he was a skater boy, he said—no, you know what, no, we're not calling it that
additional_tags: ['Misunderstandings', 'Mutual Pining', 'Fluff and Angst', 'sleeping on each other', 'worried langa aka canon langa', 'oblivious reki', 'oblivious but very good and the best']
summary:
Everyone knows Reki and Langa are dating. Everyone except Reki, that is.

“Is it someone from class?”

Langa pushes his board back and forth, the little rumble of the tires filling the late afternoon quiet between them as he takes a deep, audible breath, looks directly at Reki, and nods. “Yes.”

And that’s a surprise. Reki tries not to let it show. “Have you guys been on any dates?”

“Yeah. I mean, I thought they were dates.”

That’s… kind of sweet. Sweet in the way that feels like it's going to make Reki sick. “How have you even had time for that?” he mutters. “You spend all your time with me.”

summary:
The love letter is two sentences long. There isn’t even a Dear Langa, that’s how short it is. It covers approximately 10% of the paper’s surface area.

The sentences get straight to the point. I have a crush on you. Isn’t that awful? It’s written in striking red, in an almost illegible handwriting.

There’s no signature.

For the first time in Langa’s life, he cares about a love confession.

---
notes:
langa is used to getting a bunch of love letters, but only one sticks out to him!

EDIT: this fic is now translated in russian! https://ficbook.net/readfic/10717650
EDIT 2: this fic is now translated in spanish! https://w.tt/3go5cuY
EDIT 3: nothinghappenspng on tumblr made this beautiful piece of art for this fic!! thank you so much, i love it to bits!! <3

---

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

sk8 episode 7 does not exist.

this anime is so cute!!! renga are so cute!!! i like the thought that reki has a big crush on langa, but doesn't believe it going anywhere, so he doesn't try pursuing him. meanwhile, langa is so unconsciously drawn to reki, of course he'd say yes in the end...!

langa is ridiculously gorgeous, and of course i heard that he's bad with feelings because he just doesn't comprehend them well, so he'd be the oblivious heartbreaker in my mind.

i would like to write more for them, but frankly i don't know what i'd write. i don't know shit about skateboarding, so i thought i'd tap back into what i'm familiar with: stupid boys

thank you for reading!

 

EDIT: thank you all for the wonderful comments! this was the first time i've gotten an influx in comments all at once, which sounds silly but i've never gotten so many comments in one instance. it honestly overwhelmed me so i didn't respond to any new ones - but please know that i've read all of them and i appreciate every single one! thank you so much! if you liked the fic, feel free to comment <333

author: ['brigreenie']
title: Drown In My Ocean of Black Box Dye
fandoms: ['僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia']
characters: ['Kirishima Eijirou', 'Bakugou Katsuki', 'Kaminari Denki', 'Midoriya Izuku', 'Ashido Mina', 'Sero Hanta', 'Uraraka Ochako', 'Usagiyama Rumi | Miruko']
additional_tags: ['Angst', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Hurt No Comfort', 'Mental Health Issues', 'Suicidal Thoughts', 'Suicide Attempt', 'Kirishima gets therapy the fic', 'Bakugou Katsuki Swears A Lot', 'Third Year Kirishima Eijirou', 'Third Year Bakugou Katsuki', 'Depression', 'Kirishima Eijirou Needs a Hug', 'Bakugou Katsuki & Midoriya Izuku are Best Friends', 'Kirishima Eijirou & Uraraka Ochako Friendship']
summary:
He clicked the pen his therapist had given him, opening the first page. In big letters, he wrote, “Reasons To Live: 1-100.”

Then, he flipped to the middle of the journal. He paused, felt-tip inches from the page. This was gonna be another mistake to add to his long-running list, wasn’t it?

Caving, he put the pen to the page.

“Reasons to Die: 1-100.”

The idea was simple; old as time.

First to one hundred wins.

***

After being kicked from the friend group his second year, radio silence from Bakugou over the summer, and a suicide attempt, Kirishima starts to spiral when he returns to UA.

Bakugou walks back into his life wanting to know why his hair is black all of the sudden.
notes:
There will be heavy triggers all through this fic. I will be sure to add new or specific ones at the start of each chapter, but if you are sensitive to descriptions of suicidal thoughts or actions, talks of eating disorders, or blood and violence, this fic is not for you.

The playlist for the fic is here: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/4oSUCJDkYpdakoo7lhA8rf?si=0adp_dujTkiIBoGn06_rNQ

Thank you for reading.

TW: NON-GRAPHIC REFERENCE TO SELF HARM

TW: TALKS OF ED RELATED TENDENCIES

TW: MENTION OF ED RELATED TENDENCIES

TW: TALKS OF SUICIDE ATTEMPTS, SELF-HARM, AND VOMITING

TW: IN-DEPTH TALKS OF SUICIDE.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

just a psa, I was not trying to get you to like Mina, just explain some actions. I am not condoning anything bad either of them have done, but mental illness makes you do bad shit sometimes and that can fuck with other people. I am in no way saying you have to like her, but please don’t attack me for presenting reasonings for characters actions. I thought I made it clear Kirishima was apologetic because he’s in a spot where he thinks everything is his fault, not because he is completely wrong.

HEAVY TRIGGER WARNINGS FOR MOST TRIGGERS: INCLUDING SH AND DRUG RELATED OVERDOSE.

DO NOT REPEAT THE ACTIONS SHOWN IN THIS CHAPTER.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Wow... it's over. this fic has been such a journey for me as someone who was really just writing about their struggles. If you take anything for this, it's that you don't have to revert to the person from before to be happy. Trauma and mental illness do define you in ways, in little spaces of yourself you feel like you can never clean. That doesn't mean you can't be happy if some parts of you are tainted. I promise you will be alright. The person who was happy is still you, and they still have a chance.

So much love,
- bri

series: Part 1 of encompass
summary:
Tommy's a fuck up, he can't pay attention, and never sits still. He taps his hands, pushes people away, and has never had a best friend. He's a screwed up, forgotten kid lost in the foster system. He's also just been placed with a new family. Tommy knows how this goes, he never ends up staying long. After all, no one wants a fuck up like him.

Why would this house be any different?

-

Or: the obligatory sbi foster au, but with a focus on the neurodivergent kids that inevitably get lost in the system.

Here he goes again. Another foster home, another fuck up, another time being returned into the system. Tommy knows how the cycle goes, why should this time be any different?

Day two with this weird ass family has Tommy questioning every single rule he's ever learned in the system.

Tommy goes shopping and attempts to figure out where he fits in with the dynamic of this weird-ass family. It's harder then it seems, because nothing about them makes sense.

Tommy has his first day of school, learns more about the family dynamics, and makes a friend. In that order. He thinks?

Tommy's been at this new month for about a month now. The honeymoon period is about to be up.

Tommy's sliding into place, building a strong friendship with Tubbo and slowly relearning past truths, beginning to understand that he can be exactly who he truly is. He's getting there. Slowly, very slowly.

Tommy bonds a bit with Wilbur and learns a few things about his history. The holidays draw closer and things don't go wrong. Tommy finally finds himself somewhere that he belongs.

A few challenges pop up in the lives of the people around Tommy. But even so, things work out. They work out and things are good and then Phil... well Phil asks the question.

Well... fucking with Techno didn't work. Guess he's going to need to take it a step further. But first, Tommy needs to do some reconnaissance.

Tommy took Wilbur's meds. There's only a few ways this can play out.

Guess it's time for a talk, huh?

Tommy has a family. How about that, huh? He's the last person who would have guessed it.
notes:
(See the end of the work for other works inspired by this one.)

Content Warnings: discussion of topics of abuse/rape/bullying/neglect/triggers, ableism, self-worth issues, the general fucked-ness that comes w/ the foster system

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

This has all been completed beforehand, and I plan to put out a new chapter every four to seven days. Not exactly sure yet.

But yeah, I've always loved foster fics but I feel like a lot of them don't have a lot of understanding of how the foster system works. which is okay! oftentimes your not reading those fics to learn about the foster system lol. but i wanted to highlight how things like mental illness and neurodivergence get amplified in the system and don't receive proper care. Foster kids with disabilities and mental illness, especially ones that are older, have a much more difficult time being placed with a forever home.

author: ['MollyPollyKinz']
title: Peeps
relationships: ['Wilbur Soot & Technoblade & TommyInnit & Phil Watson', 'Toby Smith | Tubbo & TommyInnit']
characters: ['TommyInnit (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Phil Watson (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Technoblade (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Wilbur Soot', 'Toby Smith | Tubbo']
additional_tags: ['Fluff', 'Wings', 'Hybrids', 'chick imprinting', 'Cuddles', 'so many cuddles', 'everybody wants to cuddle with tommy', 'Bullying', 'Light Angst', 'Hurt/Comfort', "The characters of this fic does not reflect the author's opinions of the CCs"]
series: Part 1 of Fluffy Peep-verse
summary:
“You’re imprinting,” Phil said, rubbing Tommy’s shoulder comfortingly, “Sometimes this happens when bird hybrids first get their wings in.”

“What does that even mean?” Tommy moaned, leaning further into Phil’s warmth.

Phil chuckled. “It basically means that you are going to be following me or another bird hybrid around all day, and you won’t stop peeping like that unless you have physical contact with that person.”

 

Or, the fic in which Tommy peeps like a baby chick, gets lots of cuddles, and has really fluffy wings

Mr. Nook looked up and smiled when he saw Tommy snuggled up against Technoblade. All of the other students looked up from their tests as well, and Tommy resisted the temptation to hide his face in Technoblade’s sweater. As it was, Technoblade wrapped one of his pink wings around him protectively.

“Hey, Tommy,” Mr. Nook said kindly, “You got your wings in recently?”

Tommy forced himself to speak. “Yeah,” he said, “Pretty pog, yeah?”

After two months, it's finally here.

Tommy gets cuddles with dadza and wilbur.

characters: ['Bruce Wayne', 'Billy Batson', 'Diana (Wonder Woman)', 'Clark Kent', "J'onn J'onzz", 'Oliver Queen', 'Hal Jordan', 'Barry Allen', 'Arthur Curry (DCU)', 'Dick Grayson', 'Jason Todd', 'Tim Drake', 'Damian Wayne', 'Duke Thomas', 'Cassandra Cain', 'Alfred Pennyworth']
additional_tags: ['Identity Porn', 'Identity Reveal', 'Secret family', 'Bruce Wayne is a Good Parent', 'Good Older Sibling Dick Grayson', 'Jason Todd Loves Classic Literature', "Billy Batson is Bruce Wayne's Child", 'Billy is a Sweetheart', 'Crack Treated Seriously', 'Attempt at Humor', 'Bruce Wayne Has Too Many Kids', '5+1 Things', 'Billy Batson Actually Gets to Be a Kid', 'Billy Batson protection squad', 'The Dramatic Irony is Real', 'Bruce Wayne the Serial Adopter', 'Protective Batfamily (DCU)', 'Found Family', 'POV Outsider', 'no beta we die like Billy in Injustice', 'Billy Batson-centric', 'Tired Parent Bruce Wayne', 'Accidental Baby Acquisition', 'Accidental Child Acquisition', 'Batfamily (DCU)']
summary:
When Captain Marvel sends out a distress call, the only League member available is Batman. Bruce comes to his aid, but he finds out that Billy is a 10-year-old homeless orphan with black hair and blue eyes. Obviously, he makes the only logical decision and adopts Billy. Because it's Bruce—who's allergic to revealing life-changing information—the League is left in the dark.

This story is written as 5+1 story from the Justice League's POV as they attempt to define the weird relationship between Batman and Captain Marvel. 5 times they didn't realize Batman had adopted Captain Marvel, and the 1 time they did.
notes:
So, I've been reading a lot of Billy Batson fics lately. I love them all dearly, but I'm especially fond of the fics where the Batfam adopts him. There aren't nearly enough of them, so I decided I'd try my hand at one—I hope I managed to do the trope justice!

Thank you for reading, and if you want to read a really good Batfam & Billy fic, I'd recommend checking out A Natural Progression by Starkvenger!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Poor Aquaman, if only he knew...

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

I apologize to any Cass and Duke lovers reading this... I'm not very familiar with their personalities, so while I love reading about them in other people's Batfamily fics, I don't have a good enough grasp on them as characters to write them just yet.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

I feel like I saw the Diana ice cream thing on Tumblr once upon a time...

UPDATE: I've just been informed that the Diana ice cream thing is from the Texts from Superheros Tumblr! Thank you for helping me give credit to original poster!

Brief allusions to Jason's death in the comics. Nothing overly graphic, but I did want to mention it here, just to be safe.

EDIT: Alright! This chapter has now been revamped... the Justice League was a little too clueless, so I gave them more of a fighting chance. They're still very, very lost, but they have at least one person who actually knows Bruce's real name now.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Wow, okay! So, I decided to wait until I finished this whole piece before I posted it here on AO3 because I'm always sad when I find a really good fic where the author lost inspiration before they finished. I promised myself I wouldn't do that to anyone, so, there it is!

(Also, 8,000 words is so many more pages than I thought—before this, I didn't appreciate the authors who write really long fics nearly enough!)

series: Part 1 of The Multiplayers (band au)
summary:
The Multiplayers are a faceless band that the internet has gone wild about. They started by playing covers and posting them on YouTube but now they’ve got a slew of original songs and one hell of a fanbase.

Tubbo, Ranboo, and Tommy started the band as a joke after a stream one day because “oh, haha, we all play instruments!” but now people actually like their songs… not that anybody actually knows the songs are theirs.
notes:
IMPORTANT: alrighty, so some of you may know this, some of you may not, but this fic used to have Purpled in it. However, Purpled recently stated that he actually doesn’t want irl him in fics, only his dsmp character, so I’ve rewritten the fic so that he is no longer in it.

I’ve simply replaced all of the chapters of the older version with the new one in the same fic so that people wouldn’t lose their bookmarks. This means that there are going to be some comments about Purpled in the comments section but he’s not actually in the fic anymore so don’t worry!

I’ve left the author’s notes from the original version as well (some altered to exclude purpled), but I’ve also added new notes to some chapters! The Original notes will usually come before the new ones!

If you notice purpled anywhere (or any other purpled related inconsistencies) please let me know so I can fix it!

While I am sad to see the original version go, making sure I am within everyone’s boundaries is top priority!!

Okay now get ready for sappy endnotes:

Wow! I can’t believe this is the end! Which is why it might not be! I’m thinking about writing a sequel (though I’m not sure yet, so no promises!) I really like this world I’ve created. Writing it, writing these characters and all the shenanigans that they get themselves into, it’s honestly been so much fun.

So yeah, I won’t promise anything, and I really don’t want to overwrite this (if that makes sense), but I do have ideas that I wasn’t able to get around to in this book. It would be nice to write more! That being said, I do have other fics I want to write (for example, I need to finish my Broadway Ranboo fic “King of New York”) so if a sequel does happen, it might not be right away!

I honestly can’t thank you all enough for commenting, leaving kudos, and continuing to read every chapter! When I first started writing this, my plan was to have two or three fun little chapters about these four being a band. That… didn’t happen, but I’m so glad that you guys stuck around!

Lastly, I am currently setting up a Discord server. I’ve never done that before so it’s taking some time. (If anybody has any tips/suggestions, feel free to let me know!) Once it’s ready, I will possibly - temporarily? - add another chapter onto this fic that will just have the link to the Discord for those of you who want to join. Otherwise, it’ll be in my ao3 profile and i’ll probably link it on twitter and tumblr.

Thanks again (I know, I keep saying that)

-Cal

(tldr: Possible sequel, thank you!!!, Discord server coming soon, thank you!!!)

summary: Closing his eyes, he asks mommy for good luck, opens his wings, and jumps—“Woah, baby bird.” He yelps as he snatched up mid air and immediately curls up. “Hey, it’s okay, I’m not gonna hurt you.” Slowly, he peeks, taking note of the arms curled around him, and the ground, something of which he is not standing on, before he looks up, and smiles when Hawks smiles. “Gotta learn to fly before you jump, baby bird.”

series: Part 2 of Bristling
summary:
“Bullshit.” Shōta seethes, biting the word out with a sharp, clean snap of his teeth. There’s been a potent mix of disbelief and sick cold rage building inside of him since the moment Nezu opened his mouth.

“Now, now, Aizawa-kun,” Nezu chides almost absently from where he’s hopped up to sit on the edge of the couch, “calm down. Getting emotional will not resolve the situation any faster.”

“It’s a false accusation and we all know it Nezu,” Shōta doesn’t bother to acknowledge Nezu’s statement. Instead he just leans forward a bit in his desk chair and does his best not to grind his teeth.
notes:
A lot of y'all wanted to see somethings from Aizawa's POV so here we go. Obviously there's gonna be some rehashed material from part 1 so keep that in mind but this should put things into perspective and make things clearer.

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

I consider this series done for now but please be sure to let me know what you think and remember to come scream at me on tumblr:

series: Part 3 of Writing 'bout block mens
summary:
Tommy has always been the fighter.

He has never been the fought for, and he knows it, with every whisper Tubbo directs at Ranboo, with every glance thrown his way- Tommy knows, the way he wishes he didn't, that they think he's dead.

If they're so convinced he's still dead, maybe the one good thing left he can do for them is die.

---

Or, Tommy gets addicted to being dead and thinks that nobody cares about him. The people who very much do try to pull him back from the brink before Dream can't resurrect him anymore.
notes:
I was up at 4am writing the angstiest thing I've ever put on paper. There is a trigger warning on this entire fic, guys: Tommy kills himself a lot and it's spoken about pretty openly. If that doesn't jimmy with your jams, please exit stage left and there will be Extension and Godling that are both far fluffier.

Y'all have been warned.

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

Uh- my hands slipped?

I'm going to keep this as a one-shot for now, I might add to it some day? But for now, it's just gonna be this.

series: Part 1 of audio feedback
summary:
...and they started singing Megan Thee Stallion.

(Hitoshi, like any good friend, brainwashes Izuku’s anxiety away for a day so he can know some peace. The problem? Izuku has no fear of god or consequences.

Izuku also has no goddamn filter.)
notes:
A gift for the queen of Chaos herself, Otaku6337.

This was sparked by a prompt from DreamerKitten on Ota’s discord that I borrowed with permission. I did take some stuff from Dreamer's and Luna-tic's ensuing conversation because it was hilarious and they have wonderful ideas. Thank you for letting me use this prompt! I was dying laughing in the discord.

Originally this was going to be short, sweet, and to the point but it spiraled out of control.
(If I ever write anything under 1000 words, shoot me because I’m apparently a pod person)

Things to know: this is almost all in Hitoshi's POV. The names are a little weird but Hitoshi thinks/calls people by the names he's most comfortable using for them, even if he doesn't use that name when actually speaking about that person.

This could be argued as OOC for Izuku but que sera sera.

Also, fair warning: fans of Bakugou might not be super happy but I don't bash him (much). Then again, I don't think I've met a fan of Bakugou who doesn't want canon Deku to dunk on him a bit. Just a bit.

tw: one minor homophobia mention from Mineta.

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

I wrote this during Hitoshi levels of sleep deprivation and honestly it's some of my best work comedy-wise. That being said, please excuse any errors lol. The working title for this was "unfiltered izuku: now with 100% less anxiety!"

I know Ectoplasm is canonically the math teacher but he never gets much love so I wanted him to be in this as the science teacher. We'll say Snipe is a math teacher, who knows what the hell he's usually doing. ALSO: I don't know science.

You ever realize how much metaphorical weight you carry with anxiety or stress? Can you imagine that weight being completely and abruptly gone even if only for a day? Your brain would make you high on serotonin and endorphins. I just wanted to make a fun little story for Ota with some sass and chaos and then I thought about how it would actually work and here we are. A semi-high non-anxious Izuku with zero filters or even impulse control, lightly sprinkled with angst and crack.

I'm headcanoning that Shouto "supervises" Hitoshi and Izuku hanging out because he doesn't quite get the whole love rival thing, and all three of them start spending a lot of time together especially during Hitoshi's insomnia episodes or Izuku's still occuring anxiety attacks (The boy gets meds and therapy but something things still happen to the poor bean). They end up all really liking spending time together. Hitoshi freaks out because he likes two people??? Him????? Shouto freaks out because he didn't know he could like the way someone naps or that he could stand to sit in silence comfortable with anyone but Izuku. Izuku freaks out because he doesn't want to ruin these friendships that he cherishes so much. lots of pining, lots of miscommunication, but they sort it out and all agree to date each other. It's very adorable. There's a lot of cat cafes and watching movies together.
(Also Bakugou gets therapy and Mineta gets expelled. The class is thriving *thumbs up*)

Again, thanks to DreamerKitten for the idea!
Edited 4/4/21 to get rid of those weird double spaces around the formatted words.
As always, feedback is appreciated! <3
