author: ['queerofthedagger']
title: Old Haunts (Are For Forgotten Ghosts)
characters: ['Regulus Black', 'Harry Potter', 'Sirius Black', 'James Potter', 'Remus Lupin', 'Peter Pettigrew', 'Bartemius Crouch Jr.', 'Euphemia Potter', 'Fleamont Potter', 'Orion Black', 'Walburga Black']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'First War with Voldemort', 'Time Travel', 'Master of Death Harry Potter', 'Slytherin Harry Potter', 'Regulus Black Lives', 'Fix-It', 'Regulus Black-centric', 'Good Regulus Black', 'Friends to Lovers', 'Slow Burn', 'Slow Build', 'Pining Regulus Black', 'Mutual Pining', 'Snarky Regulus Black', 'Harry Potter is a Little Shit', 'Implied/Referenced Child Abuse', "Walburga Black's A+ Parenting", 'Minor Regulus Black/Barty Crouch Jr.', 'Swearing', 'Angst with a Happy Ending']
series: Part 2 of Regulus/Harry Stories
summary:
When Regulus is eleven, he meets Harry Potter, the only recently turned up, distant cousin of James Potter. The first surprise is that, despite being a Potter, he's sorted into Slytherin. The second surprise is that he manages to convince Regulus to prank Sirius for being an ass about his sorting. The third is that he turns out to be an amazing friend.

The surprises don't end there—quite the opposite, really. The biggest might just be that Harry refuses to give up on him, and how it changes everything. His worldview, the relationship to his brother; his whole future.

Scratch that, it's the Master of Death-thing. It's definitely the Master of Death-thing.

In the end, though, Regulus finds he's rather fond of surprises.
notes:
Written for the Regulus Black Fest 2021, for Atlanta's fantastic prompt:

Sirius won't look at him. Regulus is eleven years old and his brother won't look at him and it feels like a hole carving its way into his chest. And then the boy sitting next to him, turns to him with mischievous green eyes and says, "Harry Potter, what do you say we prank the Gryffindors tomorrow?"

This is for you because for one, it was your prompt, but also because you listened to me whine endlessly, as you always do when the dear characters don't do what they're supposed to, and you deserve all the gifts. ❤️ It got a little very, very far away from me, but I still had heaps of fun writing it. I hope you'll like it!

Rated M for some of the themes (war, child abuse, violence), a lot of swearing (honestly, so much swearing) and the fact that, strictly speaking, the time travel causes some age difference between them. There's some magic going on that diminishes it, but better safe than sorry and all that.

Fic title is from Gaslight Anthem - Old Haunts.

Please do not repost my work anywhere or list it on goodreads (or similar sites).

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Thank you for reading!

There's a high chance of a sequel happening at some point regarding the Horcrux-hunt, the war, and the others finding out about Harry. I considered covering it all in this fic, but this arc feels complete in itself, and frankly, I also did not have enough time to add another 50k words to this.

I hope you liked it! ❤️

author: ['Lunette3002']
title: Little Overlooked Dreams
relationships: ['Tim Drake & Bruce Wayne', 'Tim Drake & Jason Todd', 'Tim Drake & Dick Grayson', 'Tim Drake & Damian Wayne', 'Tim Drake & Alfred Pennyworth']
characters: ['Tim Drake', 'Bruce Wayne', 'Jason Todd', 'Dick Grayson', 'Damian Wayne', 'Alfred Pennyworth']
additional_tags: ['magical mishaps', 'Age Regression/De-Aging', 'De-Aged Tim Drake', 'Bruce Wayne is a Good Parent', 'Good Sibling Jason Todd', 'Good Sibling Dick Grayson', 'Good Sibling Damian Wayne', 'Damian Wayne Tries', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Emotional Hurt/Comfort', 'Tim Drake Has Abandonment Issues', 'Fluff', 'Did I accidentally write a fluff piece for a whump server', 'yes i did', 'Batfamily (DCU)', 'Tim Drake Gets a Hug', 'Tim Drake-centric']
summary:
Tim weighed his options. He was alone at night in some alleyway in Gotham. He had nothing except the clothes left on the ground by someone and the cloak wrapped around his skinny shoulders. His camera was nowhere in sight. His backpack was gone too.

He brought the device to his ear. “Hello?”

Whatever talking had been on the other end of the line immediately cut off at his hesitant greeting.

“Who is this?”
notes:
This was for the I Whump Too Server quote trade event! We were tasked with picking a line from a story by the author we were assigned, then writing a story based on that line. I got Marzue and the line I picked came from her story, of blue feathers and shiny baubles. The line I used is bolded in the story, but I don’t want to spoil anything just yet ;)

I hope you enjoy! :smek:

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

The End

As is, this story is finished. Maybe I’ll come back to write more cute kid Tim in the future or write about him getting aged back up, but maybe not. Just know that Tim gets returned to normal eventually and his family loves and appreciates him whatever size he is.

Thanks for reading! I’ll give my dog extra pets for kudos, bookmarks, and comments.

I hope you all have a wonderful day!

George is the Twitter employee that has to write brief descriptions for all the trending hashtags (aka the Twitter Description Man). Sapnap is a fellow coworker at Twitter HQ who’s been friends with George for a long time.

author: ['nothing_left_sacred']
title: A Perfect Fit
characters: ['Harry Potter', 'Draco Malfoy']
additional_tags: ['Plot What Plot/Porn Without Plot', 'Top Harry Potter', 'Bottom Draco Malfoy', 'Werewolf Harry Potter', 'Veela Draco Malfoy', 'Service Top', 'gentle dom harry potter', 'Pillow Princess Draco Malfoy', 'Bearded Harry Potter', 'hung harry', 'Size Queen Draco Malfoy', 'idiots to lovers', 'Light BDSM', 'Kink Negotiation', 'Safe Sane and Consensual', 'Shibari', 'Bondage', 'Breeding', 'Nipple Play', 'Overstimulation', 'Multiple Orgasms', 'Forced Orgasm', 'Prostate Milking', 'Come Eating', 'Rimming', 'Knotting', 'Feminization', 'cervix stimulation', 'Mpreg', 'Size Kink', 'Praise Kink', 'Scent Kink', 'Improbable anatomy', 'Do Not Copy or Repost']
summary:
Harry has had to live his life with the curse of being overly well-endowed.

Draco has had to live his life with the curse of being hard to please.

---
A Cinderella story, of sorts.
notes:
This is primarily intended to be a fun, lighthearted, porny romp, with little to no intelligent design or thought-provoking concepts.

Indeed, I have tended in my later years to prefer to just compile all of my favourite fandom tropes and mash them all together into a truly self-indulgent piece. And as such, this will feel, perhaps, slightly contrived or “samey” to things you might have read before, and it will most assuredly be rife with some mischaracterizations and hand-wavey plot devices.

Magic, dead readers, is my modus operandi.

Now with a podfic recorded by the lovely and sweet MrsLucyGoosey. Please go listen to the dulcet tones of her work!

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

I realize I left the question of the true size of Harry’s cock to be a mystery. That was mostly on purpose, as I was torn between the tongue-in-cheek concept of making it 9 and 3/4, which would be perfect, as Draco’s favourite toy is 9 inches, and is not quite the perfect fit, so that extra 3/4s of an inch might be just what the doctor ordered to get to that special place.

Or, there was the earlier allusion to Harry’s wand, which is 11 inches. I was originally leaning towards this as a truly monstrous size that would immediately strike fear into the hearts of all but the truest size queen, but I warred with the idea of it being ever so slightly too far fetched.

Think of it as a sort of... ‘Choose your own adventure.’

Harry, as our Hero, can be whatever your hopes and dreams are for a cock.

---
Though I feel like it shouldn't need to be said (and I was unfortunately proved wrong literally the day I am posting this work as a kind commenter alerted me to someone having plagiarized an earlier work of mine); Do NOT repost this work, edited vaguely or otherwise, either here, or on other websites.

I have often wondered why this was so frequently being addressed by other authors on this site, and it seems to be a very prevalent issue. Please be respectful of authors and other content creators.

additional_tags: ['Aliens', 'Alien Abduction', 'Alien Biology', 'Alien Culture', 'Cultural Differences', 'Language Barrier', 'Humans Are Weird', 'Humans are space orcs', 'yes motherfucker its one of my FAVORITE TROPES', 'Hurt TommyInnit (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Sleepy Bois Inc-centric', 'Avian Phil Watson (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Phantom Hybrid Wilbur Soot', 'Piglin Hybrid Technoblade (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Bee Hybrid Toby Smith | Tubbo', 'sorta for all of these', 'theyre not really hybrids as much as aliens but yknow', 'Human TommyInnit (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Science Fiction', 'Misunderstandings', 'Traumatized TommyInnit (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Claustrophobia', 'Claustrophobic TommyInnit (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Flashbacks', 'Good Friend TommyInnit (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Panic Attacks', 'Platonic Cuddling', 'Found Family', 'Sleepy Bois Inc as Family']
series: Part 1 of Human Error
summary:
Tommy Innit may not be the most well-behaved kid or even the best person at times, but he certainly deserves better than to be abducted by aliens. Luckily for him, the aliens didn't seem to expect him to be able to break out of the stupid cage they stuffed him in and destroy their ship from the inside out.

Now he just has to figure out where to go from here.

__________

Philza just wants to fly his cargo ship with his two sons, he's left behind all the excitement of his old life, so when he hears rumors of a human crash landing on the trading post where they are docked, he gathers up what he had managed to get and takes off again.

This time with a stowaway.

title: The Standard You Walk Past
characters: ['Draco Malfoy', 'Harry Potter', 'Hermione Granger', 'Ron Weasley', 'Narcissa Black Malfoy', 'Pansy Parkinson', 'Mentions of many characters']
additional_tags: ['Hogwarts Eighth Year', 'Some Homophobia in the Wizarding World', 'Romance', 'Friends to Lovers', 'Fluff', 'flangst', 'Angst', 'SO MUCH FLUFF', 'And a bit of sap', 'Legilimency', 'Dreams and Nightmares', 'Slow Build', 'Prejudice Against Slytherins', 'Roommates', 'Redeemed Draco Malfoy', 'Minor Hermione Granger/Ron Weasley', 'Minor Lucius Malfoy/Narcissa Malfoy - Freeform']
summary:
On returning to Hogwarts for their Eighth Year, Headmistress McGonagall decided to room Draco Malfoy and Harry Potter together. She may have hoped for a leading example of house unity; the other students fully expected insults and fights. But nothing happened.

That was, until Harry sleepwalked into Draco’s bed.

Translation links available inside for Indonesian, Chinese, Korean, Russian, Thai, Spanish, Portuguese, and Turkish!


Podfic also available (in English) by Gabriel_Audio!
notes:
The title comes from the following quote by Lieutenant General David Lindsay Morrison, AO.

The standard you walk past, is the standard you accept.

summary:
He was not an idiot, and soon enough, he noticed it too. When Mina broke up with Kiri, Katsuki was the first one at his side. He stayed in the redhead’s room for hours, consoling him and giving him a shoulder to cry on. He canceled training with Izuku to get Kirishima back on his feet. He pushed back their dates to cook dinner for him. He disregarded Izuku’s texts to spend time with him. 

And Izuku, tragically, understood. 

As the first petal tumbled from his busted lips after returning from patrol one March evening in their third year, he understood perfectly.
notes:
I am so sorry.

This is the outcome of stress and sadness and too many sleepless nights on Tiktok.

I love BakuDeku so so much. I hate myself for writing this. I'm probably also projecting a LOT. So here is this shitshow of a fic.

author: ['RadPax']
title: Secret Fan
fandoms: ['僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia']
characters: ['Kirishima Eijirou', 'Midoriya Izuku', 'Midoriya Inko', 'Bakugou Katsuki', 'Kaminari Denki']
additional_tags: ['Quirkless Midoriya Izuku', 'Pro Hero Bakugou Katsuki', 'Twitch Streamer Izuku', 'Slow Burn', 'Secret Identity', 'Mutual Pining', 'Bakugou Katsuki is Bad at Feelings', 'Bakugou Katsuki Swears A Lot', 'Protective Bakugou Katsuki', 'Cute Midoriya Izuku', 'Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Sugar Daddy Bakugou Katsuki', "He doesn't do it on purpose it just kinda happens", 'Height Differences', 'Fluff and Angst', 'Kaminari Denki is a Dork', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Angst and Hurt/Comfort', 'tw: molestation', 'tw: depression', 'Midoriya Izuku Has PTSD', 'Midoriya Izuku Has Panic Attacks', 'Original Character(s)', 'Streamer Midoriya Izuku']
summary:
Bakugou Katsuki was now Japan's #1 Pro Hero, he just got off of work and was looking through twitch to find something to watch to keep himself awake for a few hours.
That is until he sees a cute guy with beautiful sea green hair, and emerald eyes talking about heroes.

So what if Katsuki dropped the guy some money, and so what if he was accidentally developing a crush on the guy.
This was fine.
Its fine.
After all its not like the guy is gonna send Katsuki a message-
Oh no, is that a notification sound?

AU Where Izuku is quirkless and a twitch streamer and Katsuki has to keep his identity as DynaMight hidden while the two slowly develop feelings for the other

Clicking the stream his jaw hung he couldn’t believe what he was seeing. This fucker. Not only did he have that beautiful ocean green hair, but he has gorgeous long dark eyelashes, soft full pink lips, and freckles. Holy shit. The freckles! A beautiful plethora of constellations across his cheeks and down his neck. And wait, where are they on his arms too?! Each time the guy waved his arms around Katsuki could see some along his forearm, beautiful soft angel kisses all over. God fucking damnit.

Katsuki’s hands hovered over his phone's keyboard. What the fuck do you say in this kinda situation? He was never good with feelings, let alone helping people with THEIR feelings.
But fuck.

And one thing that kept pulling at him. “Maybe cause I’m qurikless?”

—————-
KaboomKing: I don’t have a mic for my PC.
Deku: Oh heck. Really??
KaboomKing: Never needed one.
Deku: Aww… we could call on your phone?
—————-

Fuck, he completely forgot about his phone!

Maybe the shit mic quality would mask his voice? And if he wasn’t yelling and just talking calmly Deku might not even realize who he is. No, this could work. This could for sure work.

With shaky hands, Katsuki typed out his message.

“Fuck…” Katsuki groaned out, staring down at his phone. This has to be illegal to be this adorable. There no fucking way a human being could look like that and be allowed to walk down the street.

“Ohhhhh~” Denki now had a cheshire grin. “So it's a boy!”

That was not what he was expecting the other blonde to say. “What?!”

“Y’know, it makes sense. You never were into girls back in high school. Its okay Kats, you know I’d never judge you for being gay.” Denki reached out, placing a hand onto Katsuki’s broad shoulder.

Error, error. Katsuki has stopped working.

WARNING: THIS CHAPTER COVERS TOPICS OF SEXUAL ASSAULT AND PHYSICAL ABUSE!
PLEASE BE WARNED BEFORE READING

“Aw, my poor kitten. You look so upset. I’m sorry, but you were trying to get away and I just couldn’t have that.” The raven haired man said gently, pushing Izuku’s curls out of his face and brushing at his soft cheeks.”You’re far too cute for me to just let you go.”

There was a sad reality before them both. They were both alone, but in different ways. Katsuki had chosen to be alone, and had chosen to push people away. while Izuku had been pushed away, he had no choice in this isolation. But in the end, both longed to be found, long to find someone else that could understand them in a way that no one in this society could. It was poetic, in some sad messed up way. Each wanting the other for different but all to similar reasons, two sides of the same coin.

“Hey Kacchan, c-could you do something for me?” Izuku mumbled out, feeling his ears start to burn up.

“Wassup nerd?”

“Could you read to me until I fall asleep?”

“K-Kacchan…?” Izuku could barely speak, fear spiked through his entire being. He felt sick.

“Deku, I need you to breathe. You’re hyperventilating.”

“K-Kacchan he found me! He knows who I am!” Izuku rasped out.

DING DONG

the doorbell?

Izuku froze, staring at the entrance way to his apartment. Another ring, and Izuku slowly stood to walk towards the door. His body felt woozy, his vision going blurry as he made his way over.

“Wh-who is it?”

“So, what you’re saying is…” Katsuki could feel a toothy smile creepy across his sharp features. “I can beat this guy to a pulp.”

A piece to this puzzle that life dared hand them and all this time they had been desperately trying to put together but never knowing where the final piece lay.

It was here.

The piece was found.

“P-pretty? Me? I’m not a girl, Kacchan.”

“Yeah no shit Sherlock. Men can be pretty. You’ve called me pretty before.”

“Oh fuck-CRAP! No! Ugh!!!”

Katsuki couldn’t help but laugh at that. “Izuku Midoriya! Was that a swear? My, what would your mother think!”

“Shut up, your swearing has rubbed off on me!”

“Me? Swearing? I don’t know what you mean! I’m an Angel! I never swear and I am always very very polite.” Katsuki coos, sarcasm dripping from his tone.

“Hardy harr harr.” Deku huffs, but a smile clearly on his lips. “But, you’re right.”

“About?”

“You are very pretty.”

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Some answers to some questions I'm sure you all are wondering.

Did katsuki explain they knew each other as kids?
Yes. I tried writing that scene over and over again but it clashed badly with this ending, but yes he did tell him.
and Izuku about melted from it. The piece was originally planned for that scene but like I said, everything I wrote just didn't seem good.

Is Izuku still going to nursing school?
Yes~! He still dreams of being a nurse even if he's dating the top hero! He wants to save lives too!

Is Izuku still streaming?
yep~ Though now from the safety of Katsuki's home ;) Aint no one getting in there

What about inko????
Well, with Katsuki's money she's been able to get better care and is doing a lot better now.

Is this really the ending??
Yeah. I didn't want to just keep writing for the hell of writing and end up getting writers block because I can't figure out where to go next.
I haven't written a big story like this in YEARS and there's nothing worst than writing yourself into a hole just cause you don't want to be done.
But don't worry~!

So, I’m back. Sorry about the wait once again, folks. Gonna confess right now, this one is a bit of a filler chapter.

1) Because I needed to develop the relationships between characters more
2) Because I am most definitely stalling as I try to drag myself through the next challenge lmao

I’m glad I finally got something out tho, I have been going through it in the last week and finally writing something has helped make up for it

Enjoy!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Do I need to keep pittng SBI and Dream against each other? Nah. But it’s funny, so imma do it anyways.

Side note, here’s some life advice for you guys:

- Poison ivy sucks ass and does not combine well with a whacky immune system and eczema. Would not recommend. Wear shoes when walking in the woods, y’all.
- Any day can be redeemed by a little bit of fog at sunset, a good music album, and a large bowl of cubed water melon.

Now go, be free. Use my wisdom to improve your lives this instant

A quick summary of my week:

- Gets intense vigilante AU brainrot and is forced to beat it back with a proverbial broom
- Accidentally give myself writers block as a result of said proverbial broom
- Very, very tired (poison ivy meds suck)
- Mild mental breakdown (see previous for reason lmao)
- Finalized decision to never have children of my own after dealing with work

Big shoutout to goldhyuck for kicking my ass into gear and literally booting me out of writer block. Idk how that works but it was a damn miracle. Thanks dude

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

This was a really short update, but fear not. This was originally part of one chapter with the actual second challenge in it, but I’m like 2/3 of the way through writing and it’s already over 5k words, so I had to split it up for the sake of my own sanity.

I’m on a roll though, so you’ll most likely be getting either a double update today or the second half of this chapter at like 2 in the morning. We’ll have to see.

Now if you’ll excuse me, I have more writing to do

*Aggressively slams this down on the table before grinning at y’all and promptly passing out*

I wrote entire thing within about 24 hours. It’s literally half the length of the rest of the fic I- I don’t understand. How. H o w.

Thanks so much for all the suggestions, they really helped me figure out what the hell to write. Anyways, enjoy your middle of the night update

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Fun fact: the whole pendant-puzzle-thing (and literally half to content of this chapter) is actually from a dream I had like, years ago. But it fit the theme so... ta da. Wild stuff right there

I hope y’all didn’t get to attached to Quinn, he’s gonna show up like once after this lmao, I just needed a partner for Tommy.

Thanks for reading, and like 1700 kudos. I kinda just blinked and it was there, but seriously. Y’all are the best :)

Me: I don’t really have plans for this OC, he’s kinda just a plot device-

Literally all of you in the comments: Quinn is now my favorite, I will die for him

By popular demand, it seems, I’ve decided to try to fit him into a few more scenes. Did not expect him to be such a hit, but alright- you win. I surrender.

Here’s just some funny and cute bits to break up the time between rounds- please enjoy :)

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Look- it’s cute.

Not sure what kinda drugs I am currently on that’s allowing me to write this much in so little time, but hey. More updates for you.

I’m gonna keep riding this momentum as long as I can, but do not be surprised if it suddenly takes me another week to get the next chapter out. Next chapter is the start of the final round, and action scenes are hard for no good reason, man

The Vibes™️ as of late:

Me: You know, I haven’t watched the lore streams in like a month or more, I think my hyper fixation is finally ending. I’m just not as attached to the characters as I used to be

Also Me: Sees 1 (one) singular tiktok in which all the dsmp characters get happy endings and promptly bursts into tears

Still Me: Stays up until 4:22 am reading fanfics again, spends free time the next day working on my own

Yep, definitely over this fandom. Totally.

Anyways, here y’all go- it’s a little messy and the pacing is kinda funky, so I’m not super happy with it, but whatever. I simply do not care anymore. Take it. Begone.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Next chapter is my favorite next chapter is my favorite next chapter is my favorite next chapter is my fa-

Also sorry for the lack of like, actual fight scenes in this one. I was gonna write all three of Tommy’s individual rounds but the next chapter is also a massive fight scene and honestly, I’m lazy. They’re so hard for no reason, but I tried. Sorry.
¯\_(ツ)_/¯

You guys crack me up, you really do. The comments on last chapter? Immaculate.

I can’t wait to see your reactions to this one. I simply cannot wait.

(Please don’t kill me)

CW: Blood, implied murder

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Here’s a little fun fact for you all- I wrote this entire chapter (minus the fight scene) before I even wrote chapter two. Do with that information what you will.

Now, to sit back and let the chaos unfold.

See y’all later lmao

Edit (because there seems to be a little confusion):

PSA: DREAM IS NOT DEAD. MANS IS JUST PASSED OUT. THAT IS ALL

Thank you for your time.

Would you look at that. We’re at the end already.

I just wanna say thank you so much for all the kudos and comments on this work, I didn’t mention it nearly enough. I even saw some people rec this on TikTok? Like, what? I love you guys so much, just thank you for all the support. It catches me off guard every time.

This chapter might be a little sloppy, it’s currently 3:21 am right now and I wrote half of this in one go. But I’m gonna be traveling all over for the next like 6 days, so I was trying to get this done before that.

Enjoy the ending, my friends :)

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

And that’s a wrap. I’m not sure how to feel about this work, honestly. I’m not nearly as attached to it as some of my other stuff, but I sure had fun writing some of it, and reading all your comments. Just- thanks so much guys.

I’m gonna try to start a new work soon, but I’ve got school starting in like a month and a shit ton of college apps stuff to do, and it’s a long work (extensive plot woo), so that may have to go on the back burner for a bit.

In the meantime, feel free to come to over to Instagram, it’s linked in my profile bio, I’m planning a post when I get back from travels if anyone wants to check it out, or just chat or something.

Until next time, yeah?

*salutes*

title: forwarding address
characters: ['TommyInnit (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Wilbur Soot', 'Technoblade (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Phil Watson (Video Blogging RPF)']
additional_tags: ['villain!sbi', 'hero!tommy', 'Wilbur Soot and Technoblade and TommyInnit are Siblings', 'Adopted', 'as usual', 'TommyInnit Needs a Hug (Video Blogging RPF)', 'And He Gets One!', 'Superheroes', 'Villain SBI', 'Found Family', 'Fluff', 'heavy fluff yall', 'slight description of injuries', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Hurt TommyInnit (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Protective Technoblade (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Protective Wilbur Soot', 'Protective Phil Watson (Video Blogging RPF)', 'Alternate Universe - Superheroes/Superpowers']
summary:
“Who did this to you?” the Blood God growls, low and dangerous. And anyone in their right mind would be afraid, would be shitting their pants, but Tommy just flicks his eyes to the floor and mumbles that it doesn’t matter.

Echo hums softly, brushing his fingers gently over the bruises coloring Tommy’s cheek, stopping at the gash over his eyebrow before carding through his hair. Tommy doesn’t mean to lean into the touch, he knows these men are dangerous, are deadly, but he can’t help but feel safe, wrapped up in their brutal care.

It’s pathetic, really, how quickly frustrated tears well up and spill over, how easily Tommy crumbles.

The place where the villain holds his wrists burns and when he tugs, ever so gently, Tommy falls into him. Something in him aches and shatters and maybe, maybe heals, just slightly.

“It’s okay, kid,” the Blood God murmurs into his hair as Tommy sobs. “You’re okay.”

They were never going to be able to keep this up, not really. No matter how much they fought, no matter how secret they kept their identities, someone was always going to find the connection, exploit the weakness in the previously invulnerable armor.

The Syndicate had a fourth—a too-skinny hero with a loud mouth and a distinct lack of self preservation instincts. No one wants to fuck with the Syndicate, with their expensive suits and high tech gear. Plenty of people are willing to fuck with Tommy though, Tommy in his ratty old red hoodie and ripped up jeans.

And they try, they really do, but they have dangerous jobs and, well, there’s only so much they can do.

additional_tags: ['Batfamily (DCU)', 'Brotherly Bonding', 'Coming Out', 'Emotional Hurt/Comfort', 'Emotional Hurt', 'Light Angst', 'Panic Attacks', 'Tim Drake Needs a Hug', 'Tim Drake Gets a Hug', 'Bad Parents Jack and Janet Drake', 'Good Sibling Damian Wayne', 'Good Sibling Tim Drake', 'Good Sibling Dick Grayson', 'Good Sibling Jason Todd', 'Bruce Wayne is a Good Parent', 'Protective Tim Drake', 'Protective Damian Wayne', 'Family Dynamics', 'Brotherly Love', 'Damian Wayne Has a Crush', 'The kents all live on a farm together', 'Including Kon', 'and Jon', 'Family Feels', 'Fluff', 'Anal Sex', 'Sexual Content']
summary:
‘Drake?’

Tim felt like he was choking. His throat was tight. He couldn’t swallow.

‘Damian?’ He managed.

Damian was… here. At Kent Farm. Dressed in the too-big Batman pajamas that Dick had bought him last Christmas as a joke. And- And-

Tim was wearing Kon’s t-shirt and his hair was messy and his lips were swollen and- He wasn’t ready for this- He wasn’t- He couldn’t-

How had he been so stupid?

Or: Tim comes out to Damian and prepares for the entire family to know by morning. It just so happens that Damian can keep a secret. Multiple, actually.

summary:
“Shall we start the bidding then?” He gestured grandly towards Izuku. “How much are you willing to pay to buy this one of a kind-”

Without lifting its legs or showing much movement, Izuku twisted, until the whites of his eyes stared at them. “You think you can buy us,” he says, and everyone jolts.

It wasn’t Izuku’s voice. It was deep and tonal, reminding Uraraka of that night when they stayed up playing with Jirio’s sound machines. They had played with the controls, distorting their voices. It had been funny then to hear such distorted voices. But now? Uraraka shivered. Izuku sounded ancient. Deadly.

In which Aizawa deals with the fallout and regrets everything. More spooky Izuku!

additional_tags: ['Love Languages', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Child Neglect', 'Touch-Starved', 'slice(s) of life', 'gojo struggles with his love language', 'found family vibes at the end', "minor spoilers for gojo's past arc", 'Child Abuse']
summary:
“Your touch,” Megumi says, then cuts off, sounding frustrated. He moves Satoru’s hand so that it’s pressed against his chest, right over his heart, and Satoru lets him, curious where this is going and simultaneously touched by how gentle Megumi is being.

Satoru lifts a brow, regarding Megumi as the boy seems to struggle with what he wants to say.

“Your touch,” Megumi starts again, lifting his gaze to stare resolutely at Satoru. “I can’t feel it.”

And oh. Satoru feels his mouth go dry, because of course the boy has to be exactly like him, down to the same love language. Of course.

---

or; Gojo Satoru's love language is a weakness, until it's not.

Izuku's life is going amazingly well, with his Twitch channel where he streams himself playing video games and discussing the nerdiest things imaginable hitting 3 million followers, his best friend as his roommate, and his other close friends as tight-knit as they've been since high school. The only possible road bump is his viewer's continuous demands to know who "Kacchan" is - thanks to Katsuki often coming into his room during streams and Izuku's repeated attempts to pull him into video game competitions - and, more importantly, if they're dating. summary:
Tommy Innit is a very normal kid. He has friends, a warm bed to sleep in at night, and three square meals a day.

The only odd thing about him is that he has been sorta-kinda adopted into a family of space-traveling aliens. Oh, and the fact that humans are seen as the boogeymen of space. He's doing his best to prove to his crew that humans aren't that weird, but maybe they kind of have a point.

summary:
Cafe Manager by day, Vigilante by night. Tomathy Innit is a 16 year old boy who struggles to juggle between keeping his family's cafe afloat, with said family gone, and his secret life as a vigilante while he takes care of these heroes and villains that keeps passing out at his doorstep.

Seriously, where are these people coming from?

I sincerely apologize to you, IncrediblyMai. You wanted evil XD but everyone wanted good XD so according to democracy, we go for Good XD instead.

It's been a while, hasn't it?
notes:
This is just a brainrot I had from binging Vigilante Tommy fics and rewatching some Undertale playthroughs.

(See the end of the work for other works inspired by this one.)

AN: In everyone else's POV, they would refer to Tommy as an adult because 1)he acts like he's older and more mature as well as the added height he has, still doesn't stop him from causing mischief and 2)he owns his family's fucking cafe. Because really, who would expect an 16 year old to effectively run a cafe?

Explanation on Tommy's Powers

Pros:

-He can create illusions using mist from either his surroundings or released from his own body
-The illusions usually can phase through any solid but can solidify if more mist is used
-He can either project the illusions to make weapons, obstacles, etc or cover himself in it so that he can disguise himself or just go invisible

Cons:

-He needs to actually SEE when he uses the illusions so that he can form what he wants to make
-If he were to use the mists extracted from his body for a long period of time, he can risk getting frost bites, or in a more severe case, hypothermia

Sorry for the late update.

author: ['supercalvin']
title: Fathom Me Out
additional_tags: ['Canon Era', 'Magic Revealed']
summary:
After ten years, Arthur thinks he has Merlin all figured out. But as he watches Merlin, he finds out that he has more questions than answers. The longer he thinks about it, the more uneasy he feels. So he pushes it aside. Except, he can no longer ignore the questions he has about Merlin.

Not your everyday reveal!fic.
notes:
Takes place sometime after 4x13, except Lancelot is alive and Arthur and Gwen reconcile but do not marry.

Don’t need to read it, but Laundry's Hard Work is a kind-of prequel to this fic. All you really need to know is that Arthur sees Merlin’s scars, which I have drawn in the Merlin Scar Diagram.

Anyways, this is basically a character study of Arthur Pendragon. He is my favorite character and I truly enjoyed exploring everything about him.

Thanks goes to tofs (and the other users) who commented on “Laundry’s Hard Work” and started my mind rolling on this idea.

I give a ton of credit to my friend, Tessa, who brain stormed with me and essentially gave me the idea for the entirety of this fic. Acknowledgement also goes to Mat who put up with our squealing and (after Tessa and I stopped squealing) gave some great ideas of his own.

Enjoy!

 

Chinese Translation by Beulah_T

summary:
Wei Wuxian gets caught sneaking into Cloud Recesses.

But since he can't tell the truth - that he's just here to deliver his teacher's most recent love letter to her soulmate who's stuck in a cave - he tells a lie instead. He says that he's a Jiang disciple that had arrived late and so had snuck in through the gates. He hadn't expected the lie to work, sure that it would unravel as soon as they found a Jiang to verify it, but instead Jiang Yanli backs up his story, and even adds to it.

Which is how he ends up masquerading as the first disciple of Lotus Pier while trying to figure out how to get out of Cloud Recesses without anyone discovering that he's the disciple of Baoshan Sanren.

summary:
Technoblade rarely travels in the Nether anymore. He'd come down here this time to gather a few materials he can't get in the Overworld, and then he was going to leave the place where he was born but not raised.

And then he’d heard the snuffling. It’s a quiet thing, sniffling mixed with high-pitched whines, and, oh, there go his instincts. Recognizing the sound even though he’s never heard it before- though he definitely made it in his youth.

There’s a piglet nearby, and they’re terrified.

He casts one final, forlorn glance at the gold he’d seen higher up, and then he turns to follow the sound.

----

summary:
Apparently, Bakugou Katsuki is the kind of person that uses pet names when he's in a serious relationship. Who knew?

Certainly not Izuku. But he would have sincerely appreciated the head's up.

Because he's seriously dying right now.
notes:
CW: Mentions of blood and violence. If you want to skip it, it starts after the fourth paragraph cut, and you may start reading again once Katsuki calls out Izuku's name.

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

This is just an excuse for me to have Katsuki call Izuku every endearment that I can think of, because he gives nicknames to everyone else. And like everything else in my life, I just HAD to make it complicated.

I'm still new to the fandom, so I hope I didn't butcher their characterizations too much, especially the explosive pomeranian. I just love them, okay? The development of their relationship in canon is just *chef's kiss* and I just love stories where Katsuki is a good boyfriend and Izuku is helplessly in love with him.

Hit me up on Twitter! I need people to scream BKDK with. Thanks for reading, and I hope you enjoyed it!

additional_tags: ['Fluff', 'Domestic Fluff', 'Domestic Avengers', 'Stark Tower', 'Tony Stark Has A Heart', "Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker's Parental Figure", 'Parent Tony Stark', 'Parent Pepper Potts', 'Protective Happy Hogan', 'Adorable Peter Parker', 'Sleepy Peter Parker', 'May Parker (Spider-Man) & Tony Stark Coparenting Peter Parker', 'Secret Identity', 'Television Watching', 'Peter Parker Gets a Hug', 'Hurt Peter Parker', 'Precious Peter Parker', 'Peter Parker Has a Family', 'Peter Parker Has Nightmares', 'Peter Parker Has a Bad Day', 'Peter Parker Gets Stabbed', "Peter Parker's Field Trip to Stark Industries", 'Peter Parker Meets the Avengers', "Everyone Thinks Peter Parker is Tony Stark's Biological Child", "Everyone Thinks Spider-Man is Tony Stark's Biological Child", 'I Wrote This Instead of Sleeping', 'Everyone Thinks Peter and Tony are Related', 'the avengers freak out', 'POV Outsider']
series: Part 1 of Safflower-verse
summary:
Natasha looked more closely. She first saw hints of a second person in the sock poking out of the blanket at a strange angle, and the pale hand with curled-up fingers resting on Tony’s chest. Then she found a head of what looked like brown curls, tucked snugly under Tony’s arm. And eventually, a second set of sleeping breaths, slow and light. 

OR

The Avengers return from months of missions to find a child fast asleep on the lounge, with Tony snoring beside him. A mystery ensues.
Is Tony Stark a father? (It looks like it!) How have they never discovered the kid until now? I mean, Iron Man has always been good at keeping secrets, but a whole CHILD?

Rhodey could trace the shock residually plastered through every crease and curve of the other man’s face. Natasha still had a particularly pensive expression, sure, but Clint was floored. He looked like he had a concussion.

Maybe he did. Maybe that was a side effect of finding Tony Stark asleep on the couch next to a kid.

“He’s yours, isn’t he?” Rhodey asked quietly. “Your son.”

Tony opened and closed his mouth. Like a fish. “No?”

Clint leant forward to end the recording, but now that Tony was finished talking the quiet ‘beep!’ the phone made was highly audible.

“Oops,” he whispered, and quickly sent the video off to the Rogue Avengers’ group chat, with the caption, ‘Proof Stark has a son’.

Sam flew through something sticky and flailed around in the air for a second before righting himself. “What was that?” he spluttered. He recognised the feeling, but; “a spiderweb? What the fuck?”

The door to the lab slid mechanically open, to reveal a genius-billionaire-playboy-pilanthropist-possibly-dad according to the team’s conspiracy theories; and a slender, surprised-faced teen with brown curls standing awkwardly half-behind him.

Maybe it was better that the Rogues didn’t sit in on this particular board meeting.

At least it wasn’t as bad as the time he jumped onto the ceiling by accident because his pencil had rolled to the very edge of the table and the back of his neck felt like a bomb was about to go off.

“Colonel Rhodes has informed you on multiple occasions that you do not have to force yourself into threatening or vulnerable situations, but he encourages you to converse with Steve Rogers, as it may be a healthy way to resolve your emotions.”

“I’m already awake,” Peter cut in suddenly, without moving his head.

Yep. That was a voice Steve recognised, holy shit. Conspiracy confirmed.
notes:
So this is basically my first //idea// in the IronDad fandom... I took a few classic tropes (Peter meets the Avengers, Field Trip to Stark Industries, Everyone Thinks Peter and Tony are related) and just rolled them together with a massive bundle of fluff. And added a slight twist, which is that the Avengers think [censored due to spoilers] [sorry not sorry!]
There'll be ten chapters, but they won't be posted regularly.

Argh I can't believe how mentally exhausting it is to write "candy" every time instead of "lolly"... American spelling is driving me nuts. Sorry, guys, you might end up with a weird mix of "colour" but then "candy"... If there's something blaringly not-American let me know.

In case anybody was wondering about the whole mammoth milk thing in the last chapter (I know I was) both mammoths and elephants actually do produce milk. However, its toxic to humans, so no giant buckets of mammoth-milk carried around by little cave-men. And no mammoth cheese.

Sadly.

Many, many, endless thanks to everybody who enjoyed the first chapter of this story (and everybody who didn't enjoy too, I guess)! Your feedback and kudos meant so much to me!!

Anyway, I've been meaning to finished this chapter for aaages but my computer was confiscated twice and then my notepad went through the wash, so there's that.

Many thanks to everybody who reads, comments, leaves kudos, and bookmarks, have a wonderful day; and please stay covid-safe!! Wear a mask!!

Aaaah, hello!! It's been a little longer than I'd hoped... I lost my planning sheet for about the fifth time but I can mostly still remember what happens so I'm just going to roll with it. I'm a bit of a disaster sometimes so idk.

A million thanks to everybody who is leaving kudos, bookmarks, comments... you guys are amazing and I absolutely, 100% wouldn't have the motivation to do this without you, you're pretty much the only reason this fic is alive in the first place!! I can't say thank you enough!!

I've discovered that wanting to write and actually writing are too very different things. Sadly. But. I will promise that I will have the next chapter done and up by... well, how about before the weekend?

(PS Also, Bucky's whole character did a 180 and just... I'm sorry. I couldn't fix it; and it didn't want to be fixed.)

Now, I'm sorry for going slightly AWOL during the holidays, I promise it's not permanent!! <3 Not sure when the next chapter will arrive but I have no intention of deserting this fic so rest in peace etc. I love all your comments and kudos, they make my day!! Thank you!!

Secondly, I'd like to explain away my absence as being the fault of Merlin and Good Omens (I love them both very much) which led my wandering feet very far from this work at times.

This one had to be cut because it causes quite a few plot holes in the main story line, but I liked it enough to keep it around as a separate thing. There are a few identity reveal ideas I had that ultimately didn't fit the main plot.

Anyway, the next chapter is on a brief hold until I fully hammer out the plot holes I found.

Spoilers for Dark Matter up to chapter 16. Note that this hasn't been edited much/at all, so there might be continuity snags and plot holes.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

I have, no joke, four other versions of the Parent Teacher Conference alone. One with Sam stepping in as Peter’s ‘parent’ for the night. One where Peter is hit full blast with the fear toxin. Etc. That’s not getting into the next main divergence point in the story: chapter 19. There are four other versions of that, too.

Anyway, Felicia has grown on me the more I write her, and I liked this version enough, so maybe a few others will, too.

Again, spoilers for Chapter 16. This one almost made the final cut.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Again, Chapter 16 spoilers.

before u read this fic, y'all should know it's based off of another fic called Dark Matter by mysterycyclone, aka the fic that got me into Batman in the first place. and i'm so glad it did bc i actually joined the fandom right when the batman harley quinn show gate was happening on twitter and that was the most serotonin i've literally ever received in my LIFE. I did get the ok from the author to publish these fics tho don't worry!!

if u don't read that fic (although u rlly should, it's a VERY good fic,) then all u need to know to understand it is that after peter got snapped in infinity war, he woke up in the DCU, and he's been barely scraping along alone in Crime Alley, and he decided to be Spider-Man in specifically the alley. i take a few creative liberties and also there are some differences because Dark Matter is still updating and i write off my theories/headcanons, but it's still heavily influenced by the fic so show the author some love!

i have been on a writing KICK lately so we'll see how this fucking works out!!!!! literally i've written like 200 pages in the past some week it's insane. also ik some of batman was ooc probably but also i could not care less i'm so sorry i just don't this fic was dredged up from somewhere VERY deep inside of me.

anyway i'm a slut for kudos and comments, please leave them!!! <3<3<3 i have a lot more peter parker and batman crack where this came from, and i might post those too! and knowing y'alls thoughts would help me. make that decision. some of those are. significantly longer than this. i just thought this might be easiest to start posting bc it's a lot lighter lmao

all of peter's spider behaviours are either real science facts or lifted straight from canon. the bonus scene was a play on Spiders-MAn, that What If story about Peter Parker being devoured by an army of spiders who absorb his conscioussness (wtf). ethyl chloride is spidey's kryptonite in the comics, and he has canonically pretended to raise an army of spiders or eat criminals during interrogations before. i researched sm about spiders for this fic. i'm arachnophobic. i'm having nightmares.

reminder that if u liked this then there’s also the sequel :))

characters: ['Jeon Jungkook', 'Park Jimin (BTS)', 'Jung Hoseok | J-Hope', 'Kim Seokjin | Jin', 'Kim Taehyung | V', 'Kim Namjoon | RM', 'Min Yoongi | Suga', 'Park Hyungsik']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe', 'Fake/Pretend Relationship', 'Fluff', 'Humor', 'No Angst', 'maybe a tiny bit if you squint really hard though', 'Office Party', 'Vacation', 'There Was Only One Bed', 'Strangers to Lovers', 'Self-Indulgent', 'Smut', 'Sexual Tension', 'Flirting', 'Drinking', 'jungkook is very hot in this one', "but then again i guess he's very hot all the time", 'jimin is oblivious with a capital O', 'Slow Burn', "it wasn't actually supposed to be slow burn but 40k later here we are", 'Happy Ending', 'exhibitionism sort of but not really', 'Dirty Talk']
summary:
The stranger quirks a smile, his eyes twinkling a little. He’s very cute, actually, but Jimin is hardly concerned with that right now. 

“Aren’t you going to introduce me?” the man asks expectantly, glancing at Hyungsik.

“Of course,” Jimin says, turning to face Hyungsik. “How rude of me. Hyungsik, this is my boyfriend.”

The corners of his mouth twitch. “What?”

“Yes,” Jimin repeats. “My boyfriend. His name is...” Jimin finds the stranger’s foot with his own and steps on it gently, crushing the toe of his chunky sneaker under his Chelsea boot.

“Jungkook,” the man says, and it sounds like he’s choking back a laugh. “My name is Jungkook.”
notes:
(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

hello friends!!!! i decided to do something a little different with this one and post chaptered updates ♡ i'm really in love with this story and wanted to start sharing it as soon as possible! i'll be posting the remaining two chapters over the next few weeks :)

please comment and let me know what you think so far! i'd love to hear from you ♡

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

i've been having such a blast reading all your comments so far!! thank you so much for reading and taking the time to let me know this story is making you smile. it really means the world to me. let me know what you thought of this chapter! ♡

i ended up falling in love with these boys so much that i had to add an extra chapter, so there's still going to be one more after this one! i hope everyone enjoys this update, even though it's not the end ♡

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

i hope y'all are ready for the last chapter, because it's going to be a WILD ride 👀

i've been so delightfully overwhelmed by all your lovely comments so far!! i've been dealing with a lot of super-duper-bad stuff in my personal life as of late, so hearing that i made you laugh or smile is honestly THE BEST thing i could ever hear right now ♡ it lifts my spirits immensely and i appreciate it so much! (my personal situation isn't one that's going to get better, so no need to wish me well! just distract me and tell me what you thought about the chapter, mmkay?! love u guys)

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

that's all, folks! this fic ended up being about twice as long as i thought it would be and about ten times more fun to write. writing something this fluffy, funny, and tropey was exactly the healing my soul needed this month and reading your comments has been an absolute BLAST. ♡

i think this chapter is my favorite of them all, so i'd love to hear what you thought!!! thanks for coming on this ride with me and giving me the encouragement i really needed along the way. i seriously had SO much fun writing and posting this story.

thanks, as always, to my friends who read various pieces and parts of this before it was published and coaxed me through my endless neuroticism. i adore you!!!

summary:
Bruce Wayne -- billionaire playboy, owner of, at most, three brain cells -- beaten up at his own charity gala. Bruce Wayne, CEO of Wayne Enterprises out of nepotism and dumb luck, whose business wasn’t touched by corruption purely because of incompetence -- Bruce Wayne, airheaded and still generous, still kind, bloody in a stall and trying to hide it.

His hand clenched on the stall door, crumpling it between his fingers. His eyes weren’t burning yet, but barely.

“Who did this to you?”

summary:
Gojo Satoru

Professor in the PHYSICS DEPARTMENT at JUJUTSU TECHNICAL COLLEGE.

PHYS 161
Rating: 1/5

Professor Gojo WILL keep you past scheduled class time to talk about his husband. Make sure you listen because his tests include details about his personal life. I failed the midterm because I didn’t remember their anniversary date.

All in all - DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS. The fact that someone actually married this heathen is astounding.

Or, a spin around the rumor mill leads Nobara to the wrong answer.

additional_tags: ['Established Relationship', '5+1 Things', 'POV Outsider', 'High School Student Bakugou Katsuki', 'High School Student Midoriya Izuku', 'Pro Hero Bakugou Katsuki', 'Pro Hero Midoriya Izuku', 'Attempt at Humor', 'Possessive Bakugou Katsuki', 'Domestic Fluff', 'they are in love', 'and it is imperative to both my sanity and your reading experience that you understand that', 'Public Display of Affection', 'Fluff and Humor', 'M for Language and A Little Aggressive PDA', 'Not Beta Read', 'One Shot', 'Implied Jealousy', "(but not btwn bkdk. nah they're so good with each other.", 'everybody else just wants dk for themselves but bk said finders keepers when they were like 5)', 'everyone in 1-A is having the time of their life', "Yanno I prolly could've released this in chapters", 'but my impulse control grabbed me by the neck and demanded payment', 'So here we are']
summary:
“I want to confess- no, I’m going to confess to Midoriya today, but, uh, before I do that, can you tell me: are Midoriya and Todoroki dating?”

"Oh, honey, you sweet, sweet, summer child. It's not Todoroki you have to worry about – they're just friends," Ashido says, shaking her head with a vicious grin.

"Really?!"

"No, you should be worrying about him," she says, jutting her chin forward to indicate something behind Kazuo.

As if on cue, a low, echoing growl travels through the halls, and Kazuo feels his heart immediately pick up, beating wildly in his chest and so hard it almost hurts.

-

5 times people don't realize that Deku is already in a very happy relationship and try their hand at asking him out, and then in Bakugou's unique and special style, get very firmly corrected, +1 time where no correction is needed.

(Or 5+1 Times Bakugou Scares the Absolute Shit Out of Everybody Who So Much As Even Looks At Deku With the Wrong Kind of Eyes)

relationships: ['Midoriya Izuku & Sensei | All For One', 'Midoriya Izuku & Yagi Toshinori | All Might', 'Midoriya Izuku & Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko', 'First One For All User & Midoriya Izuku', 'Midoriya Izuku & Todoroki Shouto']

additional_tags: ['Midoriya Izuku is So Done', 'Midoriya Izuku is a Little Shit', 'shameless crack', 'misuse of Twitter', 'Pretend Villain Midoriya Izuku', 'Hidden/Fake Identity', 'AFO suffers almost as much as he deserves', "One For All Quirk Haunted by Past One For All Users' Ghosts (My Hero Academia)", 'dadmight', 'Sensei | All for One is Mistaken for Hisashi Midoriya', 'Actual truth is left ambiguous', 'Chaotic Midoriya Izuku', 'Corrupt Hero Public Safety Commission (My Hero Academia)', 'Conspiracy Theorist Todoroki Shouto', 'Drugged Midoriya Izuku', 'Timeline What Timeline']
series: Part 1 of Izuku Midoriya is So Done: A Series of Alternate UniversesPart 1 of All for One Versus Social Media
summary:
While high on painkillers at the hospital, Izuku creates a troll twitter account pretending to be All for One. The League of Villains, the Hero Public Safety Commission, and All Might all fall for it.

Shouto pretends to be Endeavor on twitter and Izuku trolls the HPSC.
notes:
(See the end of the work for other works inspired by this one.)

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Credit for this story idea goes to my dear sister, my first reader.

I didn’t put this story in my Dad for One series because I deliberately left it ambiguous if All for One is Hisashi Midoriya or not. Personally, I think it’s hilarious either way for different reasons. In the Not Dad for One AU, All for One launches his fake bomb of evidence at the same time that Izuku develops Black Whip. People see a boy with All Might’s quirk and multiple quirks and completely believe that he must be the test tube baby of All Might and All for One. Izuku goes on a troll rampage in retaliation, and by the time the dust clears there are enough conspiracy theories to make Shouto Todoroki weep from joy.

In the Dad for One AU, All of One can’t convince anyone that he’s Hisashi Midoriya. The Hero Public Safety Commission already released a statement saying that All for One is Izuku’s father and then released another statement taking it back. They’re not going to change their minds again—it would make them look too foolish. The story has been entrenched in the public’s mind as notorious fake news. No one will ever be able to convince Izuku of it because he’ll always believe that All for One is just trolling him back.

The critical difference between these AUs is a matter of timing. Dad for One tried to keep Izuku’s relationship to him secret until the right time to prevent him from being taken hostage. The non-related All for One could care less so he spews out his fake story immediately. Ironically, this results in people only believing All for One is Izuku’s father in the AU where he isn’t. Izuku, of course, doesn’t believe it whether it’s true or not. That was Izuku’s lie first and he’s very miffed at All for One for trying to steal it.

I had no plans to continue this fic, but it won a poll on my tumblr (aimportantdragoncollector) for which of my oneshots should get a chapter two. I’m grateful to everyone who loves this cracky story. I refuse to answer any questions about why a oneshots series now has a second chapter. I also refuse to answer any questions about the timeline, this takes place in crackverse.

Thank you to BucketOfMud and RianMoeru for helping me come up with twitter names, and my sister for brainstorming the plot with me.

author: ['K_R_Closson']
title: Love heals all wounds (so they say)
fandoms: ['Star Wars - All Media Types', 'Star Wars Legends: Jedi Apprentice Series - Jude Watson & Dave Wolverton', 'Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008) - All Media Types']
characters: ['Obi-Wan Kenobi', 'Vokara Che', 'Mace Windu', 'Cerasi (Star Wars)', 'Nield (Star Wars)', 'Arla Fett', 'Qui-Gon Jinn', 'Anakin Skywalker', 'Bail Organa', 'CC-2224 | Cody', 'CT-7567 | Rex', 'OC clones', 'Fizz the Medic']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Fix-It', 'Obi-Wan is a healer and this changes his path', 'Planet Melida | Daan (Star Wars)', 'Planet Mandalore (Star Wars)', 'Battle of Naboo (Star Wars)', 'Planet Tatooine (Star Wars)', 'Qui-Gon Jinn Lives', 'Obi-Wan and Anakin have a healthier relationship than in canon', 'Obi-Wan does not take Anakin as his padawan', 'Medic Obi-Wan', 'References to Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008)', 'Canon-Typical Violence', "Order 66 Didn't Happen (Star Wars)"]
summary:
Vokara speaks before he can. “I didn’t come here for your permission. I don’t need it. I am a Master Healer, and it is my right to take an apprentice.”

“And you want Obi-Wan Kenobi?” Mace Windu asks.

“Yes,” Vokara answers.

 

Or, Obi-Wan is wanted, becomes a healer, and this changes everything.
notes:
This is a story about the power of love and healing because I am, at my core, deeply predictable. It began as a 5+1 on the different people who could have trained Obi-Wan and then became an entire story in its own right. Because, again, predictable.

Fanfiction is a fun way to explore new things and so I've done something new (to me) with the story and it's told from different points of view. Each chapter title will name the POV character. It's an exploration of Obi-Wan mostly from other people's perceptions of him. Which means it's far kinder to him than a story told from his own perspective (Exhibit A: Can't return to who I was before).

(See the end of the work for other works inspired by this one.)

Melida/Daan time! It happens differently than in canon, but canon warnings apply (violence, child soldiers, child death - not of this is explicit)

POV is Anakin so warnings for child slavery and the abuses which come with it. Nothing explicit but the undercurrents are there.

And so the Clone Wars begin : )

Vod/vode - sibling (siblings) / sister (sisters) / brother (brothers)
Verd/verde - soldier (soldiers)
Baar'ur - medic

It's Fizz's time! I have to say, I really enjoy the symmetry of the final chapters which go Cody-Rex-Fizz-Rex-Cody.

Well...here we are. Thank you to everyone who has come on this journey with me. I hope you've enjoyed reading this story as much as I've enjoyed writing it.

series: Part 1 of Spin a Yarn
summary:
The Straw Hats find it a little weird that they don’t have a first mate. Whenever they ask, Luffy just laughs and says they do. Which is weirder, because none of the crew have ever met this so-called first mate.

A time-travel au, in which a captain and his first mate go back to the very beginning, and figures they can do more good apart than together. At least for now.
notes:
I haven't been on ao3 in years, but I've been on a One Piece binge and here we are. It's weird writing something without planning every single detail and sticking to the things I learned at Uni, but rules are meant to be broken and writing fanfiction is oddly freeing.

Don't be scared by the mature rating, but there is one scene with (spoilers) severed fingers. Not a main character, and I think everyone will be happy to hear who got them chopped off.

Anyways, enjoy this overly long one-shot that just wouldn't quit.

Edit 12/03/2022: Fixed up a bit of the formatting and grammar.

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

I hope you enjoyed this self-indulgent piece of mine. A second part is in the works, featuring Zoro's odd travels, the story of why Bon Clay and Sabo are at Sabaody, and the new scar he got from Blackbeard.

Follow me on Twitter for updates, ramblings, etc. @Srirachabunny

series: Part 1 of How much angst can I shove on to one character? (A lot)
summary:
The death of Kristen broke the Craft family. Phil, in his grief, neglected his youngest, Tommy, subconsciously blaming him for the death of his wife. Techno, who was never great at handling emotions or children, followed suit. Wilbur, who was closest to his mother, was cruel and vicious to the child, and even though a part of him loved his youngest brother, his grief was far stronger.

If Kristen’s death broke the Craft family, Tommy’s suicide shattered it. Each family member blaming each other for the fate of the youngest son, the no-longer Craft family split apart.

Ten years after the suicide of Wilbur’s younger brother Tommy, Wilbur drunkenly opened up to his friends about his biggest regret, but when asked if he wanted the chance to change what happened, Wilbur and the rest of his estranged family members wake up ten years in the past, one week before Tommy killed himself.

Wilbur and the rest of the Craft family must put aside their hatred for each other to save their youngest, and hopefully, in the process, fix their family.

DO NOT REPOST/COPY/BIND THIS FANFICTION! IF THIS IS POSTED ANYWHERE THAT IS NOT AO3, I DID NOT ALLOW IT. 2/27/24
notes:
TW: Graphic description of child neglect/abuse, graphic description of planning and committing suicide. This entire chapter is potentially very triggering! Please read with caution!

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

TW: Alcohol abuse, mentions of suicide, mentions of past child abuse/neglect

LISTEN TO THIS PLAYLIST WHILE YOU READ THIS CHAPTER (or the entire book if you want the full effect)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jhX-2wYCjxI&list=LL&index=2&t=19s

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Here we go, the second installment to the book! I really hope you enjoyed this chapter. (I posted this a day early because I couldn't wait!) Next chapter we'll see how the struggling family tries to fix their mistakes as well as learn more about what happened to them after Tommy's death. Y'all, I know I said this would have a happy ending, but it's gonna be more bittersweet. (It'll be more sweet than bitter, though, if that helps) Anyway, if you liked this chapter, leave a kudos and a comment, they really help me out! <3

I'm back y'all!!

I'm sure you've noticed the change in the number of chapters, but don't worry! All will be explained at the end of the chapter! I reccomend listening to the playlist listed in the previous chapter as you read this chapter, as it really sets the mood for the story! Happy reading everybody!! :)

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Hey guys! Sorry for how long it took me to post this. I had so much trouble writing this final chapter, and I literally had to rewrite the ending several times, and eventually, I had to scrap almost twenty pages! The reason being; I changed my mind about how I wanted the story to end halfway through the editing stage. Originally, the story was going to end with Wilbur waking up and realizing that all of it was a dream and he never really went back in time and Tommy was still dead. The story ends with Wilbur calling Phil and Techno and meeting them both at Tommy's grave where they all grieve for Tommy together as a family for the first time since the funeral. However, I decided that ending was too sad and it didn't give Tommy the chance he deserved, so I scrapped it and rewrote the final chapter with a new ending, that is a bit happier than the last.

That being said, AO3 is being a little finicky for me right now and I was forced to split the final chapter up into two chapters. So, the second half of this chapter should be posted after Thanksgiving (or for those of you who don't celebrate the holiday) around the end of the weekend.

I hope you all enjoyed this chapter, and thank you all for the lovely comments you've given me, they really inspire me to write! :) <3

Trigger Warnings: graphic description of suicide attempt, mentions of past child neglect/abuse

Read with caution people!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Finally finished with this, wow. This one was really hard to write so I hope you enjoyed it. The ending might let down some people but I felt like it was the only way to end the story. Realistically, Tommy wasn't going to heal in one week. No matter how badly they wanted to, they would never be able to magically fix years of neglect through one week. In the end, choosing what was best for Tommy was the only option. The original ending that I had planned for this book is still written, though, so let me know if any of you would be interested in reading it, I might publish it, too.

As for Dream... maybe he sent them back, maybe he didn't... the ending is a bit ambiguous, so that's completely up to you.

That's all for this book, though, so for those of you who stuck around since the very beginning, thank you for reading and waiting for the updates! I hope all of you enjoyed this book! <3

Wow. This chapter was honestly so hard to write. This entire chapter was just so heartbreaking, but I think what made it so difficult to write was how Tommy viewed his suicide. Tommy is just so young and naive, he didn't really understand the permanence of killing himself. He saw it more as moving in with his mom who separated from his dad, and less like killing himself. Honestly, the whole chapter had me in tears.

As for Phil, Wilbur and Techno... Yeah. Their actions may seem irredeemable, but I'm going to shove redemption down their throats because TOMMY DESERVED BETTER THAN THIS!!!!!!

Thank you so much for reading, I really hope you enjoyed this! If you liked it, please leave a comment and a kudos, they really help me out! :)

When Atsumu turns to face him, Kiyoomi doesn’t miss the way Atsumu’s eyes rake over his body, lingering on his hands. He adjusts his gloves and gets a little thrill of satisfaction when Atsumu bites his lip, eyes still stuck on the smooth black nitrile.

“It usually takes a decent amount of equipment to create a true predicament,” Kiyoomi says. “Unless you’d prefer I go easy on you…”

Atsumu’s eyes flash. Kiyoomi grins.
notes:
Thank you all for your patience and we hope you enjoy! We were a little worried about releasing this one after so long since it was definitely planned as a transition piece between Sleeping Dogs and some very… fun stuff we have planned for the next parts ;) But don't worry - we didn't skimp on this one, transition or not.

We've both had a lot going on over the past months so it means a lot that you all are still interested in reading this and have stuck around. Thank you again, and enjoy :)

P.S. Happy birthday Miya twins. Atsumu's present is getting destroyed and Osamu's present is Atsumu not telling him about it.

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Leave a comment to let us know what you thought! We hope you liked it :)

author: ['eggmacguffin']
title: A Meditation on Railroading
relationships: ['Tim Drake & Jason Todd', 'Tim Drake & Dick Grayson', 'Tim Drake & Bruce Wayne']
characters: ['Tim Drake', 'Jack Drake', 'Jason Todd', 'Dick Grayson', 'Bruce Wayne']
additional_tags: ['Bad Parent Jack Drake', 'Child Abuse', 'Trains', 'Implied/Referenced Homophobia', 'Crying', 'Gaslighting', 'Coming Out', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Family']
summary:
When he ends up ditched in Atlanta after a fight with his dad, Tim decides to do the only sensible thing: Tell no one and make the 800 mile journey back to Gotham on his own.

Because the "call Batman when you're in trouble" rule only applies when he's Robin, right?

In which Tim doesn't finish his soup, doesn't read a book, and doesn't ask for help.

In which Tim cries it out, eats some fruit, and bumps into an old friend.

Wherein Tim feels his age, loses his watch, and does not solve a single mystery.

In which Tim goes to breakfast, takes a nap, and receives some unexpected news.

In which Tim loses the battle, wins the war, and finds his family.
notes:
Here I go again

This story deals with themes of parental gaslighting. Tags will be added as the story progresses.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Jason enters stage train roof.

Thank you so much for all the wonderful comments! Seeing people so excited for this story made me excited for it, too.
This is unbeta'd, so if there's any grand inconsistencies or spelling errors please do not be shy
Thanks for reading!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Sorry this chapter is a little late!

Jason's references:
-Johnny Appleseed is an American historical-figure-turned-folktale who wandered the early US on foot and planted over a million apple trees in his lifetime.
-A Newbery Medal is awarded to outstanding children's literature, and often favors books that deal with profound childhood tragedy and the loss of innocence.
-Benny Alden is youngest of The Boxcar Children, a children's book series about child detectives. They are orphans, and spent their first adventure living by themselves in an abandoned boxcar, hence the name and why Jason brings it up.
-Dorothy Ann is the resident bookworm from the Magic School Bus series.
-Encyclopedia Brown is a boy detective.
I like the idea that Jason has no idea how old Tim is, and is skewing younger and younger in his references (bc Robins are born to quip) but Tim gets absolutely none of it bc he straight up doesn't read for fun and never has (at least not fiction).

Please let me know what you think, and thank you for sticking with me!

please enjoy.
I really hope you like it.
heads up for some internalized homophobia

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Railroading (n):
1. the action of traveling or working on the railroads.
2. the act of pressuring (someone) into doing something through coercion or by imposing unreal constraints. [informal]

This is a story about gaslighting.

Thank you so much for going on this journey with me. Here’s to making it home safely.

(This chapter is insanely long. I know. I’m sorry.)

Content Warning: Gaslighting

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

The response to this fic has been unbelievable. The subject matter is of an incredibly personal nature and I was honestly worried about how it would be recieved.
Reading all the wonderful comments from people who found comfort in this story meant the world to me. I cried reading some of them.
This is my third ever real fic, and my first proper multi-chapter story. The love and support I’ve received from the beautiful people in this fandom has absolutely taken my breath away.

Thank you, thank you, thank you SO MUCH for reading!
If you had fun, leave a comment! Let me know!

You can find me on tumblr at eggmacguffin!

summary:
Most people are born with a name tattooed on their inner wrist, in every written language imaginable; some people are born without. Dipper Pines is born with a small black triangle with a flesh colored dot at the center printed neatly onto his skin, standing out against its dark backdrop like an open eye.

He doesn't know what to make of this.
notes:
I'm a sucker for soulmate AUs, and I recently read a Tumblr entry considering takes on the genre in which the system is flawed; this is an attempt at presenting an imperfect soulmate AU. Hopefully I managed to keep everything organized, as well as doing the gradual build-up of the relationships justice. Concrit appreciated!

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

Okay. Here is The Plan As It Stands So Far:

1. I need to take a little break to write some original fiction.

summary:
"Without a word, Shinsou turned and left, taking long and fast steps straight to the bathroom, where he promptly locked himself in a stall. His knees buckled and his head hung over the porcelain toilet as he heaved, throwing up everything that he had eaten that day.

UA had muzzled Bakugou. No one seemed to care.

If it was okay to muzzle Bakugou, a high ranking hero student, then it was only a matter of time before they came for the dangerous gen-ed kid with a villain’s quirk.

He had to make sure that didn’t happen. He couldn’t let that happen."

author: ['JUBE514']
title: Loading and Aspect Ratio
fandoms: ['Batman - All Media Types', 'Superman - All Media Types', 'DC Extended Universe', 'DCU']
relationships: ['Clark Kent/Bruce Wayne', 'Dick Grayson & Bruce Wayne', 'Jason Todd & Bruce Wayne', 'Tim Drake & Bruce Wayne', 'Dick Grayson & Jason Todd', 'Tim Drake & Jason Todd']
characters: ['Clark Kent', 'Bruce Wayne', 'Dick Grayson', 'Jason Todd', 'Tim Drake', 'Alfred Pennyworth', 'Louis Lane', "Tim Drake's Parents", 'Diana (Wonder Woman)', 'Damian Wayne']
additional_tags: ['Wings', 'Wingfic', 'Adopted Sibling Relationship', 'Sibling Bonding', 'Identity Reveal', 'Secret Identity', 'Headcanon', 'this got out of hand', 'i wanted to write wingfic and failed to do that correctly', 'so now this is a monster', 'Fluff and Humor', 'Fluff and Angst', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Everyone Needs A Hug', 'Slow Burn', 'Alternate Universe', 'Good Sibling Jason Todd', 'Good Sibling Dick Grayson', 'Good Sibling Tim Drake', 'Alternate Universe - Everyone Lives/Nobody Dies', 'Alternate Universe - Wings', "But not like you're thinking"]
summary:
So, it didn’t start out like this.

 

Alfred would scoff at the statement, about how Bruce was trying to justify the whole situation to himself. It had started out as a simple design, black everything with black outlines and black hood. It got a little more intense as the world went on, got wind of his ghost on the streets, and became scared of The Bat . So Bruce got a little more creative with it, Alfred and him had a good laugh over the name, the scare, and Alfred had a vicious streak of humor that he had passed onto his ward-

 

So now the suit had a visible bat-theme, an insignia to drape in the shadows and to paint across the streets of Gotham.

 

It only took a year into the whole charade of heroism for Bruce to overhear a conversation between some goons- some low level thug hired by the Riddler this week- about nothing at all pertaining to what the hell the Riddler was doing in the sewers but instead:

“ The Batman can fly, you know, I’ve seen his wings.”

--

A world where nobody has wings, but people think they do, and that changes everything.
notes:
me, to myself: "im gonna write a wingfic about batman, hell yeah, under 15k lets go"

me, to myself: "im a fuckin idiot"

hello everyone, i've hiked the Appalachian trail, got home, became obsessed with DC and superbats, and now I'm trying my best to write things again. Made this monster and I hope you like it. I apologize for anybody who wanted straight up wingfic- i have failed both you and myself- but i wanted to write a 'fake' wingfic and i think i got close enough for goverment work so

also what up DC fandom i came, i read everything in four days, and i butchered canon. Sorry i ddin't include the batgirls this was already a monster you guys are damn lucky i included damian

author: ['Margo_Kim']
title: The Naming of Hobbits
relationships: ['Bilbo Baggins/Thorin Oakenshield', 'Bilbo Baggins & Thorin Oakenshield', 'Fíli & Kíli & Thorin Oakenshield', 'Dwalin & Thorin Oakenshield']
characters: ['Thorin Oakenshield', 'Bilbo Baggins', 'Dwalin', 'Kíli', 'Fíli', "Thorin's Company"]
additional_tags: ['Ambiguous Slash', 'Literally so ambiguous as to whether this is romantic or friendship', 'Romantic Friendship', 'Thorin POV', 'Awkwardness', 'Names', 'Quests', 'Post-Quest', 'Alternate Universe - Everyone Lives/Nobody Dies']
summary: There's a certain point where you can no longer ask someone what their name is. Thorin isn't sure exactly when that point is, but he knows that it's probably some time before the person in question saves your life. On the far side of the Misty Mountains, Thorin realizes that he never quite caught the first part of Mr. Baggins' name, and he finds that it's astonishingly harder to learn than he would have thought. Fili, Kili, and Dwalin are no help whatsoever.
notes:
So Ias and I were trying to figure out if Thorin ever calls Bilbo by his name before the scenes inside Erebor in DoS, and she joked that maybe Thorin literally did not know Bilbo's name until Balin told it to him. Nearly ten thousand words later, here we are.

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

Literally, how is nearly ten thousand words. I don't understand. I don't know how this happened to me. This was supposed to be 500 words max, and here we are.

At one point, I was going to write a sex scene between them where Bilbo would be like, "Oh Thorin," and Thorin would be like, "Oh....you," which probably would have toppled this over to the 15k word mark to get all the set up in there. Cutting that wasn't a length thing so much as some fics just demand to be weird ambiguous friendship love platonic romance things, but feel free to imagine that scene tacked on to the end of the Laketown section.

You can find more of me at my tumblr where, if you go there right after this is posted, I'll probably be complaining how I somehow didn't accomplish any schoolwork during this spring break. I hope my professors accept "I'm Bagginshield trash" as an excuse.

summary: Harry is treated as a Dark Lord after the war, and ultimately, despite all the efforts of his friends, thrown through the Veil. He wakes up in a world that seems to be what his own might have been without Voldemort. Harry makes a small, safe, quiet place for himself and vows never to be involved in politics. Yet somehow he still ends up attracting Tom Riddle’s attention.

This is one of my “Samhain to the Solstice” fics for this summer, fics posted between Halloween and the winter solstice. It should have three or four parts. The title comes from the saying, “Living well is the best revenge.”
