summary:
Tim is good at galas.

No, scratch that—Tim is great at galas. He’s been attending them ever since the age of three, when his parents first stuffed him into his little Gymboree tuxedo and gave him a stern lecture about ‘sitting quietly’ and ‘speaking when spoken to.’ He knows all the rules: what to wear, how to stand, when to smile, what to say, what not to say. He knows how to come across as polite and intelligent and charming, and on absolutely any other day, he would be rocking this.

---

Or, my take on a ‘Tim Joins the Family Early’ AU, told through a series of sleepovers—most of which are unplanned.

Featuring pre-teen Tim, Alive!Jason, and a whole lot of hurt/comfort.


(Cover art by the amazing Krow! )

Tim gets hurt at school. You'll never guess who comes to his aid :D

Birthday fluff + a sprinkling of hurt/comfort because I just can't help myself

In which Tim gets sick, but honestly, that's the least of his worries.

Tim puts his blood, sweat, and tears into making his parents’ return special. Literally.

Tim's parents are actually home for once.

Let's see if that helps.
notes:
Basically, I am an absolute sucker for 'Tim joins the family early' AUs—particularly the two linked above, which if you haven't read yet, you should rectify as soon as possible. They will soothe your soul in ways you didn't even realize it was aching. Seriously, top tier Good Dad!Bruce content right there.

This fic was definitely inspired by both of those stories, but I've done my best to put my own spin on things, so I'm really looking forward to adding another cake to the party! Or, really, more like five little cupcakes and some frosting.

Mega thanks to batmoniker for being a fantastic beta/cheerleader/plot-hole-filler. It's meant so much to have your support and this story wouldn't be the same without you <3

The NyQuil bit was taken directly from my friend's experience growing up, except her parents only did it for long car rides. They'd pile all the kids in the backseat, then give them each a shot of "Traveling Juice" before taking off. They'd sleep through the ride with minimal squabbling and wake up at their destination.

She just thought everyone did this with their kids. It wasn't until she was in college and got a cold and tried NyQuil for the "first time" that she realized what Traveling Juice was all along 😬
---

EDIT: I've gotten quite a few comments wondering how the Drakes' landline phone could have worked during a power outage, so I just wanted to take a second to address that!

According to How Stuff Works, it takes very little power to complete a phone call (only about 6-12 volts at about 30 milliamps). Depending on your phone service provider, it's quite common for them to have backup generators which can supply enough power through the underground copper telephone wires—separate from the main power line—to complete a call, provided that the telephone is a corded device. Wireless devices will not work without power (or, if they use a rechargeable battery, at least will not work for very long).

Now I certainly can't speak for every phone company, but this was true of the one that serviced my family growing up, so hopefully that shows it's at least plausible that the Drakes' phone could have worked during a power outage? So in this one instance, Janet does actually have a point and isn't just being a bitch (though arguments could certainly be made about how the heck she expects Tim to carry out her instructions while tethered via a 10 foot spiral cord to the kitchen wall)

EDIT #2 (because this line will truly be the death of me) : Okay, apparently all of the above information WAS true, up until the last decade or so when the majority of phone providers switched over to VoIP. This means you have to have an internet connection in order to place a landline call, which you can't have without power to the router, so modern landlines are useless in a power outage. Janet still believes what she believes from her own childhood experiences. Whether she's right and Tim could have used the hardwired phone, or whether Gotham has modernized their landline technology yet is up for interpretation. I could definitely see the city opting out, since their power grid goes down like every other week with the latest rogue attack lmao

[content warning: somewhat graphic description of injury/blood]

[Content warning: graphic descriptions of blood, injury, wounds, and serious illness. Like, this is probably the whumpiest thing I've ever written, y'all. Please proceed with caution.]

Well that's it folks! We made it!

I started writing this story back in JULY, and it's occupied almost every spare moment of my free time since then. Definitely the longest thing I've ever written, and it's bittersweet to see it end.

Thank you so so much to everyone who stuck with me, but especially to batmoniker who listened to hours upon hours of me ranting about this story over the past few months and helped me out of plot holes so deep I was ready to delete everything. Cannot even stress how much better this story is for your involvement, dude <3

--

If you're interested in reading a collection of bonus content for this fic (added scenes, alternative chapter endings, and explorations from other characters' POV), then feel free to check out this series: 5+1 (expansion pack). It answers such questions as "why was Dick hanging out at the Manor with a bullet wound?" and "how did Clark react when Bruce asked him to move a fallen tree?"

Or, if you're more interested in seeing where Tim's story continues from this point forward, then you can check out the sequels here: Settle Our Bones. Featuring such hits as "I wonder if that shrimp allergy ever comes up again" and "this boy isn’t allowed any organs"

Please let me know your thoughts in the comments! Your feedback absolutely makes my day!

author: ['Della19']
title: i blinked (and there you were)
fandoms: ['Kingsman: The Secret Service (2015)', 'Doctor Who', 'Doctor Who (2005)', 'Doctor Who & Related Fandoms']
characters: ['Gary "Eggsy" Unwin', 'Harry Hart', 'Merlin (Kingsman)', 'OC Lancelot', 'Arthur (Kingsman)', 'The Doctor (Doctor Who)']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Time Travel', 'Time Travel Fix-It', 'Weeping Angels - Freeform', 'Post-Canon', 'Pre-Canon', 'Really Minor Crossover', 'Doctor Who as a plot device']
summary:
The Weeping Angels, Eggsy reads on the stolen Torchwood intel. Aliens that pose as statues, and kill their victims by sending them back in time and feeding off their years not lived in the present. The politest psychopaths in the universe, a note reads, scrawled in what looks like a doctor’s chicken scratch on the edge of the page by someone who clearly had a perverse sense of humour. A one way trip, the report concludes; you get transported by the angels, and it’s the slow road back to the present for you.

Eggsy lays his head back on the wall, takes stock of his situation. He’s lost 30 years - three years more than his entire lifespan up ’til now - in the blink of an eye, and now he’s stuck here, in 1988. Three years before he’s even born. Arthur, the prick, is sure to be heading up the Kingsmen, and Merlin, if he’s even there would be…20, maybe. Fuck, so fucking young.

Shite, even Harry’d only be…

Alive, Eggsy thinks, and finds himself sitting down hard from where his knees can’t hold him. This is 1988, and Harry’s 23, and alive.

Suddenly, being stuck in 1988 doesn’t seem so bad.

Or, the one where love means changing the future. Harry/Eggsy, Time Travel Fix-It.
notes:
A/N: So, some quick Doctor Who notes for anyone not fluent in the show. The Weeping Angels are aliens that disguise themselves as statues and can only move when you aren’t looking at them, like turning your back or blinking. They kill you by sending you back in time and letting you live out your life in the past, and feed off the years you would have lived in the future. The Doctor is a centuries old time travelling alien who “regenerates” and shifts faces instead of dying. The Doctor mentioned in this fic is the 10th Doctor played by David Tennant and his companion is Rose, whom the 9th and 10th Doctors were in love with. They had a bit of a tragic love story that ended kind of happily. Torchwood was an agency started by Queen Victoria to monitor alien activity (The Doctor, specifically) and UNIT is also an agency that deals with aliens in the Doctor Who universe. Everything Eggsy remembers happening are things alien related that happened to London in Doctor Who during his lifetime that he thus would have remembered. And that’s all you need to know about Doctor Who for this fic, though it is a great show and I do recommend it to anyone who likes sci-fi!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

A/N: So yeah, time travel shenanigans. This ship is like a black hole of AUs, and I am getting sucked into it hard. The Doctor Who stuff is just contained to this chapter - it’s more a plot device than a true crossover. But, to come in part 2 - pining!Eggsy thinking Harry is straight, pining!Harry thinking Eggsy is with Lancelot, resolution and bendy young people sex, and then some good old fix it fun with Gazelle and Lee Unwin. You’ll also probably note that I’m writing Eggsy differently than I normally do - this is deliberate, as I’m trying to play up that whole Eggsy is the mature agent one and Harry is the younger, less sure one. And yes, his fake name is Ward because that's Julia Robert's character's last name in Pretty Woman, because I do intend to beat that one reference into the ground. Again, tumblr is a horrible place full of enablers with prompts, and I am weak. Enjoy as always, and comments feed the muse.

Disclaimer: I still don't own it.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

A/N: So pleased people are enjoying this little AU! I originally was going to have this chapter and the next one be one chapter, but this got longer than expected, and real life demanded more time, so I figured I try to get this part out at least. The downside is that it’s going to be a good while before I have time to write again - I’ve got another super fun medical school exam coming up, and then an actually super fun trip to Europe for 9 days (wheeee!) after that, so we’re looking at three weeks at the shortest before the final part is up, and my apologies for that. But, it’ll have Lee, Gazelle and it will be fix-it fluffy, so at least there is that! Also, yeah, if you find you have developed diabetes after reading this, I take no legal responsibility ;) So, as always enjoy, and comments feed the muse.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

A/N: So yeah, the delay on this is kind of inexcusable, but I do sort of have valid reason in the form of a health crisis where one of the three possible diagnosis they were going to give me for what I had was cancer, and that sort of...wasn’t conductive to creativity. I don’t have cancer, thank goodness, though I do have a chronic illness that I’m starting to be able to manage now, which isn’t exactly ideal, but a lot better than the alternative!! So yeah, that was the state of my life the last few months, and just add med school and you get very little writing done! But I feel a bit better, and I’m finally on my break, so I’m going to try and get my unfinished fics done at least, and a million thank you’s and apologies for the wait and for everyone who stuck around with this fic for much longer than I had intended!

Also I got a lot of comments about people worried this chapter was going to hurt, and I have to ask; what part of my ridiculous fix-it fervour for this pairing made you think that? ;) Seriously, the movie is angst enough for this pairing - fix-it is for fluff, as I always say, and I hope I’ve delivered on that in this fic :) So, as always comments make the world go round, and I hope you enjoyed the fic!

title: The Truth Always Comes to Light

additional_tags: ['Truth Spells', "Merlin's Magic Revealed (Merlin)", 'Love Confessions', 'Stupidity', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Happy Ending', 'Fluff and Angst', 'Good Morgana (Merlin)', 'mentioned in passing - Freeform', 'Gwaine Being Gwaine (Merlin)', 'Lancelot (Merlin) Lives', 'Alternate Universe - Everyone Lives/Nobody Dies']
summary:
“What did you do now Merlin?”

“Got cursed.”

Merlin slumped into the room and fell onto the bench of the table across from Gaius, laying his head dramatically on a book of something or other Arthur didn’t bother to look too closely at.

“Cursed.” Gaius echoed, unimpressed.

“Cursed.” Merlin sighed back, like some kind of weepy maiden.

“He can’t lie,” Arthur supplied, walking further into the room and standing behind Merlin, pushing his head off the book roughly. Merlin squawked and glared at him before shaking his head and turning back to Gaius.

"It gets worse."

summary:
Wade scoffs, shaking his head and elbowing Peter in the side. “Sure,” he says, sarcastic. “That’s why your spidey-sense doesn’t see me.”

Peter’s on the verge of laughing, wanting to join Wade in his amusement, but he freezes. His entire body goes still. He finds himself staring at a roof three buildings over, not even looking at anything. Two blocks away, a car alarm finally shuts off.

“I never told you that,” Peter says, the realization startling him.

Or: Peter's starting to realize just how much Wade knows about him.

additional_tags: ['Humor', 'Crack', "One For All Quirk Haunted by Past One For All Users' Ghosts (My Hero Academia)", 'Sensei | All For One is Midoriya Hisashi', 'Izuku Midoriya is very confused', 'there are incredible fics which portray ofa as a haunted quirk and the previous users as like', 'ominous voices and figures', 'this', 'is not such a fic', 'This is crack', 'the vestiges are just chilling together', "they're all dumbasses your honor", 'long live the undead peanut gallery', 'Sentient One For All Quirk (My Hero Academia)']
summary:
“I do sympathize with Ninth. I have a shellfish allergy too.” Yoichi confided.
“So do I actually.” Banjo said.
“Me too.”
“Me too.”
The last ones to add on were Nana and En, sounding as perplexed as all of them felt.
Everyone looked at Hikage.
“Oh I never had shellfish.”
“How.”
“Acquiring shellfish was not high on my list of priorities at the time.” Hikage said stiffly.
Banjo raised an eyebrow. “What was on your list of priorities then?”
“Strengthening One for All and not dying at the hands of All for One?”
“Oh right, I forgot about that.”
Hikage gave him an incredulous look. “How-”

“Hey Nana.” Yoichi said conversationally. “Do you happen to know if Eighth has a shellfish allergy?”

 

(Quirks aren't the only thing One for All is stockpiling and passing down.)
notes:
I read and absolutely adored Danger First by Marsalias and especially the vestiges' dynamic in it and this was born.

summary:
Midoriya Izuku is quirkless. This is a fact.

Midoriya Izuku is worthless? That's a shitty ass opinion.

Or:

Midoriya Izuku becomes the HPSC President out of pure spite and ends up changing it for the better.

series: Part 1 of Superbros!
summary: In which Tony Stark went to boarding school with Bruce Wayne, and the road to becoming a superhero is not smooth.
notes:
This plays extremely fast and loose with chronology, canon, whatever. There are elements of Batman Begins, Dark Knight, and the Iron Man movies, but also has stuff from the comics and then randomly converges at some amalgam of the Avengers movie and the Justice League I-have-no-idea-what. There is a real sequence of events that makes sense--I made a timeline! But it's pretty extravagantly not accurate to any particular canon, and time between major events is dilated/contracted as needed to get said events to line up in a meaningful and fairly reasonable way. I claim artistic license?

Also, if it's unbearably confusing out of order, let me know. I have an in order version too, with dates and stuff.

Lastly, this is in part the result of an accumulation of silly Tumblr items.

additional_tags: ['Dubious Consent', 'Isekai', 'vine sex', 'Aphrodisiacs', 'Suicide mentions', 'Bottom Kim Dokja', 'Top Yoo Joonghyuk', 'WOS is a Romance Novel', 'Ludicrous Sexual Situations', "Very Brief YJH/Woman but Trust Me it's Just For Context", "The Universe is Yoo Joonghyuk's Wingman", 'Sacrificing Yourself is Romantic', 'Anal Sex', 'Blow Jobs', 'and there was only one bed', 'Tls123 spoilers']
series: Part 1 of one knight stand
summary:
"You could just let me die," Kim Dokja says, weakly. Yoo Joonghyuk squeezes his hip, almost hard enough to hurt.

Yoo Joonghyuk scowls. "This is a terrible time for jokes, Kim Dokja."

He can't believe this is really happening to him. Kim Dokja has been poisoned by a random snake attack. In the middle of the forest. With no healers and no antidote in sight. Yoo Joonghyuk has to suck the poison out.

Han Sooyoung, you brat.

-

Kim Dokja wakes up to find that he's been isekai’d into one of Han Sooyoung's secret, smutty web novels.

He's not sure what's more at risk: his life or his virtue.

Truthfully, Kim Dokja should have expected it.

Even if his heart is closed off to romantic attachments, Yoo Joonghyuk has the libido befitting an erotic novel stallion. Kim Dokja is surprised that he falls under the category of people Yoo Joonghyuk would be okay with fooling around with. Maybe it’s a situation where Yoo Joonghyuk is content to lay with any warm and willing body?

They say that desperate times call for desperate measures, after all.

And, as per usual, there is only one bed.

summary:
“And everyone is so old,” Tubbo complains. Somehow, without them knowing about it, Tubbo’s managed to swipe a waffle and is chewing on it happily. Sapnap stifles a laugh. “Well, not everyone, I guess- the kid in our room is our age, I think. He might be younger.”

Wilbur perks up. “Does he ice skate?”

“Yeah, he does. He’s got these sick skates and everything.” Tubbo explains. “He’s quiet though. We tried talking to him, but…”

“But?”

Tubbo shrugs. "He's quiet. He doesn't talk much. I guess he's busy."

or, Tommy's made it to the Olympics for figure skating- he's the youngest contestant on the ice and he's the favor for the gold. He's supposed to be living the dream. So why is he still so unhappy? And why do all these hockey players and snowboarders care so much about him?

summary:
Tony is still a consultant, and between SI, the team and SHIELD he's overworked and exhausted. That's okay.

He and Steve have been having sex for weeks but that's all it is, just sex, and Tony wants more but he'll never get it and that's okay. Really.

What's not okay is the fact that Howard Stark has somehow appeared in the future and is the same as always.

This is definitely going to fuck up his schedule.
notes:
I like the trope where Tony thinks he's a consultant and is massively overworked because of it, and then the others find out about it. But I wanted to switch it up a bit and add in a) a shaky relationship/hate sex with Steve and b) Howard because why not. I'm really stressed right now so this wasn't written as quickly as I wanted, and it's probably not as good as I thought it would be either... but there's so much Tony hate going in the fandom right now I had to finish it.

author: ['morian']
title: separating salt from water
characters: ['Blackbeard | Edward Teach', 'Stede Bonnet', 'Lucius Spriggs', 'Roach (Our Flag Means Death)']
additional_tags: ['homoerotic shark hunting', 'pre-finale', 'Becalming', 'thirst as a metaphor for love', 'ed keeps taking off his shirt to seduce stede and it’s really really working']
summary:
"Hey." Ed reaches across because it's the only thing that feels right. He grasps Stede's wrist and smoothes the pad of his thumb across his knuckles. Stede stops fiddling with his ring and looks up at him, wide-eyed. "This isn't Captain shit. This is God shit. Are you God?"

The room is blank with silence.

Gently, Ed repeats, "Are you God, Stede?"

Stede's voice is thin and high when he answers, "I'm not God."

"And is God here, in this room?"

Comically, Stede looks around like he might find God perched on the edge of his desk, or pulling books from his shelves to examine the spines.

"He's not," Stede concedes.

"That's right, mate. Stupid bugger doesn't associate himself with pirates."

 

Or: The Revenge has been becalmed for six days. Ed has bigger things to worry about, like sharks and being in love.
notes:
this is set after ep 8 but in a world where the english didn't happen. i'm not taking into account the finale because i started it before eps 9 and 10 came out (also because it hurt my fee-fees)

title is from 'salt' by salma deera

“in front of my mother and my sisters, i pretend love is cheap and vulgar. i act like it’s a sin– i pretend that love is for women on a dark path. but at night i dream of a love so heavy it makes my spine throb– i dream up a lover who makes love like he is separating salt from water.”

 

this has been translated into 中文-普通话 國語 / mandarin chinese by kisa1986!

Thanks for all the awesome comments y'all! I appreciate them so much.

Here's the next chapter. Third part is written but needs a little editing love :) hoping to get that out ASAP.

For this next part, I think it's 100 times funnier if you remember that:
a) the boys are trying to protect Batman himself from death threats & kidnapping attempts, and are really only there for plausible deniability
b) Clark is absolutely furious with Bruce's lack of security and can't do shit about it, because Superman doesn't know Bruce Wayne, and Bruce wants to keep it that way
c) only Bruce and Clark know this

Last chapter! Thanks for sticking with it, folks. Hoping to maybe do more with this 'verse soon.

Another fun reminder:
a) Clark can hear everything they're saying outside the massage room
b) Bruce can't
c) none of what they said really registers with him until he's home later

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

That’s all for now!

Liked it? Leave me a comment and let me know what you thought :)

In a world where Midoriya Izuku does only one thing differently at the mall, he ends up being hit with a Quirk that leaves him in his seven year old body with no memories.

What happens when Shigaraki Tomura finds that Midoriya Izuku at the mall?

The League adopts a seven year old, duh.
notes:
I had this idea because, in canon, Shigaraki makes so many speeches that make genuine sense. At the USJ he's saying violence only breeds violence, and he wants the world to see that. author: ['orphan_account']
title: Devil In The Details
characters: ['Matt Murdock', 'Franklin "Foggy" Nelson', 'Karen Page', 'Claire Temple', 'Marci Stahl']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Soulmates', 'Soulmate-Identifying Marks', 'Fluff', 'Angst', 'Mutual Pining', 'Dorks in Love', 'Secret Identities Are Not Conducive To Romance']
summary: Franklin Philip Nelson is born with a bright smile and the word Devil burned over his heart.
notes:
(See the end of the work for notes.)

Foggy’s middle name is known in canon to start with ‘P’, but no one knows what it is. I chose Philip, partly it’s a fun name and partly because of Saint Philip Neri. St. Philip is known as the patron saint of joy, humor, and Special Forces. Matt most definitely counts as a special force.

 

Also, Matt gets pretty active at the end of this story. He should probably be lying completely still and knocked out on pain meds, but he's Matt Effing Murdock and he can do what he wants. He seems pretty good at grinning and bearing it anyway, and Foggy offers a lot of grinning potential. And I feel like Matt knows how to move carefully so that he doesn't hurt himself more (he's had a lot of practice), and Foggy will probably be mother henning him the whole time, no matter how into it he gets. But if that bothers you (which I would totally understand), you can either: pretend the end takes place after a time skip, where Matt's healed; or, pretend Matt has a healing factor. I sort of think he does, sometimes.

 

Also also, Matt’s Mark is a tramp stamp. I don’t know why this amused me so much, but it really, really did.

title: They Get A Sorry But I Get A Hate Crime
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
fandoms: ['僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia']
relationships: ['Midoriya Izuku/Shinsou Hitoshi', 'Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead/Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic']
additional_tags: ['Midoriya Izuku Has a Healing Quirk', 'Midoriya Izuku is a Little Shit', 'Midoriya Izuku Has a Quirk', 'Vigilante Midoriya Izuku', 'Insomniac Shinsou Hitoshi', 'Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead Training Shinsou Hitoshi', 'Shinsou Hitoshi is a Little Shit', 'Shinsou Hitoshi is a Dork', 'Midoriya Izuku is a Ray of Sunshine', 'Healer Midoriya Izuku', 'Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead is So Done', 'Parental Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead', 'Established Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead/Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic', 'Underground Healer Midoriya']
series: Part 5 of The Multiverse's Centered On Midoriya
summary:
Healing quirks are uncommon. Especially the kinds that are powerful enough for the rough style of life you find in either the underground or heroic’s industry. Recovery girl for example, is a one in a million kind of person. Her quirk is a godsend for those who constantly face life-threatening dangers. The HPSC makes it a point to prioritize all healing quirks, snatching up the one’s strong enough or fast tracking those the weaker ones you find in the high end hero wards and hospitals. Healer’s who stick to the underground are rare. After all, why spend time in the shitty and violent underground when you could be paid top dollar at a nice hospital and get the HPSC approved security to keep you safe?

So there is only one explicitly stated rule in the underground:

Keep Your Hands Off The Healer.

Midoriya Izuku was born with a healing quirk, a rather unusual one he likes to call "No Pain, No Gain", so what happens if he decides to stick to the shadows instead of the light with this kind of quirk? How will this affect the story line?

A simple oneshot I wrote in a single night, enjoy :)
notes:
(See the end of the work for notes.)

For those of you who come across tiktok recommendations of my works, please let it be forewarned that- No, CaptainCoffussy isn’t some random person acting like me, and yes my name is CaptainCoffussy on tiktok dont @ me.

characters: ['Steve Harrington', 'Eddie Munson', 'Robin Buckley', 'Vickie (Stranger Things)', 'Dustin Henderson', 'Mike Wheeler', 'Eleven | Jane Hopper', 'Lucas Sinclair', 'Maxine "Max" Mayfield', 'Argyle (Stranger Things)', 'Jonathan Byers', 'Nancy Wheeler', 'Will Byers']
additional_tags: ['Stranger Things Spoilers', 'Post-Stranger Things 4', 'Vecna is dead', "Volume 2 isn't out yet so this is probably canon divergence", 'this is assuming everyone lived', 'Frenemies', 'frenemies to lovers', 'Drinking', 'Underage Drinking', 'Recreational Drug Use', 'we die like bob', 'Slow Burn', 'Mostly not beta read', 'all ships besides steve/eddie are background', 'Gay Eddie Munson', 'Bisexual Steve Harrington', "LMAOO so yeah i'd say this isn't vol2 compliant", 'Everybody Lives']
summary: Vecna is dead. It's the summer after the party's freshman year. Steve Harrington spends it in the Family Video Store, and Eddie Munson is spending post-graduate life bothering him. And maybe Steve isn't as bothered as he used to be.
notes:
note: i'm notorious for not finishing fics, so no promises about this one.

btw, if the duffer brothers kill either of my boys i will be living in this universe i created and there's nothing anyone can do to stop me

btw wanted to say thank u to the person who reminded me Steve actually did admit to smoking weed in season 3! for the purposes of the story we're gonna pretend he didn't say that lmao, and that this is his first time.

also thank u for all the kind comments! if i don't respond know that i still read them all and appreciate every one! and even if ur not commenting, i appreciate u taking the time to read!

also, also-- i've written essentially all of this to basically the same Wallows EP on repeat (except for the first chapter, which i wrote to my oldie's playlist lol.) Wallows obviously isn't a band from the 80's, but their Remote EP really captures the ~vibes~ of this fic. or at least, it does to me, and maybe u! figured i'd throw it out there.

anyway, hope u enjoy! little bit longer of a chapter than usual :)

heyyy. so first off, i know the 'see something say something' campaign didn't happen until 2001, but lets pretend it existed before then in this universe, bc it was funny-ish and i said so.

secondly, i have good news and bad news. the good news? this will be my first ever finished fic! the bad news? There's only two more chapters left, and one is an epilogue. im actually rlly sad to be drawing this fic to a close, i feel like i could write in it forever, but i love this fic a lot and wanna do it the justice of giving it a proper ending. as of right now, and maybe im biased bc it's my first ever finished fic, it's my favorite fic ever written, and im honestly not sure if i'll do better than this. but thats ok! to create something that not only i enjoy so much, but that a lot of yall did too is something pretty spectacular!

thirdly, i have the inkling of an idea for another steddie fic. probably shorter than this, similar concept but not set in the same universe as this fic. it would be from eddie's pov, and while their dynamic would be similar, it would be tweaked just a bit to explore different sides of their characters that i didn't really lean into in this one. (ie, eddie's shyer side, and steve's more confident jock one.) and there would probably be more angst. honestly this is the first fic i've written with barely-- if any-- angst.
so if that sounds like somethin ur interested in, keep an eye out after this fic is done :D

thank u again for all the wonderful comments and support! as of right now we're at roughly 800 kudos with a bit over 6000 hits, which is absolutely insane to think that many people laid eyes on something i made-- and a good amount liked it! thats crazy, even tho it might not be a lot to some ppl, actually trying to fathom that many ppl reading something i wrote is... practically not possible haha. so thank u again!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

this was the final chapter, but don't worry! there's an epilogue coming probably tomorrow. it will likely be a little shorter than the other chapters, however.

i'll say more on the actual final update on this fic, but for now, thank yall so much for supporting, no matter what way u did! the day of posting this we broke a little over a thousand kudos, and thats pretty wild! and ofc, thank u all for the super nice comments, yall are too sweet. seriously, some of u really supersized my ego haha. even if i didn't respond i read all of them, and they meant a lot!
i hope u enjoyed the last full length update!

main edit: the angsty Eddie POV fic is out btw! it's called 'Keep it Steady, Eddie.' Once more for clarification; it is NOT a continuation of this fic, or an alternate POV to this fic

little edit: i've gotten a few ppl asking if they can draw fanart so i just wanted to say absolutely! pls give credit to the fic if u dont mind, but other than that draw to ur hearts content! and if ur comfortable, drop a comment with where to find it so I-- and anyone else who enjoyed the fic-- can see it! i'd love to see what yall come up with :D

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

and that's the end! thank yall so much for all of your support and sharing your thoughts on the story so far. i wrote the first few chapters of this as a character study just to see if i could match their vibes, and didn't think i was gonna post it at all. but im so glad i did! yall have made writing this story somethin really special, & i cant thank you enough!

if you're interested in a slightly angsty eddie-pov fic, i'll likely be starting it soon after this one. to be clear: it wont be a continuation of this fic, and will be completely unconnected to this one. a fresh start so i can explore different sides of their characters, basically.
but until then, i hope you enjoyed this fic, and a little epilogue where we got some wholesome group-dynamic content.
thanks again :) <3

author: ['gr0gu']
title: Turn Your Back on Mother Nature
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
characters: ['Steve Harrington', 'Eddie Munson', 'Robin Buckley']
additional_tags: ['Canon Compliant', 'Period-Typical Homophobia', 'Sharing a Bed', 'Saving the World', 'Steve Harrington Being an Idiot', "the three 'S'es", 'Internalized Homophobia', 'Gay Eddie Munson', 'Drinking and Smoking', 'Bisexual Steve Harrington', 'Tending to Wounds', 'Drunken Confessions', 'Coming Out', 'Fluff', 'Sleepy Cuddles', 'Making Out', 'Sexual Identity', 'Sharing Clothes', 'all the love languages', 'Happy Ending', 'Bonus Chapter', 'D&D', 'Love Confessions', 'First Time', 'giggly sex', 'Friends to Lovers', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Food as a Metaphor for Love', 'Getting Together', 'Fix-It']
summary:
It wasn't supposed to go like this.

Steve was supposed to work with Robin at the Family Video, flirt with the many many girls who came to browse the expansive selection of VHSes, go on some dates, and hopefully find The One.

It was supposed to be a notably upside-down free year.

And, hey, for what it's worth? He wasn't supposed to be pinned down on a mattress by Eddie Munson either.

And he certainly wasn't supposed to be enjoying it.

But that's getting a bit ahead of things…

Something in Steve shifts at this. The protective part of his personality gets flipped on like a switch and his mind starts racing to find a solution. He remembers the sleepless nights he had after his first encounter, and how the only reason he started to be able to sleep again was to go to where things had happened one-by-one. To confirm to himself that it was gone. And sure, swimming to the bottom of Lover’s Lake isn’t very plausible, but Steve has another idea.

“Do you trust me?” Steve asks. Eddie nods. “Then follow me.”

"Steve… are you alright?" She asks, concern lacing her voice. He must look worse than he thought. There is a long pause as she makes her way behind the desk to sit in the chair next to him. She’s frowning and giving him a look that she usually reserves for serious moments.

He takes a stuttering deep breath, "I don't know - I think I'm having, like, a crisis or something."

“What was that?” Dustin asks. He’s got this look on his face, something like giddy incredulity. He puts his fork back down into the bowl.

“I dunno what you’re talking about,” Steve brushes off. He sits back down on the couch and tries to bite back any expression that would give him away.

“I think he’s talking about the fact that Eddie just kissed you,” Lucas adds. Steve coughs, caught off guard.

“Yeah,” Dustin confirms, “that,” he agrees.
notes:
Steve Harrington and Eddie Munson do something so evil to my queer rural small town America brain. Happy Pride!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

See you soon with the next update !

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Hello my darling doves! Thank you for sticking with me and I hope you enjoy this final chapter. I'm working on a new fic that should be up in a few days that I'm really excited for. It's a bit more of a character study of both Eddie and Steve, which is something I really enjoy writing. I hope you'll be looking forward to it.

Come yell at me on tumblr if you'd like!

author: ['ras_elased']

characters: ['Steve Rogers', 'Tony Stark', 'Pepper Potts', 'Bruce Banner', 'Clint Barton', 'Nick Fury', 'Thor (Marvel)', 'Natasha Romanov']
summary: Tony has a point system for the times he can get Steve to be less than perfect.
notes:
At various points, this fic was also titled: "The Corruption of Captain America by Tony Stark", "Tony's Superpower Is Being An Asshole", "Tony Stark Just Needs A Hug Dammit", "Steve Is Stubborn And Will Make Tony His BFF If It's The Last Thing He Does", and "I Accidentally A Cap Character Study via Tonyfeels". I feel like that collection of titles gives you an idea of the degeneration of this thing, plot-wise, and also a much better summary of this fic than the actual summary. [This fic influenced/inspired by: 1) marielikestodraw's art which I swear is like 50% of the reason I'm in this fandom, 2) this set of gifs of Pepper and Tony which I somehow convinced myself was an actual canon scene in Avengers, and thus became the jumping off point for this entire fic, 3) scenes from the Avengers trailers, and 4) NCIS sexual harassment training.] Plot wise, this fic ended up going is a whole different direction than I intended, and also ended up being a hell of a lot less angsty than I envisioned. It's just so hard to write angst when I'm having THIS MUCH FUN playing with my shiny new toys. On that note: Hello glorious new fandom! I brought you a present! ♥

Acknowledgements: Huge thanks to my betas, zephre and pyrrhical who busted their asses getting this beta'd for me on short notice so I could post before it inevitably gets Jossed next week. You guys are amazing! Any remaining mistakes are mine and probably the result of rushing to post.

summary:
“Well, I didn’t think you were a good dude until about two days ago.” Eddie’s still watching Steve, studying the flutter of his eyelashes, the casual way his head turns. Noting the intensity in Steve’s eyes as they lock with Eddie’s.
“And now?”
“And now you’re lying in my bed listening to me spill my deepest, darkest secrets,” Eddie finishes.

***

Steve's wounds are infected. Eddie's the only one who knows how to heal him. Add into the equation a bottle of strong vodka, subtract Steve's shirt, and Eddie's lips get a bit too loose for his own liking. (Or, Eddie gets a tragic backstory and flirts with Steve. Steve flirts back.)
notes:
Happy Pride Month besties! Title's a reference to Phoebe Bridgers, and kinda-sorta the Sex Pistols. During this, keep your eyes peeled for a lil It by Stephen King reference, and those handcuffs on Eddie's wall.

Finally a small warning before we begin: there are mentions of the AIDS crisis - these are rather abstract, and have little to no relationship with queerness in the story. Still, though, I understand that this topic is heavy and I want you to know that it's touched on.

little historical note - ACT UP (AIDS Coalition to Unleash Power) was a huge player in turning the tide of the AIDS crisis. they advocated for increased research and access to approved medicine, as well as changes to legislation and public policies to support people with aids. (they also still exist!) at the time this fic technically takes place, ACT UP had yet to be founded. that being said, i've heard a lot of people finding that there's very little discussion about and education on ACT UP in younger queer circles, so i wanted to include the detail of eddie's handmade patch for a little callback. please ignore my blatant disrespect for timelines.

“Twenty-Seven Club, baby.”

author: ['soidade']
title: Are You Flagging?
characters: ['Steve Harrington', 'Eddie Munson', 'Robin Buckley', 'Nancy Wheeler', 'Will Byers', 'Mike Wheeler', 'Dustin Henderson', 'Argyle (Stranger Things)', 'basically everyone else in the background']
additional_tags: ['Romance', 'Fluff and Angst', 'BDSM', 'Light BDSM', 'Friends to Lovers', 'Friends With Benefits', 'idiots to lovers', 'Bisexual Steve Harrington', 'Bisexual Disaster Steve Harrington', 'Gay Eddie Munson', 'Handkerchief Code', 'Flagging', 'Period-Typical Homophobia', 'Internalized Homophobia', 'Past Child Abuse']
summary:
“Look, I’m just asking, okay? Not– I don't mean anything by it. But, uh.” His eyes darted back and forth, then he leaned in close to Steve. Steve had gotten used to that, kind of. The guy had no concept of personal space. “Are you flagging?” Eddie finally finished.

Steve shook his head slowly, eyes narrowed. He had no idea what that meant. He had no answer. “What?”

Eddie leaned away from Steve, facing forward again and nodding. “Okay, got it. That answers my question. Carry on.”

-------------------------------------------------

A (mostly) innocent question leads Steve Harrington on a journey of self-discovery, friendship, sex, and romance.

I am done! Daily updates will resume until I have posted everything. I messed with this chapter for a long time, to the point that I have no idea whether or not it is any good. I hope you enjoy it!
notes:
Hello...Welcome. This is what happened when an interesting character detail that I observed turned into a funny idea for a scene, and then that snowballed into basically a full-blown romance novel. It's not finished yet, but it's sitting at 25k words currently, so your comments are the sustenance that will give me the strength to complete it, preferably before Season 4 Volume 2 comes out and ruins it. Sex scenes will be in this, but I make no promises about them being any good. I only promise that they will contain jokes. I hope you enjoy!

Also, I am coming back to add to this later.. Please come talk to me on tumblr! @ao3soidade

subbaculture on tumblr created a wonderful book cover for this fic, which I am inserting below so you can enjoy the experience of seeing the cover before reading. Thank you subbaculture!

Thank you, everyone, for all the lovely comments! I am almost done with the fic now, so I'm hoping I'll be able to post one chapter per day until it's finished. Your comments are keeping my skin clear, my dog fed, my crops flourishing, etc, etc. I love you all.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Please look up the cover of Accept’s Balls to the Wall. The Accept pin on Eddie’s vest is one of the pieces of evidence on my mental “Eddie is Gay” conspiracy theory bulletin board, along with the black bandana, the handcuffs in his room, and various other things. I have connected the dots.

Hi, hello. So. Bad news first, always: I am having some computer trouble. I'm currently posting this at work, but I am pushing the limits of what I could be caught posting and not lose my job. The next chapter would DEFINITELY get me fired (this is actually the good news.) Anyway, I have everything in google drive, so the worst case scenario would be that I am unable to post as early in the day as I have been. So if you don't spot the update in the morning tomorrow, don't worry! It is still coming; it just might have to be in the evening, after work, when I can borrow someone's computer.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

For anyone not familiar, the movie they watched is Pink Flamingos. It’s an interesting experience. The fact that they were still in the mood to make out after watching it is a testament to their attraction to each other.

My computer...she is struggling. But here I am. For you. I am very nervous about posting this, so please be kind and gentle to me. Remember that I never promised that the sex scenes in this would be hot, only that they would have jokes. Personally, I think I delivered on that part at least.

Thank you again for all the comments, and all the support on the last chapter! I have definitely been nervous about posting this in general, but especially that last one (and future ones such as chapter...10? Just to tease you all a bit.) Everyone's support has assuaged some of that anxiety and also made me so, so happy. I hope you like this chapter as well! It was one of my favorites to write.

Hi all! I have been overwhelmed (in the best of ways) by the response to this fic. Thank you so much for all of your comments. I am replying to as many as I can, but there are definitely some slipping through the cracks. I also might have accidentally replied to some multiple times because I forgot that I already replied to them. Oops!

Quick update on my progress with this fic: It is complete through chapter 11. All of the other chapters that I have planned are partially written. So, I will definitely be finishing this, but the updates might slow down a bit after chapter 11. I will spend some time this weekend trying to get myself caught up so that I am still able to post every day, but it might be a few more days between updates after Chapter 11. Currently I have 15 chapters and a short epilogue planned, but I may end up splitting them in different ways or adding things. I don't think it will be less than that.

Thank you again for your comments and love!

It's way too early in the morning for me to be posting content like this. I am blushing. I hope you enjoy, whatever your time zone.

There is a mention of Indianapolis in this chapter. I have no idea how far it is from Hawkins because Hawkins is not real and there is no consensus on what part of Indiana it’s in. Let’s just assume it’s kind of out of the way but not crazy far. It isn’t that important, honestly.

I struggled so hard to give Vickie a personality. I am sorry she’s so bland; the writers really gave me NOTHING to work with. Robin is always a joy to write though, so I hope you like the chapter! Thanks for reading!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

So, this is the last chapter I am finished with. All other chapters are partially written, and I have basically every scene planned, so don't worry. This WILL be finished. I am just at the end of my daily posting streak. I am also determined to get this finished and posted before Vol. 2 comes out and ruins it...

Would you all be interested in reading more related to this fic, or unrelated Steddie stuff, even if Vol 2 puts all of it firmly in the AU category? I have some ideas of what I might want to write next. I will definitely need a break after finishing this one, but we probably have at least 2 years until Season 5 comes out, so we will need something to entertain us in the meantime! Let me know what you think!

Just wanted to give a warning that this chapter will include discussions of past child abuse and trauma. Take care of yourselves!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

It’s sadboy hours. Do you need some period-appropriate music to cry to? Might I suggest:
Temptation - New Order (Steve’s choice)
Losing More Than You’ve Ever Had - Accept (Eddie’s choice)
Damaged Goods - Gang of Four (My choice)
P.S. Please trust me. <3

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Thank you all so much for reading! We are officially at the end of the line! I'm sorry the last chapter is such a short one, but I didn't want to pad it out just for the sake of length. I feel like I said what I wanted to say, and here we are at the end! Tomorrow I'm going to be posting a very brief epilogue, which is just a short scene that popped into my head that I had to put out there. Thanks to everyone for your support, your lovely comments, and your continued readership! I love you all!

This is just a very brief scene that popped into my head, taking place some indeterminate amount of months in the future. If I decide to write a sequel to this fic, I reserve the right to retcon this epilogue out of existence.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Thank you so much for reading. I am so incredibly grateful to everyone who has read and commented on this! I can’t believe how much attention it has gotten and I’m so glad that so many people enjoyed it. I have some thoughts about possibly writing something else in this universe. The idea I have in mind would be starting shortly after this one ends (after chapter 16, hence possibly scrapping the epilogue,) but from Eddie’s perspective this time. I have not fleshed the idea out enough to actually commit to writing it, but I hope I'll be able to! I also have other fic ideas, and some non-fanfic writing projects I want to devote some time to, so I’m not sure when I will be posting something next! I am anticipating Volume 2 of Season 4 will break my heart, so I might need some time to recover from that! Thanks again, everyone. I’ll see you in the next one!

Edited to add on 7/20/22: Yes, volume 2 did break my heart but it won't stop me from writing more Steddie. Also, I made a tumblr specifically for talking about my fanfic and related topics, so please go follow me! ao3soidade.tumblr.com

summary:
Steve was never comfortable with others taking care of him. It was why he'd fallen so easily into the babysitter role: he'd held himself together all his life, he'd never had anyone else to do it for him.
When Steve, Robin, Eddie, and Nancy make it out of the Upside Down, Steve keeps his bandages wrapped tight and doesn't let anyone see, insisting he's fine, he's fine, he's always fine. He checks on Nancy, makes sure the kids have a place to sleep, and tries to get away to deal with his wounds on his own.
But his stubbornness won't stop the Party from helping him when he needs it.

or
I just need content of everyone loving and caring for Steve okay??

The next morning, the Party has to deal with everything they'd ignored the night before.
notes: Might make this a series of one shots capturing Steve and Eddie development, and just Steve development in general because I love him

title: In this Town We Call Home
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
relationships: ['Tim Drake & Jason Todd', 'Tim Drake & Bruce Wayne']
characters: ['Tim Drake', 'Jason Todd', 'Bruce Wayne', 'Dick Grayson', 'Janet Drake', 'Jack Drake']
additional_tags: ['Canon Divergence - Tim Drake Joins the Batfamily Earlier', 'Bad Parents Jack and Janet Drake', 'Child Neglect', 'Bruce Wayne is a Good Parent', 'Protective Jason Todd', 'Tim Drake Needs a Hug', 'Kid Tim Drake']
summary:
Instead of threatening her infant son with the boogeyman, Janet Drake tells Tim that Batman is going to come for him if he doesn't behave. Years later, Tim realises that if he wants a fast way to get adopted, all he has to do is commit a crime so that Batman will take him away.

Years later still, Tim knows that no one is coming for him, but that doesn't make him any less scared. It also doesn't make him any less interested in Batman and his Robins.

Basically, this whole fic originated from the one thought "wouldn't it be funny if Gotham parents used Batman to scare their kids". Thanks for reading, everyone! I'd love to hear what you thought.

summary:
"Wordlessly, and slowly, Bruce takes one breath after another, composing himself. He hands Jason the slightly crumpled sheet of paper. Jason reads it quickly. Quicker than Bruce, but he reads it again and again and again. Finally snapping with panicked urgency, 'What the fuck is this?'

Bruce, completely devoid of any inflection, forces himself to simply state the facts in front of him. 'That is Red Robin’s two week notice.'"

Or

Tim really thought leaving would be a lot easier. Both figuratively and literally.

The day Tim decides to move away from Gotham.

Tim takes Damian on a stake-out.

Tim tells his team about his plan to move away.

Tim and Damian talk.

Other things happen too.

Tim and Dick are interviewed by Cat Grant.

Couldn't fit Batgirls in here; they get their own thing now.

It's the summer, and it passes quickly.

We're back in the present for this one folks, don't think too much about my story structure; we know I didn't.

Tim’s future plans change. Or… well. They would’ve.

Basically a fear gas fever dream that lasts a week. Please please please take care of yourself. This one is kind of a lot, maybe.

And we're back.

Welcome to the talk.

I read the comics, but please don't point out inaccuracies. This is fiction based on fiction, let's go easy on me. I get to make stuff up if I want to.

Just to be clear. I think there's a lot of love in the Batfamily. And I'm writing this so I'm going to have them make up. Also, almost everything Tim hears here he takes out of context, and not in the way that his family meant it. That doesn't mean it didn't hurt him, though. And that is something they'll have to work through.

So I added two more chapters bc I have truly no idea how long this will be but I knew halfway through writing this chapter, that it would probably be longer than 6.

Also, I edited chapters 1 and 2. Nothing really changed, but now there are commas in the correct spaces and the Grammar is better so you are welcome.

And just fair warning, I make a very stupid and dumb dick joke near the beginning of the fic and it is not good writing, but I genuinely loved making it, so it stays in.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Thanks for all the feedback everyone. It means a lot.

This chapter is shorter than the rest because it's really just one scene. I'm also not used to writing for those characters so this was very new for me. I just had the idea for the scene and needed to get it out, so here! Have an interlude before the next chapter of Batfamily Shenanigans.

Started writing it. Had a break-down. Bon appétit.

In all seriousness though during this chapter I had the realization the the story was going to be much longer than I originally thought. So I had to re-outline the entire thing and refocus on what I wanted to say with it. It took me a while, but I think I'm finally happy with the direction I'm heading in. Thanks for being patient.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Next Up! Dick and Tim chapter featuring the Batgirls. Maybe other characters too, who knows.

In honor of 1000+ kudos, here's the next chapter a week early. I'm literally blown away by the reaction. Thanks so much, everyone.

This is late! But also apparently writing Superman is really hard and sucks a lot for me, so I'll take what I can get. These characters are new to me, and I'm not used to their voices, so here you go. Bone Apple Tea.

Hi y’all it’s been a while haha. Anyway the explanation is that between now and the last time I posted I went from a recent college grad with no jobs to a recent college grad with TWO jobs, and I’ve been traveling for one of them. Anyway, I’m still writing, just not as fast. Also I’m still traveling so this chapter ISNT quite as polished as I’m used to putting out, but I’ll edit it when I get off my flight.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

My goal to mash every trope I possibly can into one medium sized fic is going fairly well if I do say so myself. Do I do it because it makes sense? No. Do I do it because I think it’s funny? Yes.

Warning. Violence. Depictions of Violence. Descriptions of Graphic Injury. Creepy behavior by Ra’s Al Ghul. A bad memory Tim has with Bruce from being Robin. This chapter took a long time for me to write bc it was hard for me to get into the mindset of what I wanted to say. And also those two jobs turned into 3, I’m WORKING. Not as happy with it as I’d like, but she gets the job done, and I’m not publishing a masterpiece so I settled. Thanks everyone for the response, I really didn’t expect this much interaction and I appreciate all of you immensely. I promise I’m finishing this, it’ll just take a little longer than I originally thought.

hi, again.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

wild, right? See y'all at the end.

So, this is it, huh?

Thanks for coming on this journey with me y'all. I can't believe the response I've gotten and I appreciate everyone who's given me the motivation to continue.

End of chapter for more notes.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Hey guys. So this is the end of SSR.

 

It's not the end of that world, though. With that said, I'm going on a bit of a break for work. Gotta earn money and plan out a couple of fics that I want to take the time to write. One of which I'm really excited for and directly ties into SRR.

In other news you can definitely still contact me on Tumblr, at https://mediacircuspod.tumblr.com

I have something really cool going on there right now for my Batfamily fanart. You should definitely check it out if you were a fan of my fic.

Also I guess I should drop my tumblr, so u can speak to me and stuff. It’s not dedicated to Batman, and I share the account with my sister, but it’s where I am!

You can find it @mediacircuspod

series: Part 3 of Heroes End
summary:
When they found the dead body of a cheerleader in their trailer and all of Hawkins started a manhunt for Eddie, Wayne did not have a single doubt in his heart that Eddie was innocent because, at the end of day, Eddie was a good kid, damnit. And then Eddie disappeared over spring break, and when he came back, he was changed. He tried to hide it, sure, the same wicked smile still gracing his face, the same restless energy still filling his eyes and his heart, but Wayne could see it in the quiet moments and the way he was almost never sober anymore, and he realised that his best wasn't good enough anymore and he was losing his nephew.

And then Steve fucking Harrington knocked on the door of their new trailer.

 

Or: Steve and Eddie's relationship as seen through the eyes of their family.
notes:
Aaand this is the last part of this particular series. Just putting it out there before tomorrow 'cause I have this really bad feeling that either Steve or Eddie are gonna die.
It's gonna be two chapters a day or something.
Enjoy.

I have no idea if Volume 2 is already out 'cause I'm literally in work right now, but I can't wait to see what bullshit they're gonna pull on us. In the mean time, here's Nancy POV.

Well...those two episodes happened. Can't say I liked them.
Here's some Will POV, and I guess I'll get started on that Fix it fic I really hoped I wouldn't need.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

That's it for now. Thank you for reading. If I find the time and motivation, I might at some point add some more chapters from some of the other kids but for now I've got another project planned.

title: Three Shots
relationships: ['Steve Harrington/Eddie Munson', 'Steve Harrington & Dustin Henderson', 'Steve Harrington & Maxine "Max" Mayfield', 'Steve Harrington & Jim "Chief" Hopper', 'Steve Harrington & Mike Wheeler', 'Robin Buckley & Steve Harrington', 'Eleven | Jane Hopper & Steve Harrington', 'Joyce Byers & Steve Harrington', 'Will Byers & Steve Harrington', 'Steve Harrington & Lucas Sinclair', 'Dustin Henderson & Eddie Munson']
characters: ['Will Byers', 'Mike Wheeler', 'Eleven | Jane Hopper', 'Maxine "Max" Mayfield', 'Jonathan Byers', 'Nancy Wheeler', 'Joyce Byers', 'Jim "Chief" Hopper', 'Lucas Sinclair', 'Dustin Henderson', 'Steve Harrington', 'Robin Buckley', 'Eddie Munson']
additional_tags: ['Hurt/Comfort', 'Hurt Steve Harrington', 'Gun Violence', 'Good Babysitter Steve Harrington', 'Steve Harrington-centric', 'Protective Steve Harrington', 'Eddie Munson Lives', 'Post-Vecna (Stranger Things)', 'Hawkins (Stranger Things)', 'Alternate Universe - Everyone Lives/Nobody Dies', 'Temporary Character Death', 'Steve Harrington & Maxine "Max" Mayfield Have a Sibling Relationship']
summary:
Three shots ring out.

Steve hears them before he feels them; a warm, wet pain burning in his torso, intolerably excruciating.

There’s a bundle of squawks and screams, outbursts of panic and anger, and it’s only when Hopper falls forwards to take Steve up into a slightly rough, protective hold, does he realize that two of those shots have lodged themselves in his own flesh and bone. (Realizes that he’d moved, instinctively, to shield El, despite never having spoken to her, who’d the gun had been so precisely pointed at, aimed for.)

Steve Harrington watches his own blood pool and trickle over a series of hands pressed against him, small and large, soft and rugged, and for a moment, wants to stay like this. He can’t.

series: Part 1 of Steve Harrington's Unwilling Time Loop Saga
summary:
It’s the first time in a while that he doesn’t know what comes next. He’s dove into the water hundreds of times. Screamed as his flesh was torn apart, heard Master of Puppets in the distance and held back tears. Felt Max’s cold, small hand in his as she laid in the hospital bed. There are things that always happen, no matter how hard he tries: El doesn’t arrive in time. Eddie dies. Max is put in a coma.

Steve fails. They lose.

“Steve, how many loops have you been through?”

His head is nodding, and his eyes are watery, and Eddie has approached him like a spooked animal.

“I lost count.”

AKA: The one where Steve Harrington is stuck in a time loop, and Eddie Munson is really fucking hard to save, or: fuck Volume 2, these bitches are in love.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

some fun facts about this fic!

- steve goes through around a little more than two years worth of loops (or around 236 loops, taking in account The Longest Loop), and the reason why his scars and injuries are appearing now, is because the loop is dying, and steve gets to live normally :)

- my favourite moments of the fic were the “I want to graduate” speech in “THE FUNERAL”, el asking steve what the flatlining sound means in “THE LONGEST LOOP PT. I”, and hopper validating steve’s trauma in “EPILOGUE”

- i use the phrase “owl-blind in early sun” which is from one of my favourite poems about a child learning the horrors of death and life after trying to shoot an owl

- there are a few references to loops that i didn’t write, but steve still experienced, with one of the most brutal being two different loops where the gate is closed on steve’s body as he’s climbing out of it, the same happening to eddie a different time

- eddie has no dialogue lines in three chapters (“THE LONGEST LOOP PT.I”, “LOSS AND LOVE”, and “DIFFERENT”)

- i wrote a lot of the things in the chapters in the wrong order, and mix and matched them until i liked the way they flowed

- the dot point summary for the epilogue was 2,258 words, making it longer than some chapters

- nearly all of the chapters were written one day before (or finished on!) the day they were posted. for “EPILOGUE” i read through the comments again, and included some of the things people wanted to see :DD

- i thought of all the chapter names before some things that actually ended up being in the chapters themselves (for example: “THE FUNERAL” originally was ONLY the three different times steve experienced eddie’s funeral. i added the breaks in between them to add more of, well, eddie himself, because it felt important. which then spirally into the “i want to graduate” speech!)

- the longest chapter was 10,140 words, being “EPILOGUE”, and the shortest was “THE FUNERAL” with 2,162 words

- the most used words and phrases were:
- steve (820)
- eddie (385)
- time (165)
- robin (163)
- die/dies/died/dying/death/deaths/dead (137)
- hand/hands (131)
- upside down (46)
- pool/water (45)

i hope you enjoyed this wild, wild ride! many tears were shed from my end (and from what i’ve read in the comments, from your guys’ end too). i might end up doing a companion fic that explores other character’s povs, but you’ve all been such amazing readers, so i wanted to say THANK YOU!

i’d love to hear what your favourite parts or chapters were, and if there was something you wanted to see me write in the future!

edit to add: i'm planning on writing a couple companion fics to this one later in the year!! (some to do with the aftermath of this story itself, for some well needed rest, and the other to do with the loops that steve 'left behind', for more angst ;))

edit edit: this story can be read as a standalone, but if you want more angst (AKA: exploring people remembering steve's deaths and his parents!), onto the next work you go!

additional_tags: ['Hurt/Comfort', 'Angst and Hurt/Comfort', 'Psychological Torture', 'Whump', 'Steve Harrington-centric', 'Eddie Munson Lives', 'Hurt Eddie Munson', 'Hurt Steve Harrington', 'Eddie Munson-centric', 'Steve Harrington Whump', "Vecna's Curse (Stranger Things)", 'Vecna Possessing Steve Harrington', 'Jason Carver Being an Asshole', 'Brotherly Steve Harrington & Dustin Henderson', 'Steve Harrington & Maxine "Max" Mayfield Have a Sibling Relationship', 'Protective Eddie Munson', 'The Upside Down', 'Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Episode: s04e09 The Piggyback (Stranger Things)']
summary:
“Steve, that doesn’t make any sense,”

Aggressively dismissing their protests with repetitive hand gestures, Steve stands from the camper-vans built in seats, speaking in the way he usually did when the kids were trying to put themselves in the line of fire. “Yes, it does. Out of everyone here, I’ve suffered the least.”

He allows for a pause, just in case anyone argues. They don’t.

In which Steve is adamantly against using Max as bait for Vecna after everything; going above and beyond to make sure she never has to live through that ever again.

Even if that means taking her place.

(He doesn’t anticipate Jason Carver finding them there.)

((Or the discoveries that come when a demon is rifling through your head for the worst times of your life. Ones you may not even remember.))
notes:
CW: season 4 canon typical descriptions of violence, minor homophobia, alluded to/vague discussions of suicide (not a main character), and general mental distress . this is Vecna’s curse after all

summary:
Of course, the transfer kid gets mentioned because transfers are rare, but the news isn’t that exciting. In fact, according to Laura, no one even seems to know his first name. The only thing anyone has really figured out about him is that he’s American. And that’s not exactly hard because he obviously has an accent.

The only thing Derek really knows is that, despite other reports, he seems quiet enough, prefers to work alone, and has the most amazing shade of amber eyes that Derek has ever seen.

Not that he’s looking. Obviously.

OR: A Harry Potter AU where Stiles is a Slytherin transfer student and Derek is the grumpy Gryffindor who falls in love with him.

There are also potions, elves, and falcons involved. Oh, and illegal use of magic. Obviously.

A brief primer on the concept of Alpha/Beta/Omega Universes: Also known as that trope suddenly showing up in your fandom that doesn't make any sense.

Being an introduction to the concepts of the Omegaverse and alpha/beta/omega dynamics.

*Personal Note: The author of this guide is a swimmer, and giggles every time she uses her Triswim body wash, shampoo, conditioner, and body lotion. The explicit purpose of such products is to remove all traces of the chlorine scent from the skin. The author purchases Triswim products at a store named Omega Sports. That they do not sell heat suppressants, male maternity swim wear, or athletic protectors sized for the alpha.

Notes from the long suffering and anon beta, who does science for a living:
(1) The ABO nomenclature continues to confuse blood bankers everywhere.
(2) FYI, humans don’t do pheromones. Trufax, read it in a Mary Roach book. Given the liberties the ABO trope takes with mammalian physiology, I am not sure why I am compelled to note this.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

I want to thank everyone who has helped me with bits of this Primer over the last two years. Conversations about population, about assbabies, about history and plausibility. Plus a lot of fixing of my highly dubious punctuation.

In particular I’d like to thank Seperis, who started this off, AzureLunatic who built a lot of it, and my science expert who genuinely wants nothing to do with A/B/O universes, but loves world building and real!biology anyway.

I would also like to give a shout out to the Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics bookmark at AO3, which has let me follow the adventures of the A/B/O people of many worlds, not just my primary fandoms. Every one of the authors there is awesome and has given me something to think about.

And finally, I want to than the anons over at Fail_FandomAnon who kept me up to date on the spread of A/B/O across fandoms. They also invented both Dogfuck Rapeworld and Mantisfuck Consentworld and as such have me forever in their debt.

And finally, finally: Two links for further reading and world building

Netweight has created a very complicated timeline tracing the exact history of the A/B/O concept from it's Supernatural origins.http://archiveofourown.org/works/1022303/chapters/2033841

Diana Williams did the genetics of her version of A/B/O, complete with squares and charts. It's a great deal more scientific, or at least fake scientific than my impregnation chart. http://archiveofourown.org/works/766040/chapters/1435445

additional_tags: ['Fix-It', 'Stranger Things 4 Fix-It', 'Eddie Munson Lives', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Angst with a Happy Ending', 'Steve Harrington-centric', 'Good Uncle Wayne Munson', 'Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Stranger Things 4 Vol. 2 Rewrite', 'Not Beta Read', 'Canon-Typical Violence', 'Implied/Referenced Alcohol Abuse/Alcoholism']
summary:
“Steve,” Wayne echoes. “This is my home. Eddie’s my boy.” And then he ruffles his hair with one large hand, coarse from years of working with them, in an action that reminds Steve of Hopper.

“I’m gonna go down there and get my boy back. You’re gonna be my tour guide.” He holds his hand out for the final gun Steve has stashed, which he gives over reluctantly. He finds Wayne remarkably difficult to argue with—wonders if Eddie found the same. “Tour guides don’t need guns. You point at somethin’, I shoot it. Got it, Steve?”

(Steve knows Eddie’s alive. Wayne’s the only one who believes him. So they team up to save him.)
notes:
(See the end of the work for notes.)

first and foremost:
thank you SO much for all of the support and hype around this fic on twitter! i’ve never had a reception like that before, thank you all kindly! if you don’t follow me there yet please do - @barmykawa!

second of all—big shout out to my friend yeezy for their CONSTANT cheerleading and love for this fic, couldn’t have done this without them! shoutout for their idea to have wayne be a previous track sportsman in school, too, i couldn’t resist putting that in here.
you too vinny - love you man. your eddie love gets me thru the vol 2 bs.

i really hope this lived up to the expectations! and that it was as enjoyable to read as it was to write.

love you all x
- meri

summary:
Steve lives in Stark Tower and doesn't have much to do when he's not going after Hydra strongholds. He attends charity events to make Pepper happy. He goes hiking with Sam. He hangs out with Clint in Bed-Stuy and watches Dog Cops. Sometimes Tony gives him super alcohol in a sippy cup. Sometimes he sees Bucky out of the corner of his eye and wonders if it's real or if he's starting to lose his mind.

Alternately, the one with terrible jokes, a foot chase through the Lower East Side, and a tiny little robot named Shitcan.
notes:

summary:
Ok, so maybe Peter took the job (internship, whatever) to be around Wade, and yeah, maybe that wasn't exactly professional of him, but sue him, he wants to spend more time with his boyfriend!

Ok, no, don't sue him, Peter is poor.

But now he has a job, so maybe he won't be poor for much longer.

Of course, that all depends on whether or not his new boss likes him, and whether Peter is able to keep said boss from discovering that Peter is everyone's favorite neighborhood Spiderman.

And when that Boss is Tony Stark... Well, Peter's confidence has hit an all-time low.

I would like to retroactively apologize for all of my just crap knowledge about science. Ignorance, I think is what it's called. I'm sorry. I'd also like to apologize for any subsequent science stupidities. I've put my love into the wrong characters, them science nerds, because I know nothing.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

I'm just totally wowed by the positive response this story has gotten! Thank you all so much! It makes me so giddy seeing all of the wonderful comments, and the kudos... all the kudos.

I've got most of the story outlined, so no worries that this beaut won't get finished. And I've even got fever dreams of a sequel and a prequel. Because I need more things on my plate. Of course I do.

I'm hoping to publish chapters at least bi-weekly, though that might slow down a little in July, as I'm traveling overseas and probably won't have too much time to write things.

Till then, I'll hope to steadily be updating. Thanks again for the strong support!

Cheers!

This is coming out quicker and quicker, I think. I'm hoping to get it all out before I go abroad and will be pretty much incommunicado for a whole month. On the downside, I've really really got stuck on a sequel for this (which is annoying since I haven't even got the original out in its entirety yet) so that probably won't come out till august???? Or later?
Eeeeither way, I hope you enjoy this installment (do the kids still use that phrasing? Why do I have no idea what's happening in popular thingies) *cough cough* I've gotten out of control.
Here you go!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

I hope Thor wasn't too ooc? I'm so bad at writing him, I don't know why my brain insists on doing so, I really don't!
And Hair! Huzzah!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

You guys are Awesome! Thanks for all the wonderful responses, reading the comments always makes me squeal in really awful ways that just scare my dogs to death.
I'm trying to churn this out faster, because I'm leaving in a week and I don't want anything to slow this story down, but since I am leaving in a week, I'm actually really busy doing pre-leaving in a week things? Like packing? And calling my bank to tell them not to shut down my account if I use my cards overseas (which reminds me that I should actually do that immediately).
Cheers!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

You guys are literally the most sweetest of all people ever. Your comments give me life, and your kudos... well the swell my already too-big head, so... yeah. Thanks though, you're all awesome!

I have recently had no time to do anything fun. I wrote this chapter as quick as I possibly could, because I had to read Dracula, which was 160k words of period-acceptable sexism and really cliched (can it be cliched if it was the originator of the cliche?) vampire plot points. I should also point out that despite these things it was a fun book. I recommend, like 7/10. I enjoyed it, though it was for school, and so, while necessary, completely soul-destroying, as I read the whole thing in like, 2 days.

I know, I know, I could have done it in 1, but then I would have collapsed from exhaustion... and one of those days was Fathers Day so I had to... you know... interact with my father...

Shhhh! I'm an adult, I have no idea what you're talking about.

Anyway, thanks again, and I hope this Chapter was up to par!

Cheers!

Oh My God! I am so, so, so sorry about the wait on this. I honestly had this chapter (short as it is, and I'd like to apologize for that too) written days ago. But then I was doing last-minute packing, and then I was on a plane for hours and then I was in an airport, and then I was on another plane for even longer, and then I got here and I am so low on sleep that I have no idea what to do.

So....here's this thing.

And it's shorter than I'd like as well, :( but here this is. Because Wifi here is spotty at best, and I'm not only doing schooling but also in the most Amazing London (my first time overseas, I'm excited beyond measure) I might not have time to update as much as I'd like, let alone write as much as I like. Things might slooooow doooown, but I'm going to try to get the next chapter up fast to make up for this mini one.

Thanks again for all of your awesome kudos and comments,

Cheers!

Hello again, I hope the wait hasn't prematurely killed any of you off. I've somehow got all of this written besides visiting seemingly everywhere in this beautiful city, and a few places outside of it, and all with doing massive amounts of homework as well (yay school!). Do you know, I popped by both Buckingham Palace and Windsor Castle, and I didn't meet the Queen either time? I think it's ridiculous. And I've seen the crown jewels and totally did not steal them, I don't even know what you are talking about right now, you are a crazy person, what? And Big Ben, and Parliament, and both the London Bridge and the London Tower Bridge and the Queen's Gallery, and Kew Gardens, and my feet have asked me politely if I would please just leave them alone for the rest of my life.

I actually finished writing this chapter just now in a bit of a funk, because despite all of the cool things I've been seeing, homework is still a thing, and yet others in my class disagree, and we just got a mass email from our teacher pretty much saying "You suck, class is cancelled until you can get your shit together. I am seriously disappointed in all of you. Etc. Etc." So I felt super bad, and as a result the ending of the chapter is... something?

Either way, enough about me. I know who you're really here for.

Enjoy!

It has been a long time, my friends. I'm talking years, here, and I hope this is suffice for such a long wait. I think I'm getting close to the end here, and so there'll only be few more chapters. And then an angst-ridden wait for me to figure out how to begin a sequel.
Cheers!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Ahhh, so I think that after this there's only going to be one more chapter. I've got it kind of mapped out, and as much as I'd like to prolong your suffering--I mean this story, I think that is going to be it. Until the sequel...

Anyway, till then, cheers!

So guys, this is it for this one. It took a bit longer than usual because plane rides from England to US are long and I died inside.

And for you guys expecting Logon to show up...I am so sorry. You're going to be so disappointed D:

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

How'd you like it? Not too bad, I hope.
Well no worries, I've got a sequel in the works, and have even got it all kind of planned out on the back of an Olive Garden napkin, so there's that...
It's a coming, that's all that's important, right?
Don't hurt me.

Edit:
It's out!Petey and Wade are obviously an item, so why is Spiderman trying to be a homewrecker?
