author: ['Hazel_Athena']
title: Facade
characters: ['Roronoa Zoro', 'Vinsmoke Sanji', 'Nami (One Piece)', 'Monkey D. Luffy', 'Tony Tony Chopper', 'Nico Robin', 'Franky (One Piece)', 'Brook (One Piece)']
additional_tags: ['Fake Marriage', 'Angst and Humor', 'Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Spoilers up to WCI']
summary:
Left with only three other crew mates, it’s a ready expectation that Sanji will start fawning all over Robin in his usual obnoxious way. However, that’s not what happens. Instead, looking wild around the eyes in a way only someone who knows him well would recognize, the cook doesn’t break stride until he’s firmly within Zoro’s orbit and can wrap both hands around his upper arm, clinging tight.

“Hi, darling,” he chirps, his expression desperately conveying that Zoro needs to play along under pain of death. “Did you miss me?”
notes: This madness is dedicated to the lovely Dee who came up with the overall prompt and encouraged me to run with it.

author: ['arysteia']
title: The Twice-Told Tale
characters: ['Steve Rogers', 'Tony Stark', 'Howard Stark']
summary: For someone he'd hero-worshipped for so long, Steve Rogers in the flesh is a pretty big disappointment. For one thing, he keeps looking at Tony as though he reminds him of someone else, and even if he never says anything, Tony's pretty sure it's his father. A lifetime of not measuring up to Howard's expectations is more than enough, thank you very much, and he's certainly not going to make an effort to live up to any of Steve's. Steve's pretty clearly failed to live up to his expectations, in any case, and that's not hypocritical at all.
notes:
This story was written for the Avengers Big Bang 2012.

Accompanying artwork by Realproof.

Many thanks to Ms Vaudevilles for her excellent as always support, and unfailing ability to spot the one remaining plot hole.

Sons are for fathers the twice-told tale. Victoria Secunda.

author: ['LiraBuswavi']
title: Who's Old Now?
relationships: ['Billy Batson & Danny Fenton', 'Danny Fenton & Jason Todd', 'Dani Phantom & Superboy', 'Billy Batson & Jason Todd']
characters: ['Billy Batson', 'Captain Marvel', 'Batman', 'Superman', 'Flash', 'Justice League (DCU)', 'Sam Manson', 'Tucker Foley', 'Jazz Fenton', 'Danielle "Dani" Phantom', 'Jason Todd', 'Black Canary (DCU)', 'Damian Wayne', 'Danny Fenton', 'Kon-El | Conner Kent', 'Original Characters', 'Wonder Woman - Character', 'Aquaman', 'Martian Manhunter', 'Poison Ivy', 'Harley Quinn', 'Hal Jordan (Green Lantern)', 'Zatanna Zatara']
additional_tags: ['Misunderstandings', 'Based around a concept I found on Tumblr', 'Danny Fenton is an Adult', "Danny's ghost form Does Not Age", 'Billy Batson was Adopted by Danny Fenton', 'Tf when you think your immortal coworker adopted a dead child', "But really it's the other way around", 'Batman is Good With Kids', 'One Shot', 'no longer a one shot', 'Billy Batson is a little shit', 'Danny Fenton is a Little Shit', 'Aged-Up Danny Fenton', 'dani goes by elle', 'Fluff', 'There will be incoming angst', 'no regrets', 'Hurt', 'Comfort', 'Clones', 'Eldritch Danny Fenton', 'Scary Captain Marvel', 'I forgot to put Danny in the character section', 'Fixed it but so embarrassed', 'Therapy', 'clone feels', 'POV Outsider', 'Implied/Referenced Drug Addiction', 'mentions of overdose', 'Not any of the main characters a minor original character', 'Ghost King Danny Fenton', "The Fenton's C- Parenting", 'Sam Manson Has Plant Powers', 'Introspection', 'Identity Reveal', 'Mistaken Identity', 'Emails', 'Complete']
summary:
“Am I your dad!!?” Billy shouted. Danny paused. Took a deep breath in and out before turning to him.

“I’m gonna need you to back up, and explain. Please.”

 

Or, what happens when a twelve year old masquerading as an adult superhero calls his guardian, an adult who can also turn into a child superhero, on speaker phone, in front of the Justice League.

How it started... and how it's going.

What happens when your coworker whose child had died and came back comes up to you and asks for advice as a presumed fellow parent whose child died and came back, but really you're a panicking 12 year old? This, apparently.

Ta da! Next chapter is here! More identity shenanigans, a little bit of Jason in Fawcett, the Justice League, clones, and freaking people out.

Billy has therapy with Jazz, and confesses something that expands his family.

"I thought Marvel, Phantom, Phantasm, and he had it handled,” Tim replied disgruntledly.

“Phantasm who?”

“Phantasm me!”

“I travel a lot, and I would stop and settle down around you if you asked, but I also want to know if you’d like to travel with me,” Kon looked at her, blue eyes wide, and Elle had to resist the urge to bundle him in blankets and protect him from everything that ever hurt him.

What does it take to soar above the clouds? Well, it really depends on how you fly, and Billy knows it more than most others.

A working father is a stressed father, especially when work is of the paranormal kind. Jason babysits, threatens to get Billy adopted by Batman, and holds a meeting. Not necessarily in that order.

If there was one thing Captain Marvel hated about fighting in an urban environment, it was the collateral.

"J’onn… wasn’t quite sure why they were all there, to be honest. Phantom had a crown. This, on its own, would not be an issue. But instead, Phantom and Marvel treated it as a big deal, which caused the others around them to treat it as a big deal."

Family can be a half dead adult, a psychiatrist who gave therapy to her own family, a plant witch, the reincarnation of an ancient pharaoh, the Champion of Magic, and a crime lord.

This wasn’t Amity Park where the only person around with plant powers was her. This wasn’t Amity Park where the ambient ectoplasm from the portal made her powers extremely reactionary to even mildly strong emotions. This wasn’t Amity Park. This was Gotham, and there was a very well known, very powerful plant user with a vendetta against people and corporations that harmed nature.

“Any plans for today?”

Billy raised an eyebrow. “No. Besides my usual patrols, that is,”

“Great! We have a lunch date,”

“With who?”

“That’s a surprise,”

“This is the way the world ends. Not with a bang but a whimper,” - T.S. Elliot, The Hollow Men

Billy's secret is out.

There's one more important identity questions to answer.
notes:
Second work on this site, first in both of these fandoms. Not much to say, except I hope you enjoy this!

(See the end of the work for other works inspired by this one.)

Due to an overwhelming amount of support, this story will be continuing! I'm at one of the most busiest times of my year, so updates will be sparse until around the end of October. If there's anything in particular you'd like to see, feel free to comment!

I'm warning you now, there will be discussions of canonical child death and grief. Nothing too explicit, but still part of the chapter. You have been forewarned.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

It continues! Fluff approaches, don't worry and my free time has greatly increased! If there's anything in particular you'd like to see, feel free to comment. Hope you enjoyed!

I think this chapter is twice the length of previous ones. Oops.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

I really appreciated seeing all the things you guys commented last time! I touched on a lot of the things some of you wanted to see, but some parts were kind of short. Fear not! There is more to come. Comment on things you want to see in the future, and I'll do my best to fit it in. Disclaimer, no Anger Management in this story. We're sticking to platonic feels in this one!

You can check out my Tumblr @lirabuswavi . There's also fanart! Shout out and love to @doodlesforfics on Tumblr for the amazing art they did for the first chapter. Please check it out!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Hi. It's been two months. Writer's block killed me, so the Superboy chapter has been delayed. In it's place, a slightly shorter chapter as an interlude. Jason now knows! He knew about Danny being Phantom but not Billy being Marvel, as Billy wasn't ready to tell him. Now there's another addition to the ones in the know! And welcome to the new year everyone. New year, same me though. This was based off my own experience in therapy, so I hope it felt like it worked like it does for me.

The long awaited chapter, the introduction of Kon and Elle! I broke this into two parts. Part two is mostly written so should come out pretty soon. Be on the look out for that!

Me: I have most of the chapter written, so the next chapter should be coming soon!
Writer's Block:
Me:
Writer's Block:
Me:
*Three Weeks Later*
Me:...Fuck.

So, this took way longer than I wanted, but it's here now! Whoo!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Next up, expect to see some Danny-Billy bonding time, as someone suggested. I appreciate every single comment left here, each one makes my day! Feel free to comment what you'd like to see in future chapters, I do consider each comment/suggestion left.

So. Life has kicked my ass. School, musical, upcoming graduation (so close, so fucking close, almost there) have all eaten my free time and will power. My preferred update "schedule" is at least once a month, and I missed last month's and almost this one too. But here it is! Danny and Billy bonding at last.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Graduation is impending. HOPEFULLY I can get something out in May, but given that musical showdates (finally), finals (ew), and graduation (pleasesocloseholyfuckplease) are all impending, it might not happen. However, next up in planning! A mini arc! Ghost King Danny, Crime Lord Jason, and one Champion of Magic who does not need a babysitter, thank-you-very-much. Should be about three chapters. Build up, climax, aftermath. As always, every singly comment and suggestion is seen and appreciated! How a lovely *squints* 1AM.

After three months I am back! I have graduated, had time to recuperate, and worked on this chapter over the course of the summer so far. This is a part one of three. And welcome to our first outsider POV, hope y'all like it.
Going to throw out some chapter warnings for this one. Drug mentions and overdose mentions talked about in the past tense.
Hope you enjoy the chapter!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

In the end, Jason went with a white shirt for his suit. If anyone would be willing to draw Billy and Jason in their matching outfits, I would cry. You can find me @lirabuswavi on Tumblr. As always, comments and kudos are appreciated. Thank you for reading!

*Huff, wheeze* Am I- *gasp* late?
I'm back from the dead! Or writers block, whichever comes first. Of course the block was only for this story, and I wrote two different one-shots in the time I've been gone (feel free to check them out, one's Miraculous Ladybug and DP, the other's DP and Transformers: Rescue Bots). And also of course once the block was gone I wrote this chapter in two days. Go figure.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Next up! Some more Ghost King Danny, a new POV, and someone knows more about Captain Marvel and Phantom than they're supposed to...
Fun Fact! Most spirits born of something without human involvement use it/its pronouns. Like the Leshen, they don't subscribe to the societally enforced binary of humans.
Second Fun Fact! There was a scene in this inspired by one of @doodlesforfics drawings for this story! Check it out in the Works Inspired for this story, or on their Tumblr.
As always, I love comments and kudos. Feel free to tell me what kind of things you'd like to see more of in the future. Have a great day, and I hope you enjoyed this chapter!

Hello hello! A little over one month later, and I'm back! This is the last part of the Three Strikes arc, I hope y'all liked it. And a new POV is entering the ring! Wonder how much the resident telepath knows.

Chapter warning! None, I think. If you think there's something I need to add, put it in the comments and I'll fix it.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

And that's that! I hope y'all liked it. Up next, I make good on my threats of angst, hurt, and comfort! Danny has a bad time, so it's a good thing his family is there to catch him when he falls.

If you like my writing, then check out some of my other works! I have a Miraculous Ladybug x Danny Phantom crossover oneshot, as well as a Danny Phantom x Transformers Rescue Bots series with over 31,000 words so far. Please check them out.

Thank you for reading, and have an awesome day!

Back again! Perhaps less angst than I promised, and more comfort instead, but I hope you enjoy anyways!
Chapter warnings: Some casual mentions of death (canon), rejection by biological parents, and not read through before posting.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

And there we have it: I am officially all out of ideas. Tell me what you'd like to see next in the comments. Hope you enjoyed this chapter! See you in the new year!
Bonus: whose order do you think is whose?

Hey there! I'm alive! And updating on my birthday! I really loved seeing all of the suggestions you guys gave, but then one that stuck was, drumroll please... Sam and Poison Ivy! Man, that was a lot of exclamation marks in a row. Anyways, there's not content warnings for this chapter, beyond the regular cursing, which you should really know about and expect at this point.
Please check out the end notes for some important updates on the future of this fic.
I hope you enjoy this chapter!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

And there we have it! I hope you enjoyed.
Now, to get a little bit more serious. I really didn't mean to take this long to update, but a lot of IRL shit happened, none of it good. But in that time, it gave me the opportunity to think about where exactly I'm going with the various stories I've got going on. And the conclusion for this one was, no matter how much I love it on a personal level, I'm just not particularly motivated to write for it.
Who's Old Now? is my baby. It's my most popular story, with the most chapters, and the first multi chap that I've ever written. I love it, but I don't feel motivated to write for it. I'm a firm believer that you can tell when a writer loves what they're writing, and I just haven't been feeling that.
There is now a firm chapter count. There isn't an end date, because I don't know how long it'll take to write, but this story is coming to a close. The plan is a birthday chapter for Billy and three chapters for The Reveal. One of the most popular suggestions last chapter was The Reveal, but The Reveal was always supposed to be the end point. And, well, we're getting there.
This story will be finished, even if it takes me months and months. Hell, if I die IRL I'll possess my computer, just to finish it. I won't leave you hanging. You're all such fantastic readers, and I enjoy every single comment I get, even if I don't reply to most of them (curse you anxiety!).
While Who's Old Now? is winding down, I'm still writing in other areas. Check out my other works to see what I'm up to; there's more than one other Danny Phantom crossover.
I'll see you back for the future chapters, hopefully. Hope you have a great day!

Happy Birthday, I sure hope nothing goes wrong! Well, nothing does in this chapter. Next chapter? No promises.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Hope you liked this quick little slice of life. I don't know when the next chapter will be out, but it will come eventually. I hope you have an awesome day, and if you like my writing, check out some of the other stories I've done. See you next chapter!

It's here~. We made it! The reveal! We're slowly getting towards the end. I hope you enjoy this chapter!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

And that's that! Next chapter's the fallout, and the one after that is the ending/epilogue! I hope y'all enjoyed this chapter, and if you like my writing, check out some of the other stories I've done! I appreciate comments, kudos, extra kudos, questions, rereads, and anything else you're willing to give me. For a more direct line of communication, you can find me @lirabuswavi on Tumblr. Have a great day, and I'll see you for the next chapter.

Second to last chapter, let's fucking go!
Chapter warnings: Swearing, but by this point you should be familiar with it.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

I love a good dramatic reveal. I love betrayl and breaches of trust in writing, they're great. I've read many 'reveals gone bad' stories. But this story? Isn't one of them. I love drama but I also love understanding. And this is what I wanted it to be! There's hurt, there's worries, there's broken trust, but they're also not taking it out on each other. The point of a meeting is to talk, to listen, to try to understand, not yell or berate. Like was said in this chapter, they know better. Do they have flaws? Blindspots? Of course! Batman's allergic to sharing his thoughts, Superman's bad at handling things when they hit too close to home, Flash sometimes forgets that people don't think as quick as him. They're all people. They all have flaws. But they're also heroes, they chose to be heroes, they chose to hold themselves to a higher standard, and they're going to do their damn best to meet it. So, as much as I love drama and emotionally charged situations... this ain't it. This is rational, intelligent people having a rational, intelligent conversation. And it works!
I hope you enjoyed this chapter, there's only one left to go. The formatting for the next one is going to be a little different, if all goes to plan. I love comments, kudos, questions, extra kudos, and whatever you're willing to give me. Have an awesome day, and I'll see you next time for the final chapter.

Chapter Warnings: None.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

So that’s the end of things. I’m not quite sure what to say. I’ll start with the facts. This was the first multichapter I started. This will also be the first one I finish. As of writing this, Who’s Old Now is part of 30 collections, has 2,438 comments, 4,017 bookmarks, 15,052 kudos, and 200,113 hits. Even with the numbers laid out in front of me, I’m still in shock. This is far more than I ever thought it’d be.
I started this as just a oneshot, a fun little idea cobbled together from a few tidbits on Tumblr that culminated into a fun little scene. I was inspired by @doodleforfics on Tumblr, when they gave me my first ever fanart. I was in the car, and had to pull over in my culdesac I was crying so hard. The first thing I did was send it to my brother, because I was so overwhelmed with all I was feeling. Proud? Honoured? Flattered? So indescribably happy and excited that I was almost late for my appointment? Whatever it was, it was what inspired several scenes in this fic and its overall expansion from a oneshot.
So, I guess that this is thank you. Thank you @doodlesforfics for my first ever piece of fanart. Thank you to every person who commented, I read all of them, and I love them. Thank you to the people who commented on every chapter, who binge read and left a comment as you went. I saw them and I love them. Thank you for all the kudos, waking up to a kudos email from AO3 has gotten me through some bad days. Thank you to the people who left ideas that inspired chapters, thank you to the people who told me I made them smile, to the ones who told me I made them cry. Thank you so much.
And then this is goodbye. Goodbye to my most popular story. Goodbye to the story I’ve worked on the longest. Goodbye to this labour of love. You’re an important part of who I’ve made myself to be, and I know I’ll grow further. I love you, and I’ll miss you even as I know this ending is for the best. I’m glad I finished this.
So, for the last time on Who’s Old Now, thank you for reading. I love comments, kudos, extra kudos, questions and whatever you’re willing to give me. If you like what I’ve done here, check out my account to see what else I’ve done. I have multiple ongoing stories and series. Have a good day and an even better life.
Goodbye.

summary:
“An Endless?” Hob asks, softly, because it feels like a question that needs to be soft.

“That’s what we are,” Death responds, trying again for a small smile. “Me and D—”

“Don’t,” Hob interrupts, far stronger than he meant to, and Death looks surprised for as long as it takes him to get out, “Don’t, please. I-I want to hear it from him.”

Sympathy colors Death’s gaze even as Hob feels his face burn. Six hundred years, Hob thinks—he’ll be damned if he finds out his Stranger’s name from anyone but the odd man himself.

—

It's 1989 and Hob Gadling thinks he's been stood up. Death herself is kind enough to inform him otherwise—and, well, now Hob's got to bloody do something about it, doesn't he?

summary:
You return with a steeled one of your own. "You can't get rid of me that easily."

Red pupils against black eyes drfit to the bandage on your forehead, and you swallow as Moon's gaze lingers in the silence too long to be comfortable.

"I can, though." Moon's form is unnaturally still, zeroed in on your expression, reading your face, reading your body language. "I can."
-------

Several drabbles / One-shots for the Solar Lunacy universe that I'm dumping here for prompts requested to me on tumblr. No chronological order/Spoilers for Solar Lunacy.

Moon takes care of a drunk Reader.

Continuation of the previous drabble.

With no prior plans made, you are working the evening to night shift at the Pizzaplex's Daycare on Halloween night, so you practice Trick or Treating Safty with Sun and the kids, and witness a sweeter, softer moment with Moon. Also, everyone is forced to wear costumes. Including you, to which you get teased for.

Sun-Centric, Moon at the end. | Wordcount: 1,763 | A03 Version

Eclipse-Centric | Wordcount: 1,322

Slow dancing in the kitchen late at night.

Reader has a nose bleed and Moon, who does not have good memories of their blood, helps them.

Spoilers for Solar Lunacy

TW for injury and injury suturing
notes:
Hello! This fic exists purely to dump all the drabbles I've been writing on tumblr here and there for my other fic, Solar Lunacy and that universe for better organization. These prompts were given to me by folks on tumblr, so I'll have a prompt and a name at the start of each chapter. These aren't in any chronological order and some of these drabbles/oneshots may contain spoilers for Solar Lunacy, so be warned. Thanks for reading!

Note of context: on tumblr I drew a comic where at the point where the DA is at home with y/n, the maintence man comes along with a stray kitten and offers it to them. The reader is reluctant because they don't know how the DA will react, but the DA (namely Sun) is excited for the kitten, so it's a running joke now

summary:
eddie’s new roommate sure does get into a lot of fights.

a spider-man!steve story.

or

 

6 bruises of steve’s + 1 of eddie’s.

“i want to be eaten alive
and burn a hole inside my pride
like leather wrapped around my mind
two holes cut out to see the light.
– steve’s first bruise, briston maroney

 

“with a cold breeze
maybe i can soon forget
i'll wash away the bleach
and clear reflections i can see through.”
– comedown, luke hemmings

“you give a little and i fall a little too much
i give a little, i'm too late, you slip from my clutch
in the bathroom you fix your face
and you're so fucking pretty you take my breath away.”
– you’re so fucking pretty, the regrettes

 

“i feel for you but when did you believe you were alone?
you say that spiders crawled inside and made themselves a home."
– friend, please, twenty-one pilots

 

“i got my ass kicked, but you held the ice
i was a train wreck, but you took the ride
so can we stay here, right here?
nothing else that i wanna do.”
– don’t you go, all time low

 

“we were scanning the cities
walking to greater dues
but besides all the glamour
all we got was bruised.”
– mary on a cross, ghost

 

“secrets i have held in my heart
are harder to hide than i thought
maybe i just wanna be yours
i wanna be yours.”
– i wanna be yours, arctic monkeys

summary:
When Hua Cheng loses all his memories of Xie Lian, afflicted by a tricky curse, there’s only one way to get them back: Xie Lian has to get Hua Cheng to kiss him.

It shouldn’t be too difficult, right?

Xie Lian has a plan.


“Greetings, Chengzhu,” Xie Lian said. “Apologies for the intrusion. Actually, I’ve been gifted to you by the heavens as a…”
His voice caught.
“I mean, to—”
Xie Lian’s cheeks suddenly felt hot, and his palms grew damp under the rope binding his arms together. Beneath Hua Cheng’s piercing stare from above, he lost his cool.
“As your,” he stammered. “Um, as—well—if you want, I’ve been sent to you as—I’m here to be your—”

Danny's coronation is coming up and he excitedly invites the Justice League to attend.

In turn, the Justice League hesitantly accepts the invitation since they don't want to get on the wrong side of this new and very strong king of the dead. But why did Danny deliver the invitation? author: ['Blueseabird2']
title: Not so Alone
relationships: ['Dick Grayson & Bruce Wayne', 'Dick Grayson & Jason Todd', 'Dick Grayson & Damian Wayne']
characters: ['Bruce Wayne', 'Dick Grayson', 'Damian Wayne', 'Jason Todd', 'Tim Drake', 'Duke Thomas', 'Cassandra Cain', 'Stephanie Brown', 'Barry Allen', 'Wally West', 'Diana (Wonder Woman)', 'Clark Kent', 'Hal Jordan (Green Lantern)', 'Justice League (DCU)']
additional_tags: ['Bruce Wayne is a Good Parent', 'Protective Dick Grayson', 'Protective Jason Todd', 'Protective Batfamily (DCU)', 'Prank War', 'Identity Reveal', 'Crack', 'Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'BAMF Batfamily (DCU)', 'Chatlogs', 'Texting']
series: Part 3 of Batfamily Feels
summary:
Batman is insulted during a Justice League mission, which wouldn't be a problem except Nightwing is there to hear it. The other League members don't know this is a problem because they have no idea Batman has kids, much less that Nightwing is one of them. Bruce decides to do the only reasonable thing: go on vacation. His children probably won't burn down anything too important.

Dick just wants to defend his family and brag about his siblings. Good thing his father taught him a few things about the importance of detailed plans and talented allies.

The prank war starts with petty theft, purple, and cows.

Possible ghost kitties, a cow, a cactus, and several Bats invade the Tower. There are a few realizations had but the Bats still aren't found.

Bruce returns to the Watchtower is not surprised by what he finds. The Justice League has questions and actually gets some answers. The Batfamily definitely wins the war though.
notes:
Hello everyone! I started this story at a random point in my time travel work when I needed a bit of lightheartedness. This story has a couple family feels moments (I can't help myself)) but mainly focuses on BAMF Batfamily pranking the League. I've always loved the identity/children reveal stories and so here I go!

We have art now! Please take a look at the adorable art created by BDBriggs.

I hope you enjoy the start of the prank war and the League not yet knowing what's hitting them. There's a bit of batsibling bonding, because I cannot help myself.

One more to go! A few people are cluing in but the big reveal won't be until next chapter. Please enjoy a caring Hood and a giant cactus.

I hope you enjoyed and got some laughs out of this story! It was a little different for me but I really enjoyed writing it!

title: Touched
characters: ['Harry Potter', 'Tom Riddle', 'Albus Dumbledore']
additional_tags: ['POV Harry Potter', 'Tooth-Rotting Fluff', 'Light Angst', 'Sex Work', 'Sex Worker Harry Potter', 'Gentle Kissing', 'Cuddling & Snuggling', 'Touch-Starved', 'Time Travel', 'Time Travelling Harry Potter', 'Past Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley', 'Smitten Tom Riddle', 'Blow Jobs', 'Foreplay', 'Sugar Daddy Tom Riddle', 'Possessive Tom Riddle', 'Oblivious Harry Potter', 'Attempted Sexual Assault (not between Harry and Tom)', 'Ambiguous/Open Ending', 'Dark Albus Dumbledore', 'Dimension Travel', 'Sane Tom Riddle']
series: Part 1 of Touched
summary:
He’s not going to have sex with a twenty-year-old Tom Riddle. He won’t sink that low.

“Hm. Not even for twenty-five Galleons?”

Harry swallows. That’s a lot of money. It should be enough to finally afford that new coat he will need for the winter. And yet, Harry hesitates. He can’t risk changing the future. He still hopes he will, somehow, find a way to return to his friends. It’d be stupid to risk that just because he doesn’t want to freeze.

 

But why should Riddle sleeping with some whore change history? That’s ridiculous.

 

“Alright,” Harry sighs. “But only if you pay for the room.”

series: Part 1 of Still Preoccupied... With 1979
summary:
It’s May 1979 and the Order has just apprehended a pair of mysterious wizards who look remarkably like a Potter and a Malfoy. Naturally, James Potter and Sirius Black are called in to identify the strangely familiar strangers and determine their backgrounds and loyalties.

(This would be a lot easier if their captives weren’t convinced everyone they talk to is dead. It would also be easier if they didn’t spend half their bloody time bickering.)

**

“Just ask them questions only they would know the answer to,” Malfoy suggests.

“There’s not a single thing that I know about either of them from the first war that any old Death Eater couldn’t find out.”

“How is that possible?” Malfoy huffs. “He’s your father!”

“Am I or am I not famously an orphan?” Potter snarls.

**

Русский перевод: https://archiveofourown.org/works/49365862/chapters/124574398
中文翻译: https://archiveofourown.org/works/49899721

The general premise is inspired by justprompts' been waiting a lifetime (to be with you) but it's not necessary to read before this fic

This was originally supposed to be all humor, no feels, so, idrk what happened in this chapter. Not even I saw the proposal coming until I wrote it, but, alas, James Potter will do as James Potter does.

Anyway, I am determined to keep this fic as light-hearted as possible so Three’s Family will end here. However, if you feel the need for more details about how Harry and Draco will affect the past, you’re in luck because I have something resembling a sequel already half-written. Subscribe to the series for part 2, which will feature a much higher ratio of feels to humor, a depressed Harry adjusting to life without Ron and Hermione, a Regulus/Draco bromance, a marauder-worthy master of death, a jealous Remus, a very barebones description of the horcrux hunt because it’s been done before by others with more enthusiasm than I can bother to muster, a semi-redemption for Peter and a purely-hypothetical redemption for Snape, and some hopefully humorous Harry-shenanigans-centric drinking games.

author: ['aloneintherain']
title: Safeguard
fandoms: ['Spider-Man - All Media Types', 'Marvel Cinematic Universe', 'Marvel', 'The Avengers (Marvel Movies)']
characters: ['Peter Parker', 'New Yorkers - Character', 'Tony Stark', 'Aunt May', 'Johnny Storm', 'Wade Wilson', 'Steve Rogers', 'Fantastic Four - Character', 'Flash Thompson']
additional_tags: ['New York City', 'Secret Identity', 'Identity Issues', 'alludes to superhuman registration act', '(mentions of) mutant registration act', 'Hurt Peter', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'discussions of consent', 'underage superheroes', 'Police', 'protective new york', 'Overprotective', "emphasis on the 'over' part", 'News Media', 'TV News', 'POV Outsider', 'the superhero community', 'death mentioned in summary takes place before the fic and is brief and non-detailed', 'Peter-centric', 'condescending adults']
summary:
After the public death of a superhuman 15 year old, teenage superheroes are forced to wear government-issued clothing that marks them as underage.
Or; Peter is backed into a corner, Tony Stark grows increasingly frustrated, and New York protects their own.

 

Peter focusses on the pedestrians, on their whispering and pointing. At Peter. At his blue Regulation Jacket, in the middle of Times Square, blown up to epic proportions on the huge towering screens.

Oh.

“Oh,” Peter says, dumbly. “Oh no.”
notes:
This was supposed to be 3K max. I started this before Helping Hands, but it flew out of control. I've spent so much time fiddling with this fic, I'm so happy to finally upload it.

I've been thinking a lot about how the world might react to underage heroes. I mean, being a superhero is DANGEROUS. Really, really dangerous, and likely to end in major injury or death. Teenagers, out on a battlefield? Lots of adults are going to be very upset about that.

Some housekeeping:
-Peter is 16, nearing 17.
-Super is slang for superhuman/superhero.
-I love Nova, but I had to have an underage superhero die to kick start the story, so. *shrugs* Pretend it’s another, nameless Super, if it bugs you too much.
-I'm not American. Hopefully this is not too obvious.

EDIT: Cover art is by the wonderful bitterbiracialbibliophile on tumblr! Thanks so much!

EDIT (2): More art by starpaw0007. Thank you!

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

I know, Deadpool is the poster boy for shitty morals, but I think even some characters must have things they aren’t okay with. Here, Deadpool’s is consent. (And the character himself has a history of sexual abuse in the comics, SO.) I ship Peter with a lot of people, but I hate ships that depict Peter in high school, dating someone in their late 20s/30s. Little 15/16 year olds dating people 30+? Creepy. CREEPY. Also, very illegal.

I love the Avengers, including Tony. However, the man’s roles in some things (Ultron, Civil War, ect) make me so mad. I can love a character and admit they still have a lot of faults. The Avengers are my favourite superhero group, and I write them as the softest, kindest sweethearts. And maybe I made Tony more dickish than usual in this—especially considering the fact that I usually write him as a secretly schmoopy, selfless individual—but hey. Whatever.

 

WOAH, this is the longest thing I’ve ever written? It's taken a lot of time, effort, and blood, and so feedback is very much appreciated. :)

author: ['dirgewithoutmusic']
title: the kids who chose themselves
relationships: ['Anthony Goldstein & Dean Thomas', 'Ron Weasley & Cho Chang & Luna Lovegood', 'Hermione Granger & Fred Weasley & George Weasley', 'Ginny Weasley & the Creevey Brothers', 'Sirius Black & Remus Lupin', 'Mrs. Thomas & Ginny Weasley']
characters: ['Ravenclaw Ron Weasley - Character', 'Filius Flitwick', 'Hermione Granger', 'Cho Chang', 'Luna Lovegood', 'Ginny Weasley', 'Anthony Goldstein', 'Dean Thomas', 'Mrs. Thomas', 'Mrs. Weasley', 'Mr. Weasley', 'Autistic Charlie Weasley - Character', 'Percy Weasley']
additional_tags: ['a Hogwarts underground', 'Alternate Universe - Hogwarts', 'the Second Wizarding War is just a continuation of the First']
series: Part 2 of boy with a scar
summary:
What if Voldemort went after Harry and Neville, and gave no one a chance to die for them? What if both Chosen Ones died as children?
--
There was no prophesied boy, but there was still this--dozens of shadowed young faces refusing to run, even at the very end of the world. Dumbledore looked out at his chess pieces, pawns and queens; his children and his friends; his collateral damage. He had the beginnings of a plan swelling in his chest.

It would take them decades to get their hands, quietly, on every Horcrux. Tom Riddle had to think they were secret. He had to think he was safe. It would take them almost decades, but one day he would be mortal again.

These dozens of faces--they were mortal now. Alastor Moody could feel mortality in the aches of old broken bones; Andromeda rewrote her own last name. Remus and Sirius felt empty, gaping holes in the seats around them, and they made crude, expansive, joyous toasts to friends' memories.

When Molly first reached over and held Arthur's hand, they knew this was something that could not last. That was why they held hands, held on, held tight.
notes:
I already posted this as an additional chapter to 'boy with a scar' but people have been having a hard time finding it, so I thought I'd repost for y'all.

What if he killed Alice and Frank without hesitation, and was able to kill defenseless little Neville. Then just to be safe, he tracked the Potter's down too. What if Snape didn't find out in time, and Lily was murdered without thought, and Harry shortly after."

author: ['dirgewithoutmusic']
title: no place like home
relationships: ['Harry Potter & Warrington', 'Harry Potter & Hestia Carrow', 'Harry Potter & Cedric Diggory', 'Harry Potter & Fred Weasley & George Weasley', 'Harry Potter & Nymphadora Tonks', 'Harry Potter & Peeves', 'Harry Potter & the basilisk']
additional_tags: ['Harry raised by Hogwarts', 'Ravenclaw Harry']
series: Part 3 of boy with a scar
summary:
When Petunia Dursley refused to take Harry in she forfeited his birthright protection, so Dumbledore took the baby to the safest place he knew: Hogwarts.

The applicable staff (mostly just… not Snape) took Harry in on a rotating schedule as he grew from baby to toddler to child. They traded extra credit for babysitting among the older students, and Harry grew up knowing a few dozen different laps that were safe and warm to nap in.

This was a Harry who grew up among books, among old transient walls and learned professors. They gave Binns night duty sometimes, and let him talk young Harry to sleep. This was a Harry whose world changed, on principle, daily. The stairs moved. The walls became doors. You had to keep your eyes open–you had to pay attention. So he did.

He grew up in a school. Knowledge was power, but knowledge was also joy. This was his sanctuary. There was magic in his world from birth.
notes:
I had already posted this as an additional chapter to 'boy with a scar' but people were having trouble finding it, so I'm reposting it all by itself, here.

additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Tim Drake-centric', 'Child Neglect', 'Metahuman Tim Drake', 'Bruce Wayne Tries to Be a Good Parent', 'Bruce Wayne is Bad at Feelings', 'Tim Drake Needs a Hug', 'Suicide', 'Suicide Attempt', "is it suicide if you know you'll come back to life???", 'Resurrection', 'It Gets Worse Before It Gets Better', 'Good Older Sibling Dick Grayson', 'Hurt Tim Drake', 'Child Death', 'Character Undeath', 'Character Study', 'Angst', 'Fluff and Angst', 'Angst with a Happy Ending', 'Hurt/Comfort', 'Jewish Tim Drake', 'Unreliable Narrator', 'Immortal Tim Drake', "Tim Drake's Missing Spleen", "Creepy Ra's al Ghul", 'No Bashing', 'the author loves all characters', 'Damian Wayne is Bad at Feelings', 'Good Sibling Jason Todd', 'Good Sibling Damian Wayne', 'Good Sibling Cassandra Cain', 'Tim Drake Has Issues', 'Tim Drake Is Deranged', '(AFFECTIONATE)', 'Tim Drake has the self-preservation instincts of a wet paper bag', 'blanket permission for art and podfics', 'Lazarus Pit Side Effects (DCU)', 'The unreliable narrator tag is there for a REASON', 'Deranged Tim Drake', 'I EXPLICITLY FORBID ANYONE FROM FEEDING MY FICS TO AI']
series: Part 1 of bury the dead where they're found
summary:
Tim is five years old when he drowns in his parents' pool. He dies quietly, waiting for parents who love him, but will never be there, to realise that something is wrong. They never show up, and he sinks into oblivion.

When he wakes up and claws his way out of the water, the sun has set, and the lights of his house are on. He is cold and wet and his lungs burn.

But most of all, Tim is alone.

(If you die and no-one is there to see it, were you ever alive in the first place?)

Here is the thing: there is something wrong with Timothy Drake.

Trust me.

It’s a nice evening.

It doesn’t last.

Tim isn’t really sure if anyone has ever... cried over him.
notes:
I EXPLICITLY FORBID ANYONE FROM FEEDING MY FICS TO AI.

Hi hello I wrote this in a fugue state, and have most of it done. I'm not Jewish but have done my best to research specifics for this fic. Please feel free to correct me!

Anyway, I've given Tim the power to come back to life. How does he have this ability? Idk his mom had a water birth near some lazarus pits or something. This will never be examined closely, at least not in this fic. As for canon, uh. I've taken the timeline and made it my own. There is no such thing as DC canon, so I have cherry picked my favourite parts like a monkey picks bugs from its sibling's fur.

Enjoy, leave a comment, bookmark or kudos. Chapter title comes from 'Chelsea' by Phoebe Bridgers.

EDIT: quick note; Tim is an incredibly unreliable narrator in this. If you're expecting a straightforward 'poor little meow meow Tim he's so mistreated and abused by the mean mean Bats', then this is NOT the fic for you. oh my god thank you all for the support and comments, like holy shit??? thank you all so so much, i hope you like this chapter, though it may seem a bit wonky at times. most of my batman knowledge comes from a) the 1998 YJ run, b) DC Rebirth, c) Red Robin, and d) trawling through fanfics and the wiki. bc of that, i firmly do not believe in a consistent DC canon and instead just write what i want. so yeah, if something seems inconsistent or off, it's because im making a whole ass frankenstein's monster out of the source material and my own headcanons. also my desire to make writing easier for myself.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

did tim seriously invent a device that could mess with konnors hearing just in case tim died so kon wouldnt question not hearing his heartbeat? yes. yes he did.

once again, tim is not a reliable narrator. the way he understands things gets misinterpreted and distorted very easily. i absolutely love every member of the batfam, and very much Do Not Do Bashing. i find it a disservice to the characters and think it prevents an examination into why someone reacts in a specific way.

dick is terrified out of his mind, and he's always been a bit petty and easily frustrated. add on the stress of being batman for almost a year, he really isnt in the proper mindset to talk to tim calmly. barbara is also at her limit, and as the other person next to tim who saw how bruce spiralled after jason, shes furious that tim would do that to them all again. bruce is clueless and thinks tim wants space, especially because hes emancipated. rest assured hes making sad longing eyes as he watches tim leave, while telling himself that he has to respect his childrens boundaries. alfred is barely holding everyone together, and needs a holiday. damian doesnt know what the fuck is going on but knows its Bad and tries to help in his weird, awful way. steph is not dealing. with what you ask? she doesn't know either. and cass is absolutely desperate and furious that she cant make the words and thoughts make sense.

They Are Having A Time. And Not A Good One.

anyway, an actual, in depth bruce and tim reunion will happen next chapter, along with comfort, cuddles, and pain. there will be POVs galore. i am currently crying as i realise how many other one-shots im going to have to write because there are so many other paths i wanted to explore. (tim actually running away, tim NOT CUTTING OFF HIS ARM and being trapped by Ra's, DICK ARRIVING JUST AS TIM IS STABBED, etc. fuck im never going to get my masters at this rate.)

thank you all so much for reading and supporting this story, i cant believe the sheer amount of people who enjoy it. as always, leave a comment, bookmark and kudos!!!

bug, i hear you say, bug, wasnt this meant to be four chapters long.

no, i reply. youre imagining things. i definitely did not write more than expected about the batfam reacting to tims death. i definitely did not underestimate how much i had to say. i definitely did not lie when i said last chapter that things would be resolved.

summary:
“Oh, come on Addams,” Yoko says, looking down to the smaller girl through her black glasses. “I’m a vampire, I can practically hear your heartbeat when she’s around.”

Wednesday freezes up, and not the fun kind, not the brief spasm her muscles do before she fakes rigor mortis, when she slows her heart down until it’s almost non-existent. It’s the kind where if anything, it makes her heartbeat speed up, and the knowing smirk she is afforded from the other girl makes Wednesday want to stake Yoko through the heart and pin it to her murder board.

The only tell-tale sign that the words got to her is the tiny, almost unnoticeable, twitch to her right eyebrow. “I resent that observation.”

-

After Crackstone, Wednesday's visions become even more unstable and confusing, and it doesn't help she's only just realised she's in love with a werewolf.

title: the heir of something or other
relationships: ['Harry Potter & Millicent Bulstrode', 'Hermione Granger & Harry Potter', 'Colin Creevey & Dennis Creevey & Harry Potter', 'Luna Lovegood & Harry Potter', 'Astoria Greengrass & Harry Potter', 'Astoria Greengrass & Daphne Greengrass', 'Daphne Greengrass & Pansy Parkinson', 'Hermione Granger & Ron Weasley']
characters: ['Harry Potter', 'Millicent Bulstrode', 'Colin Creevey', 'Hermione Granger', 'Dennis Creevey', 'Luna Lovegood', 'Ron Weasley', 'Draco Malfoy', 'Astoria Greengrass', 'Daphne Greengrass', 'Pansy Parkinson', 'Neville Longbottom', 'Susan Bones']
additional_tags: ['Slytherin Harry', 'A few other House color changes...', 'Canon Typical Violence', 'Canon Death', 'Canon typical bullying', 'Stuff']
series: Part 5 of boy with a scar
summary:
When kids in the Slytherin Common Room tossed jeers at the pudgy feet of Millicent Bulstrode, Harry rose up to do something about it. This Harry, now one of Snape’s own, got fewer House points lost but many more detentions– it had never been the colors on his hem that Severus hated.

This was not wishing Harry an easy path. This was not wishing the boy a warm House. This was Harry, three weeks in, sleep deprived and considering running away and going back to Privet Drive. This was Harry in the back of Potions class, blank-faced under Snape’s disdain the way he’d perfected under the Dursleys’s torments.

When Quirrell shouted “troll in the dungeons, thought you ought to know,” and Harry overheard that there was a girl in the bathroom crying, he still ran off to make sure she got out okay. He hesitated first, at the back of the little pack of Slytherin first years (at the back so that no one could get behind him)– he hesitated.

And Millicent Bulstrode, who could never quite keep her tummy tucked in enough, could never brush all the cat hair off her robes, never quite keep her temper in check, hesitated, too.

summary:
There’s a pause, and then Wednesday speaks again. “I admit that I do have one ulterior motive in asking you to visit for the holidays.”

Enid laughs, unsurprised; there’s the Wednesday she knows, even a phone line and a coast away. “Yeah? What is it?”

“I told my parents that I’m in a relationship,” Wednesday says, offhand, like it’s just another sentence and not a lightning strike to Enid’s heart. "With you, specifically."

author: ['Echo']
title: A.I.s and Lullabies
relationships: ['Bruce Banner & Tony Stark', 'Natasha Romanov & Tony Stark', 'Jarvis (Iron Man movies) & Tony Stark']
characters: ['Tony Stark', 'Bruce Banner', 'Jarvis (Iron Man movies)', 'Natasha Romanov', 'Clint Barton', 'Thor (Marvel)', 'Steve Rogers']
additional_tags: ['De-aging', 'Kidfic', 'Child Abuse', 'Bittersweet Ending']
summary:
Tony is suddenly a quiet, wary five year old boy. The rest of the team are less than completely sure about what to do about that.

Natasha reminds Bruce that little Starks still need their sleep.

Clint takes Tony toy shopping, and draws his own conclusions.

Tony has some questions for JARVIS

Tony discovers the Iron Man suits, and Bruce gets used to being trusted.

Tony does quite a lot of thinking, and JARVIS gets quizzed

Natasha finds out a bit about Tony, and Tony finds out a bit about Natasha in the process.

Tony does some science of his own, and Bruce is faced with a very complicated question.

Tony reaches a compromise with Natasha, an understanding with Steve, and disproves the saying that you can't choose your family.

JARVIS always follows his creator's wishes.

Natasha and Bruce share an understanding.

JARVIS shows Tony what he's missed
notes:
Fill for http://avengerkink.livejournal.com/5102.html?thread=4669422#t4669422

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Hopefully you don't all resent me terribly for not letting Bruce and Natasha keep their little Tony for ever after. Part way through the second part I realized this would be how it would end, and no matter what I tried, it was inevitable. They got Tony back, and Natasha and Bruce have finally come to understand each other, but as Avengers, some kinds of joy can only ever be fleeting. :(

With that many comments requesting a Tony-centric epilogue, I had to oblige. This is absolutely, finally, it

author: ['MsMio']
title: The Ghost in your Videos
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
characters: ['Wednesday Addams', 'Enid Sinclair', 'Yoko Tanaka', 'Bianca Barclay', 'Ajax Petropolus', 'Eugene Ottinger', 'Xavier Thorpe']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - College/University', 'Lesbian Wednesday Addams', 'Lesbian Enid Sinclair', 'oop Wednesday is butch again', 'Enid is a Youtuber', 'and her fans are feral about her hot roommate', 'but so is Enid', 'Smut', 'Mild Painplay', "there's blood too but it's not that big of a deal"]
summary:
“who is that behind u???!!!”

“IS THAT A GHOST!?”

“THERE’S A REALLY HOT GIRL BEHIND YOU!!!!”

Enid spins in her chair, and her scream surely peaks her microphone.

Wednesday, in all of her goth glory, stands right behind Enid with her usual deadpan look. “Enid, you’re live streaming.”

Or the AU where Enid is a YouTuber, and her fans can't stop asking about her goth roommate after she appears in one of the live streams.

Enid should have cut off the stream sooner.

Another Saturday night, and like most Saturday nights, Wednesday comes back to the dorm smelling of blood.

Enid and her viewers start to find a balance.

Sundays were made for sleeping in.

It's totally not a birthday date.

Breaking the law is a pass time for an Addams.

Enid lets go of her worries; it turns out pretty great for her.

They'll deal with the consequences in the morning.

The morning after.

They have an actual date this time.

Gomez visits his daughter, and future daughter-in-law.

Wednesday and Enid do a Q&A.
notes:
(See the end of the work for other works inspired by this one.)

Yes, hello, welcome. Why did I write this??? I don't know, I was bored and I think I'm funny. Also, I love putting Enid through the ringer, she delights my brain like nothing else.

Anyways, these idiots are all like 21+ so expect some spice. Though I'll probably not update this fic as often as my main one. Which, by the by, if you haven't read my other Wenclair story, My Love Makes me a Monster, please check it out!! Enid is especially an idiot in that one :)

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Wednesday, who watches all of Enid's videos and secretly follows her Twitter: Excellent, I'm pushing her toward the edge of insanity.

ARE YOU ALL...GOOD??? I WOKE UP TO OVER 50 COMMENTS, LIKE YOU GOOD???!!! Okay but in all seriousness, thank you guys so much for the amazing support!!! I didn't think this story would be THIS FUCKING POPULAR!!

Anyways, here you go, you animals, enjoy Wednesday being Wednesday, and Enid crying as she loses all control over her chat.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Wednesday: I'm going to cause trouble on purpose.

I...I'm...I'm truly speechless. Like, thank you???? You guys are utterly insane, but like in the best way possible. Anyways, here y'all go, have at it.

By the way, I have a third Wenclair fic planned out, similar to this one but instead everyone is human and stuff, and Wednesday and Eugene have an apartment together. Eugene is a Twitch streamer with a mysterious roommate who goes by the name 'Bats' on streams. If that sounds interesting to you guys, let me know, and I'll get to work on it.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Hi, apologies for not doing this sooner, I thought I made the twitter usernames pretty obvious, but I forgot I'm the author so of course they are obvious to me. Anyways, here you go!

Enid the Wolf - Enid
Bia Bar - Bianca
yoki bear - Yoko
Divy - Divina
former slenderman - Xavier
ASnake - Ajax
Black Butterfly - ;) unknown

Thanks for the amazing comments and support of this silly little fic my guys, I'm still very much stunned at how this funny little story blew up so fast. Anyways, as always, I hope you enjoy the new chapter!

Also, to clarify some stuff. Enid is 22 while Wednesday is 21 (soon to be 22), they meet freshman year in college, and right now they are juniors, so they've been rooming together for almost three years now; so these girls are as thick as thieves (who are in love with each other).

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Wednesday's sleepy little lizard brain: Cold, find warmth.
Enid, a very warm body: Hey sleepy head, you wanna sit-
Wednesday, stopped listening after sit: Yes.

No birthday stream??? Wednesday had more important things to, and Enid was in no mood to share Wednesday with her thirsty fans. Once again, thank you all for the crazy and amazing support!!! You guys brighten my day with your kind words, and eagerness for the next chapter!!

And yes, I had to give Wednesday a poem tattoo and I thought Emily Dickinson's Wild Nights was very fitting for a secret romantic like Wednesday. Also, the song playing is People Are Strange by The Doors; I like to think Wednesday listens to a lot of like 70s and 80s rock.

Sorry if any of you hated me describing the tattoos in such detail, but as someone who wants to be covered in tattoos, I wanted to bring them to life in my writing.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Wednesday and Enid: It's not a date.
Everyone else: It's a date.

Teehee guess who kind of burnt herself out and had to take a tiny break from writing :3
Anyways, let's get back to Wednesday causing trouble on purpose.

Sad girl hours??? In my funny little fic??!! Yes because I love Enid and think she's neat. In other news, Y'ALL ARE AMAZING!!! Thanks for your well wishes, but I'm all good now my dudes!!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Me, writing the last bit: Okay just have Enid flirt with Weds and stop there.
My gay brain: Right, have Weds lose it and kiss Enid and then fuck her.
Me: NO!

y'all ;v; I don't know what happened

By popular demand I wrote smut. Shoutout to my girlfriend for reading this for me, everyone say thank you to her, without her I would have lost my nerve about making this chapter.

Also my girlfriend says: yo what's up, leeches

I gotta say y'all, we're getting close to the end of this story; there'll probably be three more chapters. I've had a blast writing this fic, and I'm still stunned by how popular it became in such a short amount of time. Thank you for your amazing support, and I can't wait to bring you all more stories in the future!

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Wednesday comes back for lunch.
Enid: Hey Weds-
Wednesday, already taking off her shoes and tie: we have thirty minutes, let's not waste them.

First off, congrats to everyone that guessed correctly on Wednesday being a bit of a dragon. I will say she'll never be a true dragon, all she'll ever be able to do is form scales and teeth, and she can't breathe fire, much to her disappointment.

Second, we have two chapters left, and the next one chapter is the duel between Gomez and Enid.

Don't know about you all, but I like to chew gum when I'm all fidgety and nervous.

Anyways, one more chapter to go for this fic!!!

AND THAT'S THE END FOLKS!!!! Thank you all for reading and your amazing support!!

I know a lot of you guys didn't want to see an end this fic, but maybe this will not be the total end of this AU! If I ever get the inspiration we might see a squeal to this fic!!

author: ['relenafanel']
title: Slide To Answer
characters: ['Steve Rogers', 'James "Bucky" Barnes']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Modern Setting', 'Wrong Number AU', 'Romantic Comedy', 'Phone Calls & Telephones', 'Dating', 'One Night Stands', 'Steve accidentally calls Bucky for dating advice', 'Bucky gives good advice', 'Meet-Cute', 'Misunderstandings']
series: Part 1 of Slide to Answer
summary:
"What do I do?” Steve appealed into the phone. “I’m freaking out.”

There was silence on the other end of the line. It lasted so long that Steve pulled the receiver away from his ear and frowned at it. Pay phones were old. Maybe this one wasn’t working despite the obvious dial tone when he picked up.

“Ok,” a stranger’s voice said over the phone. “First acknowledge the fact that you dialed the wrong number, but be quick about it because my cab is a few blocks away from my own plans and I’m about to drop some truth bombs on you.”
notes:
(with thanks and apologies to biblionerd07 for letting me use her bad dating experience for one of the scenes).

Warnings for: Bad dating experiences that include creepy one-liners that strip recipient of bodily autonomy, slight judgment of different dating styles, and one point with a misunderstanding where Bucky almost turns Steve down.

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

author: ['Maeyari']
title: In a Language He Understands
characters: ['Alhaitham (Genshin Impact)', 'Kaveh (Genshin Impact)', 'Tighnari (Genshin Impact)', 'Cyno (Genshin Impact)']
additional_tags: ['Kaveh-centric (Genshin Impact)', 'Fluff', 'Minor Angst', 'Deaf Character', 'Sign Language', 'Deaf Alhaitham (Genshin Impact)', 'Pining', "They're both stupid btw", 'Written Before Kaveh Release (Genshin Impact)', "also technically before Alhaitham's release too but i posted this the day his banner dropped oops", 'Miscommunication', "a little ooc?? hard to tell because these guys literallt aren't real yet", 'Petty Kaveh', 'Romance', 'Jealous Alhaitham (Genshin Impact)']
series: Part 1 of Deaf!Alhaitham
summary:
Kaveh used to think that Alhaitham had mastered the art of ignoring him. The man would remain unflappable as he continued to read his worn copy of The Origins of Enkanomiyan Language, even when Kaveh was a hair’s breadth away from shattering the windows of their house with his severity of pitch.

No amount of screaming, threats to throw things, or violently waving in front of him could get Alhaitham to pause in his thirst for knowledge. As it turns out, Alhaitham literally just turns his hearing aids off so he doesn’t have to listen to Kaveh.

It’s for this exact reason that Kaveh has decided to learn Sumerian Sign Language.

or,

Kaveh learns sign language just to continue bickering with Alhaitham.
notes:
Disclaimer: I'm not HOH, nor do I know any HOH people personally, so as a result, there may be some misrepresentation of deaf culture in my writing. None of it is intentional, so if there are any deaf readers, please, please, PLEASE feel free to leave a comment or find me on twitter and let me know what I can fix in the future! I want everyone who reads to have a good experience :-)

The signs used in here are based off of ASL (American Sign Language). I know some of the basics because I took a very short introductory course because I thought the class was interesting but unfortunately I didn’t get much education on the language after that bc my school doesn’t offer it :( I would love to take it in the future tho, but for now, all of the signs in here are either made up or derived directly from ASL. Please feel free to let me know if there are any inconsistencies or something I should correct.

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Tighnari: Alhaitham thought you and I were WHAT

 

The end is lazy and cringe i know im sorry i just want to put it out there so i can go about my life without them eating away at my brain like worms. I'm also sorry if there are a few notes i left in there, my beta reader is busy and i had to edit this myself ^^;

I might do Alhaitham's POV, depending on if people want it or not. Let me know, because I would be so down to write it!!

title: He’s Not Paid Enough to Deal with This Shit
characters: ['Sherlock Holmes', 'John Watson', 'Mycroft Holmes', 'Anthea (Sherlock)', 'Jim Moriarty']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Humor', 'First Meetings']
summary:
One of the first things John did was to write up step-by-step instructions on how to conduct a proper job interview before handing it over to Mycroft for his perusal. There were no kidnapping, deserted car parks or stolen therapy notes anywhere on that list.

(Or the one where John returned from the war and ended up working for Mycroft as his personal assistant slash doctor on retainer. Everything was fine, until he was sent to post bail for one Sherlock Holmes.)
notes:
Part 1 and 3 are from John’s POV, and Part 2 is from Sherlock’s.

I would really like to thank astro_frog5 and david_of_oz for the amazing job they did editing this fic despite how little time there was left for beta reading! :O They both scrutinised the fic and gave me such detailed feedback, that I feel immeasurably better about it. If there are any issues or mistakes, it’s entirely on me, because I did have to rush through my edits. >_>

Thank you so much for the interest!

Here's a translation into Vietnamese posted outside of AO3, done by Binnbinn!

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

Yes, in my head, if John was Mycroft’s PA, we wouldn’t have the whole mess of Moriarty’s evil plans in Season 2. You would still have a Sebastian Moran running free, just to keep the world a little exciting for them.

I hit up Google for a variety of skin conditions before I found one to fit Sherlock’s deductions. Unfortunately, I didn’t have the guts to Google for how long a body takes to rot in the desert, so that’s completely made up. However, my beta-reader David, knows all kinds of things and suggested that it probably takes some time for bodies to rot in a desert, considering the low humidity and the high amount of preservatives in army rations.

This was a pinch-hit, and I weren’t entirely sure what to do with the prompt at first, so I hope it was still enjoyable on some level!

author: ['andavs', 'rosepetals42']
title: The Silent Fury
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
characters: ['Stiles Stilinski', 'Derek Hale', 'Scott McCall', 'Talia Hale', 'Laura Hale', 'Cora Hale', 'Isaac Lahey', 'Erica Reyes', 'Vernon Boyd', 'Brett Talbot', 'Sheriff Stilinski', 'Melissa McCall']
additional_tags: ['How to Train Your Dragon AU', 'Emissary Stiles Stilinski', 'Magical Stiles Stilinski', 'Werewolves', 'Alive Hale Family']
summary:
Derek is about to leave, content with the smell of blood as proof that the Fury is dead when he hears it.

A heartbeat.

It’s faint and uneven and even with its help, it takes Derek a full minute of scanning the clearing before he finally spots the small heap that must be the human. It’s down on the far side of the canyon, almost completely hidden by a tall oak tree and–Derek jumps down before he thinks about it.

He knows what he has to do. Furies are dangerous. Furies are fire and smoke and a funeral he barely remembers. He lands almost silently and makes sure his hands are fully shifted into claws and then slowly moves forward.

Or, a How to Train Your Dragon AU
notes:
Hello, and welcome to the first ever full-fledged Puddle and Fish Collaboration!

One day, both Leda and I watched HTTYD. And then we started talking about a possible HTTYD AU. And then we forgot to stop talking and suddenly I was writing and she was creating visual masterpieces and we both kept sharing more and more ideas and editing and now here we are. Three months later with a monster on our hands. We hope you like it!

title: Forgetting It's There
characters: ['Peter Parker', 'Steve Rogers', 'Bruce Banner', 'Tony Stark', 'Natasha Romanova', 'Clint Barton', 'Thor (Marvel)']
additional_tags: ['Crack', 'Angst', 'cracky angst', 'Angsty crack', 'Steve is a ridiculous human being', 'Spoilers', 'this pairing needs a stupid name', 'spimerica?', 'captainman?', 'peeve?', "seriously help me out here i've got nothing", 'Hurt/Comfort', 'nobody asked for the avengers watching Rocky Horror but i wrote it anyway', 'Rare Pairing']
summary:
“You’re Captain America,” he blurts out.

“What?” says Captain America, looking a little wide-eyed. He casts a nervous glance at the girl at the counter – he has nothing to worry about there, she’s rocking out to her iPod and could care less what they’re talking about – and says, “No, uh, Steve, it’s just, I’m Steve.”

“Right,” says Peter, and then because his brain-to-mouth filter had apparently been completely destroyed in the fight on Oscorp Tower: “Hey, your butt really is as tight as it looks on TV.”
notes:
Title from “Humanity I love you” by e. e. cummings – specifically this excerpt:

“Humanity i love you because you
are perpetually putting the secret of
life in your pants and forgetting
it's there and sitting down

on it”

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

So in the comics Peter lives in Forest Hills, Queens and that isn’t actually close to Brooklyn at all. I’m ignoring this because of reasons.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

I’m taking liberties with Peter’s age, but no amount of googling helped me to figure out what his actual age was in the film, so I figure it’s justified. (If anyone does know, shh! Let me live in my happy everyone-is-over-the-age-of-consent bubble!)

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

I can’t believe how many of you are reading this thing. You guys are ridiculous. I love you all.

summary:
After accidently getting launched through a natural rift and stuck in a alternate universe, Danny decides to help the local heroes while waiting to get picked up.
But he doesn’t do it as Phantom or Fenton, oh no. He doesn’t want either of his identities to get mixed up in all this nonsense and get traced back to him. So what does he do?
Crappy cosplay.

summary:
Five times the class didn't get the Kacchan-Deku dynamic, and the one time they started figuring it out.
//
"So that was fucking weird, right?" Kirishima checked, pointing at the door they'd just left through. The other occupants of the room nodded in agreement.

"I don't think I've ever seen those two have a conversation that didn't end in Midoriya's physical health taking a hit before." Todoroki muttered, head tilting to the side.

"It is very odd," Tokoyami agreed. "Could that simply be what happens when Bakugou neglects his sleep schedule?"

Kaminari shook his head. "I don't think so, we've been with him all day. He's mostly been normal, apart from just ignoring the shit out of us. I think Mido's the first person he actually responded to."

"This is so weird," Kirishima reiterated.
notes:
this is just so i can procrastinate writing other fics by writing tiny brotherly bkdk oneshots. and like, i mean tiny. i don't think i've ever written something this short before. its gonna be like a 5+1 thing of moments where people see bakugou actually show affection/his brotherly relationship with izuku? i am very tired i did this in like an hour :)
i love all of you, i hope you enjoy <3

author: ['greenleaf']
title: Stop Crossing Oceans
characters: ['Stiles Stilinski', 'Scott McCall', 'Derek Hale', 'Allison Argent', 'Lydia Martin', 'Jackson Whittemore', 'Cora Hale', 'Isaac Lahey', 'Erica Reyes', 'Vernon Boyd', 'Danny Māhealani', 'Sheriff Stilinski', 'Alan Deaton', 'Minor Characters']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence', 'Alpha Derek', 'Alpha Scott', 'Emissary Stiles Stilinski', 'Alpha Mate Stiles Stilinski', 'Spark Stiles Stilinski', 'Scott is a Bad Friend', 'Scott McCall is a Bad Alpha', 'Toxic friendship', 'Angst', 'So much angst', 'Fix-It', 'Pack Building', 'Pack Bite', 'Losing friends', 'Life is hard', "Deaton Can't Be Trusted", 'Sheriff is wise', 'Canon-Typical Violence', 'Blood Magic', 'Character Study', 'Broken Friendship', 'Morally Ambiguous Character']
summary:
“There are no absolutes, Scott! No hard rights or hard wrongs! The world doesn’t fucking work that way and we can’t afford to think like that, because people are going to die! We signed up for that the moment we got involved with all this!”

“We? We?” Scott hisses. “Don’t you think you? Don’t forget that you’re the one who dragged us into that forest the night it all started, Stiles. So if it’s anyone’s fault, it’s yours.”

Something inside Stiles cracks, so strong and so deep that he practically hears it.
notes:
The title comes from the quote: “There comes a time when you have to stop crossing oceans for people who wouldn’t even jump puddles for you.”

Edited May 14, 2018: I took the time to proofread the fic with some minor grammar, spelling, and text changes, nothing drastic. Thank you.

Edited May 17, 2018: A week ago, it came to my attention that somebody on Wattpad plagiarized this story, with huge chunks taken word for word without credit or mention of the original work. Today, I send my sincere gratitude to the original Anon who messaged me on tumblr and informed of the mess, as well as SpanglesandSass (Fidella) and the absolutely lovely, M, who both pointed me in the right direction. Wattpad responded promptly and has taken down the offending story.

I know that nowadays, creativity isn't really about being original. Sometimes it's just being good enough not to get caught. But let us all avoid stealing somebody's work, or at least seek permission and link back to the original. That's just common decency.

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

summary: After the disastrous end of his betrothal to Gwen and the regret of his offer to Princess Mithian, Arthur swears off finding a wife until he's ready to wed. When Merlin offers himself to Arthur as bedmate, Arthur suggests they hand-fast in secret for a single year of mutual pleasure without obligation. As their year together unfolds, and secrets and betrayals unravel around them, Arthur and Merlin learn there is no such thing as uncomplicated pleasure. Everything they thought they knew can change in the span of a single year.
notes:
Written for Paperlegends 2012. Canon-era AU, which begins post-4x11 (The Hunter's Heart) and diverges from canon there.

Goss was my art-partner on this story, and she created several stunning pieces of artwork for it. All of them are incredibly beautiful. I'm very lucky to have worked with her on this story, and I'm so grateful for her joy and generosity. Her art post is on Dreamwidth, here. (ETA: Photobucket continues to be ever-changing with its blurry and disappearing photos...I will fix that when I can. Thanks for your patience...and please go see the beautiful art at goss's post in the meantime!)

Many thanks to my intrepid and eagle-eyed betas, Cori Lannam and nu_breed, who are always insightful about story issues and who see all the things I'm blind to. Thank you also to ella_bane for her cheerleading. And finally, three cheers to the_muppet for all the hard work moderating Paperlegends. It has been a joy to participate!

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Thank you for reading! If you prefer to comment on LiveJournal, the masterpost for this story is here.

There is now a sequel to this story: Para Bellum.

author: ['exclamation']
title: One Dollar Yoda
characters: ['Stiles Stilinski', 'Derek Hale', 'Sheriff Stilinski']
additional_tags: ['Mating', 'Courtship', 'Alternate Universe', 'Alternate Universe - Werewolves Are Known', 'Magical Stiles Stilinski', 'Spark Stiles Stilinski', 'Non-Consensual Touching']
summary:
Stiles is an unbonded spark, so he's been dealing with courting alphas since he was ten. It's gotten a lot worse since he turned sixteen. Some are assholes, some are nice, but Stiles hasn't wanted to spend the rest of his life bound to any of them.

When Derek Hale shows up at his school, Stiles expects him to be just another asshole alpha attempting to buy him with expensive gifts. But Derek Hale puts no effort whatsoever into his courtship gifts. Stiles ought to be offended but instead he finds it refreshing.
notes:
This is an alternative universe where individuals with magical talent (sparks) bind themselves to alphas. There are fewer sparks than alphas, so there is a ritualised courtship process during which alphas will give gifts to sparks to convince them to bond with them and join their pack. The bonding ritual is sexual in nature (but I'm not going into it in detail in this fic) and once it's formed it can't be broken until either the alpha or the spark are dead. There is a lot of societal pressure on sparks to pick and alpha to bond with, but once that happens they will be under the alpha's authority.

I'm not going into the depth of backstory and world-building that I sometimes go into. There are certain questions I'm not exploring (such as how Stiles' mother was a spark but was married to a human). This story is just a short bit of fun. It's possible I'll come back to this 'verse and play at a later date, but there may be questions about culture that I don't answer in this fic.

There will be some non-consensual groping from one of the other alphas in a later chapter.

(See the end of the work for other works inspired by this one.)

This is the chapter the warning in the tags applies to. Trigger warning for non-con groping.

author: ['dove_dove']
title: Drinking Buddies and Diaries
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']

characters: ['Crowley (Good Omens)', 'Muriel (Good Omens)', 'Aziraphale (Good Omens)']
additional_tags: ['Sad Crowley (Good Omens)', 'Cute Muriel', 'wingthem', 'separated husbands', 'Diary/Journal', 'Late Night Conversations', 'Jealous Aziraphale (Good Omens)', 'Spoilers', 'Crowley has a nice ass']
summary:
“I read the books about you,” Muriel said matter-of-factly.

Crowley wasn’t following. “The books about me?”

“The letter books to Aziraphale’s friend Diary? You must know them. They must be an angel, but I don’t think I’ve ever met them before.”

Crowley coughed heavily. “You’ve read Aziraphale’s diary?”

Crowley finds himself in the pages of Aziraphale’s diary. Muriel meets ducks.

Aziraphale learns of the Earth Observation Files.

This one veers a bit angsty. I’ll make it up to you all, I promise.

Two diary entries in this one! Crowley comes to a decision and Muriel sells a book.

Crowley and Muriel scheme. And drink.

Stuff happens. Crowley finds his best friend.

Aziraphale and Crowley square off.

Aziraphale, Crowley, and Muriel take a trip to the sea.

Muriel torments Aziraphale. Aziraphale torments Crowley.

Aziraphale talks. Muriel is found out, and found.

God has a few things to say.

Muriel keeps their promises.
