author: ['shysweetthing']
title: Victor Effing Nikiforov
characters: ['Yuri Plisetsky', 'Katsuki Yuuri', 'Victor Nikiforov', 'Mila Babicheva', 'Anya (Yuri!!! on Ice)', 'Georgi Popovich', 'Phichit Chulanont', 'Celestino Cialdini', 'Yakov Feltsman']
additional_tags: ['Fluff and Smut', 'World Championship', "Victor's teammates tease him relentlessly", 'Alternate Universe']
summary:
AU in which Yuuri still doesn’t remember the banquet, somehow doesn’t blow Japanese Nationals, runs into Victor at the World Championships, and has absolutely no idea why his idol is suddenly friendly and incredibly handsy.

Does Yuuri care about his reasons? No. It’s Victor Effing Nikiforov.

Basically this is an excuse for total fluff. And porn. And shit-talking with bonus smut. (Edited for accuracy.) Happy birthday, Victor.

~~

Victor turned back to him, supernova smile in place once more. “I really, really like you. Promise you’ll still dance with me at the banquet if you take gold this time around.”

Yuuri stared at the man. He looked at their entwined hands—he hadn’t wanted to pull away—and their thighs, pressed together despite there being plenty of room in the backseat of the cab. That scent of Victor’s cologne—just a dab, lightly applied somewhere on his neck—swirled around him. This was too real to be a dream, too physical for him to have imagined it.

“I’m sorry,” Yuuri said slowly. “But…have we talked before?”
notes:
Translation into Русский by Natasha R. available here.

I got this idea early yesterday morning and I can’t believe it but here we are, I hope you like it!

Lots of fluff, with a dollop of smut on top.

Edit 12/25: The first version of this had Victor using emojis in SNS because COME ON he totally would, but apparently that borks AO3 formatting? So if you didn't read the whole thing before, it's here now. Sorry about the mistake!

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

author: ['obaewankenope (rexthranduil)', 'rexthranduil']
title: Aposematism
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
fandoms: ['Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (Movies)']
relationships: ['Original Percival Graves/Newt Scamander', 'Implied at this point']
characters: ['Newt Scamander', 'Percival Graves | Gellert Grindelwald', 'Original Percival Graves', 'Seraphina Picquery', 'Theseus Scamander', 'Tina Goldstein', 'Queenie Goldstein', 'Gellert Grindelwald']
additional_tags: ['Newt Scamander is a Dork', 'BAMF Newt Scamander', 'BAMF!Newt', 'But a badass one', 'Scamander brothers', 'Grindelwald bit off more than he can chew with this magizoologist', "American and British Auror's do not get along", 'And are outdone by a dork with a suitcase full of illegal creatures', 'I feel like this is gonna need a sequel... Halp']
series: Part 1 of Signalling Theory: Blue Coat
summary:
Theseus had joked once that it was Newt's most dangerous quality; the ability to seem harmless when he was quite the opposite. Newt simply considered it wise, especially since he believed his coat was more than a good enough warning that others ought to be wary of him.

It wasn't his fault so few humans paid little attention to the meaning of colours.
notes:
Update: 27th September 2022. I just went through and did some editing here and there. Altered some grammar bits etc. Hope you enjoy if you reread it (or read it for the first time).
Update on update: 28th September 2022. I actually went to the effort of looking up how possessive apostrophe's work and in British English. I've been using them mostly right for years so Ha! Yes, I went and re-edited this because of this very fact. So what.

I have seen Fantastic Beasts only once so far and did not expect to fall in love with the movie, least of all Newt Scamander. As such, I trawled AO3 for fic and found a woefully small amount of bamf!Newt fics in existence. In addition, I discovered the Code: Blue Coat series by Pinchess07 which I strongly recommend you go and read, which cemented my love for Newt and his colourful coat.

I hope you enjoy this fic, the labours of my distraction, and enjoy the bamf!Newt too :)

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Theseus is now a new fav btw. It's a good thing him and Newt don't see each other that often, the magical world would tumble before the brilliance of the Scamander brothers!

As always, comments and kudos are greatly appreciated.

series: Part 1 of Scientific Inquiry
summary:
A young Vulcan decides to find a mate for his guardian, Spock. After careful calculations, Cadet Kirk is obviously the superior choice.

French translation by Emily Bright

Русский translation by sKarEd

notes:
(See the end of the work for other works inspired by this one.)

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Hello gentle readers! I'm going to try my hand at other POVs in the next two chapters. I've only written in "Jim" but I want to try Senik and Spock. Spock POV is a personal favorite of mine, but I've never been brave enough to try. Wish me luck :-)

Thank you for reading and any feedback.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Readers, you make me smile, I'm blown away by your responses. Thank you thank you thank you thank you.

To everyone who just wanted to coo and cuddle Senik, I hope you enjoyed it.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Many thanks to the people who produce the Youtube videos of how to do basic things on the International Space Station, the trailer for the movie "Gravity" (absolutely terrifying!!), and my readers for indulging my wish to do my take on Kobayashi Maru-ish event where Jim has to turn to Spock, demanding the Vulcan to "hold me." Yes, 3000+ words just for that.

tomasu: family member
telik: bonded
fam'telsu: without a bond

Thank you dear readers, I adore reading your reviews, you are really keeping me motivated and provide that mental chocolate I crave. Flirty K/S ahead for all of you!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

(I believe there is a very strong correlation between true love and breakfast food.)

So, Spock making the first move. Thoughts?

Thank you dear readers. Sorry for the delay. I'm going to lay the blame directly where it needs to go: on myself Tumblr.

Thank you for your feedback, it is what kept me up tonight finishing this. All mistakes are my own, compounded my lack of sleep. You guys are awesome and completely worth it.

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Gentle Readers, Senik wanted the POV in this chapter, and we just don't think Spock-n-Jim would get a booster seat and let Senik order off the kiddie menu on their first date (yes, I know you'd let him join you on your dates... it's only logical.) He had to be sneaky.

I do want to write that scene. I have a thing for hands. And dessert. Yum.

Thank you, as always, for your kind replies and comments. I'd have Senik deliver a chocolate cake to all of you!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Anyone else want to read more of "The Vulcan Captain and the Virgin Yeoman?" 'Moist.' Gross.

Thank you dear readers, you know, I really really had this great scene where Senik wound up in the hospital over this, but I chickened out after the 30th comment of how much you guys like him. I couldn't even bruise him a little.

Thank you for your comments and kudos, I love hearing your thoughts. The end is within sight, I think!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Oh my goodness. Just a tiny epilogue, and the end *sniffles*

Gentle readers, thank you for your patience, I can't wait to comment on your kind words that have motivated me to sit down and get the rest of this story out. You are all just the best!

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

The end!

Gentle, amazing, sweet, dear, awesome readers, you can expect your very own Senik (c)*** in the mail in 5-7 business days. You are awesome, make my day, wind beneath my wings, brain chocolate that sustains me during dreary work days. Always happy to read your thoughts. LLAP <3

 

***Some assembly required, please no refined sugars. Reader is aware that Senik (c) has an accepted "primary contract" on subject property and that this offer is a backup offer that will be placed in first position if the current "primary contract" is cancelled for any reason. Senik (c) branded products may have the benefit of a manufacturer's warranty provided by the product manufacturer - please see your product box and literature for details. Not responsible for direct, indirect, incidental or consequential damages or "scientific inquiry" resulting from any defect, error or failure to perform.

Edit August 6, 2022: Dear Gentle Reader, if you've gotten this far, thank you for reading! It's been 9 years since I first shared this, I've done some very small edits to clear up the grammar, fix my spacing, and dust off the silly mistakes. I've enjoyed having you as a reader (and return reader!) and hope to hear from you. 😊

author: ['ShanaStoryteller']
title: hope is the thing with feathers
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
characters: ['Stiles Stilinski', 'Derek Hale', 'Scott McCall', 'Alan Deaton', 'Laura Hale', 'Peter Hale', 'Talia Hale', 'Sheriff Stilinski', 'Lydia Martin', 'Danny Māhealani', 'Jackson Whittemore', 'OFCs', 'OMCs']
additional_tags: ['BAMF Stiles', 'Magic!Stiles', 'Hale fire', 'AU', 'universe fix it', 'Pre series', 'Pre-Slash', 'Scott and Stiles bromance', 'Derek is an artist', 'Everyone lives', "peter doesn't suck", "Stiles is Derek's Anchor", 'stiles and the hales are tight']
series: Part 1 of where thou art, that is home
summary:
Stiles is ten when he saves the Hales from their burning home and Derek from a wolfsbane bullet, and this establishes a pattern that seem to continue indefinitely.

"Then he's facing a burning home, and he wraps the hood of his sweatshirt around his mouth before he pushes the door open and steps inside. There's Mr. Hale asleep - he hopes asleep - on the couch, next to - Stiles thinks that's his brother but there are so many Hales, who can keep track. He rushes over and starts shaking him, can see the rise and fall of the man's chest so he knows he's alive, but he's not waking up.
He shoves away his hood so he can shout, "Mr. Hale! You have to get up, there's a fire! Mr. Hale, get up!" Nothing, he's not even twitching, both of them taking in deep even breaths like they're having the most peaceful of rests, and Stiles is going to cry. "Wake up, wake up, wake up!"
There's a moment, where all Stiles can hear is the blood rushing in his ears and not the roar of the flames or the creak of wood, then with a violent, silent pop it's all back and both of the men are gasping awake, eyes open and jumping to their feet. "
notes:
(See the end of the work for notes and other works inspired by this one.)

I started this a couple months ago, and while I did some quick editing on thing, like making Peter Talia's brother and mentioning emissaries, the important tree and Stiles sacrifice was in there from the first outline, so I feel awesome. I'm note sure when I'll start the second part, but if nothing else I have an outline for it.

If you'd like, you can follow/harass me on tumbler here: shanastoryteller.tumblr.com

I put a lot of love and effort into this, so I hope you enjoyed it!

archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']

summary:
“Just… tell me. Tell me what is going on, Snape.”
What was going on was that Severus Snape had no trouble tracking down one Petunia Evans, now Dursley, to a little town in Surrey where he saw how exactly she was treating her nephew. Which somehow led to last night and Severus knocking on Lupin’s door with a toddler half-asleep in his arms.
notes:
Warning for implied bad treatment of children (not sexual). Emotional and physical abuse in a domestic setting.
Also, many of the DADA professors that led to Lockhart’s hiring, which had to had been bad.

This work is part of a long series. More warnings with future updates, which I hope to do weekly.

Translation available in Russian here.
Partial translation available in German here.

Podfic by sam Gabriel available here.

(See the end of the work for more notes and other works inspired by this one.)

(See the end of the chapter for notes.)

Yes, I know. But the story is continued in The Meaning of Dandelions!

Mistletoe has many symbolic meanings. In addition to Christmas and the kissing tradition it symbolizes fertility and vitality. It has also been used to symbolize peace and friendship. Hanging mistletoe could indicate a place where violence was forbidden.

Feedback is love!

summary:
thatsochangeablechick: like i know there’s this post going around of Jason calling Bruce ‘dad’ sarcastically and getting freaked about it, but i want you to consider
jason calls bruce ‘dad’ and b is visibly moved, gruff voice shaky, sheen of tears behind lenses and all that, as he tries to brush past it (bc if b made a big deal jay would flip his shit, for the discourse ™ )
so jason gets into the habit of dropping the d-word in there just to see what he can get away with, want a batmobile? take it. fleeing his siblings after irritating them? you do you jay chum.

________

"See, Tim?" Jason called over his shoulder sardonically. "Dad agrees with me."

He turned back to his food for a moment before the thought suddenly occurred to him that the Cave had gone near silent. He cautiously glanced back at the others. Alfred was still working away at stitching Tim up. Tim looked a little pale and sweaty, but he was glancing over at Jason with a look that was a mixture of concern and confusion. Bruce was standing stock-still, seemingly staring off into space.

Idk. I'm in a cruddy mood today and this was done. Enjoy.

author: ['0lizzybennet0']
title: Twenty-Five Hours
characters: ['Katsuki Yuuri', 'Victor Nikiforov', 'Yuri Plisetsky', 'Yakov Feltsman']
additional_tags: ['Angst', 'Miscommunication', 'Getting Together', 'Flirting at 40000ft in the air']
summary: In which Yuuri spends a 25 hour flight next to Victor Nikiforov, skating legend, and feels it might simultaneously be the best and worst thing that has ever happened to him.
notes:
Set at the start of the series, if Yuuri and Victor had never met at the banquet and Yuuri never skated Victor's routine.

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Okay. So as it turns out, I am incapable of updating any faster. I probably should have noted at the beginning that I would be slow to update, apologies! Unfortunately the combination of the commute, a 9-5, and fabbo work ‘busy season’ leaves little time outside of the weekend for life’s finer pursuits (fanfic). Why, you might ask, did I embark on a 20,000+ word fic in the middle of busy season then? Good question, I have no impulse control.

Thank you for the frankly gorgeous comments on this fic. I am honestly blown away. I am quite concerned that I won’t quite live up to the expectations I never anticipated having! Thank you all for making me, on many many occasions, silently dance in the bathroom at work while reading your comments. I’m not even kidding.

(See the end of the chapter for more notes.)

Note: Yuuri's descent into drunken disarray is unfortunately quite accurately modeled on my usual trajectory after overdoing the vodka. Including the rapid bounce back to sobriety, which gives you plenty of time to really think about all the ill-advised things you might have done.

Where they are flying is irrelevant to the story, mainly because I can't really justify (without significant weaseling) why they'd be flying any route that takes 25 hours. The only people flying that are Australians trying to escape their 46 degrees hellhole of a country.

author: ['mommymuffin']
title: Throw Away the Key
archive_warnings: ['Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings']
characters: ['Stiles Stilinski', 'Derek Hale', 'Scott McCall (Teen Wolf)', 'Sheriff Stilinski']
additional_tags: ['One Shot', 'Feral Derek', 'Magical Stiles Stilinski', 'Scenting', 'Cuddly Derek']
summary:
Stiles knew it was stupid to go to the hunters’ headquarters all by himself, so when he finds himself caught, he can really only blame himself.

It shouldn't surprise Stiles when the situation quickly goes from bad to worse as the hunters throw him to a feral werewolf waiting to tear him apart.

Sucks that it's Derek, though.
notes:
I feel really bad for being so slow on finishing the second part of the "Shakespeare Was a Wolf" series and I am sorry to anyone who is ever so patiently waiting for it. To show how sorry I am, please have this (much shorter) Sterek story in the meantime. I am working on part two, I promise!

So, this story popped into my head and popped right out (in record time, no less), because my mind is often wont to wander down the path of Feral Derek. It is such an intriguing path, that one. And this story had been niggling at the back of my brain for a while now I think. Also, since I'm rewatching Teen Wolf from the beginning with my roommate, it somehow wound up being kind of set in between season one and season two?? Or something??? I'm not really sure. Let's just call it canon-divergent and leave it at that, shall we?

Please enjoy the story.

(And thank you for your patience to anyone who is waiting for the sequel to "A Wolf By Any Other Name"!!)

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

author: ['Cesare']
title: icebreaker
characters: ['Katsuki Yuuri', 'Victor Nikiforov', 'Original Female Character(s)', 'Original Male Character(s)', "Katsuki Yuuri's classmates", 'Yuri Plisetsky']
additional_tags: ['POV Outsider', 'Post-Series', 'College', 'University', 'Study Group', 'Retirement', 'Happy', 'Happy Ending', 'Friendship', 'Coach Victor Nikiforov', 'College Student Katsuki Yuuri', 'Students', 'Oblivious Katsuki Yuuri', 'Supportive Victor Nikiforov', 'Established Katsuki Yuuri/Victor Nikiforov', 'Established Relationship']
summary:
Yuuri's husband is possibly not as oblivious as he seems, because he grins and asks, "Have you never looked up Yuuri?"

"There's a porn actress with the same name who went into politics," says Nate, "so she's most of the results, and some stuff about figure skating."

"Some stuff about figure skating," Victor says ruefully to Yuuri.

(((A post-skating-retirement college scenario based on skygemspeaks' idea about Yuuri's college classmates learning about his figure skating career. I wrote a variation mostly because I just really wanted to include Victor in the mix. This also heavily draws on kevystel's ideas about Yuuri unknowingly breaking hearts everywhere he goes.)))
notes:
As mentioned in this story, there really is a porn actress also named Katsuki Yuuri. However, I decided that if she was going to be a more common search result for the name ahead of figure-skating Katsuki Yuuri, she would have to do something that made a big splash in the news, like going into politics-- so I invented that part.

The quad axel is not a thing yet, but I imagine in a few years, Yurio will be trying for it.

Moyo zolotse: my gold. Tanpopo: dandelion.

author: ['kellifer_fic']
title: By Moon And Stars
characters: ['Derek Hale', 'Stiles Stilinski', 'Scott McCall', 'Allison Argent', 'Peter Hale', 'Lydia Martin', 'Jackson Whittemore', 'Erica Reyes', 'Vernon Boyd', 'Isaac Lahey', 'Sheriff Stilinski']
additional_tags: ['Alternate Universe', 'Alternate Universe - Fusion', 'Emotional/Psychological Abuse', 'Arranged Marriage']
summary:
"Have you heard of this Alpha?" Stiles asks, shuffling up his pallet so Scott has room to sit. Scott does with a grateful little twist of his mouth. Stefan forces him into the Stilinski ceremonial armor when they travel and Stiles can see that it's heavy and doesn't sit well on Scott. He can't shift encased in metal and Stefan knows it.

"I know of him, mostly stories that seem a little fantastical. Shifters exaggerate just like common people. They like their war stories."

"Tell me of him. Tell me a war story."
notes:
Charity fic for the very generous loquerer who wanted a GoT fusion based on this amazing artwork by littleartbot. No knowledge of the source material required as this is... pretty different.

Thank you to my amazing beta LariaGwyn who, to put it simply, makes me better. Any remaining mistakes are my own.

(See the end of the work for more notes.)

Tact and social mores are completely relegated to the back of Derek’s brain, and without thinking, he blurts out, “Did you spend your heat alone?”

Stiles’ head jerks around in surprise, and then he flushes pink and looks away. His voice comes out brusque and unfriendly. “Not that it’s any of your business, but I spend every heat alone.”
notes:
Ohhhhhhkay so first I thought I would never write a/b/o and then I thought I would never write a/b/o that involved heat cycles and yet here I am, writing this fic. All I can say is that my brain is a very strange place.

Warnings for a view of a/b/o that involves a lot of serious discussions of whether or not consent can be granted in this sort of setting. I'm not trying to kinkshame anyone here, just exploring the concept. Plus there is a detailed description of a past rape and a suicide attempt (not in the first chapter, but later in the fic). So yeah, definitely some triggery material in here, take care of yourselves!

I was asked to warn about the scene where the past rape is discussed, so, that's in this chapter. To avoid it, when you get to Stiles and Derek on a stake-out, you can skip ahead, just search for the word 'dating' and it'll take you to the bit where they're talking about that. ^_^
